GE09ram_06_u:3: 6.001.002a kṛtaṃ hanumatā kāryaṃ sumahad bhuvi duṣkaram
GE09ram_06_u:4: 6.001.002c manasāpi yad anyena na śakyaṃ dharaṇītale
GE09ram_06_u:5: 6.001.003a na hi taṃ paripaśyāmi yas tareta mahārṇavam
GE09ram_06_u:6: 6.001.003c anyatra garuṇād vāyor anyatra ca hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:9: 6.001.005a praviṣṭaḥ sattvam āśritya jīvan ko nāma niṣkramet
GE09ram_06_u:10: 6.001.005c ko viśet sudurādharṣāṃ rākṣasaiś ca surakṣitām
GE09ram_06_u:11: 6.001.005e yo vīryabalasaṃpanno na samaḥ syād dhanūmataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:13: 6.001.006c evaṃ vidhāya svabalaṃ sadṛśaṃ vikramasya ca
GE09ram_06_u:14: 6.001.007a yo hi bhṛtyo niyuktaḥ san bhartrā karmaṇi duṣkare
GE09ram_06_u:16: 6.001.008a niyukto nṛpateḥ kāryaṃ na kuryād yaḥ samāhitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:17: 6.001.008c bhṛtyo yuktaḥ samarthaś ca tam āhuḥ puruṣādhamam
GE09ram_06_u:19: 6.001.009c na cātmā laghutāṃ nītaḥ sugrīvaś cāpi toṣitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:20: 6.001.010a ahaṃ ca raghuvaṃśaś ca lakṣmaṇaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:22: 6.001.011a idaṃ tu mama dīnasyā mano bhūyaḥ prakarṣati
GE09ram_06_u:23: 6.001.011c yad ihāsya priyākhyātur na kurmi sadṛśaṃ priyam
GE09ram_06_u:25: 6.001.012c mayā kālam imaṃ prāpya dattas tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:27: 6.001.013c sāgaraṃ tu samāsādya punar naṣṭaṃ mano mama
GE09ram_06_u:30: 6.001.015a yady apy eṣa tu vṛttānto vaidehyā gadito mama
GE09ram_06_u:36: 6.002.002a kiṃ tvaṃ saṃtapyase vīra yathānyaḥ prākṛtas tathā
GE09ram_06_u:37: 6.002.002c maivaṃ bhūs tyaja saṃtāpaṃ kṛtaghna iva sauhṛdam
GE09ram_06_u:38: 6.002.003a saṃtāpasya ca te sthānaṃ na hi paśyāmi rāghava
GE09ram_06_u:39: 6.002.003c pravṛttāv upalabdhāyāṃ jñāte ca nilaye ripoḥ
GE09ram_06_u:40: 6.002.004a dhṛtimāñ śāstravit prājñaḥ paṇḍitaś cāsi rāghava
GE09ram_06_u:43: 6.002.005c laṅkām ārohayiṣyāmo haniṣyāmaś ca te ripum
GE09ram_06_u:46: 6.002.007a ime śūrāḥ samarthāś ca sarve no hariyūthapāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:48: 6.002.008a eṣāṃ harṣeṇa jānāmi tarkaś cāsmin dṛḍho mama
GE09ram_06_u:49: 6.002.008c vikrameṇa samāneṣye sītāṃ hatvā yathā ripum
GE09ram_06_u:50: 6.002.009a setur atra yathā vadhyed yathā paśyema tāṃ purīm
GE09ram_06_u:51: 6.002.009c tasya rākṣasarājasya tathā tvaṃ kuru rāghava
GE09ram_06_u:52: 6.002.010a dṛṣṭvā tāṃ hi purīṃ laṅkāṃ trikūṭaśikhare sthitām
GE09ram_06_u:53: 6.002.010c hataṃ ca rāvaṇaṃ yuddhe darśanād upadhāraya
GE09ram_06_u:54: 6.002.011a setubaddhaḥ samudre ca yāval laṅkā samīpataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:55: 6.002.011c sarvaṃ tīrṇaṃ ca vai sainyaṃ jitam ity upadhāryatām
GE09ram_06_u:56: 6.002.012a ime hi samare śūrā harayaḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:57: 6.002.012c tad alaṃ viklavā buddhī rājan sarvārthanāśanī
GE09ram_06_u:59: 6.002.013c yat tu kāryaṃ manuṣyeṇa śauṇḍīryam avalambatā
GE09ram_06_u:61: 6.002.014a vinaṣṭe vā pranaṣṭe vā śokaḥ sarvārthanāśanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:63: 6.002.015a madvidhaiḥ sacivaiḥ sārtham ariṃ jetum ihārhasi
GE09ram_06_u:64: 6.002.015c na hi paśyāmy ahaṃ kaṃ cit triṣu lokeṣu rāghava
GE09ram_06_u:65: 6.002.016a gṛhītadhanuṣo yas te tiṣṭhed abhimukho raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:66: 6.002.016c vānareṣu samāsaktaṃ na te kāryaṃ vipatsyate
GE09ram_06_u:67: 6.002.017a acirād drakṣyase sītāṃ tīrtvā sāgaram akṣayam
GE09ram_06_u:68: 6.002.017c tad alaṃ śokam ālambya krodham ālamba bhūpate
GE09ram_06_u:69: 6.002.018a niśceṣṭāḥ kṣatriyā mandāḥ sarve caṇḍasya bibhyati
GE09ram_06_u:72: 6.002.019c ime hi samare śūrā harayaḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:74: 6.002.020c kathaṃ cit paripaśyāmas te vayaṃ varuṇālayam
GE09ram_06_u:75: 6.002.021a kim uktvā bahudhā cāpi sarvathā vijayī bhavān
GE09ram_06_u:80: 6.003.003a kati durgāṇi durgāyā laṅkāyās tad bravīhi me
GE09ram_06_u:81: 6.003.003c jñātum icchāmi tat sarvaṃ darśanād iva vānara
GE09ram_06_u:83: 6.003.004c gupti karma ca laṅkāyā rakṣasāṃ sadanāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:84: 6.003.005a yathāsukhaṃ yathāvac ca laṅkāyām asi dṛṣṭavān
GE09ram_06_u:85: 6.003.005c saram ācakṣva tattvena sarvathā kuśalo hy asi
GE09ram_06_u:87: 6.003.006c vākyaṃ vākyavidāṃ śreṣṭho rāmaṃ punar athābravīt
GE09ram_06_u:89: 6.003.007c guptā purī yathā laṅkā rakṣitā ca yathā balaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:90: 6.003.008a parāṃ samṛddhiṃ laṅkāyāḥ sāgarasya ca bhīmatām
GE09ram_06_u:91: 6.003.008c vibhāgaṃ ca balaughasya nirdeśaṃ vāhanasya ca
GE09ram_06_u:95: 6.003.010c dvārāṇi vipulāny asyāś catvāri sumahānti ca
GE09ram_06_u:99: 6.003.012c śataśo rocitā vīraiḥ śataghnyo rakṣasāṃ gaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:100: 6.003.013a sauvarṇaś ca mahāṃs tasyāḥ prākāro duṣpradharṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:108: 6.003.017a ekas tv akampyo balavān saṃkramaḥ sumahādṛḍhaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:109: 6.003.017c kāñcanair bahubhiḥ stambhair vedikābhiś ca śobhitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:113: 6.003.019c nādeyaṃ pārvataṃ vanyaṃ kṛtrimaṃ ca caturvidham
GE09ram_06_u:115: 6.003.020c naupathaś cāpi nāsty atra nirādeśaś ca sarvataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:116: 6.003.021a śailāgre racitā durgā sā pūr devapuropamā
GE09ram_06_u:118: 6.003.022a parighāś ca śataghnyaś ca yantrāṇi vividhāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:130: 6.003.028a te mayā saṃkramā bhagnāḥ parikhāś cāvapūritāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:131: 6.003.028c dagdhā ca nagarī laṅkā prākārāś cāvasāditāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:132: 6.003.029a yena kena tu mārgeṇa tarāma varuṇālayam
GE09ram_06_u:134: 6.003.030a aṅgado dvivido maindo jāmbavān panaso nalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:135: 6.003.030c nīlaḥ senāpatiś caiva balaśeṣeṇa kiṃ tava
GE09ram_06_u:136: 6.003.031a plavamānā hi gatvā tāṃ rāvaṇasya mahāpurīm
GE09ram_06_u:142: 6.004.002a yāṃ nivedayase laṅkāṃ purīṃ bhīmasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:143: 6.004.002c kṣipram enāṃ vadhiṣyāmi satyam etad bravīmi te
GE09ram_06_u:145: 6.004.003c yukto muhūrto vijayaḥ prāpto madhyaṃ divākaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:146: 6.004.004a uttarā phalgunī hy adya śvas tu hastena yokṣyate
GE09ram_06_u:148: 6.004.005a nimittāni ca dhanyāni yāni prādurbhavanti me
GE09ram_06_u:150: 6.004.006a upariṣṭād dhi nayanaṃ sphuramāṇam idaṃ mama
GE09ram_06_u:152: 6.004.007a agre yātu balasyāsya nīlo mārgam avekṣitum
GE09ram_06_u:155: 6.004.008c pathā madhumatā cāśu senāṃ senāpate naya
GE09ram_06_u:157: 6.004.009c rākṣasāḥ parirakṣethās tebhyas tvaṃ nityam udyataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:162: 6.004.012a gajaś ca girisaṃkāśo gavayaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:163: 6.004.012c gavākṣaś cāgrato yāntu gavāṃ dṛptā ivarṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:172: 6.004.017a jāmbavāṃś ca suṣeṇaś ca vegadarśī ca vānaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:173: 6.004.017c ṛkṣarājo mahāsattvaḥ kukṣiṃ rakṣantu te trayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:177: 6.004.019c guhābhyaḥ śikharebhyaś ca āśu pupluvire tadā
GE09ram_06_u:179: 6.004.020c jagāma rāmo dharmātmā sasainyo dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
GE09ram_06_u:180: 6.004.021a śataiḥ śatasahasraiś ca koṭībhir ayutair api
GE09ram_06_u:181: 6.004.021c vāraṇābhiś ca haribhir yayau parivṛtas tadā
GE09ram_06_u:182: 6.004.022a taṃ yāntam anuyāti sma mahatī harivāhinī
GE09ram_06_u:184: 6.004.023c āplavantaḥ plavantaś ca garjantaś ca plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:185: 6.004.023e kṣvelanto ninadantaś ca jagmur vai dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
GE09ram_06_u:186: 6.004.024a bhakṣayantaḥ sugandhīni madhūni ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:188: 6.004.025a anyonyaṃ sahasā dṛṣṭā nirvahanti kṣipanti ca
GE09ram_06_u:189: 6.004.025c patantaś cotpatanty anye pātayanty apare parān
GE09ram_06_u:190: 6.004.026a rāvaṇo no nihantavyaḥ sarve ca rajanīcarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:192: 6.004.027a purastād ṛṣabho vīro nīlaḥ kumuda eva ca
GE09ram_06_u:193: 6.004.027c pathānaṃ śodhayanti sma vānarair bahubhiḥ saha
GE09ram_06_u:194: 6.004.028a madhye tu rājā sugrīvo rāmo lakṣmaṇa eva ca
GE09ram_06_u:196: 6.004.029a hariḥ śatabalir vīraḥ koṭībhir daśabhir vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:197: 6.004.029c sarvām eko hy avaṣṭabhya rarakṣa harivāhinīm
GE09ram_06_u:200: 6.004.031a suṣeṇo jāmbavāṃś caiva ṛkṣair bahubhir āvṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:203: 6.004.032c saṃpatan patatāṃ śreṣṭhas tad balaṃ paryapālayat
GE09ram_06_u:204: 6.004.033a darīmikhaḥ prajaṅghaś ca jambho 'tha rabhasaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:205: 6.004.033c sarvataś ca yayur vīrās tvarayantaḥ plavaṃgamān
GE09ram_06_u:210: 6.004.036a tasya dāśaratheḥ pārśve śūrās te kapikuñjarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:211: 6.004.036c tūrṇam āpupluvuḥ sarve sadaśvā iva coditāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:214: 6.004.038a tam aṅgadagato rāmaṃ lakṣmaṇaḥ śubhayā girā
GE09ram_06_u:216: 6.004.039a hṛtām avāpya vaidehīṃ kṣipraṃ hatvā ca rāvaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:218: 6.004.040a mahānti ca nimittāni divi bhūmau ca rāghava
GE09ram_06_u:220: 6.004.041a anu vāti śubho vāyuḥ senāṃ mṛduhitaḥ sukhaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:222: 6.004.042a prasannāś ca diśaḥ sarvā vimalaś ca divākaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:223: 6.004.042c uśanā ca prasannārcir anu tvāṃ bhārgavo gataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:224: 6.004.043a brahmarāśir viśuddhaś ca śuddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:234: 6.004.048a prasannāḥ surasāś cāpo vanāni phalavanti ca
GE09ram_06_u:238: 6.004.050a evam ārya samīkṣyaitān prīto bhavitum arhasi
GE09ram_06_u:239: 6.004.050c iti bhrātaram āśvāsya hṛṣṭaḥ saumitrir abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:240: 6.004.051a athāvṛtya mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ jagāma mahatī camūḥ
GE09ram_06_u:242: 6.004.052a karāgraiś caraṇāgraiś ca vānarair uddhataṃ rajaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:243: 6.004.052c bhaumam antardadhe lokaṃ nivārya savituḥ prabhām
GE09ram_06_u:244: 6.004.053a sā sma yāti divārātraṃ mahatī harivāhinī
GE09ram_06_u:249: 6.004.055c sahyaparvatam āsedur malayaṃ ca mahī dharam
GE09ram_06_u:251: 6.004.056c paśyann api yayau rāmaḥ sahyasya malayasya ca
GE09ram_06_u:253: 6.004.057c karavīrāṃś ca timiśān bhañjanti sma plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:257: 6.004.059c yayuḥ pibanto hṛṣṭās te madhūni madhupiṅgalāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:261: 6.004.061c anye vṛkṣān prapadyante prapatanty api cāpare
GE09ram_06_u:262: 6.004.062a babhūva vasudhā tais tu saṃpūrṇā haripuṃgavaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:268: 6.004.065a te sahyaṃ samatikramya malayaṃ ca mahāgirim
GE09ram_06_u:273: 6.004.067c velām āsādya vipulāṃ rāmo vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:275: 6.004.068c ihedānīṃ vicintā sā yā na pūrvaṃ samutthitā
GE09ram_06_u:277: 6.004.069c na cāyam anupāyena śakyas taritum arṇavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:278: 6.004.070a tad ihaiva niveśo 'stu mantraḥ prastūyatām iha
GE09ram_06_u:281: 6.004.071c rāmaḥ sāgaram āsādya vāsam ājñāpayat tadā
GE09ram_06_u:283: 6.004.072c svāṃ svāṃ senāṃ samutsṛjya mā ca kaś cit kuto vrajet
GE09ram_06_u:284: 6.004.072e gacchantu vānarāḥ śūrā jñeyaṃ channaṃ bhayaṃ ca naḥ
GE09ram_06_u:287: 6.004.074a virarāja samīpasthaṃ sāgarasya tu tad balam
GE09ram_06_u:300: 6.004.080c durgaṃ drugam amārgaṃ tam agādham asurālayam
GE09ram_06_u:302: 6.004.081c utpetuś ca nipetuś ca pravṛddhā jalarāśayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:307: 6.004.084a saṃpṛktaṃ nabhasā hy ambhaḥ saṃpṛktaṃ ca nabho 'mbhasā
GE09ram_06_u:310: 6.004.085c viśeṣo na dvayor āsīt sāgarasyāmbarasya ca
GE09ram_06_u:318: 6.005.001a sā tu nīlena vidhivat svārakṣā susamāhitā
GE09ram_06_u:320: 6.005.002a maindaś ca dvividhaś cobhau tatra vānarapuṃgavau
GE09ram_06_u:321: 6.005.002c viceratuś ca tāṃ senāṃ rakṣārthaṃ sarvato diśam
GE09ram_06_u:323: 6.005.003c pārśvasthaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmo vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:324: 6.005.004a śokaś ca kila kālena gacchatā hy apagacchati
GE09ram_06_u:325: 6.005.004c mama cāpaśyataḥ kāntām ahany ahani vardhate
GE09ram_06_u:326: 6.005.005a na me duḥkhaṃ priyā dūre na me duḥkhaṃ hṛteti ca
GE09ram_06_u:328: 6.005.006a vāhi vāta yataḥ kanyā tāṃ spṛṣṭvā mām api spṛśa
GE09ram_06_u:330: 6.005.007a tan me dahati gātrāṇi viṣaṃ pītam ivāśaye
GE09ram_06_u:331: 6.005.007c hā nātheti priyā sā māṃ hriyamāṇā yad abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:333: 6.005.008c rātriṃ divaṃ śarīraṃ me dahyate madanāgninā
GE09ram_06_u:335: 6.005.009c kathaṃ cit prajvalan kāmaḥ samāsuptaṃ jale dahet
GE09ram_06_u:336: 6.005.010a bahv etat kāmayānasya śakyam etena jīvitum
GE09ram_06_u:337: 6.005.010c yad ahaṃ sā ca vāmorur ekāṃ dharaṇim āśritau
GE09ram_06_u:339: 6.005.011c upasnehena jīvāmi jīvantīṃ yac chṛṇomi tām
GE09ram_06_u:341: 6.005.012c vijitya śatrūn drakṣyāmi sītāṃ sphītām iva śriyam
GE09ram_06_u:342: 6.005.013a kadā nu cārubimbauṣṭhaṃ tasyāḥ padmam ivānanam
GE09ram_06_u:344: 6.005.014a tau tasyāḥ saṃhatau pīnau stanau tālaphalopamau
GE09ram_06_u:345: 6.005.014c kadā nu khalu sotkampau hasantyā māṃ bhajiṣyataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:349: 6.005.016c vidhūya jaladān nīlāñ śaśilekhā śaratsv iva
GE09ram_06_u:354: 6.005.019a kadā nu khalu māṃ sādhvī sītāmarasutopamā
GE09ram_06_u:355: 6.005.019c sotkaṇṭhā kaṇṭham ālambya mokṣyaty ānandajaṃ jalam
GE09ram_06_u:356: 6.005.020a kadā śokam imaṃ ghoraṃ maithilī viprayogajam
GE09ram_06_u:358: 6.005.021a evaṃ vilapatas tasya tatra rāmasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:362: 6.006.001a laṅkāyāṃ tu kṛtaṃ karma ghoraṃ dṛṣṭvā bhavāvaham
GE09ram_06_u:364: 6.006.001e abravīd rākṣasān sarvān hriyā kiṃ cid avāṅmukhaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:365: 6.006.002a dharṣitā ca praviṣṭā ca laṅkā duṣprasahā purī
GE09ram_06_u:366: 6.006.002c tena vānaramātreṇa dṛṣṭā sītā ca jānakī
GE09ram_06_u:367: 6.006.003a prasādo dharṣitaś caityaḥ pravarā rākṣasā hatāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:368: 6.006.003c āvilā ca purī laṅkā sarvā hanumatā kṛtā
GE09ram_06_u:369: 6.006.004a kiṃ kariṣyāmi bhadraṃ vaḥ kiṃ vā yuktam anantaram
GE09ram_06_u:370: 6.006.004c ucyatāṃ naḥ samarthaṃ yat kṛtaṃ ca sukṛtaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_06_u:371: 6.006.005a mantramūlaṃ hi vijayaṃ prāhur āryā manasvinaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:372: 6.006.005c tasmād vai rocaye mantraṃ rāmaṃ prati mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:374: 6.006.006c teṣāṃ tu samavetānāṃ guṇadoṣaṃ vadāmy aham
GE09ram_06_u:376: 6.006.007c mitrair vāpi samānārthair bāndhavair api vā hitaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:378: 6.006.008c daive ca kurute yatnaṃ tam āhuḥ puruṣottamam
GE09ram_06_u:379: 6.006.009a eko 'rthaṃ vimṛśed eko dharme prakurute manaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:380: 6.006.009c ekaḥ kāryāṇi kurute tam āhur madhyamaṃ naram
GE09ram_06_u:382: 6.006.010c kariṣyāmīti yaḥ kāryam upekṣet sa narādhamaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:386: 6.006.012c mantriṇo yatra nirastās tam āhur mantram uttamam
GE09ram_06_u:387: 6.006.013a bahvyo 'pi matayo gatvā mantriṇo hy arthanirṇaye
GE09ram_06_u:388: 6.006.013c punar yatraikatāṃ prāptaḥ sa mantro madhyamaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:390: 6.006.014c na caikamatye śreyo 'sti mantraḥ so 'dhama ucyate
GE09ram_06_u:395: 6.006.017a tariṣyati ca suvyaktaṃ rāghavaḥ sāgaraṃ sukham
GE09ram_06_u:397: 6.006.018a asminn evaṃgate kārye viruddhe vānaraiḥ saha
GE09ram_06_u:398: 6.006.018c hitaṃ pure ca sainye ca sarvaṃ saṃmantryatāṃ mama
GE09ram_06_u:399: 6.007.001a ity uktā rākṣasendreṇa rākṣasās te mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:402: 6.007.002c sumahan no balaṃ kasmād viṣādaṃ bhajate bhavān
GE09ram_06_u:404: 6.007.003c sumahat kadanaṃ kṛtvā vaśyas te dhanadaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:407: 6.007.005a vinihatya ca yakṣaughān vikṣobhya ca vigṛhya ca
GE09ram_06_u:413: 6.007.008a nirjitās te mahābāho nāgā gatvā rasātalam
GE09ram_06_u:414: 6.007.008c vāsukis takṣakaḥ śaṅkho jaṭī ca vaśam āhṛtāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:415: 6.007.009a akṣayā balavantaś ca śūrā labdhavarāḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:416: 6.007.009c tvayā saṃvatsaraṃ yuddhvā samare dānavā vibho
GE09ram_06_u:419: 6.007.011a śūrāś ca balavantaś ca varuṇasya sutā raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:423: 6.007.013a jayaś ca viplulaḥ prāpto mṛtyuś ca pratiṣedhitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:424: 6.007.013c suyuddhena ca te sarve lokās tatra sutoṣitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:426: 6.007.014c āsīd vasumatī pūrṇā mahadbhir iva pādapaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:427: 6.007.015a teṣāṃ vīryaguṇotsāhair na samo rāghavo raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:428: 6.007.015c prasahya te tvayā rājan hatāḥ paramadurjayāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:429: 6.007.016a rājan nāpad ayukteyam āgatā prākṛtāj janāt
GE09ram_06_u:430: 6.007.016c hṛdi naiva tvayā kāryā tvaṃ vadhiṣyasi rāghavam
GE09ram_06_u:432: 6.008.001c abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ śūraḥ senāpatis tadā
GE09ram_06_u:434: 6.008.002c na tvāṃ dharṣayituṃ śaktāḥ kiṃ punar vānarā raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:435: 6.008.003a sarve pramattā viśvastā vañcitāḥ sma hanūmatā
GE09ram_06_u:436: 6.008.003c na hi me jīvato gacchej jīvan sa vanagocaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:438: 6.008.004c karomy avānarāṃ bhūmim ājñāpayatu māṃ bhavān
GE09ram_06_u:440: 6.008.005c nāgamiṣyati te duḥkhaṃ kiṃ cid ātmāparādhajam
GE09ram_06_u:441: 6.008.006a abravīc ca susaṃkruddho durmukho nāma rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:442: 6.008.006c idaṃ na kṣamaṇīyaṃ hi sarveṣāṃ naḥ pradharṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:446: 6.008.008c praviṣṭān sāgaraṃ bhīmam ambaraṃ vā rasātalam
GE09ram_06_u:449: 6.008.010a kiṃ vo hanumatā kāryaṃ kṛpaṇena tapasvinā
GE09ram_06_u:453: 6.008.012a kaumbhakarṇis tato vīro nikumbho nāma vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:458: 6.008.014c kruddhaḥ parilihan vaktraṃ jihvayā vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:463: 6.008.016e sāṅgadaṃ ca hanūmantaṃ rāmaṃ ca raṇakuñjaram
GE09ram_06_u:466: 6.009.002a agniketuś ca durdharṣo raśmiketuś ca rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:469: 6.009.003c dhūmrākṣaś cātikāyaś ca durmukhaś caiva rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:471: 6.009.004c cāpāni ca sabāṇāni khaḍgāṃś ca vipulāñ śitān
GE09ram_06_u:473: 6.009.005c abruvan rāvaṇaṃ sarve pradīptā iva tejasā
GE09ram_06_u:474: 6.009.006a adya rāmaṃ vadhiṣyāmaḥ sugrīvaṃ ca salakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:475: 6.009.006c kṛpaṇaṃ ca hanūmantaṃ laṅkā yena pradharṣitā
GE09ram_06_u:477: 6.009.007c abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ punaḥ pratyupaveśya tān
GE09ram_06_u:478: 6.009.008a apy upāyais tribhis tāta yo 'rthaḥ prāptuṃ na śakyate
GE09ram_06_u:479: 6.009.008c tasya vikramakālāṃs tān yuktān āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:481: 6.009.009c vikramās tāta sidhyanti parīkṣya vidhinā kṛtāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:482: 6.009.010a apramattaṃ kathaṃ taṃ tu vijigīṣuṃ bale sthitam
GE09ram_06_u:485: 6.009.011c kṛtaṃ hanumatā karma duṣkaraṃ tarkayeta kaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:487: 6.009.012c pareṣāṃ sahasāvajñā na kartavyā kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_06_u:490: 6.009.014a kharo yady ativṛttas tu rāmeṇa nihato raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:491: 6.009.014c avaśyaṃ prāṇināṃ prāṇā rakṣitavyā yathā balam
GE09ram_06_u:492: 6.009.015a etannimittaṃ vaidehī bhayaṃ naḥ sumahad bhavet
GE09ram_06_u:493: 6.009.015c āhṛtā sā parityājyā kalahārthe kṛte na kim
GE09ram_06_u:494: 6.009.016a na naḥ kṣamaṃ vīryavatā tena dharmānuvartinā
GE09ram_06_u:495: 6.009.016c vairaṃ nirarthakaṃ kartuṃ dīyatām asya maithilī
GE09ram_06_u:497: 6.009.017c purīṃ dārayate bāṇair dīyatām asya maithilī
GE09ram_06_u:499: 6.009.018c nāvaskandati no laṅkāṃ tāvat sītā pradīyatām
GE09ram_06_u:500: 6.009.019a vinaśyed dhi purī laṅkā śūrāḥ sarve ca rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:501: 6.009.019c rāmasya dayitā patnī na svayaṃ yadi dīyate
GE09ram_06_u:502: 6.009.020a prasādaye tvāṃ bandhutvāt kuruṣva vacanaṃ mama
GE09ram_06_u:503: 6.009.020c hitaṃ pathyaṃ tv ahaṃ brūmi dīyatām asya maithilī
GE09ram_06_u:505: 6.009.021c sṛjaty amoghān viśikhān vadhāya te; pradīyatāṃ dāśarathāya maithilī
GE09ram_06_u:506: 6.009.022a tyajasva kopaṃ sukhadharmanāśanaṃ; bhajasva dharmaṃ ratikīrtivardhanam
GE09ram_06_u:507: 6.009.022c prasīda jīvema saputrabāndhavāḥ; pradīyatāṃ dāśarathāya maithilī
GE09ram_06_u:513: 6.010.003c hṛṣyanti vyasaneṣv ete jñātīnāṃ jñātayaḥ sadā
GE09ram_06_u:514: 6.010.004a pradhānaṃ sādhakaṃ vaidyaṃ dharmaśīlaṃ ca rākṣasa
GE09ram_06_u:515: 6.010.004c jñātayo hy avamanyante śūraṃ paribhavanti ca
GE09ram_06_u:518: 6.010.006a śrūyante hastibhir gītāḥ ślokāḥ padmavane kva cit
GE09ram_06_u:519: 6.010.006c pāśahastān narān dṛṣṭvā śṛṇu tān gadato mama
GE09ram_06_u:520: 6.010.007a nāgnir nānyāni śastrāṇi na naḥ pāśā bhayāvahāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:521: 6.010.007c ghorāḥ svārthaprayuktās tu jñātayo no bhayāvahāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:522: 6.010.008a upāyam ete vakṣyanti grahaṇe nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:523: 6.010.008c kṛtsnād bhayāj jñātibhayaṃ sukaṣṭaṃ viditaṃ ca naḥ
GE09ram_06_u:524: 6.010.009a vidyate goṣu saṃpannaṃ vidyate brāhmaṇe damaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:525: 6.010.009c vidyate strīṣu cāpalyaṃ vidyate jñātito bhayam
GE09ram_06_u:526: 6.010.010a tato neṣṭam idaṃ saumya yad ahaṃ lokasatkṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:527: 6.010.010c aiśvaryam abhijātaś ca ripūṇāṃ mūrdhni ca sthitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:528: 6.010.011a anyas tv evaṃvidhaṃ brūyād vākyam etan niśācara
GE09ram_06_u:529: 6.010.011c asmin muhūrte na bhavet tvāṃ tu dhik kulapāṃsanam
GE09ram_06_u:530: 6.010.012a ity uktaḥ paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ nyāyavādī vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:532: 6.010.013a abravīc ca tadā vākyaṃ jātakrodho vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:534: 6.010.014a sa tvaṃ bhrātāsi me rājan brūhi māṃ yad yad icchasi
GE09ram_06_u:535: 6.010.014c idaṃ tu paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ na kṣamāmy anṛtaṃ tava
GE09ram_06_u:537: 6.010.015c na gṛhṇanty akṛtātmānaḥ kālasya vaśam āgatāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:539: 6.010.016c apriyasya tu pathyasya vaktā śrotā ca durlabhaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:541: 6.010.017c na naśyantam upekṣeyaṃ pradīptaṃ śaraṇaṃ yathā
GE09ram_06_u:543: 6.010.018c na tvām icchāmy ahaṃ draṣṭuṃ rāmeṇa nihataṃ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:544: 6.010.019a śūrāś ca balavantaś ca kṛtāstrāś ca raṇājire
GE09ram_06_u:546: 6.010.020a ātmānaṃ sarvathā rakṣa purīṃ cemāṃ sarākṣasām
GE09ram_06_u:547: 6.010.020c svasti te 'stu gamiṣyāmi sukhī bhava mayā vinā
GE09ram_06_u:548: 6.010.021a nivāryamāṇasya mayā hitaiṣiṇā; na rocate te vacanaṃ niśācara
GE09ram_06_u:549: 6.010.021c parītakālā hi gatāyuṣo narā; hitaṃ na gṛhṇanti suhṛdbhir īritam
GE09ram_06_u:550: 6.011.001a ity uktvā paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ rāvaṇaṃ rāvaṇānujaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:555: 6.011.003c vānaraiḥ saha durdharṣaś cintayām āsa buddhimān
GE09ram_06_u:556: 6.011.004a cintayitvā muhūrtaṃ tu vānarāṃs tān uvāca ha
GE09ram_06_u:559: 6.011.005c rākṣaso 'bhyeti paśyadhvam asmān hantuṃ na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:560: 6.011.006a sugrīvasya vacaḥ śrutvā sarve te vānarottamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:561: 6.011.006c sālān udyamya śailāṃś ca idaṃ vacanam abruvan
GE09ram_06_u:562: 6.011.007a śīghraṃ vyādiśa no rājan vadhāyaiṣāṃ durātmanām
GE09ram_06_u:565: 6.011.008c uttaraṃ tīram āsādya khastha eva vyatiṣṭhata
GE09ram_06_u:566: 6.011.009a uvāca ca mahāprājñaḥ svareṇa mahatā mahān
GE09ram_06_u:567: 6.011.009c sugrīvaṃ tāṃś ca saṃprekṣya khastha eva vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:569: 6.011.010c tasyāham anujo bhrātā vibhīṣaṇa iti śrutaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:570: 6.011.011a tena sītā janasthānād dhṛtā hatvā jaṭāyuṣam
GE09ram_06_u:571: 6.011.011c ruddhvā ca vivaśā dīnā rākṣasībhiḥ surakṣitā
GE09ram_06_u:572: 6.011.012a tam ahaṃ hetubhir vākyair vividhaiś ca nyadarśayam
GE09ram_06_u:573: 6.011.012c sādhu niryātyatāṃ sītā rāmāyeti punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:574: 6.011.013a sa ca na pratijagrāha rāvaṇaḥ kālacoditaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:577: 6.011.014c tyaktvā putrāṃś ca dārāṃś ca rāghavaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:580: 6.011.016a etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā sugrīvo laghuvikramaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:583: 6.011.017c caturbhiḥ saha rakṣobhir bhavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:585: 6.011.018c tasyāhaṃ nigrahaṃ manye kṣamaṃ kṣamavatāṃ vara
GE09ram_06_u:587: 6.011.019c prahartuṃ māyayā channo viśvaste tvayi rāghava
GE09ram_06_u:588: 6.011.020a badhyatām eṣa tīvreṇa daṇḍena sacivaiḥ saha
GE09ram_06_u:589: 6.011.020c rāvaṇasya nṛśaṃsasya bhrātā hy eṣa vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:590: 6.011.021a evam uktvā tu taṃ rāmaṃ saṃrabdho vāhinīpatiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:592: 6.011.022a sugrīvasya tu tad vākyaṃ śrutvā rāmo mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:595: 6.011.023c vākyaṃ hetumad atyarthaṃ bhavadbhir api tac chrutam
GE09ram_06_u:596: 6.011.024a suhṛdā hy arthakṛccheṣu yuktaṃ buddhimatā satā
GE09ram_06_u:598: 6.011.025a ity evaṃ paripṛṣṭās te svaṃ svaṃ matam atandritāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:600: 6.011.026a ajñātaṃ nāsti te kiṃ cit triṣu lokeṣu rāghava
GE09ram_06_u:601: 6.011.026c ātmānaṃ pūjayan rāma pṛcchasy asmān suhṛttayā
GE09ram_06_u:602: 6.011.027a tvaṃ hi satyavrataḥ śūro dhārmiko dṛḍhavikramaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:603: 6.011.027c parīkṣya kārā smṛtimān nisṛṣṭātmā suhṛtsu ca
GE09ram_06_u:604: 6.011.028a tasmād ekaikaśas tāvad bruvantu sacivās tava
GE09ram_06_u:605: 6.011.028c hetuto matisaṃpannāḥ samarthāś ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:608: 6.011.030a śatroḥ sakāśāt saṃprāptaḥ sarvathā śaṅkya eva hi
GE09ram_06_u:611: 6.011.031c praharanti ca randhreṣu so 'narthaḥ sumahān bhavet
GE09ram_06_u:613: 6.011.032c guṇataḥ saṃgrahaṃ kuryād doṣatas tu visarjayet
GE09ram_06_u:614: 6.011.033a yadi doṣo mahāṃs tasmiṃs tyajyatām aviśaṅkitam
GE09ram_06_u:615: 6.011.033c guṇān vāpi bahūñ jñātvā saṃgrahaḥ kriyatāṃ nṛpa
GE09ram_06_u:616: 6.011.034a śarabhas tv atha niścitya sārthaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:619: 6.011.035c parīkṣya ca tataḥ kāryo yathānyāyaṃ parigrahaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:620: 6.011.036a jāmbavāṃs tv atha saṃprekṣya śāstrabuddhyā vicakṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:622: 6.011.037a baddhavairāc ca pāpāc ca rākṣasendrād vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:623: 6.011.037c adeśa kāle saṃprāptaḥ sarvathā śaṅkyatām ayam
GE09ram_06_u:628: 6.011.040a bhāvam asya tu vijñāya tatas tattvaṃ kariṣyasi
GE09ram_06_u:629: 6.011.040c yadi dṛṣṭo na duṣṭo vā buddhipūrvaṃ nararṣabha
GE09ram_06_u:631: 6.011.041c uvāca vacanaṃ ślakṣṇam arthavan madhuraṃ laghu
GE09ram_06_u:632: 6.011.042a na bhavantaṃ matiśreṣṭhaṃ samarthaṃ vadatāṃ varam
GE09ram_06_u:634: 6.011.043a na vādān nāpi saṃgharṣān nādhikyān na ca kāmataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:636: 6.011.044a arthānarthanimittaṃ hi yad uktaṃ sacivais tava
GE09ram_06_u:637: 6.011.044c tatra doṣaṃ prapaśyāmi kriyā na hy upapadyate
GE09ram_06_u:638: 6.011.045a ṛte niyogāt sāmarthyam avaboddhuṃ na śakyate
GE09ram_06_u:639: 6.011.045c sahasā viniyogo hi doṣavān pratibhāti me
GE09ram_06_u:640: 6.011.046a cārapraṇihitaṃ yuktaṃ yad uktaṃ sacivais tava
GE09ram_06_u:642: 6.011.047a adeśa kāle saṃprāpta ity ayaṃ yad vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:643: 6.011.047c vivakṣā cātra me 'stīyaṃ tāṃ nibodha yathā mati
GE09ram_06_u:644: 6.011.048a sa eṣa deśaḥ kālaś ca bhavatīha yathā tathā
GE09ram_06_u:645: 6.011.048c puruṣāt puruṣaṃ prāpya tathā doṣaguṇāv api
GE09ram_06_u:646: 6.011.049a daurātmyaṃ rāvaṇe dṛṣṭvā vikramaṃ ca tathā tvayi
GE09ram_06_u:647: 6.011.049c yuktam āgamanaṃ tasya sadṛśaṃ tasya buddhitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:648: 6.011.050a ajñātarūpaiḥ puruṣaiḥ sa rājan pṛcchyatām iti
GE09ram_06_u:649: 6.011.050c yad uktam atra me prekṣā kā cid asti samīkṣitā
GE09ram_06_u:652: 6.011.052a aśakyaḥ sahasā rājan bhāvo vettuṃ parasya vai
GE09ram_06_u:653: 6.011.052c antaḥ svabhāvair gītais tair naipuṇyaṃ paśyatā bhṛśam
GE09ram_06_u:654: 6.011.053a na tv asya bruvato jātu lakṣyate duṣṭabhāvatā
GE09ram_06_u:655: 6.011.053c prasannaṃ vadanaṃ cāpi tasmān me nāsti saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:657: 6.011.054c na cāsya duṣṭā vāk cāpi tasmān nāstīha saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:659: 6.011.055c balād dhi vivṛṇoty eva bhāvam antargataṃ nṛṇām
GE09ram_06_u:662: 6.011.057a udyogaṃ tava saṃprekṣya mithyāvṛttaṃ ca rāvaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:663: 6.011.057c vālinaś ca vadhaṃ śrutvā sugrīvaṃ cābhiṣecitam
GE09ram_06_u:665: 6.011.058c etāvat tu puraskṛtya yujyate tv asya saṃgrahaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:667: 6.011.059c tvaṃ pramāṇaṃ tu śeṣasya śrutvā buddhimatāṃ vara
GE09ram_06_u:668: 6.012.001a atha rāmaḥ prasannātmā śrutvā vāyusutasya ha
GE09ram_06_u:670: 6.012.002a mamāpi tu vivakṣāsti kā cit prati vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:671: 6.012.002c śrutam icchāmi tat sarvaṃ bhavadbhiḥ śreyasi sthitaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:672: 6.012.003a mitrabhāvena saṃprāptaṃ na tyajeyaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_06_u:673: 6.012.003c doṣo yady api tasya syāt satām etad agarhitam
GE09ram_06_u:677: 6.012.005c yat tvam āryaṃ prabhāṣethāḥ sattvavān sapathe sthitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:678: 6.012.006a mama cāpy antarātmāyaṃ śuddhiṃ vetti vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:679: 6.012.006c anumanāc ca bhāvāc ca sarvataḥ suparīkṣitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:680: 6.012.007a tasmāt kṣipraṃ sahāsmābhis tulyo bhavatu rāghava
GE09ram_06_u:682: 6.012.008a sa sugrīvasya tad vākyayṃ rāmaḥ śrutvā vimṛśya ca
GE09ram_06_u:684: 6.012.009a suduṣṭo vāpy aduṣṭo vā kim eṣa rajanīcaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:685: 6.012.009c sūkṣmam apy ahitaṃ kartuṃ mamāśaktaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_06_u:686: 6.012.010a piśācān dānavān yakṣān pṛthivyāṃ caiva rākṣasān
GE09ram_06_u:688: 6.012.011a śrūyate hi kapotena śatruḥ śaraṇam āgataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:689: 6.012.011c arcitaś ca yathānyāyaṃ svaiś ca māṃsair nimantritaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:690: 6.012.012a sa hi taṃ pratijagrāha bhāryā hartāram āgatam
GE09ram_06_u:691: 6.012.012c kapoto vānaraśreṣṭha kiṃ punar madvidho janaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:693: 6.012.013c śṛṇu gāthāṃ purā gītāṃ dharmiṣṭhāṃ satyavādinā
GE09ram_06_u:695: 6.012.014c na hanyād ānṛśaṃsyārtham api śatruṃ paraṃ pata
GE09ram_06_u:696: 6.012.015a ārto vā yadi vā dṛptaḥ pareṣāṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:698: 6.012.016a sa ced bhayād vā mohād vā kāmād vāpi na rakṣati
GE09ram_06_u:699: 6.012.016c svayā śaktyā yathātattvaṃ tat pāpaṃ lokagarhitam
GE09ram_06_u:701: 6.012.017c ādāya sukṛtaṃ tasya sarvaṃ gacched arakṣitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:702: 6.012.018a evaṃ doṣo mahān atra prapannānām arakṣaṇe
GE09ram_06_u:704: 6.012.019a kariṣyāmi yathārthaṃ tu kaṇḍor vacanam uttamam
GE09ram_06_u:705: 6.012.019c dharmiṣṭhaṃ ca yaśasyaṃ ca svargyaṃ syāt tu phalodaye
GE09ram_06_u:706: 6.012.020a sakṛd eva prapannāya tavāsmīti ca yācate
GE09ram_06_u:707: 6.012.020c abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyo dadāmy etad vrataṃ mama
GE09ram_06_u:709: 6.012.021c vibhīṣaṇo vā sugrīva yadi vā rāvaṇaḥ svayam
GE09ram_06_u:710: 6.012.022a tatas tu sugrīvavaco niśamya tad; dharīśvareṇābhihitaṃ nareśvaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:711: 6.012.022c vibhīṣaṇenāśu jagāma saṃgamaṃ; patatrirājena yathā puraṃdaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:713: 6.013.001c khāt papātāvaniṃ hṛṣṭo bhaktair anucaraiḥ saha
GE09ram_06_u:714: 6.013.002a sa tu rāmasya dharmātmā nipapāta vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:716: 6.013.003a abravīc ca tadā rāmaṃ vākyaṃ tatra vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:717: 6.013.003c dharmayuktaṃ ca yuktaṃ ca sāmprataṃ saṃpraharṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:720: 6.013.005a parityaktā mayā laṅkā mitrāṇi ca dhanāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:721: 6.013.005c bhavadgataṃ me rājyaṃ ca jīvitaṃ ca sukhāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:722: 6.013.006a rākṣasānāṃ vadhe sāhyaṃ laṅkāyāś ca pradharṣaṇe
GE09ram_06_u:724: 6.013.007a iti bruvāṇaṃ rāmas tu pariṣvajya vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:725: 6.013.007c abravīl lakṣmaṇaṃ prītaḥ samudrāj jalam ānaya
GE09ram_06_u:727: 6.013.008c rājānaṃ rakṣasāṃ kṣipraṃ prasanne mayi mānada
GE09ram_06_u:728: 6.013.009a evam uktas tu saumitrir abhyaṣiñcad vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:730: 6.013.010a taṃ prasādaṃ tu rāmasya dṛṣṭvā sadyaḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:731: 6.013.010c pracukruśur mahānādān sādhu sādhv iti cābruvan
GE09ram_06_u:732: 6.013.011a abravīc ca hanūmāṃś ca sugrīvaś ca vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:736: 6.013.013a evam uktas tu dharmajñaḥ pratyuvāca vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:737: 6.013.013c samudraṃ rāghavo rājā śaraṇaṃ gantum arhati
GE09ram_06_u:739: 6.013.014c kartum arhati rāmasya jñāteḥ kāryaṃ mahodadhiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:742: 6.013.016a sa lakṣmaṇaṃ mahātejāḥ sugrīvaṃ ca harīśvaram
GE09ram_06_u:745: 6.013.017c brūhi tvaṃ sahasugrīvas tavāpi yadi rocate
GE09ram_06_u:747: 6.013.018c ubhābhyāṃ saṃpradhāryāryaṃ rocate yat tad ucyatām
GE09ram_06_u:748: 6.013.019a evam uktau tu tau vīrāv ubhau sugrīvalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_06_u:750: 6.013.020a kimarthaṃ no naravyāghra na rociṣyati rāghava
GE09ram_06_u:751: 6.013.020c vibhīṣaṇena yat tūktam asmin kāle sukhāvaham
GE09ram_06_u:753: 6.013.021c laṅkā nāsādituṃ śakyā sendrair api surāsuraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:757: 6.013.023c saṃviveśa tadā rāmo vedyām iva hutāśanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:760: 6.014.002a na ca darśayate mandas tadā rāmasya sāgaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:765: 6.014.004c avalepaṃ samudrasya na darśayati yat svayam
GE09ram_06_u:766: 6.014.005a praśamaś ca kṣamā caiva ārjavaṃ priyavāditā
GE09ram_06_u:767: 6.014.005c asāmarthyaṃ phalanty ete nirguṇeṣu satāṃ guṇāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:770: 6.014.007a na sāmnā śakyate kīrtir na sāmnā śakyate yaśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:771: 6.014.007c prāptuṃ lakṣmaṇa loke 'smiñ jayo vā raṇamūdhani
GE09ram_06_u:774: 6.014.009a mahābhogāni matsyānāṃ kariṇāṃ ca karān iha
GE09ram_06_u:775: 6.014.009c bhogāṃś ca paśya nāgānāṃ mayā bhinnāni lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_06_u:778: 6.014.011a kṣamayā hi samāyuktaṃ mām ayaṃ makarālayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:779: 6.014.011c asamarthaṃ vijānāti dhik kṣamām īdṛśe jane
GE09ram_06_u:785: 6.014.014c babhūva rāmo durdharṣo yugāntāgnir iva jvalan
GE09ram_06_u:786: 6.014.015a saṃpīḍya ca dhanur ghoraṃ kampayitvā śarair jagat
GE09ram_06_u:800: 6.015.001a tato madhyāt samudrasya sāgaraḥ svayam utthitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:801: 6.015.001c udayan hi mahāśailān meror iva divākaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:807: 6.015.004a pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotiś ca rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:808: 6.015.004c svabhāve saumya tiṣṭhanti śāśvataṃ mārgam āśritāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:809: 6.015.005a tat svabhāvo mamāpy eṣa yad agādho 'ham aplavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:810: 6.015.005c vikāras tu bhaved rādha etat te pravadāmy aham
GE09ram_06_u:811: 6.015.006a na kāmān na ca lobhād vā na bhayāt pārthivātmaja
GE09ram_06_u:813: 6.015.007a vidhāsye rāma yenāpi viṣahiṣye hy ahaṃ tathā
GE09ram_06_u:814: 6.015.007c grāhā na prahariṣyanti yāvat senā tariṣyati
GE09ram_06_u:815: 6.015.008a ayaṃ saumya nalo nāma tanujo viśvakarmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:817: 6.015.009a eṣa setuṃ mahotsāhaḥ karotu mayi vānaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:818: 6.015.009c tam ahaṃ dhārayiṣyāmi tathā hy eṣa yathā pitā
GE09ram_06_u:819: 6.015.010a evam uktvodadhir naṣṭaḥ samutthāya nalas tataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:822: 6.015.011c pituḥ sāmarthyam āsthāya tattvam āha mahodadhiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:823: 6.015.012a mama mātur varo datto mandare viśvakarmaṇā
GE09ram_06_u:825: 6.015.013a na cāpy aham anukto vai prabrūyām ātmano guṇān
GE09ram_06_u:830: 6.015.015c babhañjur vānarās tatra pracakarṣuś ca sāgaram
GE09ram_06_u:831: 6.015.016a te sālaiś cāśvakarṇaiś ca dhavair vaṃśaiś ca vānarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:832: 6.015.016c kuṭajair arjunais tālais tikalais timiśair api
GE09ram_06_u:833: 6.015.017a bilvakaiḥ saptaparṇaiś ca karṇikāraiś ca puṣpitaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:835: 6.015.018a samūlāṃś ca vimūlāṃś ca pādapān harisattamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:842: 6.015.021c babhūva tumulaḥ śabdas tadā tasmin mahodadhau
GE09ram_06_u:843: 6.015.022a sa nalena kṛtaḥ setuḥ sāgare makarālaye
GE09ram_06_u:845: 6.015.023a tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:846: 6.015.024a āplavantaḥ plavantaś ca garjantaś ca plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:847: 6.015.024c tam acintyam asahyaṃ ca adbhutaṃ lomaharṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:850: 6.015.025c badhnantaḥ sāgare setuṃ jagmuḥ pāraṃ mahodadheḥ
GE09ram_06_u:855: 6.015.028a agratas tasya sainyasya śrīmān rāmaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:858: 6.015.029c salile prapatanty anye mārgam anye na lebhire
GE09ram_06_u:859: 6.015.029e ke cid vaihāyasa gatāḥ suparṇā iva pupluvuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:862: 6.015.031a vānarāṇāṃ hi sā tīrṇā vāhinī nala setunā
GE09ram_06_u:864: 6.015.032a tad adbhutaṃ rāghava karma duṣkaraṃ; samīkṣya devāḥ saha siddhacāraṇaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:865: 6.015.032c upetya rāmaṃ sahitā maharṣibhiḥ; samabhyaṣiñcan suśubhair jalaiḥ pṛthak
GE09ram_06_u:866: 6.015.033a jayasva śatrūn naradeva medinīṃ; sasāgarāṃ pālaya śāśvatīḥ samāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:867: 6.015.033c itīva rāmaṃ naradevasatkṛtaṃ; śubhair vacobhir vividhair apūjayan
GE09ram_06_u:870: 6.016.002a samagraṃ sāgaraṃ tīrṇaṃ dustaraṃ vānaraṃ balam
GE09ram_06_u:872: 6.016.003a sāgare setubandhaṃ tu na śraddadhyāṃ kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_06_u:873: 6.016.003c avaśyaṃ cāpi saṃkhyeyaṃ tan mayā vānaraṃ balam
GE09ram_06_u:875: 6.016.004c parimāṇaṃ ca vīryaṃ ca ye ca mukhyāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:876: 6.016.005a mantriṇo ye ca rāmasya sugrīvasya ca saṃmatāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:877: 6.016.005c ye pūrvam abhivartante ye ca śūrāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:878: 6.016.006a sa ca setur yathā baddhaḥ sāgare salilārṇave
GE09ram_06_u:879: 6.016.006c niveśaś ca yathā teṣāṃ vānarāṇāṃ mahātmanām
GE09ram_06_u:880: 6.016.007a rāmasya vyavasāyaṃ ca vīryaṃ praharaṇāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:881: 6.016.007c lakṣmaṇasya ca vīrasya tattvato jñātum arhatha
GE09ram_06_u:882: 6.016.008a kaś ca senāpatis teṣāṃ vānarāṇāṃ mahaujasām
GE09ram_06_u:883: 6.016.008c etaj jñātvā yathātattvaṃ śīghram agantum arhathaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:886: 6.016.010a tatas tad vānaraṃ sainyam acintyaṃ lomaharṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:888: 6.016.011a tat sthitaṃ parvatāgreṣu nirdareṣu guhāsu ca
GE09ram_06_u:890: 6.016.012a taramāṇaṃ ca tīrṇaṃ ca tartukāmaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:892: 6.016.013a tau dadarśa mahātejāḥ pracchannau ca vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:895: 6.016.014a tau dṛṣṭvā vyathitau rāmaṃ nirāśau jīvite tadā
GE09ram_06_u:899: 6.016.016a tayos tad vacanaṃ śrutvā rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:901: 6.016.017a yadi dṛṣṭaṃ balaṃ kṛtsnaṃ vayaṃ vā susamīkṣitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:902: 6.016.017c yathoktaṃ vā kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ chandataḥ pratigamyatām
GE09ram_06_u:904: 6.016.018c vaktavyo rakṣasāṃ rājā yathoktaṃ vacanaṃ mama
GE09ram_06_u:905: 6.016.019a yad balaṃ ca samāśritya sītāṃ me hṛtavān asi
GE09ram_06_u:908: 6.016.020c rākṣasaṃ ca balaṃ paśya śarair vidhvaṃsitaṃ mayā
GE09ram_06_u:909: 6.016.021a ghoraṃ roṣam ahaṃ mokṣye balaṃ dhāraya rāvaṇa
GE09ram_06_u:910: 6.016.021c śvaḥkāle vajravān vajraṃ dānaveṣv iva vāsavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:917: 6.016.025a rāmo dāśarathiḥ śrīmāṃl lakṣmaṇaś ca vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:919: 6.016.026a ete śaktāḥ purīṃ laṅkāṃ saprākārāṃ satoraṇām
GE09ram_06_u:921: 6.016.027a yādṛśaṃ tasya rāmasya rūpaṃ praharaṇāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:922: 6.016.027c vadhiṣyati purīṃ laṅkām ekas tiṣṭhantu te trayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:925: 6.016.029a prahṛṣṭarūpā dhvajinī vanaukasāṃ; mahātmanāṃ saṃprati yoddhum icchatām
GE09ram_06_u:926: 6.016.029c alaṃ virodhena śamo vidhīyatāṃ; pradīyatāṃ dāśarathāya maithilī
GE09ram_06_u:931: 6.017.003a tvaṃ tu saumya paritrasto haribhir nirjito bhṛśam
GE09ram_06_u:933: 6.017.003e ko hi nāma sapatno māṃ samare jetum arhati
GE09ram_06_u:934: 6.017.004a ity uktvā paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:938: 6.017.005c paśyamānaḥ samudraṃ ca parvatāṃś ca vanāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:940: 6.017.006a tad apāram asaṃkhyeyaṃ vānarāṇāṃ mahad balam
GE09ram_06_u:942: 6.017.007a eṣāṃ vānaramukhyānāṃ ke śūrāḥ ke mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:944: 6.017.008a keṣāṃ śṛṇoti sugrīvaḥ ke vā yūthapayūthapāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:945: 6.017.008c sāraṇācakṣva me sarvaṃ ke pradhānāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:947: 6.017.009c ācacakṣe 'tha mukhyajño mukhyāṃs tāṃs tu vanaukasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:948: 6.017.010a eṣa yo 'bhimukho laṅkāṃ nardaṃs tiṣṭhati vānaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:953: 6.017.012c balāgre tiṣṭhate vīro nīlo nāmaiṣa yūthapaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:954: 6.017.013a bāhū pragṛhya yaḥ padbhyāṃ mahīṃ gacchati vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:955: 6.017.013c laṅkām abhimukhaḥ kopād abhīkṣṇaṃ ca vijṛmbhate
GE09ram_06_u:957: 6.017.014c sphoṭayaty abhisaṃrabdho lāṅgūlaṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:961: 6.017.016a ye tu viṣṭabhya gātrāṇi kṣveḍayanti nadanti ca
GE09ram_06_u:968: 6.017.019c buddhimān vānaraḥ śūras triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:969: 6.017.020a tūrṇaṃ sugrīvam āgamya punar gacchati vānaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:971: 6.017.021a yaḥ purā gomatītīre ramyaṃ paryeti parvatam
GE09ram_06_u:973: 6.017.022a tatra rājyaṃ praśāsty eṣa kumudo nāma yūthapaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:976: 6.017.023c tāmrāḥ pītāḥ sitāḥ śvetāḥ prakīrṇā ghorakarmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:979: 6.017.025a yas tv eṣa siṃhasaṃkāśaḥ kapilo dīrghakesaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:980: 6.017.025c nibhṛtaḥ prekṣate laṅkāṃ didhakṣann iva cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_06_u:981: 6.017.026a vindhyaṃ kṛṣṇagiriṃ sahyaṃ parvataṃ ca sudarśanam
GE09ram_06_u:982: 6.017.026c rājan satatam adhyāste rambho nāmaiṣa yūthapaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:985: 6.017.028a yas tu karṇau vivṛṇute jṛmbhate ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:986: 6.017.028c na ca saṃvijate mṛtyor na ca yūthād vidhāvati
GE09ram_06_u:988: 6.017.029c rājan satatam adhyāste śarabho nāma yūthapaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:989: 6.017.030a etasya balinaḥ sarve vihārā nāma yūthapāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:991: 6.017.031a yas tu megha ivākāśaṃ mahān āvṛtya tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_06_u:993: 6.017.032a bherīṇām iva saṃnādo yasyaiṣa śrūyate mahān
GE09ram_06_u:996: 6.017.033c yuddhe duṣprasaho nityaṃ panaso nāma yūthapaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:999: 6.017.035a yas tu bhīmāṃ pravalgantīṃ camūṃ tiṣṭhati śobhayan
GE09ram_06_u:1000: 6.017.035c sthitāṃ tīre samudrasya dvitīya iva sāgaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1002: 6.017.036c pibaṃś carati parṇāśāṃ nadīnām uttamāṃ nadīm
GE09ram_06_u:1004: 6.017.037c tvām āhvayati yuddhāya krathano nāma yūthapaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1005: 6.017.038a yas tu gairikavarṇābhaṃ vapuḥ puṣyati vānaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1006: 6.017.038c gavayo nāma tejasvī tvāṃ krodhād abhivartate
GE09ram_06_u:1010: 6.017.040c yūthapā yūthapaśreṣṭhā yeṣāṃ saṃkhyā na vidyate
GE09ram_06_u:1011: 6.018.001a tāṃs tu te 'haṃ pravakṣyāmi prekṣamāṇasya yūthapān
GE09ram_06_u:1012: 6.018.001c rāghavārthe parākrāntā ye na rakṣanti jīvitam
GE09ram_06_u:1013: 6.018.002a snigdhā yasya bahuśyāmā bālā lāṅgūlam āśritāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1014: 6.018.002c tāmrāḥ pītāḥ sitāḥ śvetāḥ prakīrṇā ghorakarmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1021: 6.018.006a nīlān iva mahāmeghāṃs tiṣṭhato yāṃs tu paśyasi
GE09ram_06_u:1025: 6.018.008a parvateṣu ca ye ke cid viṣameṣu nadīṣu ca
GE09ram_06_u:1026: 6.018.008c ete tvām abhivartante rājann ṛṣkāḥ sudāruṇāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1027: 6.018.009a eṣāṃ madhye sthito rājan bhīmākṣo bhīmadarśanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1031: 6.018.011a yavīyān asya tu bhrātā paśyainaṃ parvatopamam
GE09ram_06_u:1032: 6.018.011c bhrātrā samāno rūpeṇa viśiṣṭas tu parākrame
GE09ram_06_u:1035: 6.018.013a etena sāhyaṃ sumahat kṛtaṃ śakrasya dhīmatā
GE09ram_06_u:1036: 6.018.013c devāsure jāmbavatā labdhāś ca bahavo varāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1038: 6.018.014c muñcanti vipulākārā na mṛtyor udvijanti ca
GE09ram_06_u:1039: 6.018.015a rākṣasānāṃ ca sadṛśāḥ piśācānāṃ ca romaśāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1041: 6.018.016a yaṃ tv enam abhisaṃrabdhaṃ plavamānam iva sthitam
GE09ram_06_u:1045: 6.018.018a yaḥ sthitaṃ yojane śailaṃ gacchan pārśvena sevate
GE09ram_06_u:1046: 6.018.018c ūrdhvaṃ tathaiva kāyena gataḥ prāpnoti yojanam
GE09ram_06_u:1047: 6.018.019a yasmān na paramaṃ rūpaṃ catuṣpādeṣu vidyate
GE09ram_06_u:1049: 6.018.020a yena yuddhaṃ tadā dattaṃ raṇe śakrasya dhīmatā
GE09ram_06_u:1050: 6.018.020c parājayaś ca na prāptaḥ so 'yaṃ yūthapayūthapaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1058: 6.018.023e yuddheṣv akatthano nityaṃ krathano nāma yūthapaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1061: 6.018.025a yo gaṅgām anu paryeti trāsayan hastiyūthapān
GE09ram_06_u:1064: 6.018.026c harīṇāṃ vāhinī mukhyo nadīṃ haimavatīm anu
GE09ram_06_u:1066: 6.018.027c ramate vānaraśreṣṭho divi śakra iva svayam
GE09ram_06_u:1068: 6.018.028c eṣa durmarṣaṇo rājan pramāthī nāma yūthapaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1077: 6.018.033a yasya bhāsā sadā bhānti tadvarṇā mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1078: 6.018.033c yasya prasthaṃ mahātmāno na tyajanti maharṣayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1082: 6.018.035c teṣāṃ madhye girivaras tvam ivānagha rakṣasām
GE09ram_06_u:1085: 6.018.037a siṃha iva caturdaṃṣṭrā vyāghrā iva durāsadāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1089: 6.018.039a eṣa caiṣām adhipatir madhye tiṣṭhati vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:1090: 6.018.039c nāmnā pṛthivyāṃ vikhyāto rājañ śatabalīti yaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1092: 6.018.040a gajo gavākṣo gavayo nalo nīlaś ca vānaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1093: 6.018.040c ekaika eva yūthānāṃ koṭibhir daśabhir vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1095: 6.018.041c na śakyante bahutvāt tu saṃkhyātuṃ laghuvikramāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1097: 6.018.042c sarve samarthāḥ pṛthivīṃ kṣaṇena; kartuṃ pravidhvastavikīrṇaśailām
GE09ram_06_u:1099: 6.019.001c balam ālokayan sarvaṃ śuko vākyam athābravīt
GE09ram_06_u:1100: 6.019.002a sthitān paśyasi yān etān mattān iva mahādvipān
GE09ram_06_u:1101: 6.019.002c nyagrodhān iva gāṅgeyān sālān haimavatīn iva
GE09ram_06_u:1104: 6.019.004a eṣāṃ koṭisahasrāṇi nava pañcaca sapta ca
GE09ram_06_u:1108: 6.019.006a yau tau paśyasi tiṣṭhantau kumārau devarūpiṇau
GE09ram_06_u:1109: 6.019.006c maindaś ca dvividaś cobhau tābhyāṃ nāsti samo yudhi
GE09ram_06_u:1111: 6.019.007c āśaṃsete yudhā laṅkām etau marditum ojasā
GE09ram_06_u:1112: 6.019.008a yāv etāv etayoḥ pārśve sthitau parvatasaṃnibhau
GE09ram_06_u:1113: 6.019.008c sumukho vimukhaś caiva mṛtyuputrau pituḥ samau
GE09ram_06_u:1114: 6.019.009a yaṃ tu paśyasi tiṣṭhantaṃ prabhinnam iva kuñjaram
GE09ram_06_u:1115: 6.019.009c yo balāt kṣobhayet kruddhaḥ samudram api vānaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1116: 6.019.010a eṣo 'bhigantā laṅkāyā vaidehyās tava ca prabho
GE09ram_06_u:1117: 6.019.010c enaṃ paśya purā dṛṣṭaṃ vānaraṃ punar āgatam
GE09ram_06_u:1118: 6.019.011a jyeṣṭhaḥ kesariṇaḥ putro vātātmaja iti śrutaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1119: 6.019.011c hanūmān iti vikhyāto laṅghito yena sāgaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1122: 6.019.013a udyantaṃ bhāskaraṃ dṛṣṭvā bālaḥ kila pipāsitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1124: 6.019.014a ādityam āhariṣyāmi na me kṣut pratiyāsyati
GE09ram_06_u:1128: 6.019.016a patitasya kaper asya hanur ekā śilātale
GE09ram_06_u:1129: 6.019.016c kiṃ cid bhinnā dṛḍhahanor hanūmān eṣa tena vai
GE09ram_06_u:1131: 6.019.017c nāsya śakyaṃ balaṃ rūpaṃ prabhāvo vānubhāṣitum
GE09ram_06_u:1132: 6.019.018a eṣa āśaṃsate laṅkām eko marditum ojasā
GE09ram_06_u:1135: 6.019.019c yasmin na calate dharmo yo dharmaṃ nātivartate
GE09ram_06_u:1136: 6.019.020a yo brāhmam astraṃ vedāṃś ca veda vedavidāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1137: 6.019.020c yo bhindyād gaganaṃ bāṇaiḥ parvatāṃś cāpi dārayet
GE09ram_06_u:1138: 6.019.021a yasya mṛtyor iva krodhaḥ śakrasyeva parākramaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1139: 6.019.021c sa eṣa rāmas tvāṃ yoddhuṃ rājan samabhivartate
GE09ram_06_u:1142: 6.019.023a eṣo 'sya lakṣmaṇo nāma bhrātā prāṇasamaḥ priyaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1144: 6.019.024a amarṣī durjayo jetā vikrānto buddhimān balī
GE09ram_06_u:1145: 6.019.024c rāmasya dakṣiṇo bāhur nityaṃ prāṇo bahiścaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1146: 6.019.025a na hy eṣa rāghavasyārthe jīvitaṃ parirakṣati
GE09ram_06_u:1148: 6.019.026a yas tu savyam asau pakṣaṃ rāmasyāśritya tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_06_u:1152: 6.019.028a yaṃ tu paśyasi tiṣṭhantaṃ madhye girim ivācalam
GE09ram_06_u:1155: 6.019.029c yaḥ kapīn ati babhrāja himavān iva parvatān
GE09ram_06_u:1160: 6.019.032a etāṃ ca mālāṃ tārāṃ ca kapirājyaṃ ca śāśvatam
GE09ram_06_u:1162: 6.019.033a evaṃ koṭisahasreṇa śaṅkūnāṃ ca śatena ca
GE09ram_06_u:1165: 6.019.034c tataḥ prayatnaḥ paramo vidhīyatāṃ; yathā jayaḥ syān na paraiḥ parājayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1166: 6.020.001a śukena tu samākhyātāṃs tān dṛṣṭvā hariyūthapān
GE09ram_06_u:1167: 6.020.001c samīpasthaṃ ca rāmasya bhrātaraṃ svaṃ vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:1168: 6.020.002a lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahāvīryaṃ bhujaṃ rāmasya dakṣiṇam
GE09ram_06_u:1170: 6.020.003a kiṃ cid āvignahṛdayo jātakrodhaś ca rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1171: 6.020.003c bhartsayām āsa tau vīrau kathānte śukasāraṇau
GE09ram_06_u:1174: 6.020.005a na tāvat sadṛśaṃ nāma sacivair upajīvibhiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1177: 6.020.006c ubhābhyāṃ sadṛśaṃ nāma vaktum aprastave stavam
GE09ram_06_u:1178: 6.020.007a ācāryā guravo vṛddhā vṛthā vāṃ paryupāsitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1179: 6.020.007c sāraṃ yad rājaśāstrāṇām anujīvyaṃ na gṛhyate
GE09ram_06_u:1180: 6.020.008a gṛhīto vā na vijñāto bhāro jñānasya vochyate
GE09ram_06_u:1181: 6.020.008c īdṛśaiḥ sacivair yukto mūrkhair diṣṭyā dharāmy aham
GE09ram_06_u:1182: 6.020.009a kiṃ nu mṛtyor bhayaṃ nāsti māṃ vaktuṃ paruṣaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1183: 6.020.009c yasya me śāsato jihvā prayacchati śubhāśubham
GE09ram_06_u:1184: 6.020.010a apy eva dahanaṃ spṛṣṭvā vane tiṣṭhanti pādapāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1187: 6.020.011c yadi pūrvopakārair me na krodho mṛdutāṃ vrajet
GE09ram_06_u:1189: 6.020.012c na hi vāṃ hantum icchāmi smarann upakṛtāni vām
GE09ram_06_u:1190: 6.020.012e hatāv eva kṛtaghnau tau mayi snehaparāṅmukhau
GE09ram_06_u:1191: 6.020.013a evam uktau tu savrīḍau tāv ubhau śukasāraṇau
GE09ram_06_u:1197: 6.020.016a tān abravīt tato vākyaṃ rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1200: 6.020.017c mantreṣv abhyantarā ye 'sya prītyā tena samāgatāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1201: 6.020.018a kathaṃ svapiti jāgarti kim anyac ca kariṣyati
GE09ram_06_u:1205: 6.020.020a cārās tu te tathety uktvā prahṛṣṭā rākṣaseśvaram
GE09ram_06_u:1206: 6.020.020c kṛtvā pradakṣiṇaṃ jagmur yatra rāmaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1209: 6.020.022a te tu dharmātmanā dṛṣṭā rākṣasendreṇa rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1211: 6.020.023a vānarair arditās te tu vikrāntair laghuvikramaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1213: 6.020.024a tato daśagrīvam upasthitās te; cārā bahirnityacarā niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1214: 6.020.024c gireḥ suvelasya samīpavāsinaṃ; nyavedayan bhīmabalaṃ mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1215: 6.021.001a tatas tam akṣobhya balaṃ laṅkādhipataye carāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1217: 6.021.002a cārāṇāṃ rāvaṇaḥ śrutvā prāptaṃ rāmaṃ mahābalam
GE09ram_06_u:1218: 6.021.002c jātodvego 'bhavat kiṃ cic chārdūlaṃ vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:1219: 6.021.003a ayathāvac ca te varṇo dīnaś cāsi niśācara
GE09ram_06_u:1220: 6.021.003c nāsi kaccid amitrāṇāṃ kruddhānāṃ vaśam āgataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1221: 6.021.004a iti tenānuśiṣṭas tu vācaṃ mandam udīrayat
GE09ram_06_u:1223: 6.021.005a na te cārayituṃ śakyā rājan vānarapuṃgavāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1224: 6.021.005c vikrāntā balavantaś ca rāghaveṇa ca rakṣitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1225: 6.021.006a nāpi saṃbhāṣituṃ śakyāḥ saṃpraśno 'tra na labhyate
GE09ram_06_u:1229: 6.021.008a jānubhir muṣṭibhir dantais talaiś cābhihato bhṛśam
GE09ram_06_u:1235: 6.021.011a eṣa śailaiḥ śilābhiś ca pūrayitvā mahārṇavam
GE09ram_06_u:1236: 6.021.011c dvāram āśritya laṅkāyā rāmas tiṣṭhati sāyudhaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1239: 6.021.013a purā prākāram āyāti kṣipram ekataraṃ kuru
GE09ram_06_u:1240: 6.021.013c sītāṃ cāsmai prayacchāśu suyuddhaṃ vā pradīyatām
GE09ram_06_u:1242: 6.021.014c śārdūlasya mahad vākyam athovāca sa rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1245: 6.021.016a evam uktvā mahātejā rāvaṇaḥ punar abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:1246: 6.021.016c cāritā bhavatā senā ke 'tra śūrāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1247: 6.021.017a kīdṛśāḥ kiṃprabhāvāś ca vānarā ye durāsadāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1248: 6.021.017c kasya putrāś ca pautrāś ca tattvam ākhyāhi rākṣasa
GE09ram_06_u:1249: 6.021.018a tatr atra pratipatsyāmi jñātvā teṣāṃ balābalam
GE09ram_06_u:1256: 6.021.021c kadanaṃ yasya putreṇa kṛtam ekena rakṣasām
GE09ram_06_u:1257: 6.021.022a suṣeṇaś cāpi dharmātmā putro dharmasya vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:1258: 6.021.022c saumyaḥ somātmajaś cātra rājan dadhimukhaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1259: 6.021.023a sumukho durmukhaś cātra vegadarśī ca vānaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1262: 6.021.024c anilasya ca putro 'tra hanūmān iti viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1263: 6.021.025a naptā śakrasya durdharṣo balavān aṅgado yuvā
GE09ram_06_u:1264: 6.021.025c maindaś ca dvividaś cobhau balināv aśvisaṃbhavau
GE09ram_06_u:1274: 6.021.030c dūṣaṇo nihato yena kharaś ca triśirās tathā
GE09ram_06_u:1275: 6.021.031a nāsti rāmasya sadṛśo vikrame bhuvi kaś cana
GE09ram_06_u:1277: 6.021.032a vaktuṃ na śakto rāmasya naraḥ kaś cid guṇān kṣitau
GE09ram_06_u:1280: 6.021.033c yasya bāṇapathaṃ prāpya na jīved api vāsavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1281: 6.021.034a rākṣasānāṃ variṣṭhaś ca tava bhrātā vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1282: 6.021.034c parigṛhya purīṃ laṅkāṃ rāghavasya hite rataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1283: 6.021.035a iti sarvaṃ samākhyātaṃ tavedaṃ vānaraṃ balam
GE09ram_06_u:1285: 6.022.001a tatas tam akṣobhyabalaṃ laṅkāyāṃ nṛpateś caraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1287: 6.022.002a cārāṇāṃ rāvaṇaḥ śrutvā prāptaṃ rāmaṃ mahābalam
GE09ram_06_u:1288: 6.022.002c jātodvego 'bhavat kiṃ cit sacivāṃś cedam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:1289: 6.022.003a mantriṇaḥ śīghram āyāntu sarve vai susamāhitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1290: 6.022.003c ayaṃ no mantrakālo hi saṃprāpta iva rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1291: 6.022.004a tasya tac chāsanaṃ śrutvā mantriṇo 'bhyāgaman drutam
GE09ram_06_u:1292: 6.022.004c tataḥ saṃmantrayām āsa sacivai rākṣasaiḥ saha
GE09ram_06_u:1293: 6.022.005a mantrayitvā sa durdharṣaḥ kṣamaṃ yat samanantaram
GE09ram_06_u:1300: 6.022.008c māṃ tvaṃ samupatiṣṭhasva mahac ca saśaraṃ dhanuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1301: 6.022.009a evam uktas tathety āha vidyujjihvo niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1302: 6.022.009c tasya tuṣṭo 'bhavad rājā pradadau ca vibhūṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:1308: 6.022.012a upasṛtya tataḥ sītāṃ praharṣan nāma kīrtayan
GE09ram_06_u:1309: 6.022.012c idaṃ ca vacanaṃ dhṛṣṭam uvāca janakātmajām
GE09ram_06_u:1310: 6.022.013a sāntvyamānā mayā bhadre yam upāśritya valgase
GE09ram_06_u:1311: 6.022.013c khara hantā sa te bhartā rāghavaḥ samare hataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1312: 6.022.014a chinnaṃ te sarvato mūlaṃ darpas te nihato mayā
GE09ram_06_u:1315: 6.022.015c śṛṇu bhartṛbadhaṃ sīte ghoraṃ vṛtravadhaṃ yathā
GE09ram_06_u:1316: 6.022.016a samāyātaḥ samudrāntaṃ māṃ hantuṃ kila rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1319: 6.022.017c balena mahatā rāmo vrajaty astaṃ divākare
GE09ram_06_u:1323: 6.022.019c balam asya hataṃ rātrau yatra rāmaḥ sulakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1324: 6.022.020a paṭṭasān parighān khaḍgāṃś cakrān daṇḍān mahāyasān
GE09ram_06_u:1326: 6.022.021a yaṣṭīś ca tomarān prāsaṃś cakrāṇi musalāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:1331: 6.022.023c diśaḥ pravrājitaḥ sarvair lakṣmaṇaḥ plavagaiḥ saha
GE09ram_06_u:1334: 6.022.025a jāmbavān atha jānubhyām utpatan nihato yudhi
GE09ram_06_u:1335: 6.022.025c paṭṭasair bahubhiś chinno nikṛttaḥ pādapo yathā
GE09ram_06_u:1336: 6.022.026a maindaś ca dvividaś cobhau nihatau vānararṣabhau
GE09ram_06_u:1340: 6.022.028a nārācair bahubhiś chinnaḥ śete daryāṃ darīmukhaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1341: 6.022.028c kumudas tu mahātejā niṣkūjan sāyakair hataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1342: 6.022.029a aṅgado bahubhiś chinnaḥ śarair āsādya rākṣasaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1346: 6.022.031a pradrutāś ca pare trastā hanyamānā jaghanyataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1347: 6.022.031c abhidrutās tu rakṣobhiḥ siṃhair iva mahādvipāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1348: 6.022.032a sāgare patitāḥ ke cit ke cid gaganam āśritāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1349: 6.022.032c ṛkṣā vṛkṣān upārūḍhā vānarais tu vimiśritāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1350: 6.022.033a sāgarasya ca tīreṣu śaileṣu ca vaneṣu ca
GE09ram_06_u:1351: 6.022.033c piṅgākṣās te virūpākṣair bahubhir bahavo hatāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1352: 6.022.034a evaṃ tava hato bhartā sasainyo mama senayā
GE09ram_06_u:1357: 6.022.036c yena tad rāghavaśiraḥ saṃgrāmāt svayam āhṛtam
GE09ram_06_u:1358: 6.022.037a vidyujjihvas tato gṛhya śiras tat saśarāsanam
GE09ram_06_u:1360: 6.022.038a tam abravīt tato rājā rāvaṇo rākṣasaṃ sthitam
GE09ram_06_u:1362: 6.022.039a agrataḥ kuru sītāyāḥ śīghraṃ dāśaratheḥ śiraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1363: 6.022.039c avasthāṃ paścimāṃ bhartuḥ kṛpaṇā sādhu paśyatu
GE09ram_06_u:1364: 6.022.040a evam uktaṃ tu tad rakṣaḥ śiras tat priyadarśanam
GE09ram_06_u:1366: 6.022.041a rāvaṇaś cāpi cikṣepa bhāsvaraṃ kārmukaṃ mahat
GE09ram_06_u:1367: 6.022.041c triṣu lokeṣu vikhyātaṃ sītām idam uvāca ha
GE09ram_06_u:1368: 6.022.042a idaṃ tat tava rāmasya kārmukaṃ jyāsamanvitam
GE09ram_06_u:1369: 6.022.042c iha prahastenānītaṃ hatvā taṃ niśi mānuṣam
GE09ram_06_u:1370: 6.022.043a sa vidyujjihvena sahaiva tac chiro; dhanuś ca bhūmau vinikīrya rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1371: 6.022.043c videharājasya sutāṃ yaśasvinīṃ; tato 'bravīt tāṃ bhava me vaśānugā
GE09ram_06_u:1372: 6.023.001a sā sītā tac chiro dṛṣṭvā tac ca kārmukam uttamam
GE09ram_06_u:1374: 6.023.002a nayane mukhavarṇaṃ ca bhartus tat sadṛśaṃ mukham
GE09ram_06_u:1375: 6.023.002c keśān keśāntadeśaṃ ca taṃ ca cūḍāmaṇiṃ śubham
GE09ram_06_u:1380: 6.023.005a āryeṇa kiṃ nu kaikeyyāḥ kṛtaṃ rāmeṇa vipriyam
GE09ram_06_u:1381: 6.023.005c yad gṛhāc cīravasanas tayā prasthāpito vanam
GE09ram_06_u:1382: 6.023.006a evam uktvā tu vaidehī vepamānā tapasvinī
GE09ram_06_u:1383: 6.023.006c jagāma jagatīṃ bālā chinnā tu kadalī yathā
GE09ram_06_u:1384: 6.023.007a sā muhūrtāt samāśvasya pratilabhya ca cetanām
GE09ram_06_u:1387: 6.023.008c imāṃ te paścimāvasthāṃ gatāsmi vidhavā kṛtā
GE09ram_06_u:1388: 6.023.009a prathamaṃ maraṇaṃ nāryā bhartur vaiguṇyam ucyate
GE09ram_06_u:1391: 6.023.010c yo hi mām udyatas trātuṃ so 'pi tvaṃ vinipātitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1392: 6.023.011a sā śvaśrūr mama kausalyā tvayā putreṇa rāghava
GE09ram_06_u:1393: 6.023.011c vatseneva yathā dhenur vivatsā vatsalā kṛtā
GE09ram_06_u:1394: 6.023.012a ādiṣṭaṃ dīrgham āyus te yair acintyaparākrama
GE09ram_06_u:1395: 6.023.012c anṛtaṃ vacanaṃ teṣām alpāyur asi rāghava
GE09ram_06_u:1396: 6.023.013a atha vā naśyati prajñā prājñasyāpi satas tava
GE09ram_06_u:1397: 6.023.013c pacaty enaṃ tathā kālo bhūtānāṃ prabhavo hy ayam
GE09ram_06_u:1398: 6.023.014a adṛṣṭaṃ mṛtyum āpannaḥ kasmāt tvaṃ nayaśāstravit
GE09ram_06_u:1399: 6.023.014c vyasanānām upāyajñaḥ kuśalo hy asi varjane
GE09ram_06_u:1403: 6.023.016c priyām iva śubhāṃ nārīṃ pṛthivīṃ puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_06_u:1404: 6.023.017a arcitaṃ satataṃ yatnād gandhamālyair mayā tava
GE09ram_06_u:1405: 6.023.017c idaṃ te matpriyaṃ vīra dhanuḥ kāñcanabhūṣitam
GE09ram_06_u:1407: 6.023.018c pūrvaiś ca pitṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ nūnaṃ svarge samāgataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1408: 6.023.019a divi nakṣatrabhūtas tvaṃ mahat karma kṛtaṃ priyam
GE09ram_06_u:1410: 6.023.020a kiṃ mān na prekṣase rājan kiṃ māṃ na pratibhāṣase
GE09ram_06_u:1411: 6.023.020c bālāṃ bālena saṃprāptāṃ bhāryāṃ māṃ sahacāriṇīm
GE09ram_06_u:1412: 6.023.021a saṃśrutaṃ gṛhṇatā pāṇiṃ cariṣyāmīti yat tvayā
GE09ram_06_u:1413: 6.023.021c smara tan mama kākutstha naya mām api duḥkhitām
GE09ram_06_u:1414: 6.023.022a kasmān mām apahāya tvaṃ gato gatimatāṃ vara
GE09ram_06_u:1415: 6.023.022c asmāl lokād amuṃ lokaṃ tyaktvā mām iha duḥkhitām
GE09ram_06_u:1416: 6.023.023a kalyāṇair ucitaṃ yat tat pariṣvaktaṃ mayaiva tu
GE09ram_06_u:1417: 6.023.023c kravyādais tac charīraṃ te nūnaṃ viparikṛṣyate
GE09ram_06_u:1419: 6.023.024c agnihotreṇa saṃskāraṃ kena tvaṃ tu na lapsyase
GE09ram_06_u:1422: 6.023.026a sa tasyāḥ paripṛcchantyā vadhaṃ mitrabalasya te
GE09ram_06_u:1423: 6.023.026c tava cākhyāsyate nūnaṃ niśāyāṃ rākṣasair vadham
GE09ram_06_u:1424: 6.023.027a sā tvāṃ suptaṃ hataṃ śrutvā māṃ ca rakṣogṛhaṃ gatām
GE09ram_06_u:1426: 6.023.028a sādhu pātaya māṃ kṣipraṃ rāmasyopari rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1427: 6.023.028c samānaya patiṃ patnyā kuru kalyāṇam uttamam
GE09ram_06_u:1428: 6.023.029a śirasā me śiraś cāsya kāyaṃ kāyena yojaya
GE09ram_06_u:1431: 6.023.030a śrutaṃ mayā vedavidāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ pitur gṛhe
GE09ram_06_u:1432: 6.023.030c yāsāṃ strīṇāṃ priyo bhartā tāsāṃ lokā mahodayāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1433: 6.023.031a kṣamā yasmin damas tyāgaḥ satyaṃ dharmaḥ kṛtajñatā
GE09ram_06_u:1434: 6.023.031c ahiṃsā caiva bhūtānāṃ tam ṛte kā gatir mama
GE09ram_06_u:1436: 6.023.032c bhartuḥ śiro dhanus tatra samīkṣya janakātmajā
GE09ram_06_u:1442: 6.023.035c kiṃ cid ātyayikaṃ kāryaṃ teṣāṃ tvaṃ darśanaṃ kuru
GE09ram_06_u:1445: 6.023.037a sa tu sarvaṃ samarthyaiva mantribhiḥ kṛtyam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1447: 6.023.038a antardhānaṃ tu tac chīrṣaṃ tac ca kārmukam uttamam
GE09ram_06_u:1449: 6.023.039a rākṣasendras tu taiḥ sārdhaṃ mantribhir bhīmavikramaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1454: 6.023.041c samānayadhvaṃ sainyāni vaktavyaṃ ca na kāraṇam
GE09ram_06_u:1455: 6.023.042a tatas tatheti pratigṛhya tad vaco; balādhipās te mahad ātmano balam
GE09ram_06_u:1456: 6.023.042c samānayaṃś caiva samāgataṃ ca te; nyavedayan bhartari yuddhakāṅkṣiṇi
GE09ram_06_u:1457: 6.024.001a sītāṃ tu mohitāṃ dṛṣṭvā saramā nāma rākṣasī
GE09ram_06_u:1459: 6.024.002a sā hi tatra kṛtā mitraṃ sītayā rakṣyamāṇayā
GE09ram_06_u:1461: 6.024.003a sā dadarśa sakhīṃ sītāṃ saramā naṣṭacetanām
GE09ram_06_u:1463: 6.024.004a tāṃ samāśvāsayām āsa sakhī snehena suvratā
GE09ram_06_u:1464: 6.024.004c uktā yad rāvaṇena tvaṃ pratyuktaṃ ca svayaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_06_u:1465: 6.024.005a sakhīsnehena tad bhīru mayā sarvaṃ pratiśrutam
GE09ram_06_u:1466: 6.024.005c līnayā ganahe śūhye bhayam utsṛjya rāvaṇāt
GE09ram_06_u:1467: 6.024.005e tava hetor viśālākṣi na hi me jīvitaṃ priyam
GE09ram_06_u:1468: 6.024.006a sa saṃbhrāntaś ca niṣkrānto yat kṛte rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1469: 6.024.006c tac ca me viditaṃ sarvam abhiniṣkramya maithili
GE09ram_06_u:1470: 6.024.007a na śakyaṃ sauptikaṃ kartuṃ rāmasya viditātmanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1472: 6.024.008a na caiva vānarā hantuṃ śakyāḥ pādapayodhinaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1476: 6.024.010a vikrānto rakṣitā nityam ātmanaś ca parasya ca
GE09ram_06_u:1479: 6.024.011c na hato rāghavaḥ śrīmān sīte śatrunibarhaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1481: 6.024.012c iyaṃ prayuktā raudreṇa māyā māyāvidā tvayi
GE09ram_06_u:1482: 6.024.013a śokas te vigataḥ sarvaḥ kalyāṇaṃ tvām upasthitam
GE09ram_06_u:1483: 6.024.013c dhruvaṃ tvāṃ bhajate lakṣmīḥ priyaṃ prītikaraṃ śṛṇu
GE09ram_06_u:1488: 6.024.016a anena preṣitā ye ca rākṣasā laghuvikramaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1489: 6.024.016c rāghavas tīrṇa ity evaṃ pravṛttis tair ihāhṛtā
GE09ram_06_u:1490: 6.024.017a sa tāṃ śrutvā viśālākṣi pravṛttiṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1491: 6.024.017c eṣa mantrayate sarvaiḥ sacivaiḥ saha rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1492: 6.024.018a iti bruvāṇā saramā rākṣasī sītayā saha
GE09ram_06_u:1496: 6.024.020a saṃnāhajananī hy eṣā bhairavā bhīru bherikā
GE09ram_06_u:1499: 6.024.021c tatra tatra ca saṃnaddhāḥ saṃpatanti padātayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1501: 6.024.022c vegavadbhir nadadbhiś ca toyaughair iva sāgaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1502: 6.024.023a śāstrāṇāṃ ca prasannānāṃ carmaṇāṃ varmaṇāṃ tathā
GE09ram_06_u:1506: 6.024.025a ghaṇṭānāṃ śṛṇu nirghoṣaṃ rathānāṃ śṛṇu nisvanam
GE09ram_06_u:1510: 6.024.027a śrīs tvāṃ bhajati śokaghnī rakṣasāṃ bhayam āgatam
GE09ram_06_u:1515: 6.024.029c yathā śatruṣu śatrughno viṣṇunā saha vāsavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1516: 6.024.030a āgatasya hi rāmasya kṣipram aṅkagatāṃ satīm
GE09ram_06_u:1517: 6.024.030c ahaṃ drakṣyāmi siddhārthāṃ tvāṃ śatrau vinipātite
GE09ram_06_u:1520: 6.024.032a acirān mokṣyate sīte devi te jaghanaṃ gatām
GE09ram_06_u:1521: 6.024.032c dhṛtām etāṃ bahūn māsān veṇīṃ rāmo mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1522: 6.024.033a tasya dṛṣṭvā mukhaṃ devi pūrṇacandram ivoditam
GE09ram_06_u:1523: 6.024.033c mokṣyase śokajaṃ vāri nirmokam iva pannagī
GE09ram_06_u:1524: 6.024.034a rāvaṇaṃ samare hatvā nacirād eva maithili
GE09ram_06_u:1525: 6.024.034c tvayā samagraṃ priyayā sukhārho lapsyate sukham
GE09ram_06_u:1528: 6.024.036a girivaram abhito 'nuvartamāno; haya iva maṇḍalam āśu yaḥ karoti
GE09ram_06_u:1529: 6.024.036c tam iha śaraṇam abhyupehi devi; divasakaraṃ prabhavo hy ayaṃ prajānām
GE09ram_06_u:1530: 6.025.001a atha tāṃ jātasaṃtāpāṃ tena vākyena mohitām
GE09ram_06_u:1531: 6.025.001c saramā hlādayām āsa pṛtivīṃ dyaur ivāmbhasā
GE09ram_06_u:1532: 6.025.002a tatas tasyā hitaṃ sakhyāś cikīrṣantī sakhī vacaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1536: 6.025.004a na hi me kramamāṇāyā nirālambe vihāyasi
GE09ram_06_u:1537: 6.025.004c samartho gatim anvetuṃ pavano garuḍo 'pi vā
GE09ram_06_u:1538: 6.025.005a evaṃ bruvāṇāṃ tāṃ sītā saramāṃ punar abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:1540: 6.025.006a samarthā gaganaṃ gantum api vā tvaṃ rasātalam
GE09ram_06_u:1542: 6.025.007a matpriyaṃ yadi kartavyaṃ yadi buddhiḥ sthirā tava
GE09ram_06_u:1543: 6.025.007c jñātum icchāmi taṃ gatvā kiṃ karotīti rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1544: 6.025.008a sa hi māyābalaḥ krūro rāvaṇaḥ śatrurāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1547: 6.025.009c rākṣasībhiḥ sughorābhir yā māṃ rakṣanti nityaśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1548: 6.025.010a udvignā śaṅkitā cāsmi na ca svasthaṃ mano mama
GE09ram_06_u:1549: 6.025.010c tad bhayāc cāham udvignā aśokavanikāṃ gatāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1550: 6.025.011a yadi nāma kathā tasya niścitaṃ vāpi yad bhavet
GE09ram_06_u:1551: 6.025.011c nivedayethāḥ sarvaṃ tat paro me syād anugrahaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1552: 6.025.012a sā tv evaṃ bruvatīṃ sītāṃ saramā valgubhāṣiṇī
GE09ram_06_u:1554: 6.025.013a eṣa te yady abhiprāyas tasmād gacchāmi jānaki
GE09ram_06_u:1555: 6.025.013c gṛhya śatror abhiprāyam upāvṛttāṃ ca paśya mām
GE09ram_06_u:1556: 6.025.014a evam uktvā tato gatvā samīpaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1558: 6.025.015a sā śrutvā niścayaṃ tasya niścayajñā durātmanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1560: 6.025.016a sā praviṣṭā punas tatra dadarśa janakātmajām
GE09ram_06_u:1561: 6.025.016c pratīkṣamāṇāṃ svām eva bhraṣṭapadmām iva śriyam
GE09ram_06_u:1562: 6.025.017a tāṃ tu sītā punaḥ prāptāṃ saramāṃ valgubhāṣiṇīm
GE09ram_06_u:1563: 6.025.017c pariṣvajya ca susnigdhaṃ dadau ca svayam āsanam
GE09ram_06_u:1564: 6.025.018a ihāsīnā sukhaṃ sarvam ākhyāhi mama tattvataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1566: 6.025.019a evam uktā tu saramā sītayā vepamānayā
GE09ram_06_u:1571: 6.025.021c nidarśanaṃ te paryāptaṃ janasthāne yad adbhutam
GE09ram_06_u:1572: 6.025.022a laṅghanaṃ ca samudrasya darśanaṃ ca hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1573: 6.025.022c vadhaṃ ca rakṣasāṃ yuddhe kaḥ kuryān mānuṣo bhuvi
GE09ram_06_u:1574: 6.025.023a evaṃ sa mantrivṛddhaiś ca mātrā ca bahu bhāṣitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1575: 6.025.023c na tvām utsahate moktum artahm arthaparo yathā
GE09ram_06_u:1576: 6.025.024a notsahaty amṛto moktuṃ yuddhe tvām iti maithili
GE09ram_06_u:1577: 6.025.024c sāmātyasya nṛśaṃsasya niścayo hy eṣa vartate
GE09ram_06_u:1578: 6.025.025a tad eṣā susthirā buddhir mṛtyulobhād upasthitā
GE09ram_06_u:1579: 6.025.025c bhayān na śaktas tvāṃ moktum anirastas tu saṃyuge
GE09ram_06_u:1580: 6.025.025e rākṣasānāṃ ca sarveṣām ātmanaś ca vadhena hi
GE09ram_06_u:1581: 6.025.026a nihatya rāvaṇaṃ saṃkhye sarvathā niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1585: 6.025.028a śrutvā tu taṃ vānarasainyaśabdaṃ; laṅkāgatā rākṣasarājabhṛtyāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1586: 6.025.028c naṣṭaujaso dainyaparītaceṣṭāḥ; śreyo na paśyanti nṛpasya doṣaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1591: 6.026.003a atha tān sacivāṃs tatra sarvān ābhāṣya rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1592: 6.026.003c sabhāṃ saṃnādayan sarvām ity uvāca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1594: 6.026.004c yad uktavanto rāmasya bhavantas tan mayā śrutam
GE09ram_06_u:1595: 6.026.004e bhavataś cāpy ahaṃ vedmi yuddhe satyaparākramān
GE09ram_06_u:1596: 6.026.005a tatas tu sumahāprājño mālyavān nāma rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1598: 6.026.006a vidyāsv abhivinīto yo rājā rājan nayānugaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1599: 6.026.006c sa śāsti ciram aiśvaryam arīṃś ca kurute vaśe
GE09ram_06_u:1600: 6.026.007a saṃdadhāno hi kālena vigṛhṇaṃś cāribhiḥ saha
GE09ram_06_u:1602: 6.026.008a hīyamānena kartavyo rājñā saṃdhiḥ samena ca
GE09ram_06_u:1603: 6.026.008c na śatrum avamanyeta jyāyān kurvīta vigraham
GE09ram_06_u:1604: 6.026.009a tan mahyaṃ rocate saṃdhiḥ saha rāmeṇa rāvaṇa
GE09ram_06_u:1605: 6.026.009c yadartham abhiyuktāḥ sma sītā tasmai pradīyatām
GE09ram_06_u:1606: 6.026.010a tasya devarṣayaḥ sarve gandharvāś ca jayaiṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1607: 6.026.010c virodhaṃ mā gamas tena saṃdhis te tena rocatām
GE09ram_06_u:1608: 6.026.011a asṛjad bhagavān pakṣau dvāv eva hi pitāmahaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1610: 6.026.012a dharmo hi śrūyate pakṣaḥ surāṇāṃ ca mahātmanām
GE09ram_06_u:1611: 6.026.012c adharmo rakṣasaṃ pakṣo hy asurāṇāṃ ca rāvaṇa
GE09ram_06_u:1612: 6.026.013a dharmo vai grasate 'dharmaṃ tataḥ kṛtam abhūd yugam
GE09ram_06_u:1613: 6.026.013c adharmo grasate dharmaṃ tatas tiṣyaḥ pravartate
GE09ram_06_u:1614: 6.026.014a tat tvayā caratā lokān dharmo vinihato mahān
GE09ram_06_u:1616: 6.026.015a sa pramādād vivṛddhas te 'dharmo 'hir grasate hi naḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1620: 6.026.016e teṣāṃ prabhāvo durdharṣaḥ pradīpta iva pāvakaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1622: 6.026.017c mukhyair yajñair yajanty ete nityaṃ tais tair dvijātayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1623: 6.026.018a juhvaty agnīṃś ca vidhivad vedāṃś coccair adhīyate
GE09ram_06_u:1627: 6.026.019c ādatte rakṣasāṃ tejo dhūmo vyāpya diśo daśa
GE09ram_06_u:1628: 6.026.020a teṣu teṣu ca deśeṣu puṇyeṣu ca dṛḍhavrataiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1630: 6.026.021a utpātān vividhān dṛṣṭvā ghorān bahuvidhāṃs tathā
GE09ram_06_u:1635: 6.026.023c dhvajā dhvastā vivarṇāś ca na prabhānti yathāpuram
GE09ram_06_u:1636: 6.026.024a vyālā gomāyavo gṛdhrā vāśanti ca subhairavam
GE09ram_06_u:1637: 6.026.024c praviśya laṅkām aniśaṃ samavāyāṃś ca kurvate
GE09ram_06_u:1638: 6.026.025a kālikāḥ pāṇḍurair dantaiḥ prahasanty agrataḥ sthitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1639: 6.026.025c striyaḥ svapneṣu muṣṇantyo gṛhāṇi pratibhāṣya ca
GE09ram_06_u:1641: 6.026.026c kharā goṣu prajāyante mūṣikā nakulaiḥ saha
GE09ram_06_u:1642: 6.026.027a mārjārā dvīpibhiḥ sārdhaṃ sūkarāḥ śunakaiḥ saha
GE09ram_06_u:1643: 6.026.027c kiṃnarā rākṣasaiś cāpi sameyur mānuṣaiḥ saha
GE09ram_06_u:1646: 6.026.029a cīkī kūcīti vāśantyaḥ śārikā veśmasu sthitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1650: 6.026.030e etāny anyāni duṣṭāni nimittāny utpatanti ca
GE09ram_06_u:1651: 6.026.031a viṣṇuṃ manyāmahe rāmaṃ mānuṣaṃ deham āsthitam
GE09ram_06_u:1653: 6.026.032a yena baddhaḥ samudrasya sa setuḥ paramādbhutaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1655: 6.026.033a idaṃ vacas tatra nigadya mālyavan; parīkṣya rakṣo'dhipater manaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1656: 6.026.033c anuttameṣūttamapauruṣo balī; babhūva tūṣṇīṃ samavekṣya rāvaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:1657: 6.027.001a tat tu mālyavato vākyaṃ hitam uktaṃ daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1658: 6.027.001c na marṣayati duṣṭātmā kālasya vaśam āgataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1659: 6.027.002a sa baddhvā bhrukuṭiṃ vaktre krodhasya vaśam āgataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1661: 6.027.003a hitabuddhyā yad ahitaṃ vacaḥ paruṣam ucyate
GE09ram_06_u:1664: 6.027.004c samarthaṃ manyase kena tyaktaṃ pitrā vanālayam
GE09ram_06_u:1665: 6.027.005a rakṣasām īśvaraṃ māṃ ca devatānāṃ bhayaṃkaram
GE09ram_06_u:1666: 6.027.005c hīnaṃ māṃ manyase kena ahīnaṃ sarvavikramaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1667: 6.027.006a vīradveṣeṇa vā śaṅke pakṣapātena vā ripoḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1671: 6.027.008a ānīya ca vanāt sītāṃ padmahīnām iva śriyam
GE09ram_06_u:1674: 6.027.009c paśya kaiś cid ahobhis tvaṃ rāghavaṃ nihataṃ mayā
GE09ram_06_u:1675: 6.027.010a dvandve yasya na tiṣṭhanti daivatāny api saṃyuge
GE09ram_06_u:1676: 6.027.010c sa kasmād rāvaṇo yuddhe bhayam āhārayiṣyati
GE09ram_06_u:1677: 6.027.011a dvidhā bhajyeyam apy evaṃ na nameyaṃ tu kasya cit
GE09ram_06_u:1678: 6.027.011c eṣa me sahajo doṣaḥ svabhāvo duratikramaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1679: 6.027.012a yadi tāvat samudre tu setur baddho yadṛcchayā
GE09ram_06_u:1680: 6.027.012c rāmeṇa vismayaḥ ko 'tra yena te bhayam āgatam
GE09ram_06_u:1681: 6.027.013a sa tu tīrtvārṇavaṃ rāmaḥ saha vānarasenayā
GE09ram_06_u:1682: 6.027.013c pratijānāmi te satyaṃ na jīvan pratiyāsyati
GE09ram_06_u:1683: 6.027.014a evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ saṃrabdhaṃ ruṣṭaṃ vijñāya rāvaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:1687: 6.027.016a rāvaṇas tu sahāmātyo mantrayitvā vimṛśya ca
GE09ram_06_u:1688: 6.027.016c laṅkāyām atulāṃ guptiṃ kārayām āsa rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1689: 6.027.017a vyādideśa ca pūrvasyāṃ prahastaṃ dvāri rākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_06_u:1691: 6.027.018a paścimāyām atho dvāri putram indrajitaṃ tathā
GE09ram_06_u:1694: 6.027.019c svayaṃ cātra bhaviṣyāmi mantriṇas tān uvāca ha
GE09ram_06_u:1699: 6.027.022a visarjayām āsa tataḥ sa mantriṇo; vidhānam ājñāpya purasya puṣkalam
GE09ram_06_u:1700: 6.027.022c jayāśiṣā mantragaṇena pūjito; viveśa so 'ntaḥpuram ṛddhiman mahat
GE09ram_06_u:1701: 6.028.001a naravānararājau tau sa ca vāyusutaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1702: 6.028.001c jāmbavān ṛkṣarājaś ca rākṣasaś ca vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1703: 6.028.002a aṅgado vāliputraś ca saumitriḥ śarabhaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1704: 6.028.002c suṣeṇaḥ sahadāyādo maindo dvivida eva ca
GE09ram_06_u:1705: 6.028.003a gajo gavākṣo kumudo nalo 'tha panasas tathā
GE09ram_06_u:1707: 6.028.004a iyaṃ sā lakṣyate laṅkā purī rāvaṇapālitā
GE09ram_06_u:1710: 6.028.005c nityaṃ saṃnihito hy atra rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1713: 6.028.007a analaḥ śarabhaś caiva saṃpātiḥ praghasas tathā
GE09ram_06_u:1714: 6.028.007c gatvā laṅkāṃ mamāmātyāḥ purīṃ punar ihāgatāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1715: 6.028.008a bhūtvā śakunayaḥ sarve praviṣṭāś ca ripor balam
GE09ram_06_u:1716: 6.028.008c vidhānaṃ vihitaṃ yac ca tad dṛṣṭvā samupasthitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1718: 6.028.009c rāma tad bruvataḥ sarvaṃ yathātathyena me śṛṇu
GE09ram_06_u:1719: 6.028.010a pūrvaṃ prahastaḥ sabalo dvāram āsādya tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_06_u:1728: 6.028.014c balena rākṣasaiḥ sārdhaṃ madhyamaṃ gulmam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1729: 6.028.015a etān evaṃvidhān gulmāṃl laṅkāyāṃ samudīkṣya te
GE09ram_06_u:1730: 6.028.015c māmakāḥ sacivāḥ sarve śīghraṃ punar ihāgatāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1731: 6.028.016a gajānāṃ ca sahasraṃ ca rathānām ayutaṃ pure
GE09ram_06_u:1732: 6.028.016c hayānām ayute dve ca sāgrakoṭī ca rakṣasām
GE09ram_06_u:1739: 6.028.020a kuberaṃ tu yadā rāma rāvaṇaḥ pratyayudhyata
GE09ram_06_u:1743: 6.028.022a atra manyur na kartavyo roṣaye tvāṃ na bhīṣaye
GE09ram_06_u:1744: 6.028.022c samartho hy asi vīryeṇa surāṇām api nigrahe
GE09ram_06_u:1745: 6.028.023a tad bhavāṃś caturaṅgeṇa balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1750: 6.028.025c prahastaṃ pratiyoddhā syād vānarair bahubhir vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1751: 6.028.026a aṅgado vāliputras tu balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1757: 6.028.029a parikrāmati yaḥ sarvāṃl lokān saṃtāpayan prajāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1758: 6.028.029c tasyāhaṃ rākṣasendrasya svayam eva vadhe dhṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1761: 6.028.031a vānarendraś ca balavān ṛkṣarājaś ca jāmbavān
GE09ram_06_u:1763: 6.028.032a na caiva mānuṣaṃ rūpaṃ kāryaṃ haribhir āhave
GE09ram_06_u:1764: 6.028.032c eṣā bhavatu naḥ saṃjñā yuddhe 'smin vānare bale
GE09ram_06_u:1766: 6.028.033c vayaṃ tu mānuṣeṇaiva sapta yotsyāmahe parān
GE09ram_06_u:1767: 6.028.034a aham eva saha bhrātrā lakṣmaṇena mahaujasā
GE09ram_06_u:1768: 6.028.034c ātmanā pañcamaś cāyaṃ sakhā mama vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1769: 6.028.035a sa rāmaḥ kāryasiddhyartham evam uktvā vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:1771: 6.028.036a tatas tu rāmo mahatā balena; pracchādya sarvāṃ pṛthivīṃ mahātmā
GE09ram_06_u:1772: 6.028.036c prahṛṣṭarūpo 'bhijagāma laṅkāṃ; kṛtvā matiṃ so 'rivadhe mahātmā
GE09ram_06_u:1773: 6.029.001a sa tu kṛtvā suvelasya matim ārohaṇaṃ prati
GE09ram_06_u:1776: 6.029.002c mantrajñaṃ ca vidhijñaṃ ca ślakṣṇayā parayā girā
GE09ram_06_u:1777: 6.029.003a suvelaṃ sādhu śailendram imaṃ dhātuśataiś citam
GE09ram_06_u:1780: 6.029.004c yena me maraṇāntāya hṛtā bhāryā durātmanā
GE09ram_06_u:1781: 6.029.005a yena dharmo na vijñāto na vṛttaṃ na kulaṃ tathā
GE09ram_06_u:1782: 6.029.005c rākṣasyā nīcayā buddhyā yena tad garhitaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_06_u:1783: 6.029.006a yasmin me vardhate roṣaḥ kīrtite rākṣasādhame
GE09ram_06_u:1785: 6.029.007a eko hi kurute pāpaṃ kālapāśavaśaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1787: 6.029.008a evaṃ saṃmantrayann eva sakrodho rāvaṇaṃ prati
GE09ram_06_u:1790: 6.029.009c saśaraṃ cāpam udyamya sumahad vikrame rataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1792: 6.029.010c hanūmān aṅgado nīlo maindo dvivida eva ca
GE09ram_06_u:1794: 6.029.011c panasaḥ kumudaś caiva haro rambhaś ca yūthapaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1795: 6.029.012a ete cānye ca bahavo vānarāḥ śīghragāminaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1798: 6.029.013a te tv adīrgheṇa kālena girim āruhya sarvataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1799: 6.029.013c dadṛśuḥ śikhare tasya viṣaktām iva khe purīm
GE09ram_06_u:1803: 6.029.015c dadṛśus te hariśreṣṭhāḥ prākāram aparaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_06_u:1804: 6.029.016a te dṛṣṭvā vānarāḥ sarve rākṣasān yuddhakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1805: 6.029.016c mumucur vipulān nādāṃs tatra rāmasya paśyataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1808: 6.029.018a tataḥ sa rāmo harivāhinīpatir; vibhīṣaṇena pratinandya satkṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1809: 6.029.018c salakṣmaṇo yūthapayūthasaṃvṛtaḥ; suvela pṛṣṭhe nyavasad yathāsukham
GE09ram_06_u:1810: 6.030.001a tāṃ rātrim uṣitās tatra suvele haripuṃgavāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1811: 6.030.001c laṅkāyāṃ dadṛśur vīrā vanāny upavanāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:1816: 6.030.004a hintālair arjunair nīpaiḥ saptaparṇaiś ca puṣpitaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1817: 6.030.004c tilakaiḥ karṇikāraiś ca paṭālaiś ca samantataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1821: 6.030.006c śādvalaiś ca tathā nīlaiś citrābhir vanarājibhiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1822: 6.030.007a gandhāḍhyāny abhiramyāṇi puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:1832: 6.030.012a viviśus te tatas tāni vanāny upavanāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:1836: 6.030.014a anye tu harivīrāṇāṃ yūthān niṣkramya yūthapāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1839: 6.030.015c kampayantaś ca tāṃ laṅkāṃ nādaiḥ svair nadatāṃ varāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1842: 6.030.017a ṛkṣāḥ siṃhā varāhāś ca mahiṣā vāraṇā mṛgāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1843: 6.030.017c tena śabdena vitrastā jagmur bhītā diśo daśa
GE09ram_06_u:1844: 6.030.018a śikharaṃ tu trikūṭasya prāṃśu caikaṃ divispṛśam
GE09ram_06_u:1847: 6.030.019c ślakṣṇaṃ śrīman mahac caiva duṣprāpaṃ śakunair api
GE09ram_06_u:1848: 6.030.020a manasāpi durārohaṃ kiṃ punaḥ karmaṇā janaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1851: 6.030.021c kāñcanena ca sālena rājatena ca śobhitā
GE09ram_06_u:1852: 6.030.022a prāsādaiś ca vimānaiś ca laṅkā paramabhūṣitā
GE09ram_06_u:1857: 6.030.024c śatena rakṣasāṃ nityaṃ yaḥ samagreṇa rakṣyate
GE09ram_06_u:1859: 6.030.025c rāvaṇasya purīṃ rāmo dadarśa saha vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1860: 6.030.026a tāṃ ratnapūrṇāṃ bahusaṃvidhānāṃ; prāsādamālābhir alaṃkṛtāṃ ca
GE09ram_06_u:1861: 6.030.026c purīṃ mahāyantrakavāṭamukhyāṃ; dadarśa rāmo mahatā balena
GE09ram_06_u:1868: 6.031.004a vātāś ca paruṣaṃ vānti kampate ca vasuṃdharā
GE09ram_06_u:1873: 6.031.006c jvalac ca nipataty etad ādityād agnimaṇḍalam
GE09ram_06_u:1880: 6.031.010a dṛśyante na yathāvac ca nakṣatrāṇy abhivartate
GE09ram_06_u:1881: 6.031.010c yugāntam iva lokasya paśya lakṣmaṇa śaṃsati
GE09ram_06_u:1882: 6.031.011a kākāḥ śyenās tathā gṛdhrā nīcaiḥ paripatanti ca
GE09ram_06_u:1883: 6.031.011c śivāś cāpy aśivā vācaḥ pravadanti mahāsvanāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1886: 6.031.013a ity evaṃ tu vadan vīro lakṣmaṇaṃ lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1888: 6.031.014a avatīrya tu dharmātmā tasmāc chailāt sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1892: 6.031.016a tataḥ kāle mahābāhur balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1893: 6.031.016c prasthitaḥ purato dhanvī laṅkām abhimukhaḥ purīm
GE09ram_06_u:1894: 6.031.017a taṃ vibhīṣaṇa sugrīvau hanūmāñ jāmbavān nalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1895: 6.031.017c ṛkṣarājas tathā nīlo lakṣmaṇaś cānyayus tadā
GE09ram_06_u:1897: 6.031.018c pracchādya mahatīṃ bhūmim anuyāti sma rāghavam
GE09ram_06_u:1900: 6.031.020a tau tv adīrgheṇa kālena bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_06_u:1907: 6.031.023c rāmaḥ sahānujo dhanvī jugopa ca rurodha ca
GE09ram_06_u:1911: 6.031.025c nānyo rāmād dhi tad dvāraṃ samarthaḥ parirakṣitum
GE09ram_06_u:1915: 6.031.027a vinyastāni ca yodhānāṃ bahūni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:1917: 6.031.028a pūrvaṃ tu dvāram āsādya nīlo haricamūpatiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1918: 6.031.028c atiṣṭhat saha maindena dvividena ca vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:1922: 6.031.030c pramāthi praghasābhyāṃ ca vīrair anyaiś ca saṃgataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1923: 6.031.031a madhyame ca svayaṃ gulme sugrīvaḥ samatiṣṭhata
GE09ram_06_u:1928: 6.031.033c dvāre dvāre harīṇāṃ tu koṭiṃ koṭiṃ nyaveśayat
GE09ram_06_u:1929: 6.031.034a paścimena tu rāmasya sugrīvaḥ saha jāmbavān
GE09ram_06_u:1931: 6.031.035a te tu vānaraśārdūlāḥ śārdūlā iva daṃṣṭriṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1935: 6.031.037a daśanāgabalāḥ ke cit ke cid daśaguṇottarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1937: 6.031.038a santi caughā balāḥ ke cit ke cic chataguṇottarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1939: 6.031.039a adbhutaś ca vicitraś ca teṣām āsīt samāgamaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1942: 6.031.040c laṅkām upaniviṣṭaiś ca saṃpatadbhiś ca vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1944: 6.031.041c laṅkā dvārāṇy upājagmur anye yoddhuṃ samantataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1945: 6.031.042a āvṛtaḥ sa giriḥ sarvais taiḥ samantāt plavaṃgamaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1946: 6.031.042c ayutānāṃ sahasraṃ ca purīṃ tām abhyavartata
GE09ram_06_u:1957: 6.031.048a rāghavaḥ saṃniveśyaivaṃ sainyaṃ svaṃ rakṣasāṃ vadhe
GE09ram_06_u:1958: 6.031.048c saṃmantrya mantribhiḥ sārdhaṃ niścitya ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1962: 6.031.050a gatvā saumya daśagrīvaṃ brūhi madvacanāt kape
GE09ram_06_u:1963: 6.031.050c laṅghayitvā purīṃ laṅkāṃ bhayaṃ tyaktvā gatavyathaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1966: 6.031.052a nāgānām atha yakṣāṇāṃ rājñāṃ ca rajanīcara
GE09ram_06_u:1967: 6.031.052c yac ca pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ mohād avaliptena rākṣasa
GE09ram_06_u:1968: 6.031.053a nūnam adya gato darpaḥ svayambhū varadānajaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1971: 6.031.054a padavīṃ devatānāṃ ca maharṣīṇāṃ ca rākṣasa
GE09ram_06_u:1972: 6.031.054c rājarṣīṇāṃ ca sarveṇāṃ gamiṣyasi mayā hataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1973: 6.031.055a balena yena vai sītāṃ māyayā rākṣasādhama
GE09ram_06_u:1974: 6.031.055c mām atikrāmayitvā tvaṃ hṛtavāṃs tad vidarśaya
GE09ram_06_u:1975: 6.031.056a arākṣasam imaṃ lokaṃ kartāsmi niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1976: 6.031.056c na cec charaṇam abhyeṣi mām upādāya maithilīm
GE09ram_06_u:1978: 6.031.057c laṅkaiśvaryaṃ dhruvaṃ śrīmān ayaṃ prāpnoty akaṇṭakam
GE09ram_06_u:1979: 6.031.058a na hi rājyam adharmeṇa bhoktuṃ kṣaṇam api tvayā
GE09ram_06_u:1981: 6.031.059a yudhyasva vā dhṛtiṃ kṛtvā śauryam ālambya rākṣasa
GE09ram_06_u:1982: 6.031.059c maccharais tvaṃ raṇe śāntas tataḥ pūto bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_06_u:1983: 6.031.060a yady āviśasi lokāṃs trīn pakṣibhūto manojavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:1984: 6.031.060c mama cakṣuṣpathaṃ prāpya na jīvan pratiyāsyasi
GE09ram_06_u:1985: 6.031.061a bravīmi tvāṃ hitaṃ vākyaṃ kriyatām aurdhvadekikam
GE09ram_06_u:1986: 6.031.061c sudṛṣṭā kriyatāṃ laṅkā jīvitaṃ te mayi sthitam
GE09ram_06_u:1987: 6.031.062a ity uktaḥ sa tu tāreyo rāmeṇākliṣṭakarmaṇā
GE09ram_06_u:1996: 6.031.066c vāliputro 'ṅgado nāma yadi te śrotram āgataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2000: 6.031.068c nirudvignās trayo lokā bhaviṣyanti hate tvayi
GE09ram_06_u:2002: 6.031.069c śatrum adyoddhariṣyāmi tvām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca kaṇṭakam
GE09ram_06_u:2004: 6.031.070c na cet satkṛtya vaidehīṃ praṇipatya pradāsyasi
GE09ram_06_u:2005: 6.031.071a ity evaṃ paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ bruvāṇe haripuṃgave
GE09ram_06_u:2007: 6.031.072a tataḥ sa roṣatāmrākṣaḥ śaśāsa sacivāṃs tadā
GE09ram_06_u:2008: 6.031.072c gṛhyatām eṣa durmedhā vadhyatām iti cāsakṛt
GE09ram_06_u:2010: 6.031.073c jagṛhus taṃ tato ghorāś catvāro rajanīcarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2011: 6.031.074a grāhayām āsa tāreyaḥ svayam ātmānam ātmanā
GE09ram_06_u:2013: 6.031.075a sa tān bāhudvaye saktān ādāya patagān iva
GE09ram_06_u:2021: 6.031.079a rāvaṇas tu paraṃ cakre krodhaṃ prāsādadharṣaṇāt
GE09ram_06_u:2023: 6.031.080a rāmas tu bahubhir hṛṣṭair ninadadbhiḥ plavaṃgamaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2031: 6.031.084a rākṣasā vismayaṃ jagmus trāsaṃ jagmus tathāpare
GE09ram_06_u:2036: 6.031.086c pragṛhya rakṣāṃsi mahāyudhāni; yugāntavātā iva saṃviceruḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2037: 6.032.001a tatas te rākṣasās tatra gatvā rāvaṇamandiram
GE09ram_06_u:2038: 6.032.001c nyavedayan purīṃ ruddhāṃ rāmeṇa saha vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2039: 6.032.002a ruddhāṃ tu nagarīṃ śrutvā jātakrodho niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2043: 6.032.004a sa dṛṣṭvā vānaraiḥ sarvāṃ vasudhāṃ kavalīkṛtām
GE09ram_06_u:2045: 6.032.005a sa cintayitvā suciraṃ dhairyam ālambya rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2051: 6.032.008a te drumaiḥ parvatāgraiś ca muṣṭibhiś ca plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2054: 6.032.009c pāṃsubhiḥ parvatāgraiś ca tṛṇaiḥ kāṣṭhaiś ca vānarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2055: 6.032.010a tataḥ sahasrayūthāś ca koṭiyūthāś ca yūthapāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2059: 6.032.012a āplavantaḥ plavantaś ca garjantaś ca plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2061: 6.032.013a jayaty atibalo rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2063: 6.032.014a ity evaṃ ghoṣayantaś ca garjantaś ca plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2065: 6.032.015a vīrabāhuḥ subāhuś ca nalaś ca vanagocaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2068: 6.032.017a pūrvadvāraṃ tu kumudaḥ koṭibhir daśabhir vṛtaḥ
