GE09ram_06_u:2071: 6.032.018c āvṛtya balavāṃs tasthau viṃśatyā koṭibhir vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2072: 6.032.019a suṣeṇaḥ paścimadvāraṃ gatas tārā pitā hariḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2073: 6.032.019c āvṛtya balavāṃs tasthau ṣaṣṭi koṭibhir āvṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2075: 6.032.020c āvṛtya balavāṃs tasthau sugrīvaś ca harīśvaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2077: 6.032.021c vṛtaḥ koṭyā mahāvīryas tasthau rāmasya pārvataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2079: 6.032.022c vṛtaḥ koṭyā mahāvīryas tasthau rāmasya pārśvataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2081: 6.032.023c vṛto yas tais tu sacivais tasthau tatra mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2089: 6.032.027c rakṣasāṃ vānarāṇāṃ ca yathā devāsure purā
GE09ram_06_u:2092: 6.032.029a tathā vṛkṣair mahākāyāḥ parvatāgraiś ca vānarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2093: 6.032.029c rākṣasās tāni rakṣāṃsi nakhair dantaiś ca vegitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2094: 6.032.030a rākṣasās tv apare bhīmāḥ prākārasthā mahīgatān
GE09ram_06_u:2095: 6.032.030c bhiṇḍipālaiś ca khaḍgaiś ca śūlaiś caiva vyadārayan
GE09ram_06_u:2100: 6.033.001a yudhyatāṃ tu tatas teṣāṃ vānarāṇāṃ mahātmanām
GE09ram_06_u:2106: 6.033.004a vānarāṇām api camūr mahatī jayam iccatām
GE09ram_06_u:2112: 6.033.007a prajaṅghena ca saṃpātir nityaṃ durmarṣaṇo raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:2120: 6.033.011a agniketuś ca durdharṣo raśmiketuś ca rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2121: 6.033.011c suptaghno yajñakopaś ca rāmeṇa saha saṃgatāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2126: 6.033.014a dharmasya putro balavān suṣeṇa iti viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2128: 6.033.015a vānarāś cāpare bhīmā rākṣasair aparaiḥ saha
GE09ram_06_u:2129: 6.033.015c dvandvaṃ samīyur bahudhā yuddhāya bahubhiḥ saha
GE09ram_06_u:2131: 6.033.016c rakṣasāṃ vānarāṇāṃ ca vīrāṇāṃ jayam icchatām
GE09ram_06_u:2137: 6.033.019c jaghāna samare śrīmān aṅgado vegavān kapiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2138: 6.033.020a saṃpātis tu tribhir bāṇaiḥ prajaṅghena samāhataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2142: 6.033.022a tasya taṃ ratham āsthāya hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2150: 6.033.026a agniketuś ca durdharṣo raśmiketuś ca rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2151: 6.033.026c suptighno yajñakopaś ca rāmaṃ nirbibhiduḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2152: 6.033.027a teṣāṃ caturṇāṃ rāmas tu śirāṃsi samare śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2154: 6.033.028a vajramuṣṭis tu maindena muṣṭinā nihato raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:2155: 6.033.028c papāta sarathaḥ sāśvaḥ purāṭṭa iva bhūtale
GE09ram_06_u:2163: 6.033.032c nirbibheda śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ karair megham ivāṃśumān
GE09ram_06_u:2165: 6.033.033c bibheda samare nīlaṃ nikumbhaḥ prajahāsa ca
GE09ram_06_u:2167: 6.033.034c śiraś ciccheda samare nikumbhasya ca sāratheḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2169: 6.033.035c suṣeṇaṃ tāḍayām āsa nanāda ca muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2170: 6.033.036a taṃ rathastham atho dṛṣṭvā suṣeṇo vānarottamaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2173: 6.033.037c apakramya rathāt tūrṇaṃ gadāpāṇiḥ kṣitau sthitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2179: 6.033.040c tāṃ śilāṃ pātayām āsa tasyorasi mahāmṛdhe
GE09ram_06_u:2182: 6.033.042a evaṃ tair vānaraiḥ śūraiḥ śūrās te rajanīcarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2183: 6.033.042c dvandve vimṛditās tatra daityā iva divaukasaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2184: 6.033.043a bhallaiḥ khaḍgair gadābhiś ca śaktitomara paṭṭasaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2185: 6.033.043c apaviddhaś ca bhinnaś ca rathaiḥ sāṃgrāmikair hayaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2193: 6.034.001a yudhyatām eva teṣāṃ tu tadā vānararakṣasām
GE09ram_06_u:2194: 6.034.001c ravir astaṃ gato rātriḥ pravṛttā prāṇahāriṇī
GE09ram_06_u:2198: 6.034.003c anyonyaṃ samare jaghnus tasmiṃs tamasi dāruṇe
GE09ram_06_u:2199: 6.034.004a jahi dāraya caitīti kathaṃ vidravasīti ca
GE09ram_06_u:2200: 6.034.004c evaṃ sutumulaḥ śabdas tasmiṃs tamasi śuśruve
GE09ram_06_u:2208: 6.034.008c cakarṣuś ca dadaṃśuś ca daśanaiḥ krodhamūrchitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2209: 6.034.009a lakṣmaṇaś cāpi rāmaś ca śarair āśīviṣomapaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2223: 6.034.016a tatas te rākṣasās tatra tasmiṃs tamasi dāruṇe
GE09ram_06_u:2226: 6.034.017c udvarta iva saptānāṃ samudrāṇām abhūt svanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2227: 6.034.018a teṣāṃ rāmaḥ śaraiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ ṣaḍ jaghāna niśācarān
GE09ram_06_u:2231: 6.034.020a te tu rāmeṇa bāṇaughaḥ sarvamarmasu tāḍitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2234: 6.034.021c diśaś cakāra vimalāḥ pradiśaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2235: 6.034.022a ye tv anye rākṣasā vīrā rāmasyābhimukhe sthitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2236: 6.034.022c te 'pi naṣṭāḥ samāsādya pataṃgā iva pāvakam
GE09ram_06_u:2238: 6.034.023c babhūva rajanī citrā khadyotair iva śāradī
GE09ram_06_u:2239: 6.034.024a rākṣasānāṃ ca ninadair harīṇāṃ cāpi garjitaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2240: 6.034.024c sā babhūva niśā ghorā bhūyo ghoratarā tadā
GE09ram_06_u:2245: 6.034.027a aṅgadas tu raṇe śatruṃ nihantuṃ samupasthitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2246: 6.034.027c rāvaṇer nijaghānāśu sārathiṃ ca hayān api
GE09ram_06_u:2247: 6.034.028a indrajit tu rathaṃ tyaktvā hatāśvo hatasārathiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2252: 6.034.030a sa rāmaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva ghorair nāgamayaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2254: 6.035.001a sa tasya gatim anvicchan rājaputraḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_06_u:2256: 6.035.002a dvau suṣeṇasya dāyādau nīlaṃ ca plavagarṣabham
GE09ram_06_u:2257: 6.035.002c aṅgadaṃ vāliputraṃ ca śarabhaṃ ca tarasvinam
GE09ram_06_u:2260: 6.035.004a te saṃprahṛṣṭā harayo bhīmān udyamya pādapān
GE09ram_06_u:2261: 6.035.004c ākāśaṃ viviśuḥ sarve mārgāmāṇā diśo daśa
GE09ram_06_u:2265: 6.035.006c andhakāre na dadṛśur meghaiḥ sūryam ivāvṛtam
GE09ram_06_u:2271: 6.035.009c tāv ubhau ca prakāśete puṣpitāv iva kiṃśukau
GE09ram_06_u:2275: 6.035.011c draṣṭum āsādituṃ vāpi na śaktaḥ kiṃ punar yuvām
GE09ram_06_u:2278: 6.035.013a evam uktvā tu dharmajñau bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_06_u:2279: 6.035.013c nirbibheda śitair bāṇaiḥ prajaharṣa nanāda ca
GE09ram_06_u:2281: 6.035.014c bhūyo bhūyaḥ śarān ghorān visasarja mahāmṛdhe
GE09ram_06_u:2282: 6.035.015a tato marmasu marmajño majjayan niśitāñ śarān
GE09ram_06_u:2283: 6.035.015c rāmalakṣmaṇayor vīro nanāda ca muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2284: 6.035.016a baddhau tu śarabandhena tāv ubhau raṇamūrdhani
GE09ram_06_u:2292: 6.035.020a na hy aviddhaṃ tayor gātraṃ babhūvāṅgulam antaram
GE09ram_06_u:2293: 6.035.020c nānirbhinnaṃ na cāstabdham ā karāgrād ajihmagaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2294: 6.035.021a tau tu krūreṇa nihatau rakṣasā kāmarūpiṇā
GE09ram_06_u:2296: 6.035.022a papāta prathamaṃ rāmo viddho marmasu mārgaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2297: 6.035.022c krodhād indrajitā yena purā śakro vinirjitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2299: 6.035.023c vivyādha vatsadantaiś ca siṃhadaṃṣṭraiḥ kṣurais tathā
GE09ram_06_u:2300: 6.035.024a sa vīraśayane śiśye vijyam ādāya kārmukam
GE09ram_06_u:2303: 6.035.025c sa tatra lakṣmaṇo dṛṣṭvā nirāśo jīvite 'bhavat
GE09ram_06_u:2304: 6.035.026a baddhau tu vīrau patitau śayānau; tau vānarāḥ saṃparivārya tasthuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2305: 6.035.026c samāgatā vāyusutapramukhyā; viṣadam ārtāḥ paramaṃ ca jagmuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2306: 6.036.001a tato dyāṃ pṛthivīṃ caiva vīkṣamāṇā vanaukasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2320: 6.036.008a antarikṣaṃ nirīkṣanto diśaḥ sarvāś ca vānarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2321: 6.036.008c na cainaṃ māyayā channaṃ dadṛśū rāvaṇiṃ raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:2326: 6.036.011a indrajit tv ātmanaḥ karma tau śayānau samīkṣya ca
GE09ram_06_u:2328: 6.036.012a dūṣaṇasya ca hantārau kharasya ca mahābalau
GE09ram_06_u:2333: 6.036.014c aspṛṣṭvā śayanaṃ gātrais triyāmā yāti śarvatī
GE09ram_06_u:2334: 6.036.015a kṛtsneyaṃ yatkṛte laṅkā nadī varṣāsv ivākulā
GE09ram_06_u:2337: 6.036.016c vikramā niṣphalāḥ sarve yathā śaradi toyadāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2338: 6.036.017a evam uktvā tu tān sarvān rākṣasān paripārśvagān
GE09ram_06_u:2339: 6.036.017c yūthapān api tān sarvāṃs tāḍayām āsa rāvaṇiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2340: 6.036.018a tān ardayitvā bāṇaughais trāsayitvā ca vānarān
GE09ram_06_u:2344: 6.036.020a evam uktās tu te sarve rākṣasāḥ kūṭayodhinaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2345: 6.036.020c paraṃ vismayam ājagmuḥ karmaṇā tena toṣitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2346: 6.036.021a vineduś ca mahānādān sarve te jaladopamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2347: 6.036.021c hato rāma iti jñātvā rāvaṇiṃ samapūjayan
GE09ram_06_u:2348: 6.036.022a niṣpandau tu tadā dṛṣṭvā tāv ubhau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_06_u:2357: 6.036.026c evaṃ prāyāṇi yuddhāni vijayo nāsti naiṣṭhikaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2362: 6.036.029a evam uktvā tatas tasya jalaklinnena pāṇinā
GE09ram_06_u:2370: 6.036.033a atha vā rakṣyatāṃ rāmo yāvat saṃjñā viparyayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2371: 6.036.033c labdhasaṃjñau tu kākutsthau bhayaṃ no vyapaneṣyataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2372: 6.036.034a naitat kiṃ cana rāmasya na ca rāmo mumūrṣati
GE09ram_06_u:2373: 6.036.034c na hy enaṃ hāsyate lakṣmīr durlabhā yā gatāyuṣām
GE09ram_06_u:2375: 6.036.035c yāvat sarvāṇi sainyāni punaḥ saṃsthāpayāmy aham
GE09ram_06_u:2378: 6.036.037a māṃ tu dṛṣṭvā pradhāvantam anīkaṃ saṃpraharṣitum
GE09ram_06_u:2379: 6.036.037c tyajantu harayas trāsaṃ bhuktapūrvām iva srajam
GE09ram_06_u:2386: 6.036.041a utpapāta tato hṛṣṭaḥ putraṃ ca pariṣasvaje
GE09ram_06_u:2387: 6.036.041c rāvaṇo rakṣasāṃ madhye śrutvā śatrū nipātitau
GE09ram_06_u:2388: 6.036.042a upāghrāya sa mūrdhny enaṃ papraccha prītamānasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2389: 6.036.042c pṛcchate ca yathāvṛttaṃ pitre sarvaṃ nyavedayat
GE09ram_06_u:2390: 6.036.043a sa harṣavegānugatāntarātmā; śrutvā vacas tasya mahārathasya
GE09ram_06_u:2391: 6.036.043c jahau jvaraṃ dāśaratheḥ samutthitaṃ; prahṛṣya vācābhinananda putram
GE09ram_06_u:2394: 6.037.002a hanūmān aṅgado nīlaḥ suṣeṇaḥ kumudo nalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2396: 6.037.003a jāmbavān ṛṣabhaḥ sundo rambhaḥ śatabaliḥ pṛthuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2397: 6.037.003c vyūḍhānīkāś ca yattāś ca drumān ādāya sarvataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2398: 6.037.004a vīkṣamāṇā diśaḥ sarvās tiryag ūrdhvaṃ ca vānarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2399: 6.037.004c tṛṇeṣv api ca ceṣṭatsu rākṣasā iti menire
GE09ram_06_u:2401: 6.037.005c ājuhāva tataḥ sītā rakṣaṇī rākṣasīs tadā
GE09ram_06_u:2402: 6.037.006a rākṣasyas trijaṭā cāpi śāsanāt tam upasthitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2403: 6.037.006c tā uvāca tato hṛṣṭo rākṣasī rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2405: 6.037.007c puṣpakaṃ ca samāropya darśayadhvaṃ hatau raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:2406: 6.037.008a yad āśrayād avaṣṭabdho neyaṃ mām upatiṣṭhati
GE09ram_06_u:2407: 6.037.008c so 'syā bhartā saha bhrātrā nirasto raṇamūrdhani
GE09ram_06_u:2410: 6.037.010a adya kālavaśaṃ prāptaṃ raṇe rāmaṃ salakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:2413: 6.037.011c rākṣasyas tās tathety uktvā prajagmur yatra puṣpakam
GE09ram_06_u:2417: 6.037.013c sītām āropayām āsur vimānaṃ puṣpakaṃ tadā
GE09ram_06_u:2418: 6.037.014a tataḥ puṣpakam āropya sītāṃ trijaṭayā saha
GE09ram_06_u:2421: 6.037.015c rāghavo lakṣmaṇaś caiva hatāv indrajitā raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:2422: 6.037.016a vimānenāpi sītā tu gatvā trijaṭayā saha
GE09ram_06_u:2423: 6.037.016c dadarśa vānarāṇāṃ tu sarvaṃ sinyaṃ nipātitam
GE09ram_06_u:2427: 6.037.018c lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva rāmaṃ ca visaṃjñau śarapīḍitau
GE09ram_06_u:2430: 6.037.020a tau dṛṣṭvā bhrātarau tatra vīrau sā puruṣarṣabhau
GE09ram_06_u:2431: 6.037.020c duḥkhārtā subhṛśaṃ sītā karuṇaṃ vilalāpa ha
GE09ram_06_u:2432: 6.037.021a sā bāṣpaśokābhihatā samīkṣya; tau bhrātarau devasamaprabhāvau
GE09ram_06_u:2433: 6.037.021c vitarkayantī nidhanaṃ tayoḥ sā; duḥkhānvitā vākyam idaṃ jagāda
GE09ram_06_u:2434: 6.038.001a bhartāraṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam
GE09ram_06_u:2436: 6.038.002a ūcur lakṣaṇikā ye māṃ putriṇy avidhaveti ca
GE09ram_06_u:2438: 6.038.003a yajvano mahiṣīṃ ye mām ūcuḥ patnīṃ ca satriṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2440: 6.038.004a vīrapārthivapatnī tvaṃ ye dhanyeti ca māṃ viduḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2442: 6.038.005a ūcuḥ saṃśravaṇe ye māṃ dvijāḥ kārtāntikāḥ śubhām
GE09ram_06_u:2444: 6.038.006a imāni khalu padmāni pādayor yaiḥ kila striyaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2449: 6.038.008c tāny adya nihate rāme vitathāni bhavanti me
GE09ram_06_u:2450: 6.038.009a keśāḥ sūkṣmāḥ samā nīlā bhruvau cāsaṃgate mama
GE09ram_06_u:2451: 6.038.009c vṛtte cālomaśe jaṅghe dantāś cāviralā mama
GE09ram_06_u:2452: 6.038.010a śaṅkhe netre karau pādau gulphāv ūrū ca me citau
GE09ram_06_u:2453: 6.038.010c anuvṛttā nakhāḥ snigdhāḥ samāś cāṅgulayo mama
GE09ram_06_u:2455: 6.038.011c magnā cotsaṅginī nābhiḥ pārśvoraskaṃ ca me citam
GE09ram_06_u:2456: 6.038.012a mama varṇo maṇinibho mṛdūny aṅgaruhāṇi ca
GE09ram_06_u:2459: 6.038.013c mandasmitety eva ca māṃ kanyālakṣaṇikā viduḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2463: 6.038.015c tīrtvā sāgaram akṣobhyaṃ bhrātarau goṣpade hatau
GE09ram_06_u:2464: 6.038.016a nanu vāruṇam āgneyam aindraṃ vāyavyam eva ca
GE09ram_06_u:2468: 6.038.018a na hi dṛṣṭipathaṃ prāpya rāghavasya raṇe ripuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2469: 6.038.018c jīvan pratinivarteta yady api syān manojavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2471: 6.038.019c yatra rāmaḥ saha bhrātrā śete yudhi nipāthitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2472: 6.038.020a nāhaṃ śocāmi bhartāraṃ nihataṃ na ca lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:2473: 6.038.020c nātmānaṃ jananī cāpi yathā śvaśrūṃ tapasvinīm
GE09ram_06_u:2474: 6.038.021a sā hi cintayate nityaṃ samāptavratam āgatam
GE09ram_06_u:2475: 6.038.021c kadā drakṣyāmi sītāṃ ca rāmaṃ ca sahalakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:2477: 6.038.022c mā viṣādaṃ kṛthā devi bhartāyaṃ tava jīvati
GE09ram_06_u:2478: 6.038.023a kāraṇāni ca vakṣyāmi mahānti sadṛśāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:2481: 6.038.024c bhavanti yudhi yodhānāṃ mukhāni nihate patau
GE09ram_06_u:2482: 6.038.025a idaṃ vimānaṃ vaidehi puṣpakaṃ nāma nāmataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2483: 6.038.025c divyaṃ tvāṃ dhārayen nedaṃ yady etau gajajīvitau
GE09ram_06_u:2485: 6.038.026c senā bhramati saṃkhyeṣu hatakarṇeva naur jale
GE09ram_06_u:2487: 6.038.027c senā rakṣati kākutsthau māyayā nirjitau raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:2488: 6.038.028a sā tvaṃ bhava suvisrabdhā anumānaiḥ sukhodayaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2489: 6.038.028c ahatau paśya kākutsthau snehād etad bravīmi te
GE09ram_06_u:2490: 6.038.029a anṛtaṃ noktapūrvaṃ me na ca vakṣye kadā cana
GE09ram_06_u:2492: 6.038.030a nemau śakyau raṇe jetuṃ sendrair api surāsuraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2493: 6.038.030c etayor ānanaṃ dṛṣṭvā mayā cāveditaṃ tava
GE09ram_06_u:2494: 6.038.031a idaṃ ca sumahac cihnaṃ śanaiḥ paśyasva maithili
GE09ram_06_u:2495: 6.038.031c niḥsaṃjñāv apy ubhāv etau naiva lakṣmīr viyujyate
GE09ram_06_u:2498: 6.038.033a tyaja śokaṃ ca duḥkhaṃ ca mohaṃ ca janakātmaje
GE09ram_06_u:2500: 6.038.034a śrutvā tu vacanaṃ tasyāḥ sītā surasutopamā
GE09ram_06_u:2501: 6.038.034c kṛtāñjalir uvācedam evam astv iti maithilī
GE09ram_06_u:2502: 6.038.035a vimānaṃ puṣpakaṃ tat tu samivartya manojavam
GE09ram_06_u:2503: 6.038.035c dīnā trijaṭayā sītā laṅkām eva praveśitā
GE09ram_06_u:2504: 6.038.036a tatas trijaṭayā sārdhaṃ puṣpakād avaruhya sā
GE09ram_06_u:2506: 6.038.037a praviśya sītā bahuvṛkṣaṣaṇḍāṃ; tāṃ rākṣasendrasya vihārabhūmim
GE09ram_06_u:2507: 6.038.037c saṃprekṣya saṃcintya ca rājaputrau; paraṃ viṣādaṃ samupājagāma
GE09ram_06_u:2513: 6.039.003c sthiratvāt sattvayogāc ca śaraiḥ saṃdānito 'pi san
GE09ram_06_u:2514: 6.039.004a tato dṛṣṭvā sarudhiraṃ viṣaṇṇaṃ gāḍham arpitam
GE09ram_06_u:2516: 6.039.005a kiṃ nu me sītayā kāryaṃ kiṃ kāryaṃ jīvitena vā
GE09ram_06_u:2517: 6.039.005c śayānaṃ yo 'dya paśyāmi bhrātaraṃ yudhi nirjitam
GE09ram_06_u:2518: 6.039.006a śakyā sītā samā nārī prāptuṃ loke vicinvatā
GE09ram_06_u:2520: 6.039.007a parityakṣyāmy ahaṃ prāṇān vānarāṇāṃ tu paśyatām
GE09ram_06_u:2522: 6.039.008a kiṃ nu vakṣyāmi kausalyāṃ mātaraṃ kiṃ nu kaikayīm
GE09ram_06_u:2524: 6.039.009a vivatsāṃ vepamānāṃ ca krośantīṃ kurarīm iva
GE09ram_06_u:2525: 6.039.009c katham āśvāsayiṣyāmi yadi yāsyāmi taṃ vinā
GE09ram_06_u:2526: 6.039.010a kathaṃ vakṣyāmi śatrughnaṃ bharataṃ ca yaśasvinam
GE09ram_06_u:2527: 6.039.010c mayā saha vanaṃ yāto vinā tenāgataḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2528: 6.039.011a upālambhaṃ na śakṣyāmi soḍhuṃ bata sumitrayā
GE09ram_06_u:2529: 6.039.011c ihaiva dehaṃ tyakṣyāmi na hi jīvitum utsahe
GE09ram_06_u:2530: 6.039.012a dhiṅ māṃ duṣkṛtakarmāṇam anāryaṃ yatkṛte hy asau
GE09ram_06_u:2532: 6.039.013a tvaṃ nityaṃ suviṣaṇṇaṃ mām āśvāsayasi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_06_u:2533: 6.039.013c gatāsur nādya śaknoṣi mām ārtam abhibhāṣitum
GE09ram_06_u:2534: 6.039.014a yenādya bahavo yuddhe rākṣasā nihatāḥ kṣitau
GE09ram_06_u:2535: 6.039.014c tasyām eva kṣitau vīraḥ sa śete nihataḥ paraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2537: 6.039.015c śarajālaiś cito bhāti bhāskaro 'stam iva vrajan
GE09ram_06_u:2539: 6.039.016c rujā cābruvato hy asya dṛṣṭirāgeṇa sūcyate
GE09ram_06_u:2540: 6.039.017a yathaiva māṃ vanaṃ yāntam anuyāto mahādyutiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2542: 6.039.018a iṣṭabandhujano nityaṃ māṃ ca nityam anuvrataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2545: 6.039.019c paruṣaṃ vipriyaṃ vāpi śrāvitaṃ na kadā cana
GE09ram_06_u:2547: 6.039.020c iṣvastreṣv adhikas tasmāt kārtavīryāc ca lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2548: 6.039.021a astrair astrāṇi yo hanyāc chakrasyāpi mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2550: 6.039.022a tac ca mithyā pralaptaṃ māṃ pradhakṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2551: 6.039.022c yan mayā na kṛto rājā rākṣasānāṃ vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2553: 6.039.023c matvā hīnaṃ mayā rājan rāvaṇo 'bhidraved balī
GE09ram_06_u:2555: 6.039.024c sāgaraṃ tara sugrīva punas tenaiva setunā
GE09ram_06_u:2556: 6.039.025a kṛtaṃ hanumatā kāryaṃ yad anyair duṣkaraṃ raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:2558: 6.039.026a aṅgadena kṛtaṃ karma maindena dvividena ca
GE09ram_06_u:2559: 6.039.026c yuddhaṃ kesariṇā saṃkhye ghoraṃ saṃpātinā kṛtam
GE09ram_06_u:2561: 6.039.027c anyaiś ca haribhir yuddhaṃ madārthe tyaktajīvitaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2562: 6.039.028a na cātikramituṃ śakyaṃ daivaṃ sugrīva mānuṣaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2563: 6.039.028c yat tu śakyaṃ vayasyena suhṛdā vā paraṃtapa
GE09ram_06_u:2566: 6.039.029c anujñātā mayā sarve yatheṣṭaṃ gantum arhatha
GE09ram_06_u:2567: 6.039.030a śuśruvus tasya te sarve vānarāḥ paridevitam
GE09ram_06_u:2572: 6.039.032c vānarā dudruvuḥ sarve manyamānās tu rāvaṇim
GE09ram_06_u:2574: 6.040.001c kim iyaṃ vyathitā senā mūḍhavāteva naur jale
GE09ram_06_u:2576: 6.040.002c na tvaṃ paśyasi rāmaṃ ca lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam
GE09ram_06_u:2580: 6.040.004c nānimittam idaṃ manye bhavitavyaṃ bhayena tu
GE09ram_06_u:2583: 6.040.006a anyonyasya na lajjante na nirīkṣanti pṛṣṭhataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2586: 6.040.007c sugrīvaṃ vardhayām āsa rāghavaṃ ca niraikṣata
GE09ram_06_u:2595: 6.040.012a te nivṛttāḥ punaḥ sarve vānarās tyaktasaṃbhramāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2596: 6.040.012c ṛkṣarājavacaḥ śrutvā taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:2597: 6.040.013a vibhīṣaṇas tu rāmasya dṛṣṭvā gātraṃ śaraiś citam
GE09ram_06_u:2599: 6.040.014a jalaklinnena hastena tayor netre pramṛjya ca
GE09ram_06_u:2603: 6.040.016a bhrātuḥ putreṇa me tena duṣputreṇa durātmanā
GE09ram_06_u:2605: 6.040.017a śarair imāv alaṃ viddhau rudhireṇa samukṣitau
GE09ram_06_u:2606: 6.040.017c vasudhāyām ima suptau dṛśyete śalyakāv iva
GE09ram_06_u:2607: 6.040.018a yayor vīryam upāśritya pratiṣṭhā kāṅkṣitā mayā
GE09ram_06_u:2610: 6.040.019c prāptapratijñaś ca ripuḥ sakāmo rāvaṇaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2613: 6.040.021a rājyaṃ prāpsyasi dharmajña laṅkāyāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2614: 6.040.021c rāvaṇaḥ saha putreṇa sa rājyaṃ neha lapsyate
GE09ram_06_u:2616: 6.040.022c tyaktvā mohaṃ vadhiṣyete sagaṇaṃ rāvaṇaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:2617: 6.040.023a tam evaṃ sāntvayitvā tu samāśvāsya ca rākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_06_u:2618: 6.040.023c suṣeṇaṃ śvaśuraṃ pārśve sugrīvas tam uvāca ha
GE09ram_06_u:2620: 6.040.024c gaccha tvaṃ bhrātarau gṛhya kiṣkindhāṃ rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_06_u:2621: 6.040.025a ahaṃ tu rāvaṇaṃ hatvā saputraṃ sahabāndhavam
GE09ram_06_u:2622: 6.040.025c maithilīm ānayiṣyāmi śakro naṣṭām iva śriyam
GE09ram_06_u:2627: 6.040.028a tān ārtān naṣṭasaṃjñāṃś ca parāsūṃś ca bṛhaspatiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2629: 6.040.029a tāny auṣadhāny ānayituṃ kṣīrodaṃ yāntu sāgaram
GE09ram_06_u:2631: 6.040.030a harayas tu vijānanti pārvatī te mahauṣadhī
GE09ram_06_u:2633: 6.040.031a candraś ca nāma droṇaś ca parvatau sāgarottame
GE09ram_06_u:2634: 6.040.031c amṛtaṃ yatra mathitaṃ tatra te paramauṣadhī
GE09ram_06_u:2635: 6.040.032a te tatra nihite devaiḥ parvate paramauṣadhī
GE09ram_06_u:2636: 6.040.032c ayaṃ vāyusuto rājan hanūmāṃs tatra gacchatu
GE09ram_06_u:2637: 6.040.033a etasminn antare vāyur meghāṃś cāpi savidyutaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2638: 6.040.033c paryasyan sāgare toyaṃ kampayann iva parvatān
GE09ram_06_u:2642: 6.040.035c śīghraṃ sarvāṇi yādāṃsi jagmuś ca lavaṇārṇavam
GE09ram_06_u:2644: 6.040.036c vānarā dadṛśuḥ sarve jvalantam iva pāvakam
GE09ram_06_u:2645: 6.040.037a tam āgatam abhiprekṣya nāgās te vipradudruvuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2646: 6.040.037c yais tau satpuruṣau baddhau śarabhūtair mahābalau
GE09ram_06_u:2647: 6.040.038a tataḥ suparṇaḥ kākutsthau dṛṣṭvā pratyabhinandya ca
GE09ram_06_u:2650: 6.040.039c suvarṇe ca tanū snigdhe tayor āśu babhūvatuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2651: 6.040.040a tejo vīryaṃ balaṃ cauja utsāhaś ca mahāguṇāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2652: 6.040.040c pradarśanaṃ ca buddhiś ca smṛtiś ca dviguṇaṃ tayoḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2654: 6.040.041c ubhau tau sasvaje hṛṣṭau rāmaś cainam uvāca ha
GE09ram_06_u:2656: 6.040.042c āvām iha vyatikrāntau śīghraṃ ca balinau kṛtau
GE09ram_06_u:2657: 6.040.043a yathā tātaṃ daśarathaṃ yathājaṃ ca pitāmaham
GE09ram_06_u:2658: 6.040.043c tathā bhavantam āsādya hṛṣayaṃ me prasīdati
GE09ram_06_u:2663: 6.040.046a ahaṃ sakhā te kākutstha priyaḥ prāṇo bahiścaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2665: 6.040.047a asurā vā mahāvīryā dānavā vā mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2673: 6.040.051a imaṃ śrutvā tu vṛttāntaṃ tvaramāṇo 'ham āgataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2676: 6.040.052c apramādaś ca kartavyo yuvābhyāṃ nityam eva hi
GE09ram_06_u:2679: 6.040.054a tan na viśvasitavyaṃ vo rākṣasānāṃ raṇājire
GE09ram_06_u:2681: 6.040.055a evam uktvā tato rāmaṃ suparṇaḥ sumahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2683: 6.040.056a sakhe rāghava dharmajña ripūṇām api vatsala
GE09ram_06_u:2686: 6.040.057c rāvaṇaṃ ca ripuṃ hatvā sītāṃ samupalapsyase
GE09ram_06_u:2687: 6.040.058a ity evam uktvā vacanaṃ suparṇaḥ śīghravikramaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2688: 6.040.058c rāmaṃ ca virujaṃ kṛtvā madhye teṣāṃ vanaukasām
GE09ram_06_u:2689: 6.040.059a pradakṣiṇaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā pariṣvajya ca vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:2692: 6.040.060c siṃhanādāṃs tadā nedur lāṅgūlaṃ dudhuvuś ca te
GE09ram_06_u:2693: 6.040.061a tato bherīḥ samājaghnur mṛdaṅgāṃś ca vyanādayan
GE09ram_06_u:2694: 6.040.061c dadhmuḥ śaṅkhān saṃprahṛṣṭāḥ kṣvelanty api yathāpuram
GE09ram_06_u:2699: 6.040.064a tatas tu bhīmas tumulo ninādo; babhūva śākhāmṛgayūthapānām
GE09ram_06_u:2700: 6.040.064c kṣaye nidāghasya yathā ghanānāṃ; nādaḥ subhīmo nadatāṃ niśīthe
GE09ram_06_u:2702: 6.041.001c nardatāṃ rākṣasaiḥ sārdhaṃ tadā śuśrāva rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2704: 6.041.002c sacivānāṃ tatas teṣāṃ madhye vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:2706: 6.041.003c bahūnāṃ sumahān nādo meghānām iva garjatām
GE09ram_06_u:2707: 6.041.004a vyaktaṃ sumahatī prītir eteṣāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2708: 6.041.004c tathā hi vipulair nādaiś cukṣubhe varuṇālayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2709: 6.041.005a tau tu baddhau śarais tīṣkṇair bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_06_u:2710: 6.041.005c ayaṃ ca sumahān nādaḥ śaṅkāṃ janayatīva me
GE09ram_06_u:2711: 6.041.006a etat tu vacanaṃ coktvā mantriṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2715: 6.041.008a tathoktās tena saṃbhrāntāḥ prākāram adhiruhya te
GE09ram_06_u:2717: 6.041.009a tau ca muktau sughoreṇa śarabandhena rāghavau
GE09ram_06_u:2723: 6.041.012a yau tāv indrajitā yuddhe bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_06_u:2727: 6.041.014a tac chrutvā vacanaṃ teṣāṃ rākṣasendro mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2731: 6.041.016a tam astrabandham āsādya yadi muktau ripū mama
GE09ram_06_u:2732: 6.041.016c saṃśayastham idaṃ sarvam anupaśyāmy ahaṃ balam
GE09ram_06_u:2734: 6.041.017c ādattaṃ yais tu saṃgrāme ripūṇāṃ mama jīvitam
GE09ram_06_u:2735: 6.041.018a evam uktvā tu saṃkruddho niśvasann urago yathā
GE09ram_06_u:2736: 6.041.018c abravīd rakṣasāṃ madhye dhūmrākṣaṃ nāma rākasaṃ
GE09ram_06_u:2739: 6.041.020a evam uktas tu dhūmrākṣo rākṣasendreṇa dhīmatā
GE09ram_06_u:2742: 6.041.021c tvarayasva balaṃ tūrṇaṃ kiṃ cireṇa yuyutsataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2748: 6.041.024c gadābhiḥ paṭṭasair daṇḍair āyasair musalair bhṛśam
GE09ram_06_u:2749: 6.041.025a parighair bhiṇḍipālaiś ca bhallaiḥ prāsaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2750: 6.041.025c niryayū rākṣasā ghorā nardanto jaladā yathā
GE09ram_06_u:2751: 6.041.026a rathaiḥ kavacinas tv anye dhvajaiś ca samalaṃkṛtaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2753: 6.041.027a hayaiḥ paramaśīghraiś ca gajendraiś ca madotkaṭaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2757: 6.041.029a sa niryāto mahāvīryo dhūmrākṣo rākṣasair vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2761: 6.041.031a rathaśīrṣe mahābhīmo gṛdhraś ca nipapāta ha
GE09ram_06_u:2763: 6.041.032a rudhirārdro mahāñ śvetaḥ kabandhaḥ patito bhuvi
GE09ram_06_u:2765: 6.041.033a vavarṣa rudhiraṃ devaḥ saṃcacāla ca medinī
GE09ram_06_u:2767: 6.041.033e timiraughāvṛtās tatra diśaś ca na cakāśire
GE09ram_06_u:2768: 6.041.034a sa tūtpātāṃs tato dṛṣṭvā rākṣasānāṃ bhayāvahān
GE09ram_06_u:2770: 6.041.035a tataḥ subhīmo bahubhir niśācarair; vṛto 'bhiniṣkramya raṇotsuko balī
GE09ram_06_u:2771: 6.041.035c dadarśa tāṃ rāghavabāhupālitāṃ; samudrakalpāṃ bahuvānarīṃ camūm
GE09ram_06_u:2774: 6.042.002a teṣāṃ tu tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ saṃjajñe harirakṣasām
GE09ram_06_u:2777: 6.042.003c vānarai rākṣasāś cāpi drumair bhūmau samīkṛtāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2778: 6.042.004a rākṣasāś cāpi saṃkruddhā vānarān niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2780: 6.042.005a te gadābhiś ca bhīmābhiḥ paṭṭasaiḥ kūṭamudgaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2781: 6.042.005c ghoraiś ca parighaiś citrais triśūlaiś cāpi saṃśitaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2785: 6.042.007c jagṛhus te drumāṃs tatra śilāś ca hariyūthapāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2786: 6.042.008a te bhīmavegā harayo nardamānās tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2787: 6.042.008c mamanthū rākṣasān bhīmān nāmāni ca babhāṣire
GE09ram_06_u:2789: 6.042.009c śilābhir vividhābhiś ca bahuśākhaiś ca pādapaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2790: 6.042.010a rākṣasā mathitāḥ ke cid vānarair jitakāśibhiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2791: 6.042.010c vavarṣū rudhiraṃ ke cin mukhai rudhirabhojanāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2792: 6.042.011a pārśveṣu dāritāḥ ke cit ke cid rāśīkṛtā drumaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2793: 6.042.011c śilābhiś cūrṇitāḥ ke cit ke cid dantair vidāritāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2794: 6.042.012a dhvajair vimathitair bhagnaiḥ kharaiś ca vinipātitaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2804: 6.042.017a sanyaṃ tu vidrutaṃ dṛṣṭvā dhūmrākṣo rākṣasarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2806: 6.042.018a prāsaiḥ pramathitāḥ ke cid vānarāḥ śoṇitasravāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2807: 6.042.018c mudgarair āhatāḥ ke cit patitā dharaṇītale
GE09ram_06_u:2808: 6.042.019a parighair mathitaḥ ke cid bhiṇḍipālair vidāritāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2809: 6.042.019c paṭṭasair āhatāḥ ke cid vihvalanto gatāsavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2810: 6.042.020a ke cid vinihatā bhūmau rudhirārdrā vanaukasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2811: 6.042.020c ke cid vidrāvitā naṣṭāḥ saṃkruddhai rākṣasair yudhi
GE09ram_06_u:2813: 6.042.021c vidāritāstraśūlai ca ke cid āntrair vinisrutāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2814: 6.042.022a tat subhīmaṃ mahad yuddhaṃ harirākasa saṃkulam
GE09ram_06_u:2819: 6.042.024c hasan vidrāvayām āsa diśas tāñ śaravṛṣṭibhiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2823: 6.042.026c śilāṃ tāṃ pātayām āsa dhūmrākṣasya rathaṃ prati
GE09ram_06_u:2824: 6.042.027a āpatantīṃ śilāṃ dṛṣṭvā gadām udyamya saṃbhramāt
GE09ram_06_u:2826: 6.042.028a sā pramathya rathaṃ tasya nipapāta śilābhuvi
GE09ram_06_u:2828: 6.042.029a sa bhaṅktvā tu rathaṃ tasya hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2834: 6.042.032a tam āpatantaṃ dhūmrākṣo gadām udyamya vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:2836: 6.042.033a tataḥ kruddhas tu vegena gadāṃ tāṃ bahukaṇṭakām
GE09ram_06_u:2837: 6.042.033c pātayām āsa dhūmrākṣo mastake tu hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2838: 6.042.034a tāḍitaḥ sa tayā tatra gadayā bhīmarūpayā
GE09ram_06_u:2839: 6.042.034c sa kapir mārutabalas taṃ prahāram acintayan
GE09ram_06_u:2842: 6.042.035c papāta sahasā bhūmau vikīrṇa iva parvataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2845: 6.042.037a sa tu pavanasuto nihatya śatruṃ; kṣatajavahāḥ saritaś ca saṃvikīrya
GE09ram_06_u:2846: 6.042.037c ripuvadhajanitaśramo mahātmā; mudam agamat kapibhiś ca pūjyamānaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2854: 6.043.004c rākasaiḥ saṃvṛto ghorais tadā niryāty akampanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2855: 6.043.005a na hi kampayituṃ śakyaḥ surair api mahāmṛdhe
GE09ram_06_u:2856: 6.043.005c akampanas tatas teṣām āditya iva tejasā
GE09ram_06_u:2860: 6.043.007c vivarṇo mukhavarṇaś ca gadgadaś cābhavat svaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2862: 6.043.008c ūcuḥ khagā mṛgāḥ sarve vācaḥ krūrā bhayāvahāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2865: 6.043.010a tadā nirgacchatas tasya rakṣasaḥ saha rākṣasaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2866: 6.043.010c babhūva sumahān nādaḥ kṣobhayann iva sāgaram
GE09ram_06_u:2871: 6.043.013a sarve hy atibalāḥ śūrāḥ sarve parvatasaṃnibhāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2878: 6.043.016c saṃvṛtāni ca bhūtāni dadṛśur na raṇājire
GE09ram_06_u:2879: 6.043.017a na dhvajo na patākāvā varma vā turago 'pi vā
GE09ram_06_u:2880: 6.043.017c āyudhaṃ syandanaṃ vāpi dadṛśe tena reṇunā
GE09ram_06_u:2881: 6.043.018a śabdaś ca sumahāṃs teṣāṃ nardatām abhidhāvatām
GE09ram_06_u:2882: 6.043.018c śrūyate tumule yuddhe na rūpāṇi cakāśire
GE09ram_06_u:2883: 6.043.019a harīn eva susaṃkruddhā harayo jaghnur āhave
GE09ram_06_u:2884: 6.043.019c rākṣasāś cāpi rakṣāṃsi nijaghnus timire tadā
GE09ram_06_u:2885: 6.043.020a parāṃś caiva vinighnantaḥ svāṃś ca vānararākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2887: 6.043.021a tatas tu rudhiraugheṇa siktaṃ vyapagataṃ rajaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2890: 6.043.022c harayo rākṣasās tūrṇaṃ jaghnur anyonyam ojasā
GE09ram_06_u:2897: 6.043.026a etasminn antare vīrā harayaḥ kumudo nalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2898: 6.043.026c maindaś ca paramakruddhaś cakrur vegam anuttamam
GE09ram_06_u:2899: 6.043.027a te tu vṛkṣair mahāvegā rākṣasānāṃ camūmukhe
GE09ram_06_u:2901: 6.044.001a tad dṛṣṭvā sumahat karma kṛtaṃ vānarasattamaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2902: 6.044.001c krodham āhārayām āsa yudhi tīvram akampanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2904: 6.044.002c dṛṣṭvā tu karma śatrūṇāṃ sārathiṃ vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:2905: 6.044.003a tatraiva tāvat tvaritaṃ rathaṃ prāpaya sārathe
GE09ram_06_u:2906: 6.044.003c ete 'tra bahavo ghnanti subahūn rākṣasān raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:2907: 6.044.004a ete 'tra balavanto hi bhīmakāyāś ca vānarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2909: 6.044.005a etān nihantum icchāmi samaraślāghino hy aham
GE09ram_06_u:2910: 6.044.005c etaiḥ pramathitaṃ sarvaṃ dṛśyate rākṣasaṃ balam
GE09ram_06_u:2913: 6.044.007a na sthātuṃ vānarāḥ śekuḥ kiṃ punar yoddhum āhave
GE09ram_06_u:2922: 6.044.011c mahendra iva dhārābhiḥ śarair abhivavarṣa ha
GE09ram_06_u:2926: 6.044.013c abhidudrāva tad rakṣaḥ kampayann iva medinīm
GE09ram_06_u:2934: 6.044.017c yathā hi namuciṃ saṃkhye vajreṇeva puraṃdaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2935: 6.044.018a akampanas tu tad dṛṣṭvā giriśṛṅgaṃ samudyatam
GE09ram_06_u:2942: 6.044.021c prahasya parayā prītyā bhrāmayām āsa saṃyuge
GE09ram_06_u:2945: 6.044.023a gajāṃś ca sagajārohān sarathān rathinas tathā
GE09ram_06_u:2946: 6.044.023c jaghāna hanumān dhīmān rākṣasāṃś ca padātikān
GE09ram_06_u:2947: 6.044.024a tam antakam iva kruddhaṃ samare prāṇahāriṇam
GE09ram_06_u:2950: 6.044.025c dadarśākampano vīraś cukrodha ca nanāda ca
GE09ram_06_u:2953: 6.044.027a sa tathā pratividdhas tu bahvībhiḥ śaravṛṣṭibhiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2954: 6.044.027c hanūmān dadṛśe vīraḥ prarūḍha iva sānumān
GE09ram_06_u:2955: 6.044.028a tato 'nyaṃ vṛkṣam utpāṭya kṛtvā vegam anuttamam
GE09ram_06_u:2957: 6.044.029a sa vṛkṣeṇa hatas tena sakrodhena mahātmanā
GE09ram_06_u:2958: 6.044.029c rākṣaso vānarendreṇa papāta sa mamāra ca
GE09ram_06_u:2959: 6.044.030a taṃ dṛṣṭvā nihataṃ bhūmau rākṣasendram akampanam
GE09ram_06_u:2960: 6.044.030c vyathitā rākṣasāḥ sarve kṣitikampa iva drumāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2962: 6.044.031c laṅkām abhiyayus trastā vānarais tair abhidrutāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2965: 6.044.033a anyonyaṃ pramamantus te viviśur nagaraṃ bhayāt
GE09ram_06_u:2966: 6.044.033c pṛṣṭhatas te susaṃmūḍhāḥ prekṣamāṇā muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2969: 6.044.035a so 'pi prahṛṣṭas tān sarvān harīn saṃpratyapūjayat
GE09ram_06_u:2971: 6.044.036a vineduś ca yathā prāṇaṃ harayo jitakāśinaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2972: 6.044.036c cakarṣuś ca punas tatra saprāṇān eva rākṣasān
GE09ram_06_u:2973: 6.044.037a sa vīraśobhām abhajan mahākapiḥ; sametya rakṣāṃsi nihatya mārutiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2974: 6.044.037c mahāsuraṃ bhīmam amitranāśanaṃ; yathaiva viṣṇur balinaṃ camūmukhe
GE09ram_06_u:2975: 6.044.038a apūjayan devagaṇās tadā kapiṃ; svayaṃ ca rāmo 'tibalaś ca lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2976: 6.044.038c tathaiva sugrīvamukhāḥ plavaṃgamā; vibhīṣaṇaś caiva mahābalas tadā
GE09ram_06_u:2978: 6.045.001c kiṃ cid dīnamukhaś cāpi sacivāṃs tān udaikṣata
GE09ram_06_u:2979: 6.045.002a sa tu dhyātvā muhūrtaṃ tu mantribhiḥ saṃvicārya ca
GE09ram_06_u:2980: 6.045.002c purīṃ pariyayau laṅkāṃ sarvān gulmān avekṣitum
GE09ram_06_u:2981: 6.045.003a tāṃ rākṣasagaṇair guptāṃ gulmair bahubhir āvṛtām
GE09ram_06_u:2983: 6.045.004a ruddhāṃ tu nagarīṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2987: 6.045.006a ahaṃ vā kumbhakarṇo vā tvaṃ vā senāpatir mama
GE09ram_06_u:2988: 6.045.006c indrajid vā nikumbho vā vaheyur bhāram īdṛśam
GE09ram_06_u:2989: 6.045.007a sa tvaṃ balam itaḥ śīghram ādāya parigṛhya ca
GE09ram_06_u:2991: 6.045.008a niryāṇād eva te nūnaṃ capalā harivāhinī
GE09ram_06_u:2993: 6.045.009a capalā hy avinītāś ca calacittāś ca vānarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2994: 6.045.009c na sahiṣyanti te nādaṃ siṃhanādam iva dvipāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:2995: 6.045.010a vidrute ca bale tasmin rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_06_u:2998: 6.045.011c pratilomānulomaṃ vā yad vā no manyase hitam
GE09ram_06_u:3001: 6.045.013a rājan mantritapūrvaṃ naḥ kuśalaiḥ saha mantribhiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3002: 6.045.013c vivādaś cāpi no vṛttaḥ samavekṣya parasparam
GE09ram_06_u:3003: 6.045.014a pradānena tu sītāyāḥ śreyo vyavasitaṃ mayā
GE09ram_06_u:3004: 6.045.014c apradāne punar yuddhaṃ dṛṣṭam etat tathaiva naḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3005: 6.045.015a so 'haṃ dānaiś ca mānaiś ca satataṃ pūjitas tvayā
GE09ram_06_u:3006: 6.045.015c sāntvaiś ca vividhaiḥ kāle kiṃ na kuryāṃ priyaṃ tava
GE09ram_06_u:3007: 6.045.016a na hi me jīvitaṃ rakṣyaṃ putradāradhanāni vā
GE09ram_06_u:3008: 6.045.016c tvaṃ paśya māṃ juhūṣantaṃ tvadarthe jīvitaṃ yudhi
GE09ram_06_u:3009: 6.045.017a evam uktvā tu bhartāraṃ rāvaṇaṃ vāhinīpatiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3010: 6.045.017c samānayata me śīghraṃ rākṣasānāṃ mahad balam
GE09ram_06_u:3013: 6.045.019a ity uktās te prahastena balādhyakṣāḥ kṛtatvarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3016: 6.045.020c laṅkā rākṣasavīrais tair gajair iva samākulā
GE09ram_06_u:3019: 6.045.022a srajaś ca vividhākārā jagṛhus tv abhimantritāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3023: 6.045.024a athāmantrya ca rājānaṃ bherīm āhatya bhairavām
GE09ram_06_u:3030: 6.045.027c laṅkāyā niryayau tūrṇaṃ balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3033: 6.045.029a ninadantaḥ svarān ghorān rākṣasā jagmur agrataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3039: 6.045.032a tasya niryāṇa ghoṣeṇa rākṣasānāṃ ca nardatām
GE09ram_06_u:3042: 6.045.033c maṇḍalāny apasavyāni khagāś cakrū rathaṃ prati
GE09ram_06_u:3044: 6.045.035a antarikṣāt papātolkā vāyuś ca paruṣo vavau
GE09ram_06_u:3045: 6.045.035c anyonyam abhisaṃrabdhā grahāś ca na cakāśire
GE09ram_06_u:3046: 6.045.036a vavarṣū rudhiraṃ cāsya siṣicuś ca puraḥsarān
GE09ram_06_u:3050: 6.045.038a niryāṇa śrīś ca yāsyāsīd bhāsvarā ca sudurlabhā
GE09ram_06_u:3051: 6.045.038c sā nanāśa muhūrtena same ca skhalitā hayāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3055: 6.045.040c vṛkṣān ārujatāṃ caiva gurvīś cāgṛhṇatāṃ śilāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3059: 6.045.042a tataḥ prahastaḥ kapirājavāhinīm; abhipratasthe vijayāya durmatiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3060: 6.045.042c vivṛddhavegāṃ ca viveśa tāṃ camūṃ; yathā mumūrṣuḥ śalabho vibhāvasum
GE09ram_06_u:3066: 6.046.003c gadāś ca parighāḥ prāsā vividhāś ca paraśvadhāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3070: 6.046.005c śilāś ca vipulā dīrghā yoddhukāmāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3071: 6.046.006a teṣām anyonyam āsādya saṃgrāmaḥ sumahān abhūt
GE09ram_06_u:3072: 6.046.006c bahūnām aśmavṛṣṭiṃ ca śaravṛṣṭiṃ ca varṣatām
GE09ram_06_u:3074: 6.046.007c vānarā rākṣasāṃś cāpi nijaghnur bahavo bahūn
GE09ram_06_u:3075: 6.046.008a śūlaiḥ pramathitāḥ ke cit ke cit tu paramāyudhaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3076: 6.046.008c parighair āhatāḥ ke cit ke cic chinnāḥ paraśvadhaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3077: 6.046.009a nirucchvāsāḥ punaḥ ke cit patitā dharaṇītale
GE09ram_06_u:3079: 6.046.010a ke cid dvidhākṛtāḥ khaḍgaiḥ sphurantaḥ patitā bhuvi
GE09ram_06_u:3080: 6.046.010c vānarā rākṣasaiḥ śūlaiḥ pārśvataś ca vidāritāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3083: 6.046.012a vajrasparśatalair hastair muṣṭibhiś ca hatā bhṛśam
GE09ram_06_u:3085: 6.046.013a ārtasvaraṃ ca svanatāṃ siṃhanādaṃ ca nardatām
GE09ram_06_u:3086: 6.046.013c babhūva tumulaḥ śabdo harīṇāṃ rakṣasāṃ yudhi
GE09ram_06_u:3091: 6.046.016a teṣām āpatatāṃ śīghraṃ nighnatāṃ cāpi vānarān
GE09ram_06_u:3093: 6.046.017a durmukhaḥ punar utpāṭya kapiḥ sa vipuladrumam
GE09ram_06_u:3095: 6.046.018a jāmbavāṃs tu susaṃkruddhaḥ pragṛhya mahatīṃ śilām
GE09ram_06_u:3099: 6.046.020a amṛṣyamāṇas tat karma prahasto ratham āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3101: 6.046.021a āvarta iva saṃjajñe ubhayoḥ senayos tadā
GE09ram_06_u:3105: 6.046.023a vānarāṇāṃ śarīrais tu rākṣasānāṃ ca medinī
GE09ram_06_u:3106: 6.046.023c babhūva nicitā ghorā patitair iva parvataiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3108: 6.046.024c saṃchannā mādhave māsi palāśair iva puṣpitaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3117: 6.046.029a rākṣasāḥ kapimukhyāś ca terus tāṃ dustarāṃ nadīm
GE09ram_06_u:3119: 6.046.030a tataḥ sṛjantaṃ bāṇaughān prahastaṃ syandane sthitam
GE09ram_06_u:3122: 6.046.031c prahastaṃ tāḍayām āsa vṛkṣam utpāṭya vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:3126: 6.046.033c yathaiva govṛṣo varṣaṃ śāradaṃ śīghram āgatam
GE09ram_06_u:3131: 6.046.036a vidhanus tu kṛtas tena prahasto vāhinīpatiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3139: 6.046.040a ājaghāna tadā nīlaṃ lalāṭe musalena saḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3143: 6.046.042a tam acintyaprahāraṃ sa pragṛhya musalaṃ mahat
GE09ram_06_u:3148: 6.046.044c prahastasya śilāṃ nīlo mūrdhni tūrṇam apātayat
GE09ram_06_u:3149: 6.046.045a sā tena kapimukhyena vimuktā mahatī śilā
GE09ram_06_u:3150: 6.046.045c bibheda bahudhā ghorā prahastasya śiras tadā
GE09ram_06_u:3152: 6.046.046c papāta sahasā bhūmau chinnamūla iva drumaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3154: 6.046.047c śarīrād api susrāva gireḥ prasravaṇaṃ yathā
GE09ram_06_u:3155: 6.046.048a hate prahaste nīlena tad akampyaṃ mahad balam
GE09ram_06_u:3159: 6.046.050a hate tasmiṃś camūmukhye rākṣasas te nirudyamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3161: 6.046.051a tatas tu nīlo vijayī mahābalaḥ; praśasyamānaḥ svakṛtena karmaṇā
GE09ram_06_u:3162: 6.046.051c sametya rāmeṇa salakṣmaṇena; prahṛṣṭarūpas tu babhūva yūthapaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3163: 6.047.001a tasmin hate rākṣasasainyapāle; plavaṃgamānām ṛṣabheṇa yuddhe
GE09ram_06_u:3165: 6.047.002a gatvā tu rakṣo'dhipateḥ śaśaṃsuḥ; senāpatiṃ pāvakasūnuśastam
GE09ram_06_u:3166: 6.047.002c tac cāpi teṣāṃ vacanaṃ niśamya; rakṣo'dhipaḥ krodhavaśaṃ jagāma
GE09ram_06_u:3167: 6.047.003a saṃkhye prahastaṃ nihataṃ niśamya; śokārditaḥ krodhaparītacetāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3168: 6.047.003c uvāca tān nairṛtayodhamukhyān; indro yathā cāmarayodhamukhyān
GE09ram_06_u:3172: 6.047.005c svayam eva gamiṣyāmi raṇaśīrṣaṃ tad adbhutam
GE09ram_06_u:3173: 6.047.006a adya tad vānarānīkaṃ rāmaṃ ca sahalakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:3175: 6.047.007a sa evam uktvā jvalanaprakāśaṃ; rathaṃ turaṃgottamarājiyuktam
GE09ram_06_u:3178: 6.047.008c puṇyaiḥ stavaiś cāpy abhipūjyamānas; tadā yayau rākṣasarājamukhyaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3180: 6.047.009c babhau vṛto rākṣasarājamukhyair; bhūtair vṛto rudra ivāmareśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3181: 6.047.010a tato nagaryāḥ sahasā mahaujā; niṣkramya tad vānarasainyam ugram
GE09ram_06_u:3183: 6.047.011a tad rākṣasānīkam atipracaṇḍam; ālokya rāmo bhujagendrabāhuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3184: 6.047.011c vibhīṣaṇaṃ śastrabhṛtāṃ variṣṭham; uvāca senānugataḥ pṛthuśrīḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3187: 6.047.013a tatas tu rāmasya niśamya vākyaṃ; vibhīṣaṇaḥ śakrasamānavīryaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3190: 6.047.014c prakampayan nāgaśiro 'bhyupaiti hy; akampanaṃ tv enam avehi rājan
GE09ram_06_u:3191: 6.047.015a yo 'sau rathastho mṛgarājaketur; dhūnvan dhanuḥ śakradhanuḥprakāśam
GE09ram_06_u:3192: 6.047.015c karīva bhāty ugravivṛttadaṃṣṭraḥ; sa indrajin nāma varapradhānaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3196: 6.047.017c gajaṃ kharaṃ garjati vai mahātmā; mahodaro nāma sa eṣa vīraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3199: 6.047.019a yaś caiṣa śūlaṃ niśitaṃ pragṛhya; vidyutprabhaṃ kiṃkaravajravegam
GE09ram_06_u:3200: 6.047.019c vṛṣendram āsthāya giriprakāśam; āyāti so 'sau triśirā yaśasvī
GE09ram_06_u:3201: 6.047.020a asau ca jīmūtanikāśa rūpaḥ; kumbhaḥ pṛthuvyūḍhasujātavakṣāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3202: 6.047.020c samāhitaḥ pannagarājaketur; visphārayan bhāti dhanur vidhūnvan
GE09ram_06_u:3203: 6.047.021a yaś caiṣa jāmbūnadavajrajuṣṭaṃ; dīptaṃ sadhūmaṃ parighaṃ pragṛhya
GE09ram_06_u:3206: 6.047.022c rathaṃ samāsthāya vibhāty udagro; narāntako 'sau nagaśṛṅgayodhī
GE09ram_06_u:3208: 6.047.023c bhūtair vṛto bhāti vivṛttanetraiḥ; so 'sau surāṇām api darpahantā
GE09ram_06_u:3209: 6.047.024a yatraitad indupratimaṃ vibhātic; chattraṃ sitaṃ sūkṣmaśalākam agryam
GE09ram_06_u:3210: 6.047.024c atraiṣa rakṣo'dhipatir mahātmā; bhūtair vṛto rudra ivāvabhāti
GE09ram_06_u:3215: 6.047.027a āditya iva duṣprekṣyo raśmibhir bhāti rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3216: 6.047.027c suvyaktaṃ lakṣaye hy asya rūpaṃ tejaḥsamāvṛtam
GE09ram_06_u:3223: 6.047.031a evam uktvā tato rāmo dhanur ādāya vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:3225: 6.047.032a tataḥ sa rakṣo'dhipatir mahātmā; rakṣāṃsi tāny āha mahābalāni
GE09ram_06_u:3227: 6.047.033a visarjayitvā sahasā tatas tān; gateṣu rakṣaḥsu yathāniyogam
GE09ram_06_u:3229: 6.047.034a tam āpatantaṃ sahasā samīkṣya; dīpteṣucāpaṃ yudhi rākṣasendram
GE09ram_06_u:3230: 6.047.034c mahat samutpāṭya mahīdharāgraṃ; dudrāva rakṣo'dhipatiṃ harīśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3231: 6.047.035a tac chailaśṛṅgaṃ bahuvṛkṣasānuṃ; pragṛhya cikṣepa niśācarāya
GE09ram_06_u:3232: 6.047.035c tam āpatantaṃ sahasā samīkṣya; bibheda bāṇais tapanīyapuṅkhaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3233: 6.047.036a tasmin pravṛddhottamasānuvṛkṣe; śṛṅge vikīrṇe patite pṛthivyām
GE09ram_06_u:3238: 6.047.038c sugrīvam āsādya bibheda vegād; guheritā kraucam ivograśaktiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3239: 6.047.039a sa sāyakārto viparītacetāḥ; kūjan pṛthivyāṃ nipapāta vīraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3240: 6.047.039c taṃ prekṣya bhūmau patitaṃ visaṃjmaṃ; neduḥ prahṛṣṭā yudhi yātudhānāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3241: 6.047.040a tato gavākṣo gavayaḥ sudaṃṣṭras; tatharṣabho jyotimukho nalaś ca
GE09ram_06_u:3242: 6.047.040c śailān samudyamya vivṛddhakāyāḥ; pradudruvus taṃ prati rākṣasendram
GE09ram_06_u:3243: 6.047.041a teṣāṃ prahārān sa cakāra meghān; rakṣo'dhipo bāṇagaṇaiḥ śitāgraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3244: 6.047.041c tān vānarendrān api bāṇajālair; bibheda jāmbūnadacitrapuṅkhaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3245: 6.047.042a te vānarendrās tridaśāribāṇair; bhinnā nipetur bhuvi bhīmarūpāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3246: 6.047.042c tatas tu tad vānarasainyam ugraṃ; pracchādayām āsa sa bāṇajālaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3248: 6.047.043c śākhāmṛgā rāvaṇasāyakārtā; jagmuḥ śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ sma rāmam
GE09ram_06_u:3249: 6.047.044a tato mahātmā sa dhanur dhanuṣmān; ādāya rāmaḥ saharā jagāma
GE09ram_06_u:3250: 6.047.044c taṃ lakṣmaṇaḥ prāñjalir abhyupetya; uvāca vākyaṃ paramārthayuktam
GE09ram_06_u:3252: 6.047.045c vidhamiṣyāmy ahaṃ nīcam anujānīhi māṃ vibho
GE09ram_06_u:3254: 6.047.046c gaccha yatnaparaś cāpi bhava lakṣmaṇa saṃyuge
GE09ram_06_u:3257: 6.047.048a tasya cchidrāṇi mārgasva svacchidrāṇi ca gopaya
GE09ram_06_u:3259: 6.047.049a rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā saṃpariṣvajya pūjya ca
GE09ram_06_u:3260: 6.047.049c abhivādya tato rāmaṃ yayau saumitrir āhavam
GE09ram_06_u:3265: 6.047.052a rathaṃ tasya samāsādya bhujam udyamya dakṣiṇam
GE09ram_06_u:3266: 6.047.052c trāsayan rāvaṇaṃ dhīmān hanūmān vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:3268: 6.047.053c avadhyatvāt tvayā bhagnā vānarebhyas tu te bhayam
GE09ram_06_u:3269: 6.047.054a eṣa me dakṣiṇo bāhuḥ pañcaśākhaḥ samudyataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3273: 6.047.056a kṣipraṃ prahara niḥśaṅkaṃ sthirāṃ kīrtim avāpnuhi
GE09ram_06_u:3276: 6.047.057c prahṛtaṃ hi mayā pūrvam akṣaṃ smara sutaṃ tava
GE09ram_06_u:3279: 6.047.059a sa talābhihatas tena cacāla ca muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3283: 6.047.061a saṃgrāme taṃ tathā dṛṣṭva rāvaṇaṃ talatāḍitam
GE09ram_06_u:3284: 6.047.061c ṛṣayo vānarāḥ siddhā nedur devāḥ sahāsurāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3287: 6.047.063a rāvaṇenaivam uktas tu mārutir vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:3288: 6.047.063c dhig astu mama vīryaṃ tu yat tvaṃ jīvasi rāvaṇa
GE09ram_06_u:3289: 6.047.064a sakṛt tu praharedānīṃ durbuddhe kiṃ vikatthase
GE09ram_06_u:3290: 6.047.064c tatas tvāṃ māmako muṣṭir nayiṣyāmi yathākṣayam
GE09ram_06_u:3294: 6.047.065e hanūmān vakṣasi vyūdhe saṃcacāla hataḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3295: 6.047.066a vihvalaṃ taṃ tadā dṛṣṭvā hanūmantaṃ mahābalam
GE09ram_06_u:3305: 6.047.071a rāvaṇo 'pi mahātejās tac chṛṅgaṃ saptabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3306: 6.047.071c ājaghāna sutīkṣṇāgrais tad vikīrṇaṃ papāta ha
GE09ram_06_u:3307: 6.047.072a tad vikīrṇaṃ gireḥ śṛṅgaṃ dṛṣṭvā haricamūpatiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3309: 6.047.073a so 'śvakarṇān dhavān sālāṃś cūtāṃś cāpi supuṣpitān
GE09ram_06_u:3310: 6.047.073c anyāṃś ca vividhān vṛkṣān nīlaś cikṣepa saṃyuge
GE09ram_06_u:3311: 6.047.074a sa tān vṛkṣān samāsādya praticiccheda rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3314: 6.047.075c hrasvaṃ kṛtvā tadā rūpaṃ dhvajāgre nipapāta ha
GE09ram_06_u:3316: 6.047.076c jajvāla rāvaṇaḥ krodhāt tato nīlo nanāda ha
GE09ram_06_u:3317: 6.047.077a dhvajāgre dhanuṣaś cāgre kirīṭāgre ca taṃ harim
GE09ram_06_u:3318: 6.047.077c lakṣmaṇo 'tha hanūmāṃś ca dṛṣṭvā rāmaś ca vismitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3320: 6.047.078c astram āhārayām āsa dīptam āgneyam adbhutam
GE09ram_06_u:3321: 6.047.079a tatas te cukruśur hṛṣṭā labdhalakṣyāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3323: 6.047.080a vānarāṇāṃ ca nādena saṃrabdho rāvaṇas tadā
GE09ram_06_u:3329: 6.047.083a jīvitaṃ khalu rakṣasva yadi śaknoṣi vānara
GE09ram_06_u:3330: 6.047.083c tāni tāny ātmarūpāṇi sṛjase tvam anekaśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3338: 6.047.087c jānubhyām apatad bhūmau na ca prāṇair vyayujyata
GE09ram_06_u:3341: 6.047.089a tam āha saumitrir adīnasattvo; visphārayantaṃ dhanur aprameyam
GE09ram_06_u:3342: 6.047.089c anvehi mām eva niśācarendra; na vānarāṃs tvaṃ prati yoddhum arhasi
GE09ram_06_u:3343: 6.047.090a sa tasya vākyaṃ paripūrṇaghoṣaṃ; jyāśabdam ugraṃ ca niśamya rājā
GE09ram_06_u:3344: 6.047.090c āsādya saumitrim avasthitaṃ taṃ; kopānvitaṃ vākyam uvāca rakṣaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3345: 6.047.091a diṣṭyāsi me rāghava dṛṣṭimārgaṃ; prāpto 'ntagāmī viparītabuddhiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3346: 6.047.091c asmin kṣaṇe yāsyasi mṛtyudeśaṃ; saṃsādyamāno mama bāṇajālaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3347: 6.047.092a tam āha saumitrir avismayāno; garjantam udvṛttasitāgradaṃṣṭram
GE09ram_06_u:3348: 6.047.092c rājan na garjanti mahāprabhāvā; vikatthase pāpakṛtāṃ variṣṭha
GE09ram_06_u:3349: 6.047.093a jānāmi vīryaṃ tava rākṣasendra; balaṃ pratāpaṃ ca parākramaṃ ca
GE09ram_06_u:3351: 6.047.094a sa evam uktaḥ kupitaḥ sasarja; rakṣo'dhipaḥ saptaśarān supuṅkhān
GE09ram_06_u:3352: 6.047.094c tāṃl lakṣmaṇaḥ kāñcanacitrapuṅkhaiś; ciccheda bāṇair niśitāgradhāraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3353: 6.047.095a tān prekṣamāṇaḥ sahasā nikṛttān; nikṛttabhogān iva pannagendrān
GE09ram_06_u:3354: 6.047.095c laṅkeśvaraḥ krodhavaśaṃ jagāma; sasarja cānyān niśitān pṛṣatkān
GE09ram_06_u:3355: 6.047.096a sa bāṇavarṣaṃ tu vavarṣa tīvraṃ; rāmānujaḥ kārmukasaṃprayuktam
GE09ram_06_u:3356: 6.047.096c kṣurārdhacandrottamakarṇibhallaiḥ; śarāṃś ca ciccheda na cukṣubhe ca
GE09ram_06_u:3357: 6.047.097a sa lakṣmaṇaś cāśu śarāñ śitāgrān; mahendravajrāśanitulyavegān
GE09ram_06_u:3358: 6.047.097c saṃdhāya cāpe jvalanaprakāśān; sasarja rakṣo'dhipater vadhāya
GE09ram_06_u:3359: 6.047.098a sa tān praciccheda hi rākṣasendraś; chittvā ca tāṃl lakṣmaṇam ājaghāna
GE09ram_06_u:3361: 6.047.099a sa lakṣmaṇo rāvaṇasāyakārtaś; cacāla cāpaṃ śithilaṃ pragṛhya
GE09ram_06_u:3362: 6.047.099c punaś ca saṃjñāṃ pratilabhya kṛcchrāc; ciccheda cāpaṃ tridaśendraśatroḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3363: 6.047.100a nikṛttacāpaṃ tribhir ājaghāna; bāṇais tadā dāśarathiḥ śitāgraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3364: 6.047.100c sa sāyakārto vicacāla rājā; kṛcchrāc ca saṃjñāṃ punar āsasāda
GE09ram_06_u:3365: 6.047.101a sa kṛttacāpaḥ śaratāḍitaś ca; svedārdragātro rudhirāvasiktaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3366: 6.047.101c jagrāha śaktiṃ samudagraśaktiḥ; svayambhudattāṃ yudhi devaśatruḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3368: 6.047.102c cikṣepa śaktiṃ tarasā jvalantīṃ; saumitraye rākṣasarāṣṭranāthaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3369: 6.047.103a tām āpatantīṃ bharatānujo 'strair; jaghāna bāṇaiś ca hutāgnikalpaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3370: 6.047.103c tathāpi sā tasya viveśa śaktir; bhujāntaraṃ dāśarather viśālam
GE09ram_06_u:3371: 6.047.104a śaktyā brāmyā tu saumitris tāḍitas tu stanāntare
GE09ram_06_u:3372: 6.047.104c viṣṇor acintyaṃ svaṃ bhāgam ātmānaṃ pratyanusmarat
GE09ram_06_u:3375: 6.047.106a himavān mandaro merus trailokyaṃ vā sahāmaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3376: 6.047.106c śakyaṃ bhujābhyām uddhartuṃ na saṃkhye bharatānujaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3377: 6.047.107a athainaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ bhāgaṃ mānuṣaṃ deham āsthitam
GE09ram_06_u:3382: 6.047.109c jānubhyām apatad bhūmau cacāla ca papāta ca
GE09ram_06_u:3384: 6.047.110c ṛṣayo vānarāś caiva nedur devāḥ savāsavāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3387: 6.047.112a vāyusūnoḥ suhṛttvena bhaktyā paramayā ca saḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3389: 6.047.113a taṃ samutsṛjya sā śaktiḥ saumitriṃ yudhi durjayam
GE09ram_06_u:3390: 6.047.113c rāvaṇasya rathe tasmin sthānaṃ punar upāgamat
GE09ram_06_u:3392: 6.047.114c ādade niśitān bāṇāñ jagrāha ca mahad dhanuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3393: 6.047.115a āśvastaś ca viśalyaś ca lakṣmaṇaḥ śatrusūdanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3396: 6.047.116c rāghavas tu raṇe dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇaṃ samabhidravat
GE09ram_06_u:3398: 6.047.117c mama pṛṣṭhaṃ samāruhya rakṣasaṃ śāstum arhasi
GE09ram_06_u:3399: 6.047.118a tac chrutvā rāghavo vākyaṃ vāyuputreṇa bhāṣitam
GE09ram_06_u:3402: 6.047.119a tam ālokya mahātejāḥ pradudrāva sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3405: 6.047.120c girā gambhīrayā rāmo rākṣasendram uvāca ha
GE09ram_06_u:3406: 6.047.121a tiṣṭha tiṣṭha mama tvaṃ hi kṛtvā vipriyam īdṛśam
GE09ram_06_u:3407: 6.047.121c kva nu rākṣasaśārdūla gato mokṣam avāpsyasi
GE09ram_06_u:3409: 6.047.122c gamiṣyasi tvaṃ daśa vā diśo vā; tathāpi me nādya gato vimokṣyase
GE09ram_06_u:3410: 6.047.123a yaś caiṣa śaktyābhihatas tvayādya; icchan viṣādaṃ sahasābhyupetaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3411: 6.047.123c sa eṣa rakṣogaṇarāja mṛtyuḥ; saputradārasya tavādya yuddhe
GE09ram_06_u:3419: 6.047.127c sasārathiṃ sāśaniśūlakhaḍgaṃ; rāmaḥ praciccheda śaraiḥ supuṅkhaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3421: 6.047.128c bhujāntare vyūḍhasujātarūpe; vajreṇa meruṃ bhagavān ivendraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3422: 6.047.129a yo vajrapātāśanisaṃnipātān; na cukṣubhe nāpi cacāla rājā
GE09ram_06_u:3423: 6.047.129c sa rāmabāṇābhihato bhṛśārtaś; cacāla cāpaṃ ca mumoca vīraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3424: 6.047.130a taṃ vihvalantaṃ prasamīkṣya rāmaḥ; samādade dīptam athārdhacandram
GE09ram_06_u:3425: 6.047.130c tenārkavarṇaṃ sahasā kirīṭaṃ; ciccheda rakṣo'dhipater mahātmāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3427: 6.047.131c gataśriyaṃ kṛttakirīṭakūṭam; uvāca rāmo yudhi rākṣasendram
GE09ram_06_u:3428: 6.047.132a kṛtaṃ tvayā karma mahat subhīmaṃ; hatapravīraś ca kṛtas tvayāham
GE09ram_06_u:3429: 6.047.132c tasmāt pariśrānta iti vyavasya; na tvaṃ śarair mṛtyuvaśaṃ nayāmi
GE09ram_06_u:3430: 6.047.133a sa evam ukto hatadarpaharṣo; nikṛttacāpaḥ sa hatāśvasūtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3431: 6.047.133c śarārditaḥ kṛttamahākirīṭo; viveśa laṅkāṃ sahasā sma rājā
GE09ram_06_u:3433: 6.047.134c harīn viśalyān sahalakṣmaṇena; cakāra rāmaḥ paramāhavāgre
GE09ram_06_u:3434: 6.047.135a tasmin prabhagne tridaśendraśatrau; surāsurā bhūtagaṇā diśaś ca
GE09ram_06_u:3435: 6.047.135c sasāgarāḥ sarṣimahoragāś ca; tathaiva bhūmyambucarāś ca hṛṣṭāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3444: 6.048.005a sarvaṃ tat khalu me moghaṃ yat taptaṃ paramaṃ tapaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3446: 6.048.006a idaṃ tad brahmaṇo ghoraṃ vākyaṃ mām abhyupasthitam
GE09ram_06_u:3447: 6.048.006c mānuṣebhyo vijānīhi bhayaṃ tvam iti tat tathā
GE09ram_06_u:3449: 6.048.007c avadhyatvaṃ mayā prāptaṃ mānuṣebhyo na yācitam
GE09ram_06_u:3454: 6.048.010a sa parājitam ātmānaṃ prahastaṃ ca niṣūditam
GE09ram_06_u:3458: 6.048.012a nava ṣaṭ sapta cāṣṭau ca māsān svapiti rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3459: 6.048.012c taṃ tu bodhayata kṣipraṃ kumbhakarṇaṃ mahābalam
GE09ram_06_u:3460: 6.048.013a sa hi saṃkhye mahābāhuḥ kakudaṃ sarvarakṣasām
GE09ram_06_u:3461: 6.048.013c vānarān rājaputrau ca kṣipram eva vadhiṣyati
GE09ram_06_u:3462: 6.048.014a kumbhakarṇaḥ sadā śete mūḍho grāmyasukhe rataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3464: 6.048.015a bhaviṣyati na me śokaḥ kumbhakarṇe vibodhite
GE09ram_06_u:3465: 6.048.015c kiṃ kariṣyāmy ahaṃ tena śakratulyabalena hi
GE09ram_06_u:3466: 6.048.016a īdṛśe vyasane prāpte yo na sāhyāya kalpate
GE09ram_06_u:3467: 6.048.016c te tu tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rākṣasendrasya rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3470: 6.048.018a gandhamālyāṃs tathā bhakṣyān ādāya sahasā yayuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3474: 6.048.020a tāṃ praviśya guhāṃ ramyāṃ śubhāṃ kāñcanakuṭṭimām
GE09ram_06_u:3476: 6.048.021a te tu taṃ vikṛtaṃ suptaṃ vikīrṇam iva parvatam
GE09ram_06_u:3484: 6.048.025a mṛgāṇāṃ mahiṣāṇāṃ ca varāhāṇāṃ ca saṃcayān
GE09ram_06_u:3486: 6.048.026a tataḥ śoṇitakumbhāṃś ca madyāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:3489: 6.048.027c divyair ācchādayām āsur mālyair gandhaiḥ sugandhibhiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3490: 6.048.028a dhūpaṃ sugandhaṃ sasṛjus tuṣṭuvuś ca paraṃtapam
GE09ram_06_u:3493: 6.048.029c tumulaṃ yugapac cāpi vineduś cāpy amarṣitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3494: 6.048.030a nedur āsphoṭayām āsuś cikṣipus te niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3497: 6.048.031c diśo dravantas tridivaṃ kirantaḥ; śrutvā vihaṃgāḥ sahasā nipetuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3498: 6.048.032a yadā bhṛśaṃ tair ninadair mahātmā; na kumbhakarṇo bubudhe prasuptaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3499: 6.048.032c tato musuṇḍīmusalāni sarve; rakṣogaṇās te jagṛhur gadāś ca
GE09ram_06_u:3500: 6.048.033a taṃ śailaśṛṅgair musalair gadābhir; vṛkṣais talair mudgaramuṣṭibhiś ca
GE09ram_06_u:3501: 6.048.033c sukhaprasuptaṃ bhuvi kumbhakarṇaṃ; rakṣāṃsy udagrāṇi tadā nijaghnuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3508: 6.048.036c abhighnanto nadantaś ca naiva saṃvivide tu saḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3509: 6.048.037a yadā cainaṃ na śekus te pratibodhayituṃ tadā
GE09ram_06_u:3511: 6.048.038a aśvān uṣṭrān kharān nāgāñ jaghnur daṇḍakaśāṅkuśaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3519: 6.048.042a evam apy atinidras tu yadā naiva prabudhyata
GE09ram_06_u:3520: 6.048.042c śāpasya vaśam āpannas tataḥ kruddhā niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3523: 6.048.044a anye bherīḥ samājaghnur anye cakrur mahāsvanam
GE09ram_06_u:3524: 6.048.044c keśān anye pralulupuḥ karṇāv anye daśanti ca
GE09ram_06_u:3531: 6.048.047c kumbhakarṇas tato buddhaḥ sparśaṃ param abudhyata
GE09ram_06_u:3532: 6.048.048a sa pātyamānair giriśṛṅgavṛkṣair; acintayaṃs tān vipulān prahārān
GE09ram_06_u:3535: 6.048.049c vivṛtya vaktraṃ vaḍavāmukhābhaṃ; niśācaro 'sau vikṛtaṃ jajṛmbhe
GE09ram_06_u:3539: 6.048.051c niśvāsaś cāsya saṃjajñe parvatād iva mārutaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3540: 6.048.052a rūpam uttiṣṭhatas tasya kumbhakarṇasya tad babhau
GE09ram_06_u:3545: 6.048.054c medaḥ kumbhaṃ ca madyaṃ ca papau śakraripus tadā
GE09ram_06_u:3546: 6.048.055a tatas tṛpta iti jñātvā samutpetur niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3548: 6.048.056a sa sarvān sāntvayām āsa nairṛtān nairṛtarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3549: 6.048.056c bodhanād vismitaś cāpi rākṣasān idam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:3551: 6.048.057c kaccit sukuśalaṃ rājño bhayaṃ vā neha kiṃ cana
GE09ram_06_u:3552: 6.048.058a atha vā dhruvam anyebhyo bhayaṃ param upasthitam
GE09ram_06_u:3556: 6.048.060a na hy alpakāraṇe suptaṃ bodhayiṣyati māṃ bhṛśam
GE09ram_06_u:3559: 6.048.061c yūpākṣaḥ sacivo rājñaḥ kṛtāñjalir uvāca ha
GE09ram_06_u:3560: 6.048.062a na no devakṛtaṃ kiṃ cid bhayam asti kadā cana
GE09ram_06_u:3561: 6.048.062c na daityadānavebhyo vā bhayam asti hi tādṛśam
GE09ram_06_u:3562: 6.048.062e yādṛśaṃ mānuṣaṃ rājan bhayam asmān upasthitam
GE09ram_06_u:3569: 6.048.066a yan na devaiḥ kṛto rājā nāpi daityair na dānavaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3570: 6.048.066c kṛtaḥ sa iha rāmeṇa vimuktaḥ prāṇasaṃśayāt
GE09ram_06_u:3571: 6.048.067a sa yūpākṣavacaḥ śrutvā bhrātur yudhi parājayam
GE09ram_06_u:3574: 6.048.068c rāghavaṃ ca raṇe hatvā paścād drakṣyāmi rāvaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:3577: 6.048.070a tat tasya vākyaṃ bruvato niśamya; sagarvitaṃ roṣavivṛddhadoṣam
GE09ram_06_u:3578: 6.048.070c mahodaro nairṛtayodhamukhyaḥ; kṛtāñjalir vākyam idaṃ babhāṣe
GE09ram_06_u:3579: 6.048.071a rāvaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā guṇadoṣu vimṛśya ca
GE09ram_06_u:3580: 6.048.071c paścād api mahābāho śatrūn yudhi vijeṣyasi
GE09ram_06_u:3588: 6.048.075c kathaṃ tatraiva niryātu drakṣyase tam ihāgatam
GE09ram_06_u:3589: 6.048.076a rāvaṇas tv abravīd dhṛṣṭo yathānyāyaṃ ca pūjitam
GE09ram_06_u:3590: 6.048.076c draṣṭum enam ihecchāmi yathānyāyaṃ ca pūjitam
GE09ram_06_u:3591: 6.048.077a tathety uktvā tu te sarve punar āgamya rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3595: 6.048.079a kumbhakarṇas tu durdharṣo bhrātur ājñāya śāsanam
GE09ram_06_u:3596: 6.048.079c tathety uktvā mahāvīryaḥ śayanād utpapāta ha
GE09ram_06_u:3599: 6.048.081a tatas te tvaritās tasya rājṣasā rāvaṇājñayā
GE09ram_06_u:3600: 6.048.081c madyaṃ bhakṣyāṃś ca vividhān kṣipram evopahārayan
GE09ram_06_u:3606: 6.048.085a sa rājamārgaṃ vapuṣā prakāśayan; sahasraraśmir dharaṇīm ivāṃśubhiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3607: 6.048.085c jagāma tatrāñjalimālayā vṛtaḥ; śatakratur geham iva svayambhuvaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3608: 6.048.086a ke cic charaṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ sma rāmaṃ; vrajanti ke cid vyathitāḥ patanti
GE09ram_06_u:3609: 6.048.086c ke cid diśaḥ sma vyathitāḥ prayānti; ke cid bhayārtā bhuvi śerate sma
GE09ram_06_u:3610: 6.048.087a tam adriśṛṅgapratimaṃ kirīṭinaṃ; spṛśantam ādityam ivātmatejasā
GE09ram_06_u:3611: 6.048.087c vanaukasaḥ prekṣya vivṛddham adbhutaṃ; bhayārditā dudruvire tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3612: 6.049.001a tato rāmo mahātejā dhanur ādāya vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:3618: 6.049.004a vidrutāṃ vāhinīṃ dṛṣṭvā vardhamānaṃ ca rākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_06_u:3619: 6.049.004c savismayam idaṃ rāmo vibhīṣaṇam uvāca ha
GE09ram_06_u:3621: 6.049.005c laṅkāyāṃ dṛśyate vīraḥ savidyud iva toyadaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3623: 6.049.006c yaṃ dṛṣṭvā vānarāḥ sarve vidravanti tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3624: 6.049.007a ācakṣva me mahān ko 'sau rakṣo vā yadi vāsuraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3625: 6.049.007c na mayaivaṃvidhaṃ bhūtaṃ dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ kadā cana
GE09ram_06_u:3628: 6.049.009a yena vaivasvato yuddhe vāsavaś ca parājitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3630: 6.049.010a etena devā yudhi dānavāś ca; yakṣā bhujaṃgāḥ piśitāśanāś ca
GE09ram_06_u:3633: 6.049.011c hantuṃ na śekus tridaśāḥ kālo 'yam iti mohitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3634: 6.049.012a prakṛtyā hy eṣa tejasvī kumbhakarṇo mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3639: 6.049.014c yānti sma śaraṇaṃ śakraṃ tam apy arthaṃ nyavedayan
GE09ram_06_u:3640: 6.049.015a sa kumbhakarṇaṃ kupito mahendro; jaghāna vajreṇa śitena vajrī
GE09ram_06_u:3641: 6.049.015c sa śakravajrābhihato mahātmā; cacāla kopāc ca bhṛśaṃ nanāda
GE09ram_06_u:3643: 6.049.016c śrutvā ninādaṃ vitrastā bhūyo bhūmir vitatrase
GE09ram_06_u:3648: 6.049.019a prajābhiḥ saha śakraś ca yayau sthānaṃ svayambhuvaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3650: 6.049.019e prajānāṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ cāpi devānāṃ cāpi dharṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:3651: 6.049.020a evaṃ prajā yadi tv eṣa bhakṣayiṣyati nityaśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3654: 6.049.021c rakṣāṃsy āvāhayām āsa kumbhakarṇaṃ dadarśa ha
GE09ram_06_u:3656: 6.049.022c dṛṣṭvā niśvasya caivedaṃ svayambhūr idam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:3658: 6.049.023c tasmāt tvam adya prabhṛti mṛtakalpaḥ śayiṣyasi
GE09ram_06_u:3662: 6.049.025a na naptāraṃ svakaṃ nyāyyaṃ śaptum evaṃ prajāpate
GE09ram_06_u:3663: 6.049.025c na mithyāvacanaś ca tvaṃ svapsyaty eṣa na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3664: 6.049.025e kālas tu kriyatām asya śayane jāgare tathā
GE09ram_06_u:3665: 6.049.026a rāvaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā svayambhūr idam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:3666: 6.049.026c śayitā hy eṣa ṣaṇ māsān ekāhaṃ jāgariṣyati
GE09ram_06_u:3667: 6.049.027a ekenāhnā tv asau vīraś caran bhūmiṃ bubhukṣitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3668: 6.049.027c vyāttāsyo bhakṣayel lokān saṃkruddha iva pāvakaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3671: 6.049.029a sa eṣa nirgato vīraḥ śibirād bhīmavikramaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3674: 6.049.030c katham enaṃ raṇe kruddhaṃ vārayiṣyanti vānarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3675: 6.049.031a ucyantāṃ vānarāḥ sarve yantram etat samucchritam
GE09ram_06_u:3678: 6.049.032c uvāca rāghavo vākyaṃ nīlaṃ senāpatiṃ tadā
GE09ram_06_u:3679: 6.049.033a gaccha sainyāni sarvāṇi vyūhya tiṣṭhasva pāvake
GE09ram_06_u:3680: 6.049.033c dvārāṇy ādāya laṅkāyāś caryāś cāpy atha saṃkramān
GE09ram_06_u:3681: 6.049.034a śailaśṛṅgāṇi vṛkṣāṃś ca śilāś cāpy upasaṃharan
GE09ram_06_u:3685: 6.049.036a tato gavākṣaḥ śarabho hanumān aṅgado nalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3687: 6.049.037a tato harīṇāṃ tad anīkam ugraṃ; rarāja śailodyatavṛkṣahastam
GE09ram_06_u:3688: 6.049.037c gireḥ samīpānugataṃ yathaiva; mahan mahāmbhodharajālam ugram
GE09ram_06_u:3695: 6.050.004a sa tat tadā sūrya ivābhrajālaṃ; praviśya rakṣo'dhipater niveśanam
GE09ram_06_u:3696: 6.050.004c dadarśa dūre 'grajam āsanasthaṃ; svayambhuvaṃ śakra ivāsanastham
GE09ram_06_u:3697: 6.050.005a so 'bhigamya gṛhaṃ bhrātuḥ kakṣyām abhivigāhya ca
GE09ram_06_u:3702: 6.050.007c bhrātur vavande caraṇāṃ kiṃ kṛtyam iti cābravīt
GE09ram_06_u:3708: 6.050.010a kimartham aham ādṛtya tvayā rājan prabodhitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3709: 6.050.010c śaṃsa kasmād bhayaṃ te 'sti ko 'dya preto bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_06_u:3711: 6.050.011c īṣat tu parivṛttābhyāṃ netrābhyāṃ vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:3712: 6.050.012a adya te sumahān kālaḥ śayānasya mahābala
GE09ram_06_u:3713: 6.050.012c sukhitas tvaṃ na jānīṣe mama rāmakṛtaṃ bhayam
GE09ram_06_u:3715: 6.050.013c samudraṃ sabalas tīrtvā mūlaṃ naḥ parikṛntati
GE09ram_06_u:3716: 6.050.014a hanta paśyasva laṅkāyā vanāny upavanāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:3718: 6.050.015a ye rākṣasā mukhyatamā hatās te vānarair yudhi
GE09ram_06_u:3719: 6.050.015c vānarāṇāṃ kṣayaṃ yuddhe na paśyāmi kadā cana
GE09ram_06_u:3720: 6.050.016a sarvakṣapitakośaṃ ca sa tvam abhyavapadya mām
GE09ram_06_u:3722: 6.050.017a bhrātur arthe mahābāho kuru karma suduṣkaram
GE09ram_06_u:3723: 6.050.017c mayaivaṃ noktapūrvo hi kaś cid bhrātaḥ paraṃtapa
GE09ram_06_u:3724: 6.050.017e tvayy asti mama ca snehaḥ parā saṃbhāvanā ca me
GE09ram_06_u:3726: 6.050.018c tvayā devāḥ prativyūhya nirjitāś cāsurā yudhi
GE09ram_06_u:3727: 6.050.018e na hi te sarvabhūteṣu dṛśyate sadṛśo balī
GE09ram_06_u:3728: 6.050.019a kuruṣva me priyahitam etad uttamaṃ; yathāpriyaṃ priyaraṇabāndhavapriya
GE09ram_06_u:3729: 6.050.019c svatejasā vidhama sapatnavāhinīṃ; śaradghanaṃ pavana ivodyato mahān
GE09ram_06_u:3732: 6.051.002a dṛṣṭo doṣo hi yo 'smābhiḥ purā mantravinirṇaye
GE09ram_06_u:3734: 6.051.003a śīghraṃ khalv abhyupetaṃ tvāṃ phalaṃ pāpasya karmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3736: 6.051.004a prathamaṃ vai mahārāja kṛtyam etad acintitam
GE09ram_06_u:3738: 6.051.005a yaḥ paścāt pūrvakāryāṇi kuryād aiśvaryam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3739: 6.051.005c pūrvaṃ cottarakāryāṇi na sa veda nayānayau
GE09ram_06_u:3742: 6.051.007a trayāṇāṃ pañcadhā yogaṃ karmaṇāṃ yaḥ prapaśyati
GE09ram_06_u:3743: 6.051.007c sacivaiḥ samayaṃ kṛtvā sa sabhye vartate pathi
GE09ram_06_u:3744: 6.051.008a yathāgamaṃ ca yo rājā samayaṃ vicikīrṣati
GE09ram_06_u:3746: 6.051.009a dharmam arthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca sarvān vā rakṣasāṃ pate
GE09ram_06_u:3747: 6.051.009c bhajate puruṣaḥ kāle trīṇi dvandvāni vā punaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3748: 6.051.010a triṣu caiteṣu yac chreṣṭhaṃ śrutvā tan nāvabudhyate
GE09ram_06_u:3749: 6.051.010c rājā vā rājamātro vā vyarthaṃ tasya bahuśrutam
GE09ram_06_u:3750: 6.051.011a upapradānaṃ sāntvaṃ vā bhedaṃ kāle ca vikramam
GE09ram_06_u:3751: 6.051.011c yogaṃ ca rakṣasāṃ śreṣṭha tāv ubhau ca nayānayau
GE09ram_06_u:3752: 6.051.012a kāle dharmārthakāmān yaḥ saṃmantrya sacivaiḥ saha
GE09ram_06_u:3753: 6.051.012c niṣevetātmavāṃl loke na sa vyasanam āpnuyāt
GE09ram_06_u:3758: 6.051.015a aśāstraviduṣāṃ teṣāṃ na kāryam ahitaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3760: 6.051.016a ahitaṃ ca hitākāraṃ dhārṣṭyāj jalpanti ye narāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3767: 6.051.019c chidram anye prapadyante krauñcasya kham iva dvijāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3768: 6.051.020a yo hi śatrum avajñāya nātmānam abhirakṣati
GE09ram_06_u:3769: 6.051.020c avāpnoti hi so 'narthān sthānāc ca vyavaropyate
GE09ram_06_u:3770: 6.051.021a tat tu śrutvā daśagrīvaḥ kumbhakarṇasya bhāṣitam
GE09ram_06_u:3771: 6.051.021c bhrukuṭiṃ caiva saṃcakre kruddhaś cainam uvāca ha
GE09ram_06_u:3772: 6.051.022a mānyo gurur ivācāryaḥ kiṃ māṃ tvam anuśāsati
GE09ram_06_u:3773: 6.051.022c kim evaṃ vākśramaṃ kṛtvā kāle yuktaṃ vidhīyatām
GE09ram_06_u:3775: 6.051.023c nābhipannam idānīṃ yad vyarthās tasya punaḥ kṛthāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3776: 6.051.024a asmin kāle tu yad yuktaṃ tad idānīṃ vidhīyatām
GE09ram_06_u:3778: 6.051.025a yadi khalv asti me sneho bhrātṛtvaṃ vāvagacchasi
GE09ram_06_u:3779: 6.051.025c yadi vā kāryam etat te hṛdi kāryatamaṃ matam
GE09ram_06_u:3782: 6.051.027a tam athaivaṃ bruvāṇaṃ tu vacanaṃ dhīradāruṇam
GE09ram_06_u:3783: 6.051.027c ruṣṭo 'yam iti vijñāya śanaiḥ ślakṣṇam uvāca ha
GE09ram_06_u:3787: 6.051.029c roṣaṃ ca saṃparityajya svastho bhavitum arhasi
GE09ram_06_u:3788: 6.051.030a naitan manasi kartavvyaṃ mayi jīvati pārthiva
GE09ram_06_u:3790: 6.051.031a avaśyaṃ tu hitaṃ vācyaṃ sarvāvasthaṃ mayā tava
GE09ram_06_u:3792: 6.051.032a sadṛśaṃ yat tu kāle 'smin kartuṃ snigdhena bandhunā
GE09ram_06_u:3793: 6.051.032c śatrūṇāṃ kadanaṃ paśya kriyamāṇaṃ mayā raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:3795: 6.051.033c hate rāme saha bhrātrā dravantīṃ harivāhinīm
GE09ram_06_u:3796: 6.051.034a adya rāmasya tad dṛṣṭvā mayānītaṃ raṇāc chiraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3798: 6.051.035a adya rāmasya paśyantu nidhanaṃ sumahat priyam
GE09ram_06_u:3799: 6.051.035c laṅkāyāṃ rākṣasāḥ sarve ye te nihatabāndhavāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3804: 6.051.038a na paraḥ preṣaṇīyas te yuddhāyātula vikrama
GE09ram_06_u:3806: 6.051.039a yadi śakro yadi yamo yadi pāvakamārutau
GE09ram_06_u:3807: 6.051.039c tān ahaṃ yodhayiṣyāmi kubera varuṇāv api
GE09ram_06_u:3810: 6.051.041a atha vā tyaktaśastrasya mṛdgatas tarasā ripūn
GE09ram_06_u:3811: 6.051.041c na me pratimukhe kaś cic chaktaḥ sthātuṃ jijīviṣuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3812: 6.051.042a naiva śaktyā na gadayā nāsinā na śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3813: 6.051.042c hastābhyām eva saṃrabdho haniṣyāmy api vajriṇam
GE09ram_06_u:3814: 6.051.043a yadi me muṣṭivegaṃ sa rāghavo 'dya sahiṣyati
GE09ram_06_u:3815: 6.051.043c tataḥ pāsyanti bāṇaughā rudhiraṃ rāghavasya te
GE09ram_06_u:3816: 6.051.044a cintayā bādhyase rājan kimarthaṃ mayi tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_06_u:3818: 6.051.045a muñca rāmād bhayaṃ rājan haniṣyāmīha saṃyuge
GE09ram_06_u:3819: 6.051.045c rāghavaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva sugrīvaṃ ca mahābalam
GE09ram_06_u:3820: 6.051.045e asādhāraṇam icchāmi tava dātuṃ mahad yaśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3821: 6.051.046a vadhena te dāśaratheḥ sukhāvahaṃ; sukhaṃ samāhartum ahaṃ vrajāmi
GE09ram_06_u:3822: 6.051.046c nihatya rāmaṃ sahalakṣmaṇena; khādāmi sarvān hariyūthamukhyān
GE09ram_06_u:3823: 6.051.047a ramasva kāmaṃ piba cāgryavāruṇīṃ; kuruṣva kṛtyāni vinīyatāṃ jvaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3824: 6.051.047c mayādya rāme gamite yamakṣayaṃ; cirāya sītā vaśagā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_06_u:3828: 6.052.002c avalipto na śaknoṣi kṛtyaṃ sarvatra veditum
GE09ram_06_u:3829: 6.052.003a na hi rājā na jānīte kumbhakarṇa nayānayau
GE09ram_06_u:3830: 6.052.003c tvaṃ tu kaiśorakād dhṛṣṭaḥ kevalaṃ vaktum icchasi
GE09ram_06_u:3831: 6.052.004a sthānaṃ vṛddhiṃ ca hāniṃ ca deśakālavibhāgavit
GE09ram_06_u:3832: 6.052.004c ātmanaś ca pareṣāṃ ca budhyate rākṣasarṣabha
GE09ram_06_u:3833: 6.052.005a yat tu śakyaṃ balavatā kartuṃ prākṛtabuddhinā
GE09ram_06_u:3835: 6.052.006a yāṃs tu dharmārthakāmāṃs tvaṃ bravīṣi pṛthag āśrayān
GE09ram_06_u:3836: 6.052.006c anuboddhuṃ svabhāvena na hi lakṣaṇam asti te
GE09ram_06_u:3837: 6.052.007a karma caiva hi sarveṣāṃ kāraṇānāṃ prayojanam
GE09ram_06_u:3838: 6.052.007c śreyaḥ pāpīyasāṃ cātra phalaṃ bhavati karmaṇām
GE09ram_06_u:3839: 6.052.008a niḥśreyasa phalāv eva dharmārthāv itarāv api
GE09ram_06_u:3842: 6.052.009c karmāṇy api tu kalpyāni labhate kāmam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3843: 6.052.010a tatra kḷptam idaṃ rājñā hṛdi kāryaṃ mataṃ ca naḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3844: 6.052.010c śatrau hi sāhasaṃ yat syāt kim ivātrāpanīyate
GE09ram_06_u:3845: 6.052.011a ekasyaivābhiyāne tu hetur yaḥ prakṛtas tvayā
GE09ram_06_u:3846: 6.052.011c tatrāpy anupapannaṃ te vakṣyāmi yad asādhu ca
GE09ram_06_u:3848: 6.052.012c rākṣasā rāghavaṃ taṃ tvaṃ katham eko jayiṣyasi
GE09ram_06_u:3849: 6.052.013a ye purā nirjitās tena janasthāne mahaujasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3850: 6.052.013c rākṣasāṃs tān pure sarvān bhītān adyāpi paśyasi
GE09ram_06_u:3851: 6.052.014a taṃ siṃham iva saṃkruddhaṃ rāmaṃ daśarathātmajam
GE09ram_06_u:3853: 6.052.015a jvalantaṃ tejasā nityaṃ krodhena ca durāsadam
GE09ram_06_u:3854: 6.052.015c kas taṃ mṛtyum ivāsahyam āsādayitum arhati
GE09ram_06_u:3856: 6.052.016c ekasya gamanaṃ tatra na hi me rocate tava
GE09ram_06_u:3857: 6.052.017a hīnārthas tu samṛddhārthaṃ ko ripuṃ prākṛto yathā
GE09ram_06_u:3861: 6.052.019a evam uktvā tu saṃrabdhaṃ kumbhakarṇaṃ mahodaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3863: 6.052.020a labdhvā punas tāṃ vaidehīṃ kimarthaṃ tvaṃ prajalpasi
GE09ram_06_u:3864: 6.052.020c yadecchasi tadā sītā vaśagā te bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_06_u:3865: 6.052.021a dṛṣṭaḥ kaś cid upāyo me sītopasthānakārakaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3866: 6.052.021c rucitaś cet svayā buddhyā rākṣaseśvara taṃ śṛṇu
GE09ram_06_u:3869: 6.052.023a tato gatvā vayaṃ yuddhaṃ dāsyāmas tasya yatnataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3870: 6.052.023c jeṣyāmo yadi te śatrūn nopāyaiḥ kṛtyam asti naḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3871: 6.052.024a atha jīvati naḥ śatrur vayaṃ ca kṛtasaṃyugāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3876: 6.052.026c tava pādau grahīṣyāmas tvaṃ naḥ kāma prapūraya
GE09ram_06_u:3878: 6.052.027c hato rāmaḥ saha bhrātrā sasainya iti sarvataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3879: 6.052.028a prīto nāma tato bhūtvā bhṛtyānāṃ tvam ariṃdama
GE09ram_06_u:3880: 6.052.028c bhogāṃś ca parivārāṃś ca kāmāṃś ca vasudāpaya
GE09ram_06_u:3882: 6.052.029c peyaṃ ca bahu yodhebhyaḥ svayaṃ ca muditaḥ piba
GE09ram_06_u:3884: 6.052.030c praviśyāśvāsya cāpi tvaṃ sītāṃ rahasi sāntvaya
GE09ram_06_u:3885: 6.052.030e dhanadhānyaiś ca kāmaiś ca ratnaiś caināṃ pralobhaya
GE09ram_06_u:3888: 6.052.032a rañjanīyaṃ hi bhartāraṃ vinaṣṭam avagamya sā
GE09ram_06_u:3892: 6.052.034a etat sunītaṃ mama darśanena; rāmaṃ hi dṛṣṭvaiva bhaved anarthaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3893: 6.052.034c ihaiva te setsyati motsuko bhūr; mahān ayuddhena sukhasya lābhaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3894: 6.052.035a anaṣṭasainyo hy anavāptasaṃśayo; ripūn ayuddhena jayañ janādhipa
GE09ram_06_u:3895: 6.052.035c yaśaś ca puṇyaṃ ca mahan mahīpate; śriyaṃ ca kīrtiṃ ca ciraṃ samaśnute
GE09ram_06_u:3896: 6.053.001a sa tathoktas tu nirbhartsya kumbhakarṇo mahodaram
GE09ram_06_u:3898: 6.053.002a so 'haṃ tava bhayaṃ ghoraṃ vadhāt tasya durātmanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3900: 6.053.003a garjanti na vṛthā śūra nirjalā iva toyadāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3901: 6.053.003c paśya saṃpādyamānaṃ tu garjitaṃ yudhi karmaṇā
GE09ram_06_u:3903: 6.053.004c adarśayitvā śūrās tu karma kurvanti duṣkaram
GE09ram_06_u:3908: 6.053.007a rājaśeṣā kṛtā laṅkā kṣīṇaḥ kośo balaṃ hatam
GE09ram_06_u:3910: 6.053.008a eṣa niryāmy ahaṃ yuddham udyataḥ śatrunirjaye
GE09ram_06_u:3914: 6.053.010a mahodaro 'yaṃ rāmāt tu paritrasto na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3915: 6.053.010c na hi rocayate tāta yuddhaṃ yuddhaviśārada
GE09ram_06_u:3916: 6.053.011a kaś cin me tvatsamo nāsti sauhṛdena balena ca
GE09ram_06_u:3925: 6.053.015a gamiṣyāmy aham ekākī tiṣṭhatv iha balaṃ mahat
GE09ram_06_u:3926: 6.053.015c adya tān kṣudhitaḥ kruddho bhakṣayiṣyāmi vānarān
GE09ram_06_u:3929: 6.053.017a vānarā hi mahātmānaḥ śīghrāś ca vyavasāyinaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3930: 6.053.017c ekākinaṃ pramattaṃ vā nayeyur daśanaiḥ kṣayam
GE09ram_06_u:3938: 6.053.021c śrotre cāsajjayām āsa śrīmatī cāsya kuṇḍale
GE09ram_06_u:3943: 6.053.024a sa kāñcanaṃ bhārasahaṃ nivātaṃ; vidyutprabhaṃ dīptam ivātmabhāsā
GE09ram_06_u:3949: 6.053.026e tam āśīrbhiḥ praśastābhiḥ preṣayām āsa rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3951: 6.053.027c taṃ gajaiś ca turaṃgaiś ca syandanaiś cāmbudasvanaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3954: 6.053.028c anujagmuś ca taṃ ghoraṃ kumbhakarṇaṃ mahābalam
GE09ram_06_u:3960: 6.053.031c śūrān udyamya khaḍgāṃś ca niśitāṃś ca paraśvadhān
GE09ram_06_u:3974: 6.053.038c hate tasmin hataṃ sarvaṃ taṃ vadhiṣyāmi saṃyuge
GE09ram_06_u:3983: 6.053.043a niṣpapāta ca gṛdhre 'sya śūle vai pathi gacchataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3984: 6.053.043c prāsphuran nayanaṃ cāsya savyo bāhur akampata
GE09ram_06_u:3986: 6.053.044c ādityo niṣprabhaś cāsīn na pravāti sukho 'nilaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3992: 6.053.047c vāyununnā iva ghanā yayuḥ sarvā diśas tadā
GE09ram_06_u:3993: 6.053.048a tad vānarānīkam atipracaṇḍaṃ; diśo dravad bhinnam ivābhrajālam
GE09ram_06_u:3994: 6.053.048c sa kumbhakarṇaḥ samavekṣya harṣān; nanāda bhūyo ghanavad ghanābhaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3995: 6.053.049a te tasya ghoraṃ ninadaṃ niśamya; yathā ninādaṃ divi vāridasya
GE09ram_06_u:3996: 6.053.049c petur dharaṇyāṃ bahavaḥ plavaṃgā; nikṛttamūlā iva sālavṛkṣāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:3997: 6.053.050a vipulaparighavān sa kumbhakarṇo; ripunidhanāya viniḥsṛto mahātmā
GE09ram_06_u:3998: 6.053.050c kapi gaṇabhayam ādadat subhīmaṃ; prabhur iva kiṃkaradaṇḍavān yugānte
GE09ram_06_u:4000: 6.054.001c janayann iva nirghātān vidhamann iva parvatān
GE09ram_06_u:4001: 6.054.002a tam avadhyaṃ maghavatā yamena varuṇena ca
GE09ram_06_u:4004: 6.054.003c nalaṃ nīlaṃ gavākṣaṃ ca kumudaṃ ca mahābalam
GE09ram_06_u:4005: 6.054.004a ātmānam atra vismṛtya vīryāṇy abhijanāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:4006: 6.054.004c kva gacchata bhayatrastāḥ prākṛtā harayo yathā
GE09ram_06_u:4007: 6.054.005a sādhu saumyā nivartadhvaṃ kiṃ prāṇān parirakṣatha
GE09ram_06_u:4008: 6.054.005c nālaṃ yuddhāya vai rakṣo mahatīyaṃ vibhīṣikāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4011: 6.054.007a kṛcchreṇa tu samāśvāsya saṃgamya ca tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4013: 6.054.008a te nivṛtya tu saṃkruddhāḥ kumbhakarṇaṃ vanaukasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4015: 6.054.008e prāṃśubhir giriśṛṅgaiś ca śilābhiś ca mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4016: 6.054.009a pādapaiḥ puṣpitāgraiś ca hanyamāno na kampate
GE09ram_06_u:4017: 6.054.009c tasya gātreṣu patitā bhidyante śataśaḥ śilāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4018: 6.054.009e pādapāḥ puṣpitāgrāś ca bhagnāḥ petur mahītale
GE09ram_06_u:4022: 6.054.011c nirastāḥ patitā bhūmau tāmrapuṣpā iva drumāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4024: 6.054.012c ke cit samudre patitāḥ ke cid gaganam āśritāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4025: 6.054.013a vadhyamānās tu te vīrā rākṣasena balīyasā
GE09ram_06_u:4026: 6.054.013c sāgaraṃ yena te tīrṇāḥ pathā tenaiva dudruvuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4027: 6.054.014a te sthalāni tathā nimnaṃ viṣaṇṇavadanā bhayāt
GE09ram_06_u:4028: 6.054.014c ṛkṣā vṛkṣān samārūḍhāḥ ke cit parvatam āśritāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4029: 6.054.015a mamajjur arṇave ke cid guhāḥ ke cit samāśritāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4030: 6.054.015c niṣeduḥ plavagāḥ ke cit ke cin naivāvatasthire
GE09ram_06_u:4031: 6.054.016a tān samīkṣyāṅgado bhaṅgān vānarān idam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:4033: 6.054.017a bhagnānāṃ vo na paśyāmi parigamya mahīm imām
GE09ram_06_u:4034: 6.054.017c sthānaṃ sarve nivartadhvaṃ kiṃ prāṇān parirakṣatha
GE09ram_06_u:4036: 6.054.018c dārā hy apahasiṣyanti sa vai ghātas tu jīvitām
GE09ram_06_u:4037: 6.054.019a kuleṣu jātāḥ sarve sma vistīrṇeṣu mahatsu ca
GE09ram_06_u:4038: 6.054.019c anāryāḥ khalu yad bhītās tyaktvā vīryaṃ pradhāvata
GE09ram_06_u:4039: 6.054.020a vikatthanāni vo yāni yadā vai janasaṃsadi
GE09ram_06_u:4040: 6.054.020c tāni vaḥ kva ca yatāni sodagrāṇi mahānti ca
GE09ram_06_u:4041: 6.054.021a bhīrupravādāḥ śrūyante yas tu jīvati dhikkṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4042: 6.054.021c mārgaḥ satpuruṣair juṣṭaḥ sevyatāṃ tyajyatāṃ bhayam
GE09ram_06_u:4044: 6.054.022c duṣprāpaṃ brahmalokaṃ vā prāpnumo yudhi sūditāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4045: 6.054.022e saṃprāpnuyāmaḥ kīrtiṃ vā nihatya śatrum āhave
GE09ram_06_u:4046: 6.054.023a na kumbhakarṇaḥ kākutsthaṃ dṛṣṭvā jīvan gamiṣyati
GE09ram_06_u:4049: 6.054.024c ekena bahavo bhagnā yaśo nāśaṃ gamiṣyati
GE09ram_06_u:4050: 6.054.025a evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ taṃ śūram aṅgadaṃ kanakāṅgadam
GE09ram_06_u:4052: 6.054.026a kṛtaṃ naḥ kadanaṃ ghoraṃ kumbhakarṇena rakṣasā
GE09ram_06_u:4053: 6.054.026c na sthānakālo gacchāmo dayitaṃ jīvitaṃ hi naḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4054: 6.054.027a etāvad uktvā vacanaṃ sarve te bhejire diśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4056: 6.054.028a dravamāṇās tu te vīrā aṅgadena valīmukhāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4057: 6.054.028c sāntvaiś ca bahumānaiś ca tataḥ sarve nivartitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4064: 6.055.003a prayātāś ca gatā harṣaṃ maraṇe kṛtaniścayāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4066: 6.055.004a atha vṛkṣān mahākāyāḥ sānūni sumahānti ca
GE09ram_06_u:4068: 6.055.005a sa kumbhakarṇaḥ saṃkruddho gadām udyamya vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:4070: 6.055.006a śatāni sapta cāṣṭau ca sahasrāṇi ca vānarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4072: 6.055.007a ṣoḍaśāṣṭau ca daśa ca viṃśat triṃśat tathaiva ca
GE09ram_06_u:4075: 6.055.008a hanūmāñ śailaśṛṅgāṇi vṛkṣāṃś ca vividhān bahūn
GE09ram_06_u:4077: 6.055.009a tāni parvataśṛṅgāṇi śūlena tu bibheda ha
GE09ram_06_u:4079: 6.055.010a tato harīṇāṃ tad anīkam ugraṃ; dudrāva śūlaṃ niśitaṃ pragṛhya
GE09ram_06_u:4080: 6.055.010c tasthau tato 'syāpatataḥ purastān; mahīdharāgraṃ hanumān pragṛhya
GE09ram_06_u:4081: 6.055.011a sa kumbhakarṇaṃ kupito jaghāna; vegena śailottamabhīmakāyam
GE09ram_06_u:4082: 6.055.011c sa cukṣubhe tena tadābhibūto; medārdragātro rudhirāvasiktaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4083: 6.055.012a sa śūlam āvidhya taḍitprakāśaṃ; giriṃ yathā prajvalitāgraśṛṅgam
GE09ram_06_u:4084: 6.055.012c bāhvantare mārutim ājaghāna; guho 'calaṃ krauñcam ivograśaktyā
GE09ram_06_u:4085: 6.055.013a sa śūlanirbhinna mahābhujāntaraḥ; pravihvalaḥ śoṇitam udvaman mukhāt
GE09ram_06_u:4087: 6.055.014a tato vineduḥ sahasā prahṛṣṭā; rakṣogaṇās taṃ vyathitaṃ samīkṣya
GE09ram_06_u:4088: 6.055.014c plavaṃgamās tu vyathitā bhayārtāḥ; pradudruvuḥ saṃyati kumbhakarṇāt
GE09ram_06_u:4095: 6.055.018a śailair vṛkṣais talaiḥ pādair muṣṭibhiś ca mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4097: 6.055.019a sparśān iva prahārāṃs tān vedayāno na vivyathe
GE09ram_06_u:4101: 6.055.021a muṣṭinā śarabhaṃ hatvā jānunā nīlam āhave
GE09ram_06_u:4104: 6.055.022c nipetus te tu medinyāṃ nikṛttā iva kiṃśukāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4107: 6.055.024a taṃ śailam iva śailābhāḥ sarve tu plavagarṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4109: 6.055.025a taṃ nakhair daśanaiś cāpi muṣṭibhir jānubhis tathā
GE09ram_06_u:4113: 6.055.027a bāhubhyāṃ vānarān sarvān pragṛhya sa mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4114: 6.055.027c bhakṣayām āsa saṃkruddho garuḍaḥ pannagān iva
GE09ram_06_u:4116: 6.055.028c nāsā puṭābhyāṃ nirjagmuḥ karṇābhyāṃ caiva vānarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4123: 6.055.032a yathā śuṣkāṇy araṇyāni grīṣme dahati pāvakaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4125: 6.055.033a tatas te vadhyamānās tu hatayūthā vināyakāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4136: 6.055.038c kumbhakarṇaṃ sthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sugrīvo vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:4137: 6.055.039a pātitāś ca tvayā vīrāḥ kṛtaṃ karma suduṣkaram
GE09ram_06_u:4138: 6.055.039c bhakṣitāni ca sainyāni prāptaṃ te paramaṃ yaśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4139: 6.055.040a tyaja tad vānarānīkaṃ prākṛtaiḥ kiṃ kariṣyasi
GE09ram_06_u:4145: 6.055.043a sa kumbhakarṇasya vaco niśamya; vyāvidhya śailaṃ sahasā mumoca
GE09ram_06_u:4147: 6.055.044a tac chailaśṛṅgaṃ sahasā vikīrṇaṃ; bhujāntare tasya tadā viśāle
GE09ram_06_u:4148: 6.055.044c tato viṣeduḥ sahasā plavaṃgamā; rakṣogaṇāś cāpi mudā vineduḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4149: 6.055.045a sa śailaśṛṅgābhihataś cukopa; nanāda kopāc ca vivṛtya vaktram
GE09ram_06_u:4150: 6.055.045c vyāvidhya śūlaṃ ca taḍitprakāśaṃ; cikṣepa haryṛkṣapater vadhāya
GE09ram_06_u:4151: 6.055.046a tat kumbhakarṇasya bhujapraviddhaṃ; śūlaṃ śitaṃ kāñcanadāmajuṣṭam
GE09ram_06_u:4152: 6.055.046c kṣipraṃ samutpatya nigṛhya dorbhyāṃ; babhañja vegena suto 'nilasya
GE09ram_06_u:4155: 6.055.048a sa tat tadā bhagnam avekṣya śūlaṃ; cukopa rakṣo'dhipatir mahātmā
GE09ram_06_u:4156: 6.055.048c utpāṭya laṅkāmalayāt sa śṛṅgaṃ; jaghāna sugrīvam upetya tena
GE09ram_06_u:4157: 6.055.049a sa śailaśṛṅgābhihato visaṃjñaḥ; papāta bhūmau yudhi vānarendraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4158: 6.055.049c taṃ prekṣya bhūmau patitaṃ visaṃjñaṃ; neduḥ prahṛṣṭā yudhi yātudhānāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4159: 6.055.050a tam abhyupetyādbhutaghoravīryaṃ; sa kumbhakarṇo yudhi vānarendram
GE09ram_06_u:4160: 6.055.050c jahāra sugrīvam abhipragṛhya; yathānilo megham atipracaṇḍaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4161: 6.055.051a sa taṃ mahāmeghanikāśarūpam; utpāṭya gacchan yudhi kumbhakarṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4163: 6.055.052a tataḥ samutpāṭya jagāma vīraḥ; saṃstūyamāno yudhi rākṣasendraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4165: 6.055.053a tatas tam ādāya tadā sa mene; harīndram indropamam indravīryaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4166: 6.055.053c asmin hṛte sarvam idaṃ hṛtaṃ syāt; sarāghavaṃ sainyam itīndraśatruḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4167: 6.055.054a vidrutāṃ vāhinīṃ dṛṣṭvā vānarāṇāṃ tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4170: 6.055.055c evaṃ gṛhīte sugrīve kiṃ kartavyaṃ mayā bhavet
GE09ram_06_u:4171: 6.055.056a yad vai nyāyyaṃ mayā kartuṃ tat kariṣyāmi sarvathā
GE09ram_06_u:4173: 6.055.057a mayā hate saṃyati kumbhakarṇe; mahābale muṣṭiviśīrṇadehe
GE09ram_06_u:4174: 6.055.057c vimocite vānarapārthive ca; bhavantu hṛṣṭāḥ pravagāḥ samagrāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4175: 6.055.058a atha vā svayam apy eṣa mokṣaṃ prāpsyati pārthivaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4177: 6.055.059a manye na tāvad ātmānaṃ budhyate vānarādhipaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4180: 6.055.060c ātmano vānarāṇāṃ ca yat pathyaṃ tat kariṣyati
GE09ram_06_u:4182: 6.055.061c aprītaś ca bhavet kaṣṭā kīrtināśaś ca śāśvataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4183: 6.055.062a tasmān muhūrtaṃ kāṅkṣiṣye vikramaṃ pārthivasya naḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4184: 6.055.062c bhinnaṃ ca vānarānīkaṃ tāvad āśvāsayāmy aham
GE09ram_06_u:4185: 6.055.063a ity evaṃ cintayitvā tu hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4187: 6.055.064a sa kumbhakarṇo 'tha viveśa laṅkāṃ; sphurantam ādāya mahāhariṃ tam
GE09ram_06_u:4189: 6.055.065a tataḥ sa saṃjñām upalabhya kṛcchrād; balīyasas tasya bhujāntarasthaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4190: 6.055.065c avekṣamāṇaḥ purarājamārgaṃ; vicintayām āsa muhur mahātmā
GE09ram_06_u:4191: 6.055.066a evaṃ gṛhītena kathaṃ nu nāma; śakyaṃ mayā saṃprati kartum adya
GE09ram_06_u:4192: 6.055.066c tathā kariṣyāmi yathā harīṇāṃ; bhaviṣyatīṣṭaṃ ca hitaṃ ca kāryam
GE09ram_06_u:4193: 6.055.067a tataḥ karāgraiḥ sahasā sametya; rājā harīṇām amarendraśatroḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4194: 6.055.067c nakhaiś ca karṇau daśanaiś ca nāsāṃ; dadaṃśa pārśveṣu ca kumbhakarṇam
GE09ram_06_u:4195: 6.055.068a sa kumbhakarṇau hṛtakarṇanāso; vidāritas tena vimarditaś ca
GE09ram_06_u:4196: 6.055.068c roṣābhibhūtaḥ kṣatajārdragātraḥ; sugrīvam āvidhya pipeṣa bhūmau
