GE09ram_06_u:4197: 6.055.069a sa bhūtale bhīmabalābhipiṣṭaḥ; surāribhis tair abhihanyamānaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4198: 6.055.069c jagāma khaṃ vegavad abhyupetya; punaś ca rāmeṇa samājagāma
GE09ram_06_u:4201: 6.055.071a tataḥ sa puryāḥ sahasā mahātmā; niṣkramya tad vānarasainyam ugram
GE09ram_06_u:4202: 6.055.071c babhakṣa rakṣo yudhi kumbhakarṇaḥ; prajā yugāntāgnir iva pradīptaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4203: 6.055.072a bubhukṣitaḥ śoṇitamāṃsagṛdhnuḥ; praviśya tad vānarasainyam ugram
GE09ram_06_u:4204: 6.055.072c cakhāda rakṣāṃsi harīn piśācān; ṛkṣāṃś ca mohād yudhi kumbhakarṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4205: 6.055.073a ekaṃ dvau trīn bahūn kruddho vānarān saha rākṣasaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4207: 6.055.074a saṃprasravaṃs tadā medaḥ śoṇitaṃ ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4209: 6.055.074e te bhakṣyamāṇā harayo rāmaṃ jagmus tadā gatim
GE09ram_06_u:4212: 6.055.076a sa kumbhakarṇasya śarāñ śarīre sapta vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:4216: 6.055.078a atha dāśarathī rāmo raudram astraṃ prayojayan
GE09ram_06_u:4222: 6.055.081a sa nirāyudham ātmānaṃ yadā mene mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4223: 6.055.081c muṣṭibhyāṃ cāraṇābhyāṃ ca cakāra kadanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_06_u:4226: 6.055.083a sa tīvreṇa ca kopena rudhireṇa ca mūrchitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4228: 6.055.084a tasmin kāle sa dharmātmā lakṣmaṇo rāmam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:4230: 6.055.085a naivāyaṃ vānarān rājan na vijānāti rākṣasān
GE09ram_06_u:4231: 6.055.085c mattaḥ śoṇitagandhena svān parāṃś caiva khādati
GE09ram_06_u:4233: 6.055.086c yūthapāś ca yathāmukhyās tiṣṭhantv asya samantataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4235: 6.055.087c prapatan rākṣaso bhūmau nānyān hanyāt plavaṃgamān
GE09ram_06_u:4240: 6.055.090a tān dṛṣṭvā nirdhūtān rāmo ruṣṭo 'yam iti rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4242: 6.055.091a sa cāpam ādāya bhujaṃgakalpaṃ; dṛḍhajyam ugraṃ tapanīyacitram
GE09ram_06_u:4244: 6.055.092a sa vānaragaṇais tais tu vṛtaḥ paramadurjayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4259: 6.055.099c tam āpatantaṃ dharaṇīdharābham; uvāca rāmo yudhi kumbhakarṇam
GE09ram_06_u:4261: 6.055.100c avehi māṃ śakrasapatna rāmam; ayaṃ muhūrtād bhavitā vicetāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4266: 6.055.103a nāhaṃ virādho vijñeyo na kabandhaḥ kharo na ca
GE09ram_06_u:4267: 6.055.103c na vālī na ca mārīcaḥ kumbhakarṇo 'ham āgataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4268: 6.055.104a paśya me mudgaraṃ ghoraṃ sarvakālāyasaṃ mahat
GE09ram_06_u:4269: 6.055.104c anena nirjitā devā dānavāś ca mayā purā
GE09ram_06_u:4270: 6.055.105a vikarṇanāsa iti māṃ nāvajñātuṃ tvam arhasi
GE09ram_06_u:4271: 6.055.105c svalpāpi hi na me pīḍā karṇanāsāvināśanāt
GE09ram_06_u:4274: 6.055.107a sa kumbhakarṇasya vaco niśamya; rāmaḥ supuṅkhān visasarja bāṇān
GE09ram_06_u:4275: 6.055.107c tair āhato vajrasamapravegair; na cukṣubhe na vyathate surāriḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4276: 6.055.108a yaiḥ sāyakaiḥ sālavarā nikṛttā; vālī hato vānarapuṃgavaś ca
GE09ram_06_u:4277: 6.055.108c te kumbhakarṇasya tadā śarīraṃ; vajropamā na vyathayāṃ pracakruḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4278: 6.055.109a sa vāridhārā iva sāyakāṃs tān; pibañ śarīreṇa mahendraśatruḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4279: 6.055.109c jaghāna rāmasya śarapravegaṃ; vyāvidhya taṃ mudgaram ugravegam
GE09ram_06_u:4280: 6.055.110a tatas tu rakṣaḥ kṣatajānuliptaṃ; vitrāsanaṃ devamahācamūnām
GE09ram_06_u:4281: 6.055.110c vyāvidhya taṃ mudgaram ugravegaṃ; vidrāvayām āsa camūṃ harīṇām
GE09ram_06_u:4282: 6.055.111a vāyavyam ādāya tato varāstraṃ; rāmaḥ pracikṣepa niśācarāya
GE09ram_06_u:4283: 6.055.111c samudgaraṃ tena jahāra bāhuṃ; sa kṛttabāhus tumulaṃ nanāda
GE09ram_06_u:4284: 6.055.112a sa tasya bāhur giriśṛṅgakalpaḥ; samudgaro rāghavabāṇakṛttaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4285: 6.055.112c papāta tasmin harirājasainye; jaghāna tāṃ vānaravāhinīṃ ca
GE09ram_06_u:4286: 6.055.113a te vānarā bhagnahatāvaśeṣāḥ; paryantam āśritya tadā viṣaṇṇāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4289: 6.055.114c utpāṭayām āsa kareṇa vṛkṣaṃ; tato 'bhidudrāva raṇe narendram
GE09ram_06_u:4290: 6.055.115a taṃ tasya bāhuṃ saha sālavṛkṣaṃ; samudyataṃ pannagabhogakalpam
GE09ram_06_u:4292: 6.055.116a sa kumbhakarṇasya bhujo nikṛttaḥ; papāta bhūmau girisaṃnikāśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4293: 6.055.116c viveṣṭamāno nijaghāna vṛkṣāñ; śailāñ śilāvānararākṣasāṃś ca
GE09ram_06_u:4294: 6.055.117a taṃ chinnabāhuṃ samavekṣya rāmaḥ; samāpatantaṃ sahasā nadantam
GE09ram_06_u:4295: 6.055.117c dvāv ardhacandrau niśitau pragṛhya; ciccheda pādau yudhi rākṣasasya
GE09ram_06_u:4297: 6.055.118c dudrāva rāmaṃ sahasābhigarjan; rāhur yathā candram ivāntarikṣe
GE09ram_06_u:4298: 6.055.119a apūrayat tasya mukhaṃ śitāgrai; rāmaḥ śarair hemapinaddhapuṅkhaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4299: 6.055.119c sa pūrṇavaktro na śaśāka vaktuṃ; cukūja kṛcchreṇa mumoha cāpi
GE09ram_06_u:4301: 6.055.120c ariṣṭam aindraṃ niśitaṃ supuṅkhaṃ; rāmaḥ śaraṃ mārutatulyavegam
GE09ram_06_u:4304: 6.055.122a sa sāyako rāghavabāhucodito; diśaḥ svabhāsā daśa saṃprakāśayan
GE09ram_06_u:4307: 6.055.123c cakarta rakṣo'dhipateḥ śiras tadā; yathaiva vṛtrasya purā puraṃdaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4309: 6.055.124c babhañja caryāgṛhagopurāṇi; prākāram uccaṃ tam apātayac ca
GE09ram_06_u:4310: 6.055.125a tac cātikāyaṃ himavatprakāśaṃ; rakṣas tadā toyanidhau papāta
GE09ram_06_u:4311: 6.055.125c grāhān mahāmīnacayān bhujaṃgamān; mamarda bhūmiṃ ca tathā viveśa
GE09ram_06_u:4312: 6.055.126a tasmir hate brāhmaṇadevaśatrau; mahābale saṃyati kumbhakarṇe
GE09ram_06_u:4313: 6.055.126c cacāla bhūr bhūmidharāś ca sarve; harṣāc ca devās tumulaṃ praṇeduḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4314: 6.055.127a tatas tu devarṣimaharṣipannagāḥ; surāś ca bhūtāni suparṇaguhyakāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4316: 6.055.128a praharṣam īyur bahavas tu vānarāḥ; prabuddhapadmapratimair ivānanaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4317: 6.055.128c apūjayan rāghavam iṣṭabhāginaṃ; hate ripau bhīmabale durāsade
GE09ram_06_u:4318: 6.055.129a sa kumbhakarṇaṃ surasainyamardanaṃ; mahatsu yuddheṣv aparājitaśramam
GE09ram_06_u:4319: 6.055.129c nananda hatvā bharatāgrajo raṇe; mahāsuraṃ vṛtram ivāmarādhipaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4323: 6.056.002c rāvaṇaḥ śokasaṃtapto mumoha ca papāta ca
GE09ram_06_u:4331: 6.056.006c śatrusainyaṃ pratāpyaikaḥ kva māṃ saṃtyajya gacchasi
GE09ram_06_u:4332: 6.056.007a idānīṃ khalv ahaṃ nāsmi yasya me patito bhujaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4333: 6.056.007c dakṣiṇo yaṃ samāśritya na bibhemi surāsurān
GE09ram_06_u:4335: 6.056.008c kālāgnipratimo hy adya rāghaveṇa raṇe hataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4336: 6.056.009a yasya te vajraniṣpeṣo na kuryād vyasanaṃ sadā
GE09ram_06_u:4338: 6.056.010a ete devagaṇāḥ sārdham ṛṣibhir gagane sthitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4339: 6.056.010c nihataṃ tvāṃ raṇe dṛṣṭvā ninadanti praharṣitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4342: 6.056.012a rājyena nāsti me kāryaṃ kiṃ kariṣyāmi sītayā
GE09ram_06_u:4344: 6.056.013a yady ahaṃ bhrātṛhantāraṃ na hanmi yudhi rāghavam
GE09ram_06_u:4345: 6.056.013c nanu me maraṇaṃ śreyo na cedaṃ vyarthajīvitam
GE09ram_06_u:4346: 6.056.014a adyaiva taṃ gamiṣyāmi deśaṃ yatrānujo mama
GE09ram_06_u:4347: 6.056.014c na hi bhrātṝn samutsṛjya kṣaṇaṃ jīvitum utsahe
GE09ram_06_u:4348: 6.056.015a devā hi māṃ hasiṣyanti dṛṣṭvā pūrvāpakāriṇam
GE09ram_06_u:4350: 6.056.016a tad idaṃ mām anuprāptaṃ vibhīṣaṇavacaḥ śubham
GE09ram_06_u:4351: 6.056.016c yad ajñānān mayā tasya na gṛhītaṃ mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4354: 6.056.018a tasyāyaṃ karmaṇaḥ prāto vipāko mama śokadaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4355: 6.056.018c yan mayā dhārmikaḥ śrīmān sa nirasto vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4356: 6.056.019a iti bahuvidham ākulāntarātmā; kṛpaṇam atīva vilapya kumbhakarṇam
GE09ram_06_u:4357: 6.056.019c nyapatad atha daśānano bhṛśārtas; tam anujam indraripuṃ hataṃ viditvā
GE09ram_06_u:4360: 6.057.002a evam eva mahāvīryo hato nas tāta madhyamaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4361: 6.057.002c na tu satpuruṣā rājan vilapanti yathā bhavān
GE09ram_06_u:4362: 6.057.003a nūnaṃ tribhuvaṇasyāpi paryāptas tvam asi prabho
GE09ram_06_u:4363: 6.057.003c sa kasmāt prākṛta iva śokasyātmānam īdṛśam
GE09ram_06_u:4364: 6.057.004a brahmadattāsti te śaktiḥ kavacaḥ sāyako dhanuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4369: 6.057.006c uddhariṣyāmi te śatrūn garuḍaḥ pannagān iha
GE09ram_06_u:4371: 6.057.007c tathādya śayitā rāmo mayā yudhi nipātitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4376: 6.057.010a tato 'ham aham ity evaṃ garjanto nairṛtarṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4381: 6.057.012c sarve samaram āsādya na śrūyante sma nirjitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4384: 6.057.014a sa tais tathā bhāskaratulyavarcasaiḥ; sutair vṛtaḥ śatrubalapramardanaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4385: 6.057.014c rarāja rājā maghavān yathāmarair; vṛto mahādānavadarpanāśanaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4386: 6.057.015a sa putrān saṃpariṣvajya bhūṣayitvā ca bhūṣaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4387: 6.057.015c āśīrbhiś ca praśastābhiḥ preṣayām āsa saṃyuge
GE09ram_06_u:4402: 6.057.023a tribhiḥ kirīṭais triśirāḥ śuśubhe sa rathottame
GE09ram_06_u:4409: 6.057.026c bhūṣaṇaiś ca babhau meruḥ prabhābhir iva bhāsvaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4410: 6.057.027a sa rarāja rathe tasmin rājasūnur mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4415: 6.057.029c śaktim ādāya tejasvī guhaḥ śatruṣv ivāhave
GE09ram_06_u:4417: 6.057.030c parigṛhya giriṃ dorbhyāṃ vapur viṣṇor viḍambayan
GE09ram_06_u:4420: 6.057.032a te pratasthur mahātmāno balair apratimair vṛtāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4422: 6.057.033a tān gajaiś ca turaṃgaiś ca rathaiś cāmbudanisvanaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4425: 6.057.034c kirīṭinaḥ śriyā juṣṭā grahā dīptā ivāmbare
GE09ram_06_u:4426: 6.057.035a pragṛhītā babhau teṣāṃ chatrāṇām āvaliḥ sitā
GE09ram_06_u:4428: 6.057.036a maraṇaṃ vāpi niścitya śatrūṇāṃ vā parājayam
GE09ram_06_u:4429: 6.057.036c iti kṛtvā matiṃ vīrā nirjagmuḥ saṃyugārthinaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4430: 6.057.037a jagarjuś ca praṇeduś ca cikṣipuś cāpi sāyakān
GE09ram_06_u:4440: 6.057.042a tad dṛṣṭvā balam āyāntaṃ labdhalakṣyāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4443: 6.057.043c amṛṣyamāṇāḥ paraharṣam ugraṃ; mahābalā bhīmataraṃ vineduḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4445: 6.057.044c vicerur udyataiḥ śailair nagāḥ śikhariṇo yathā
GE09ram_06_u:4446: 6.057.045a ke cid ākāśam āviśya ke cid urvyāṃ plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4453: 6.057.048c ke cid rathagatān vīrān gajavājigatān api
GE09ram_06_u:4456: 6.057.049e celuḥ petuś ca neduś ca tatra rākṣasapuṃgavāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4457: 6.057.050a tataḥ śailaiś ca khaḍgaiś ca visṛṣṭair harirākṣasaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4460: 6.057.051c ākṣiptāḥ kṣipyamāṇāś ca bhagnaśūlāś ca vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4461: 6.057.052a vānarān vānarair eva jagnus te rajanīcarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4462: 6.057.052c rākṣasān rākṣasair eva jaghnus te vānarā api
GE09ram_06_u:4463: 6.057.053a ākṣipya ca śilās teṣāṃ nijaghnū rākṣasā harīn
GE09ram_06_u:4464: 6.057.053c teṣāṃ cācchidya śastrāṇi jaghnū rakṣāṃsi vānarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4468: 6.057.055c rudhiraṃ prasrutās tatra rasasāram iva drumāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4469: 6.057.056a rathena ca rathaṃ cāpi vāraṇena ca vāraṇam
GE09ram_06_u:4470: 6.057.056c hayena ca hayaṃ ke cin nijaghnur vānarā raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:4471: 6.057.057a kṣuraprair ardhacandraiś ca bhallaiś ca niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4473: 6.057.058a vikīrṇaiḥ parvatāgraiś ca drumaiś chinnaiś ca saṃyuge
GE09ram_06_u:4475: 6.057.059a tasmin pravṛtte tumule vimarde; prahṛṣyamāṇeṣu valī mukheṣu
GE09ram_06_u:4476: 6.057.059c nipātyamāneṣu ca rākṣaseṣu; maharṣayo devagaṇāś ca neduḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4477: 6.057.060a tato hayaṃ mārutatulyavegam; āruhya śaktiṃ niśitāṃ pragṛhya
GE09ram_06_u:4479: 6.057.061a sa vānarān saptaśatāni vīraḥ; prāsena dīptena vinirbibheda
GE09ram_06_u:4480: 6.057.061c ekaḥ kṣaṇenendraripur mahātmā; jaghāna sainyaṃ haripuṃgavānām
GE09ram_06_u:4489: 6.057.066a yāvad utpāṭayām āsur vṛkṣāñ śailān vanaukasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4493: 6.057.068a na śekur dhāvituṃ vīrā na sthātuṃ spandituṃ kutaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4494: 6.057.068c utpatantaṃ sthitaṃ yāntaṃ sarvān vivyādha vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:4498: 6.057.070c na śekur vānarāḥ soḍhuṃ te vinedur mahāsvanam
GE09ram_06_u:4501: 6.057.072a ye tu pūrvaṃ mahātmānaḥ kumbhakarṇena pātitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4505: 6.057.074a vidrutāṃ vāhinīṃ dṛṣṭvā sa dadarśa narāntakam
GE09ram_06_u:4509: 6.057.076a gacchainaṃ rākṣasaṃ vīra yo 'sau turagam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4511: 6.057.077a sa bhartur vacanaṃ śrutvā niṣpapātāṅgadas tadā
GE09ram_06_u:4517: 6.057.080a tiṣṭha kiṃ prākṛtair ebhir haribhis tvaṃ kariṣyasi
GE09ram_06_u:4520: 6.057.081c saṃdaśya daśanair oṣṭhaṃ niśvasya ca bhujaṃgavat
GE09ram_06_u:4521: 6.057.082a sa prāsam āvidhya tadāṅgadāya; samujjvalantaṃ sahasotsasarja
GE09ram_06_u:4522: 6.057.082c sa vāliputrorasi vajrakalpe; babhūva bhagno nyapatac ca bhūmau
GE09ram_06_u:4523: 6.057.083a taṃ prāsam ālokya tadā vibhagnaṃ; suparṇakṛttoragabhogakalpam
GE09ram_06_u:4524: 6.057.083c talaṃ samudyamya sa vāliputras; turaṃgamasyābhijaghāna mūrdhni
GE09ram_06_u:4526: 6.057.084c sa tasya vājī nipapāta bhūmau; talaprahāreṇa vikīrṇamūrdhā
GE09ram_06_u:4527: 6.057.085a narāntakaḥ krodhavaśaṃ jagāma; hataṃ turagaṃ patitaṃ nirīkṣya
GE09ram_06_u:4528: 6.057.085c sa muṣṭim udyamya mahāprabhāvo; jaghāna śīrṣe yudhi vāliputram
GE09ram_06_u:4529: 6.057.086a athāṅgado muṣṭivibhinnamūrdhā; susrāva tīvraṃ rudhiraṃ bhṛśoṣṇam
GE09ram_06_u:4530: 6.057.086c muhur vijajvāla mumoha cāpi; saṃjñāṃ samāsādya visiṣmiye ca
GE09ram_06_u:4532: 6.057.087c nipātayām āsa tadā mahātmā; narāntakasyorasi vāliputraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4536: 6.057.089c babhūva tasmin nihate 'gryavīre; narāntake vālisutena saṃkhye
GE09ram_06_u:4537: 6.057.090a athāṅgado rāmamanaḥ praharṣaṇaṃ; suduṣkaraṃ taṃ kṛtavān hi vikramam
GE09ram_06_u:4538: 6.057.090c visiṣmiye so 'py ativīrya vikramaḥ; punaś ca yuddhe sa babhūva harṣitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4540: 6.058.001c devāntakas trimūrdhā ca paulastyaś ca mahodaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4552: 6.058.007c sa vṛkṣaṃ kṛttam ālokya utpapāta tato 'ṅgadaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4553: 6.058.008a sa vavarṣa tato vṛkṣāñ śilāś ca kapikuñjaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4554: 6.058.008c tān praciccheda saṃkruddhas triśirā niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4555: 6.058.009a parighāgreṇa tān vṛkṣān babhañja ca surāntakaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4564: 6.058.013c petatur locane tasya vinanāda sa vāraṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4572: 6.058.017c jānubhyāṃ patito bhūmau punar evotpapāta ha
GE09ram_06_u:4576: 6.058.019c hanūmān api vijñāya nīlaś cāpi pratasthatuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4577: 6.058.020a tataś cikṣepa śailāgraṃ nīlas triśirase tadā
GE09ram_06_u:4578: 6.058.020c tad rāvaṇasuto dhīmān bibheda niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4581: 6.058.022a tato jṛmbhitam ālokya harṣād devāntakas tadā
GE09ram_06_u:4586: 6.058.024c devāntako rākṣasarājasūnur; gatāsur urvyāṃ sahasā papāta
GE09ram_06_u:4587: 6.058.025a tasmin hate rākṣasayodhamukhye; mahābale saṃyati devaśatrau
GE09ram_06_u:4588: 6.058.025c kruddhas trimūrdhā niśitāgram ugraṃ; vavarṣa nīlorasi bāṇavarṣam
GE09ram_06_u:4589: 6.058.026a sa taiḥ śaraughair abhivarṣyamāṇo; vibhinnagātraḥ kapisainyapālaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4590: 6.058.026c nīlo babhūvātha visṛṣṭagātro; viṣṭambhitas tena mahābalena
GE09ram_06_u:4591: 6.058.027a tatas tu nīlaḥ pratilabhya saṃjñāṃ; śailaṃ samutpāṭya savṛkṣaṣaṇḍam
GE09ram_06_u:4592: 6.058.027c tataḥ samutpatya bhṛśogravego; mahodaraṃ tena jaghāna mūrdhni
GE09ram_06_u:4593: 6.058.028a tataḥ sa śailābhinipātabhagno; mahodaras tena saha dvipena
GE09ram_06_u:4594: 6.058.028c vipothito bhūmitale gatāsuḥ; papāta varjābhihato yathādriḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4595: 6.058.029a pitṛvyaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā triśirāś cāpam ādade
GE09ram_06_u:4596: 6.058.029c hanūmantaṃ ca saṃkruddho vivyādha niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4597: 6.058.030a hanūmāṃs tu samutpatya hayāṃs triśirasas tadā
GE09ram_06_u:4598: 6.058.030c vidadāra nakhaiḥ kruddho gajendraṃ mṛgarāḍ iva
GE09ram_06_u:4601: 6.058.032a divi kṣiptām ivolkāṃ tāṃ śaktiṃ kṣiptām asaṃgatām
GE09ram_06_u:4602: 6.058.032c gṛhītvā hariśārdūlo babhañja ca nanāda ca
GE09ram_06_u:4603: 6.058.033a tāṃ dṛṣṭvā ghorasaṃkāśāṃ śaktiṃ bhagnāṃ hanūmatā
GE09ram_06_u:4611: 6.058.037a sa tasya patataḥ khaḍgaṃ samācchidya mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4614: 6.058.038c utpatya ca hanūmantaṃ tāḍayām āsa muṣṭinā
GE09ram_06_u:4617: 6.058.040a sa tasya śīrṣāṇy asinā śitena; kirīṭajuṣṭāni sakuṇḍalāni
GE09ram_06_u:4618: 6.058.040c kruddhaḥ praciccheda suto 'nilasya; tvaṣṭuḥ sutasyeva śirāṃsi śakraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4620: 6.058.041c petuḥ śirāṃsīndraripor dharaṇyāṃ; jyotīṃṣi muktāni yathārkamārgāt
GE09ram_06_u:4621: 6.058.042a tasmin hate devaripau triśīrṣe; hanūmata śakraparākrameṇa
GE09ram_06_u:4622: 6.058.042c neduḥ plavaṃgāḥ pracacāla bhūmī; rakṣāṃsy atho dudruvire samantāt
GE09ram_06_u:4623: 6.058.043a hataṃ triśirasaṃ dṛṣṭvā tathaiva ca mahodaram
GE09ram_06_u:4635: 6.058.049a taṃ purastāt sthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā vānaraṃ parvatopamam
GE09ram_06_u:4639: 6.058.051a sa saṃprāpya cirāt saṃjñām ṛṣabho vānararṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4641: 6.058.052a tāṃ gṛhītvā gadāṃ bhīmām āvidhya ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4645: 6.058.054a tasmin hate bhrātari rāvaṇasya; tan nairṛtānāṃ balam arṇavābham
GE09ram_06_u:4655: 6.059.005a sa visphārya mahac cāpaṃ kirīṭī mṛṣṭakuṇḍalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4656: 6.059.005c nāma viśrāvayām āsa nanāda ca mahāsvanam
GE09ram_06_u:4658: 6.059.006c jyāśabdena ca bhīmena trāsayām āsa vānarān
GE09ram_06_u:4659: 6.059.007a te tasya rūpam ālokya yathā viṣṇos trivikrame
GE09ram_06_u:4660: 6.059.007c bhayārtā vānarāḥ sarve vidravanti diśo daśa
GE09ram_06_u:4665: 6.059.010a sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā mahātmānaṃ rāghavas tu suvismitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4666: 6.059.010c vānarān sāntvayitvā tu vibhīṣaṇam uvāca ha
GE09ram_06_u:4669: 6.059.012a ya eṣa niśitaiḥ śūlaiḥ sutīkṣṇaiḥ prāsatomaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4670: 6.059.012c arciṣmadbhir vṛto bhāti bhūtair iva maheśvaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4675: 6.059.015a ka eṣa rakṣaḥ śārdūlo raṇabhūmiṃ virājayan
GE09ram_06_u:4683: 6.059.019a viṃśatir daśa cāṣṭau ca tūṇīraratham āsthitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4684: 6.059.019c kārmukāṇi ca bhīmāni jyāś ca kāñcanapiṅgalāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4685: 6.059.020a dvau ca khaḍgau rathagatau pārśvasthau pārśvaśobhinau
GE09ram_06_u:4691: 6.059.023a kuṇḍalābhyāṃ tu yasyaitad bhāti vaktraṃ śubhekṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:4693: 6.059.024a ācakṣva me mahābāho tvam enaṃ rākṣasottamam
GE09ram_06_u:4694: 6.059.024c yaṃ dṛṣṭvā vānarāḥ sarve bhayārtā vidrutā diśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4701: 6.059.028a aśvapṛṣṭhe rathe nāge khaḍge dhanuṣi karṣaṇe
GE09ram_06_u:4702: 6.059.028c bhede sāntve ca dāne ca naye mantre ca saṃmataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4703: 6.059.029a yasya bāhuṃ samāśritya laṅkā bhavati nirbhayā
GE09ram_06_u:4706: 6.059.030c astrāṇi cāpy avāptāni ripavaś ca parājitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4708: 6.059.031c etac ca kavacaṃ divyaṃ rathaś caiṣo 'rkabhāskaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4709: 6.059.032a etena śataśo devā dānavāś ca parājitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4710: 6.059.032c rakṣitāni ca rakṣāmi yakṣāś cāpi niṣūditāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4711: 6.059.033a vajraṃ viṣṭambhitaṃ yena bāṇair indrasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4715: 6.059.035a tad asmin kriyatāṃ yatnaḥ kṣipraṃ puruṣapuṃgava
GE09ram_06_u:4718: 6.059.036c visphārayām āsa dhanur nanāda ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4719: 6.059.037a taṃ bhīmavapuṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā rathasthaṃ rathināṃ varam
GE09ram_06_u:4721: 6.059.038a kumudo dvivido maindo nīlaḥ śarabha eva ca
GE09ram_06_u:4723: 6.059.039a teṣāṃ vṛkṣāṃś ca śailāṃś ca śaraiḥ kāñcanabhūṣaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4725: 6.059.040a tāṃś caiva sarān sa harīñ śaraiḥ sarvāyasair balī
GE09ram_06_u:4729: 6.059.042a tat sainyaṃ harivīrāṇāṃ trāsayām āsa rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4730: 6.059.042c mṛgayūtham iva kruddho harir yauvanam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4731: 6.059.043a sa rāṣasendro harisainyamadhye; nāyudhyamānaṃ nijaghāna kaṃ cit
GE09ram_06_u:4732: 6.059.043c upetya rāmaṃ sadhanuḥ kalāpī; sagarvitaṃ vākyam idaṃ babhāṣe
GE09ram_06_u:4733: 6.059.044a rathe sthito 'haṃ śaracāpapāṇir; na prākṛtaṃ kaṃ cana yodhayāmi
GE09ram_06_u:4734: 6.059.044c yasyāsti śaktir vyavasāya yuktā; dadātuṃ me kṣipram ihādya yuddham
GE09ram_06_u:4735: 6.059.045a tat tasya vākyaṃ bruvato niśamya; cukopa saumitrir amitrahantā
GE09ram_06_u:4736: 6.059.045c amṛṣyamāṇaś ca samutpapāta; jagrāha cāpaṃ ca tataḥ smayitvā
GE09ram_06_u:4737: 6.059.046a kruddhaḥ saumitrir utpatya tūṇād ākṣipya sāyakam
GE09ram_06_u:4739: 6.059.047a pūrayan sa mahīṃ śailān ākāśaṃ sāgaraṃ diśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4744: 6.059.049c ādāya niśitaṃ bāṇam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:4745: 6.059.050a bālas tvam asi saumitre vikrameṣv avicakṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4746: 6.059.050c gaccha kiṃ kālasadṛśaṃ māṃ yodhayitum icchasi
GE09ram_06_u:4747: 6.059.051a na hi madbāhusṛṣṭānām astrāṇāṃ himavān api
GE09ram_06_u:4748: 6.059.051c soḍhum utsahate vegam antarikṣam atho mahī
GE09ram_06_u:4750: 6.059.052c nyasya cāpaṃ nivartasva mā prāṇāñ jahi madgataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4751: 6.059.053a atha vā tvaṃ pratiṣṭabdho na nivartitum icchasi
GE09ram_06_u:4755: 6.059.055a eṣa te sarpasaṃkāśo bāṇaḥ pāsyati śoṇitam
GE09ram_06_u:4757: 6.059.056a śrutvātikāyasya vacaḥ saroṣaṃ; sagarvitaṃ saṃyati rājaputraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4758: 6.059.056c sa saṃcukopātibalo bṛhacchrīr; uvāca vākyaṃ ca tato mahārtham
GE09ram_06_u:4759: 6.059.057a na vākyamātreṇa bhavān pradhāno; na katthanāt satpuruṣā bhavanti
GE09ram_06_u:4760: 6.059.057c mayi sthite dhanvini bāṇapāṇau; vidarśayasvātmabalaṃ durātman
GE09ram_06_u:4762: 6.059.058c pauruṣeṇa tu yo yuktaḥ sa tu śūra iti smṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4764: 6.059.059c śarair vā yadi vāpy astrair darśayasva parākramam
GE09ram_06_u:4765: 6.059.060a tataḥ śiras te niśitaiḥ pātayiṣyāmy ahaṃ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4769: 6.059.062a bālo 'yam iti vijñāya na māvajñātum arhasi
GE09ram_06_u:4770: 6.059.062c bālo vā yadi vā vṛddho mṛtyuṃ jānīhi saṃyuge
GE09ram_06_u:4773: 6.059.064a tato vidyādharā bhūtā devā daityā maharṣayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4774: 6.059.064c guhyakāś ca mahātmānas tad yuddhaṃ dadṛśus tadā
GE09ram_06_u:4779: 6.059.067a taṃ nikṛttaṃ śaraṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛttabhogam ivoragam
GE09ram_06_u:4782: 6.059.068c tān aprāptāñ śarais tīkṣṇaiś ciccheda bharatānujaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4783: 6.059.069a sa tāṃś chittvā śarais tīkṣṇair lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā
GE09ram_06_u:4784: 6.059.069c ādade niśitaṃ bāṇaṃ jvalantam iva tejasā
GE09ram_06_u:4785: 6.059.070a tam ādāya dhanuḥ śreṣṭhe yojayām āsa lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4786: 6.059.070c vicakarṣa ca vegena visasarja ca sāyakam
GE09ram_06_u:4789: 6.059.072a sa lalāṭe śaro magnas tasya bhīmasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4793: 6.059.074a cintayām āsa cāśvasya vimṛśya ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4795: 6.059.075a vicāryaivaṃ vinamyāsyaṃ vinamya ca bhujāv ubhau
GE09ram_06_u:4796: 6.059.075c sa rathopastham āsthāya rathena pracacāra ha
GE09ram_06_u:4797: 6.059.076a ekaṃ trīn pañca sapteti sāyakān rākṣasarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4803: 6.059.079a tāñ śarān yudhi saṃprekṣya nikṛttān rāvaṇātmajaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4805: 6.059.080a sa saṃdhāya mahātejās taṃ bāṇaṃ sahasotsṛjat
GE09ram_06_u:4808: 6.059.081c susrāva rudhiraṃ tīvraṃ madaṃ matta iva dvipaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4809: 6.059.082a sa cakāra tadātmānaṃ viśalyaṃ sahasā vibhuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4810: 6.059.082c jagrāha ca śaraṃ tīṣṇam astreṇāpi samādadhe
GE09ram_06_u:4812: 6.059.083c sa jajvāla tadā bāṇo dhanuś cāsya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4815: 6.059.085a tatas taṃ jvalitaṃ ghoraṃ lakṣmaṇaḥ śaram āhitam
GE09ram_06_u:4819: 6.059.087a tāv ubhāv ambare bāṇāv anyonyam abhijaghnatuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4820: 6.059.087c tejasā saṃpradīptāgrau kruddhāv iva bhujaṃ gamau
GE09ram_06_u:4823: 6.059.089a tato 'tikāyaḥ saṃkruddhas tv astram aiṣīkam utsṛjat
GE09ram_06_u:4824: 6.059.089c tat praciccheda saumitrir astram aindreṇa vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:4827: 6.059.091a tatas tad astraṃ cikṣepa lakṣmaṇāya niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4828: 6.059.091c vāyavyena tad astraṃ tu nijaghāna sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4837: 6.059.096a na śaśāka rujaṃ kartuṃ yudhi tasya narottamaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4838: 6.059.096c athainam abhyupāgamya vāyur vākyam uvāca ha
GE09ram_06_u:4840: 6.059.097c brāhmeṇāstreṇa bhindhy enam eṣa vadhyo hi nānyathā
GE09ram_06_u:4841: 6.059.098a tataḥ sa vāyor vacanaṃ niśamya; saumitrir indrapratimānavīryaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4842: 6.059.098c samādade bāṇam amoghavegaṃ; tad brāhmam astraṃ sahasā niyojya
GE09ram_06_u:4843: 6.059.099a tasmin varāstre tu niyujyamāne; saumitriṇā bāṇavare śitāgre
GE09ram_06_u:4844: 6.059.099c diśaḥ sacandrārkamahāgrahāś ca; nabhaś ca tatrāsa rarāsa corvī
GE09ram_06_u:4845: 6.059.100a taṃ brahmaṇo 'streṇa niyujya cāpe; śaraṃ supuṅkhaṃ yamadūtakalpam
GE09ram_06_u:4846: 6.059.100c saumitrir indrārisutasya tasya; sasarja bāṇaṃ yudhi vajrakalpam
GE09ram_06_u:4849: 6.059.102a taṃ prekṣamāṇaḥ sahasātikāyo; jaghāna bāṇair niśitair anekaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4850: 6.059.102c sa sāyakas tasya suparṇavegas; tadātivegena jagāma pārśvam
GE09ram_06_u:4851: 6.059.103a tam āgataṃ prekṣya tadātikāyo; bāṇaṃ pradīptāntakakālakalpam
GE09ram_06_u:4852: 6.059.103c jaghāna śaktyṛṣṭigadākuṭhāraiḥ; śūlair halaiś cāpy avipannaceṣṭaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4853: 6.059.104a tāny āyudhāny adbhutavigrahāṇi; moghāni kṛtvā sa śaro 'gnidīptaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4854: 6.059.104c prasahya tasyaiva kirīṭajuṣṭaṃ; tadātikāyasya śiro jahāra
GE09ram_06_u:4856: 6.059.105c papāta sahasā bhūmau śṛṅgaṃ himavato yathā
GE09ram_06_u:4857: 6.059.106a praharṣayuktā bahavas tu vānarā; prabuddhapadmapratimānanās tadā
GE09ram_06_u:4858: 6.059.106c apūjayaṃl lakṣmaṇam iṣṭabhāginaṃ; hate ripau bhīmabale durāsade
GE09ram_06_u:4860: 6.060.001c rakṣogaṇās tatra hatāvaśiṣṭās; te rāvaṇāya tvaritaṃ śaśaṃsuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4861: 6.060.002a tato hatāṃs tān sahasā niśamya; rājā mumohāśrupariplutākṣaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4862: 6.060.002c putrakṣayaṃ bhrātṛvadhaṃ ca ghoraṃ; vicintya rājā vipulaṃ pradadhyau
GE09ram_06_u:4863: 6.060.003a tatas tu rājānam udīkṣya dīnaṃ; śokārṇave saṃparipupluvānam
GE09ram_06_u:4864: 6.060.003c atharṣabho rākṣasarājasūnur; athendrajid vākyam idaṃ babhāṣe
GE09ram_06_u:4865: 6.060.004a na tāta mohaṃ pratigantum arhasi; yatrendrajij jīvati rākṣasendra
GE09ram_06_u:4866: 6.060.004c nendrāribāṇābhihato hi kaś cit; prāṇān samarthaḥ samare 'bhidhartum
GE09ram_06_u:4868: 6.060.005c gatāyuṣaṃ bhūmitale śayānaṃ; śaraiḥ śitair ācitasarvagātram
GE09ram_06_u:4869: 6.060.006a imāṃ pratijñāṃ śṛṇu śakraśatroḥ; suniścitāṃ pauruṣadaivayuktām
GE09ram_06_u:4870: 6.060.006c adyaiva rāmaṃ sahalakṣmaṇena; saṃtāpayiṣyāmi śarair amoghaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4872: 6.060.007c drakṣyanti me vikramam aprameyaṃ; viṣṇor ivograṃ baliyajñavāṭe
GE09ram_06_u:4873: 6.060.008a sa evam uktvā tridaśendraśatrur; āpṛcchya rājānam adīnasattvaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4876: 6.060.009c jagāma sahasā tatra yatra yuddham ariṃdama
GE09ram_06_u:4879: 6.060.011a gajaskandhagatāḥ ke cit ke cit paramavājibhiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4881: 6.060.012a sa śaṅkhaninadair bhīmair bherīṇāṃ ca mahāsvanaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4889: 6.060.016a sa tu dṛṣṭvā viniryāntaṃ balena mahatā vṛtam
GE09ram_06_u:4891: 6.060.017a tvam apratirathaḥ putra jitas te yudhi vāsavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4892: 6.060.017c kiṃ punar mānuṣaṃ dhṛṣyaṃ na vadhiṣyasi rāghavam
GE09ram_06_u:4896: 6.060.019c sthāpayām āsa rakṣāṃsi rathaṃ prati samantataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4902: 6.060.022c lohitāni ca vāsāṃsi sruvaṃ kārṣṇāyasaṃ tathā
GE09ram_06_u:4906: 6.060.024c babhūvus tāni liṅgāni vijayaṃ yāny adarśayan
GE09ram_06_u:4908: 6.060.025c havis tat pratijagrāha pāvakaḥ svayam utthitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4909: 6.060.026a so 'stram āhārayām āsa brāhmam astravidāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4915: 6.060.029a sa sainyam utsṛjya sametya tūrṇaṃ; mahāraṇe vānaravāhinīṣu
GE09ram_06_u:4916: 6.060.029c adṛśyamānaḥ śarajālam ugraṃ; vavarṣa nīlāmbudharo yathāmbu
GE09ram_06_u:4919: 6.060.031a te kevalaṃ saṃdadṛśuḥ śitāgrān; bāṇān raṇe vānaravāhinīṣu
GE09ram_06_u:4920: 6.060.031c māyā nigūḍhaṃ ca surendraśatruṃ; na cātra taṃ rākṣasam abhyapaśyan
GE09ram_06_u:4921: 6.060.032a tataḥ sa rakṣo'dhipatir mahātmā; sarvā diśo bāṇagaṇaiḥ śitāgraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4922: 6.060.032c pracchādayām āsa raviprakāśair; viṣādayām āsa ca vānarendrān
GE09ram_06_u:4929: 6.060.036a udīkṣamāṇā gaganaṃ ke cin netreṣu tāḍitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4930: 6.060.036c śarair viviśur anyonyaṃ petuś ca jagatītale
GE09ram_06_u:4932: 6.060.037c jāmbavantaṃ suṣeṇaṃ ca vegadarśinam eva ca
GE09ram_06_u:4933: 6.060.038a maindaṃ ca dvividaṃ nīlaṃ gavākṣaṃ gajagomukhau
GE09ram_06_u:4936: 6.060.039c pāvakākṣaṃ nalaṃ caiva kumudaṃ caiva vānaram
GE09ram_06_u:4939: 6.060.041a sa vai gadābhir hariyūthamukhyān; nirbhidya bāṇais tapanīyapuṅkhaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4941: 6.060.042a sa bāṇavarṣair abhivarṣyamāṇo; dhārānipātān iva tān vicintya
GE09ram_06_u:4942: 6.060.042c samīkṣamāṇaḥ paramādbhutaśrī; rāmas tadā lakṣmaṇam ity uvāca
GE09ram_06_u:4943: 6.060.043a asau punar lakṣmaṇa rākṣasendro; brahmāstram āśritya surendraśatruḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4944: 6.060.043c nipātayitvā harisainyam ugram; asmāñ śarair ardayati prasaktam
GE09ram_06_u:4946: 6.060.044c kathaṃ nu śakyo yudhi naṣṭadeho; nihantum adyendrajid udyatāstraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4947: 6.060.045a manye svayambhūr bhagavān acintyo; yasyaitad astraṃ prabhavaś ca yo 'sya
GE09ram_06_u:4948: 6.060.045c bāṇāvapātāṃs tvam ihādya dhīman; mayā sahāvyagramanāḥ sahasva
GE09ram_06_u:4949: 6.060.046a pracchādayaty eṣa hi rākṣasendraḥ; sarvā diśaḥ sāyakavṛṣṭijālaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4950: 6.060.046c etac ca sarvaṃ patitāgryavīraṃ; na bhrājate vānararājasainyam
GE09ram_06_u:4951: 6.060.047a āvāṃ tu dṛṣṭvā patitau visaṃjñau; nivṛttayuddhau hataroṣaharṣau
GE09ram_06_u:4952: 6.060.047c dhruvaṃ pravekṣyaty amarārivāsaṃ; asau samādāya raṇāgralakṣmīm
GE09ram_06_u:4953: 6.060.048a tatas tu tāv indrajid astrajālair; babhūvatus tatra tadā viśastau
GE09ram_06_u:4954: 6.060.048c sa cāpi tau tatra viṣādayitvā; nanāda harṣād yudhi rākṣasendraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4955: 6.060.049a sa tat tadā vānararājasainyaṃ; rāmaṃ ca saṃkhye sahalakṣmaṇena
GE09ram_06_u:4957: 6.061.001a tayos tadā sāditayo raṇāgre; mumoha sainyaṃ hariyūthapānām
GE09ram_06_u:4958: 6.061.001c sugrīvanīlāṅgadajāmbavanto; na cāpi kiṃ cit pratipedire te
GE09ram_06_u:4959: 6.061.002a tato viṣaṇṇaṃ samavekṣya sainyaṃ; vibhīṣaṇo buddhimatāṃ variṣṭhaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4961: 6.061.003a mā bhaiṣṭa nāsty atra viṣādakālo; yad āryaputrāv avaśau viṣaṇṇau
GE09ram_06_u:4962: 6.061.003c svayambhuvo vākyam athodvahantau; yat sāditāv indrajidastrajālaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4963: 6.061.004a tasmai tu dattaṃ paramāstram etat; svayambhuvā brāhmam amoghavegam
GE09ram_06_u:4964: 6.061.004c tan mānayantau yadi rājaputrau; nipātitau ko 'tra viṣādakālaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4965: 6.061.005a brāhmam astraṃ tadā dhīmān mānayitvā tu mārutiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4968: 6.061.006c yo yo dhārayate prāṇāṃs taṃ tam āśvāsayāvahe
GE09ram_06_u:4969: 6.061.007a tāv ubhau yugapad vīrau hanūmad rākṣasottamau
GE09ram_06_u:4974: 6.061.009c śastraiś ca patitair dīptair dadṛśāte vasuṃdharām
GE09ram_06_u:4977: 6.061.011a maindaṃ nalaṃ jyotimukhaṃ dvividaṃ panasaṃ tathā
GE09ram_06_u:4978: 6.061.011c vibhīṣaṇo hanūmāṃś ca dadṛśāte hatān raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:4985: 6.061.015a dṛṣṭvā tam upasaṃgamya paulastyo vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:4986: 6.061.015c kaccid āryaśarais tīrṣṇair na prāṇā dhvaṃsitās tava
GE09ram_06_u:4988: 6.061.016c kṛcchrād abhyudgiran vākyam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:4990: 6.061.017c pīḍyamānaḥ śitair bāṇair na tvāṃ paśyāmi cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_06_u:4991: 6.061.018a añjanā suprajā yena mātariśvā ca nairṛta
GE09ram_06_u:4992: 6.061.018c hanūmān vānaraśreṣṭhaḥ prāṇān dhārayate kva cit
GE09ram_06_u:4995: 6.061.020a naiva rājani sugrīve nāṅgade nāpi rāghave
GE09ram_06_u:4996: 6.061.020c ārya saṃdarśitaḥ sneho yathā vāyusute paraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:4999: 6.061.022a tasmiñ jīvati vīre tu hatam apy ahataṃ balam
GE09ram_06_u:5009: 6.061.027a nānyo vikramaparyāptas tvam eṣāṃ paramaḥ sakhā
GE09ram_06_u:5012: 6.061.028c viśalyau kuru cāpy etau sāditau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_06_u:5013: 6.061.029a gatvā paramam adhvānam upary upari sāgaram
GE09ram_06_u:5020: 6.061.032c drakṣyasy oṣadhayo dīptā dīpayantyo diśo daśa
GE09ram_06_u:5023: 6.061.034a tāḥ sarvā hanuman gṛhya kṣipram āgantum arhasi
GE09ram_06_u:5028: 6.061.036c hanūmān dṛśyate vīro dvitīya iva parvataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5031: 6.061.038a tasya petur nagā bhūmau harivegāc ca jajvaluḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5034: 6.061.039c na śekur vānarāḥ sthātuṃ ghūrṇamāne nagottame
GE09ram_06_u:5039: 6.061.042a padbhyāṃ tu śailam āpīḍya vaḍavāmukhavan mukham
GE09ram_06_u:5042: 6.061.043c laṅkāsthā rākṣasāḥ sarve na śekuḥ spandituṃ bhayāt
GE09ram_06_u:5045: 6.061.045a sa puccham udyamya bhujaṃgakalpaṃ; vinamya pṛṣṭhaṃ śravaṇe nikuñcya
GE09ram_06_u:5046: 6.061.045c vivṛtya vaktraṃ vaḍavāmukhābham; āpupluve vyomni sa caṇḍavegaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5047: 6.061.046a sa vṛkṣaṣaṇḍāṃs tarasā jahāra; śailāñ śilāḥ prākṛtavānarāṃś ca
GE09ram_06_u:5050: 6.061.047c jagāma meruṃ nagarājam agryaṃ; diśaḥ prakarṣann iva vāyusūnuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5051: 6.061.048a sa sāgaraṃ ghūrṇitavīcimālaṃ; tadā bhṛśaṃ bhrāmitasarvasattvam
GE09ram_06_u:5052: 6.061.048c samīkṣamāṇaḥ sahasā jagāma; cakraṃ yathā viṣṇukarāgramuktam
GE09ram_06_u:5053: 6.061.049a sa parvatān vṛkṣagaṇān sarāṃsi; nadīs taṭākāni purottamāni
GE09ram_06_u:5054: 6.061.049c sphītāñjanāṃs tān api saṃprapaśyañ; jagāma vegāt pitṛtulyavegaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5061: 6.061.053a sa brahmakośaṃ rajatālayaṃ ca; śakrālayaṃ rudraśarapramokṣam
GE09ram_06_u:5062: 6.061.053c hayānanaṃ brahmaśiraś ca dīptaṃ; dadarśa vaivasvata kiṃkarāṃś ca
GE09ram_06_u:5063: 6.061.054a vajrālayaṃ vaiśvaraṇālayaṃ ca; sūryaprabhaṃ sūryanibandhanaṃ ca
GE09ram_06_u:5064: 6.061.054c brahmāsanaṃ śaṃkarakārmukaṃ ca; dadarśa nābhiṃ ca vasuṃdharāyāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5065: 6.061.055a kailāsam agryaṃ himavacchilāṃ ca; tatharṣabhaṃ kāñcanaśailam agryam
GE09ram_06_u:5068: 6.061.056c āplutya taṃ cauṣadhiparvatendraṃ; tatrauṣadhīnāṃ vicayaṃ cakāra
GE09ram_06_u:5071: 6.061.058a mahauṣadhyas tu tāḥ sarvās tasmin parvatasattame
GE09ram_06_u:5073: 6.061.059a sa tā mahātmā hanumān apaśyaṃś; cukopa kopāc ca bhṛśaṃ nanāda
GE09ram_06_u:5075: 6.061.060a kim etad evaṃ suviniścitaṃ te; yad rāghave nāsi kṛtānukampaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5076: 6.061.060c paśyādya madbāhubalābhibhūto; vikīrṇam ātmānam atho nagendra
GE09ram_06_u:5077: 6.061.061a sa tasya śṛṅgaṃ sanagaṃ sanāgaṃ; sakāñcanaṃ dhātusahasrajuṣṭam
GE09ram_06_u:5079: 6.061.062a sa taṃ samutpāṭya kham utpapāta; vitrāsya lokān sasurān surendrān
GE09ram_06_u:5080: 6.061.062c saṃstūyamānaḥ khacarair anekair; jagāma vegād garuḍogravīryaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5081: 6.061.063a sa bhāskarādhvānam anuprapannas; tad bhāskarābhaṃ śikharaṃ pragṛhya
GE09ram_06_u:5082: 6.061.063c babhau tadā bhāskarasaṃnikāśo; raveḥ samīpe pratibhāskarābhaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5083: 6.061.064a sa tena śailena bhṛśaṃ rarāja; śailopamo gandhavahātmajas tu
GE09ram_06_u:5084: 6.061.064c sahasradhāreṇa sapāvakena; cakreṇa khe viṣṇur ivoddhṛtena
GE09ram_06_u:5085: 6.061.065a taṃ vānarāḥ prekṣya tadā vineduḥ; sa tān api prekṣya mudā nanāda
GE09ram_06_u:5086: 6.061.065c teṣāṃ samudghuṣṭaravaṃ niśamya; laṅkālayā bhīmataraṃ vineduḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5087: 6.061.066a tato mahātmā nipapāta tasmiñ; śailottame vānarasainyamadhye
GE09ram_06_u:5088: 6.061.066c haryuttamebhyaḥ śirasābhivādya; vibhīṣaṇaṃ tatra ca sasvaje saḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5089: 6.061.067a tāv apy ubhau mānuṣarājaputrau; taṃ gandham āghrāya mahauṣadhīnām
GE09ram_06_u:5090: 6.061.067c babhūvatus tatra tadā viśalyāv; uttasthur anye ca haripravīrāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5091: 6.061.068a tato harir gandhavahātmajas tu; tam oṣadhīśailam udagravīryaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5092: 6.061.068c nināya vegād dhimavantam eva; punaś ca rāmeṇa samājagāma
GE09ram_06_u:5095: 6.062.002a yato hataḥ kumbhakarṇaḥ kumārāś ca niṣūditāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5097: 6.062.003a ye ye mahābalāḥ santi laghavaś ca plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5099: 6.062.004a tato 'staṃ gata āditye raudre tasmin niśāmukhe
GE09ram_06_u:5100: 6.062.004c laṅkām abhimukhāḥ solkā jagmus te plavagarṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5104: 6.062.006c prāsādeṣu ca saṃhṛṣṭāḥ sasṛjus te hutāśanam
GE09ram_06_u:5112: 6.062.010c trastānāṃ gacchatāṃ tūrṇaṃ putrān ādāya sarvataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5114: 6.062.011c adahat pāvakas tatra jajvāla ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5120: 6.062.014c nāditāny acalābhāni veśmāny agnir dadāha saḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5130: 6.062.019c rātrau sā dṛśyate laṅkā puṣpitair iva kiṃśukaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5131: 6.062.020a hastyadhyakṣair gajair muktair muktaiś ca turagair api
GE09ram_06_u:5133: 6.062.021a aśvaṃ muktaṃ gajo dṛṣṭvā kaccid bhīto 'pasarpati
GE09ram_06_u:5134: 6.062.021c bhīto bhītaṃ gajaṃ dṛṣṭvā kva cid aśvo nivartate
GE09ram_06_u:5135: 6.062.022a sā babhūva muhūrtena haribhir dīpitā purī
GE09ram_06_u:5141: 6.062.025a udghuṣṭaṃ vānarāṇāṃ ca rākṣasānāṃ ca nisvanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5142: 6.062.025c diśo daśa samudraṃ ca pṛthivīṃ cānvanādayat
GE09ram_06_u:5143: 6.062.026a viśalyau tu mahātmānau tāv ubhau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_06_u:5144: 6.062.026c asaṃbhrāntau jagṛhatus tāv ubhau dhanuṣī vare
GE09ram_06_u:5147: 6.062.028a aśobhata tadā rāmo dhanur visphārayan mahat
GE09ram_06_u:5148: 6.062.028c bhagavān iva saṃkruddho bhavo vedamayaṃ dhanuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5150: 6.062.029c jyāśabdaś cāpi rāmasya trayaṃ vyāpa diśo daśa
GE09ram_06_u:5153: 6.062.031a tato rāmaśarān dṛṣṭvā vimāneṣu gṛheṣu ca
GE09ram_06_u:5159: 6.062.034a yaś ca vo vitathaṃ kuryāt tatra tatra vyavasthitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5162: 6.062.035c sthiteṣu dvāram āsādya rāvaṇaṃ manyur āviśat
GE09ram_06_u:5163: 6.062.036a tasya jṛmbhitavikṣepād vyāmiśrā vai diśo daśa
GE09ram_06_u:5164: 6.062.036c rūpavān iva rudrasya manyur gātreṣv adṛśyata
GE09ram_06_u:5165: 6.062.037a sa nikumbhaṃ ca kumbhaṃ ca kumbhakarṇātmajāv ubhau
GE09ram_06_u:5166: 6.062.037c preṣayām āsa saṃkruddho rākṣasair bahubhiḥ saha
GE09ram_06_u:5167: 6.062.038a śaśāsa caiva tān sarvān rākṣasān rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5169: 6.062.039a tatas tu coditās tena rākṣasā jvalitāyudhāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5170: 6.062.039c laṅkāyā niryayur vīrāḥ praṇadantaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5179: 6.062.044a taṃ dṛṣṭvā balam āyāntaṃ rākṣasānāṃ sudāruṇam
GE09ram_06_u:5180: 6.062.044c saṃcacāla plavaṃgānāṃ balam uccair nanāda ca
GE09ram_06_u:5181: 6.062.045a javenāplutya ca punas tad rākṣasabalaṃ mahat
GE09ram_06_u:5185: 6.062.047a tathaivāpy apare teṣāṃ kapīnām asibhiḥ śitaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5189: 6.062.049a dehīty anye dadāty anyo dadāmīty aparaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5199: 6.063.002a āhūya so 'ṅgadaṃ kopāt tāḍayām āsa vegitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5200: 6.063.002c gadayā kampanaḥ pūrvaṃ sa cacāla bhṛśāhataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5201: 6.063.003a sa saṃjñāṃ prāpya tejasvī cikṣepa śikharaṃ gireḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5202: 6.063.003c arditaś ca prahāreṇa kampanaḥ patito bhuvi
GE09ram_06_u:5205: 6.063.004e āpatantīṃ ca vegena kumbhas tāṃ sāntvayac camūm
GE09ram_06_u:5206: 6.063.005a sa dhanur dhanvināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ pragṛhya susamāhitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5208: 6.063.006a tasya tac chuśubhe bhūyaḥ saśaraṃ dhanur uttamam
GE09ram_06_u:5214: 6.063.009a maindas tu bhrātaraṃ dṛṣṭvā bhagnaṃ tatra mahāhave
GE09ram_06_u:5216: 6.063.010a tāṃ śilāṃ tu pracikṣepa rākṣasāya mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5217: 6.063.010c bibheda tāṃ śilāṃ kumbhaḥ prasannaiḥ pañcabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5220: 6.063.012a sa tu tena prahāreṇa maindo vānarayūthapaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5221: 6.063.012c marmaṇy abhihatas tena papāta bhuvi mūrchitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5222: 6.063.013a aṅgado mātulau dṛṣṭvā patitau tau mahābalau
GE09ram_06_u:5224: 6.063.014a tam āpatantaṃ vivyādha kumbhaḥ pañcabhir āyasaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5225: 6.063.014c tribhiś cānyaiḥ śitair bāṇair mātaṃgam iva tomaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5226: 6.063.015a so 'ṅgadaṃ vividhair bāṇaiḥ kumbho vivyādha vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:5230: 6.063.017a sa praciccheda tān sarvān bibheda ca punaḥ śilāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5233: 6.063.018c bhruvor vivyādha bāṇābhyām ulkābhyām iva kuñjaram
GE09ram_06_u:5238: 6.063.021a sa ciccheda śitair bāṇaiḥ saptabhiḥ kāyabhedanaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5239: 6.063.021c aṅgado vivyathe 'bhīkṣṇaṃ sasāda ca mumoha ca
GE09ram_06_u:5240: 6.063.022a aṅgadaṃ vyathitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sīdantam iva sāgare
GE09ram_06_u:5242: 6.063.023a rāmas tu vyathitaṃ śrutvā vāliputraṃ mahāhave
GE09ram_06_u:5244: 6.063.024a te tu vānaraśārdūlāḥ śrutvā rāmasya śāsanam
GE09ram_06_u:5248: 6.063.026a jāmbavāṃś ca suṣeṇaś ca vegadarśī ca vānaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5252: 6.063.028a tasya bāṇacayaṃ prāpya na śoker ativartitum
GE09ram_06_u:5254: 6.063.029a tāṃs tu dṛṣṭvā harigaṇāñ śaravṛṣṭibhir arditān
GE09ram_06_u:5257: 6.063.030c śailasānu caraṃ nāgaṃ vegavān iva kesarī
GE09ram_06_u:5258: 6.063.031a utpāṭya ca mahāśailān aśvakarṇān dhavān bahūn
GE09ram_06_u:5259: 6.063.031c anyāṃś ca vividhān vṛkṣāṃś cikṣepa ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5263: 6.063.033c ācitās te drumā rejur yathā ghorāḥ śataghnayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5264: 6.063.034a drumavarṣaṃ tu tac chinnaṃ dṛṣṭvā kumbhena vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:5266: 6.063.035a nirbhidyamānaḥ sahasā sahamānaś ca tāñ śarān
GE09ram_06_u:5268: 6.063.036a avaplutya tataḥ śīghraṃ kṛtvā karma suduṣkaram
GE09ram_06_u:5269: 6.063.036c abravīt kupitaḥ kumbhaṃ bhagnaśṛṅgam iva dvipam
GE09ram_06_u:5270: 6.063.037a nikumbhāgraja vīryaṃ te bāṇavegaṃ tad adbhutam
GE09ram_06_u:5271: 6.063.037c saṃnatiś ca prabhāvaś ca tava vā rāvaṇasya vā
GE09ram_06_u:5277: 6.063.040c kumbhakarṇas tu vīryeṇa sahate ca surāsurān
GE09ram_06_u:5279: 6.063.041c tvam adya rakṣasāṃ loke śreṣṭho 'si balavīryataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5284: 6.063.044a upālambhabhayāc cāpi nāsi vīra mayā hataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5285: 6.063.044c kṛtakarmā pariśrānto viśrāntaḥ paśya me balam
GE09ram_06_u:5288: 6.063.046a tataḥ kumbhaḥ samutpatya sugrīvam abhipadya ca
GE09ram_06_u:5290: 6.063.047a tasya carma ca pusphoṭa saṃjajñe cāsya śoṇitam
GE09ram_06_u:5292: 6.063.048a tadā vegena tatrāsīt tejaḥ prajvālitaṃ muhuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5297: 6.063.050c sa muṣṭiṃ pātayām āsa kumbhasyorasi vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:5302: 6.063.053a tasmin hate bhīmaparākrameṇa; plavaṃgamānām ṛṣabheṇa yuddhe
GE09ram_06_u:5303: 6.063.053c mahī saśailā savanā cacāla; bhayaṃ ca rakṣāṃsy adhikaṃ viveśa
GE09ram_06_u:5313: 6.064.005c kuṇḍalābhyāṃ ca mṛṣṭābhyāṃ mālayā ca vicitrayā
GE09ram_06_u:5314: 6.064.006a nikumbho bhūṣaṇair bhāti tena sma parigheṇa ca
GE09ram_06_u:5317: 6.064.007c prajajvāla saghoṣaś ca vidhūma iva pāvakaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5319: 6.064.008c saha caivāmarāvatyā sarvaiś ca bhavanaiḥ saha
GE09ram_06_u:5324: 6.064.011a rākṣasā vānarāś cāpi na śekuḥ spandituṃ bhayāt
GE09ram_06_u:5325: 6.064.011c hanūmaṃs tu vivṛtyoras tasthau pramukhato balī
GE09ram_06_u:5327: 6.064.012c balī balavatas tasya pātayām āsa vakṣasi
GE09ram_06_u:5328: 6.064.013a sthire tasyorasi vyūḍhe parighaḥ śatadhā kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5330: 6.064.014a sa tu tena prahāreṇa cacāla ca mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5336: 6.064.017a tataḥ pusphoṭa carmāsya prasusrāva ca śoṇitam
GE09ram_06_u:5337: 6.064.017c muṣṭinā tena saṃjajñe jvālā vidyud ivotthitā
GE09ram_06_u:5338: 6.064.018a sa tu tena prahāreṇa nikumbho vicacāla ha
GE09ram_06_u:5349: 6.064.023c utpāṭayām āsa śiro bhairavaṃ nadato mahat
GE09ram_06_u:5350: 6.064.024a atha vinadati sādite nikumbhe; pavanasutena raṇe babhūva yuddham
GE09ram_06_u:5352: 6.065.001a nikumbhaṃ ca hataṃ śrutvā kumbhaṃ ca vinipātitam
GE09ram_06_u:5357: 6.065.003c rāghavaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva jahi tau savanaukasau
GE09ram_06_u:5358: 6.065.004a rāvaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā śūro mānī kharātmajaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5359: 6.065.004c bāḍham ity abravīd dhṛṣṭo makarākṣo niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5363: 6.065.006c ratham ānīyatāṃ śīghraṃ sainyaṃ cānīyatāṃ tvarāt
GE09ram_06_u:5365: 6.065.007c syandanaṃ ca balaṃ caiva samīpaṃ pratyapādayat
GE09ram_06_u:5367: 6.065.008c sūtaṃ saṃcodayām āsa śīghraṃ me ratham āvaha
GE09ram_06_u:5368: 6.065.009a atha tān rākṣasān sarvān makarākṣo 'bravīd idam
GE09ram_06_u:5369: 6.065.009c yūyaṃ sarve prayudhyadhvaṃ purastān mama rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5371: 6.065.010c ājñaptaḥ samare hantuṃ tāv ubhau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_06_u:5372: 6.065.011a adya rāmaṃ vadhiṣyāmi lakṣmaṇaṃ ca niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5373: 6.065.011c śākhāmṛgaṃ ca sugrīvaṃ vānarāṃś ca śarottamaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5376: 6.065.013a makarākṣasya tac chrutvā vacanaṃ te niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5383: 6.065.016c kṣveḍitāsphoṭitānāṃ ca tataḥ śabdo mahān abhūt
GE09ram_06_u:5384: 6.065.017a prabhraṣṭo 'tha karāt tasya pratodaḥ sārathes tadā
GE09ram_06_u:5385: 6.065.017c papāta sahasā caiva dhvajas tasya ca rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5387: 6.065.018c caraṇair ākulair gatvā dīnāḥ sāsramukhā yayuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5393: 6.065.021c aham aham iti yuddhakauśalās te; rajanicarāḥ paribabhramur nadantaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5396: 6.066.002a tataḥ pravṛttaṃ sumahat tad yuddhaṃ lomaharṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:5406: 6.066.007a tān dṛṣṭvā rākṣasāḥ sarve dravamāṇān vanaukasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5407: 6.066.007c nedus te siṃhavad dhṛṣṭā rākṣasā jitakāśinaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5409: 6.066.008c rāmas tān vārayām āsa śaravarṣeṇa rākṣasān
GE09ram_06_u:5411: 6.066.009c krodhān alasam āviṣṭo vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:5412: 6.066.010a tiṣṭha rāma mayā sārdhaṃ dvandvayuddhaṃ dadāmi te
GE09ram_06_u:5413: 6.066.010c tyājayiṣyāmi te prāṇān dhanurmuktaiḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5414: 6.066.011a yat tadā daṇḍakāraṇye pitaraṃ hatavān mama
GE09ram_06_u:5416: 6.066.012a dahyante bhṛśam aṅgāni durātman mama rāghava
GE09ram_06_u:5417: 6.066.012c yan mayāsi na dṛṣṭas tvaṃ tasmin kāle mahāvane
GE09ram_06_u:5418: 6.066.013a diṣṭyāsi darśanaṃ rāma mama tvaṃ prāptavān iha
GE09ram_06_u:5421: 6.066.014c ye tvayā nihatāḥ śūrāḥ saha tais tvaṃ sameṣyasi
GE09ram_06_u:5422: 6.066.015a bahunātra kim uktena śṛṇu rāma vaco mama
GE09ram_06_u:5423: 6.066.015c paśyantu sakalā lokās tvāṃ māṃ caiva raṇājire
GE09ram_06_u:5424: 6.066.016a astrair vā gadayā vāpi bāhubhyāṃ vā mahāhave
GE09ram_06_u:5425: 6.066.016c abhyastaṃ yena vā rāma tena vā vartatāṃ yudhi
GE09ram_06_u:5429: 6.066.018c triśirā dūṣaṇaś cāpi daṇḍake nihatā mayā
GE09ram_06_u:5432: 6.066.020a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa kharaputro niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5434: 6.066.021a tāñ śarāñ śaravarṣeṇa rāmaś ciccheda naikadhā
GE09ram_06_u:5435: 6.066.021c nipetur bhuvi te chinnā rukmapuṅkhāḥ sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5436: 6.066.022a tad yuddham abhavat tatra sametyānyonyam ojasā
GE09ram_06_u:5439: 6.066.023c dhanur muktaḥ svanotkṛṣṭaḥ śrūyate ca raṇājire
GE09ram_06_u:5444: 6.066.026a rāmam uktās tu bāṇaughān rākṣasas tv acchinad raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:5445: 6.066.026c rakṣomuktāṃs tu rāmo vai naikadhā prācchinac charaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5446: 6.066.027a bāṇaughavitatāḥ sarvā diśaś ca vidiśas tathā
GE09ram_06_u:5447: 6.066.027c saṃchannā vasudhā caiva samantān na prakāśate
GE09ram_06_u:5448: 6.066.028a tataḥ kruddho mahābāhur dhanuś ciccheda rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5449: 6.066.028c aṣṭābhir atha nārācaiḥ sūtaṃ vivyādha rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5450: 6.066.028e bhittvā śarai rathaṃ rāmo rathāśvān samapātayat
GE09ram_06_u:5452: 6.066.029c atiṣṭhad vasudhāṃ rakṣaḥ śūlaṃ jagrāha pāṇinā
GE09ram_06_u:5454: 6.066.030a vibhrāmya ca mahac chūlaṃ prajvalantaṃ niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5455: 6.066.030c sa krodhāt prāhiṇot tasmai rāghavāya mahāhave
GE09ram_06_u:5457: 6.066.031c bāṇais tu tribhir ākāśe śūlaṃ ciccheda rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5461: 6.066.033c sādhu sādhv iti bhūtāni vyāharanti nabhogatāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5462: 6.066.034a tad dṛṣṭvā nihataṃ śūlaṃ makarākṣo niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5463: 6.066.034c muṣṭim udyamya kākutsthaṃ tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
GE09ram_06_u:5464: 6.066.035a sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā patantaṃ vai prahasya raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5466: 6.066.036a tenāstreṇa hataṃ rakṣaḥ kākutsthena tadā raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:5467: 6.066.036c saṃchinnahṛdayaṃ tatra papāta ca mamāra ca
GE09ram_06_u:5468: 6.066.037a dṛṣṭvā te rākṣasāḥ sarve makarākṣasya pātanam
GE09ram_06_u:5471: 6.066.038c dadṛśur atha ca devatāḥ prahṛṣṭā; girim iva vajrahataṃ yathā viśīrṇam
GE09ram_06_u:5475: 6.067.002c adṛśyo dṛśyamāno vā sarvathā tvaṃ balādhikaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5477: 6.067.003c kiṃ punar mānuṣau dṛṣṭvā na vadhiṣyasi saṃyuge
GE09ram_06_u:5479: 6.067.004c yajñabhūmau sa vidhivat pāvakaṃ juhuve ndrajit
GE09ram_06_u:5481: 6.067.005c ājagmus tatra saṃbhrāntā rākṣasyo yatra rāvaṇiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5483: 6.067.006c lohitāni ca vāsāṃsi sruvaṃ kārṣṇāyasaṃ tathā
GE09ram_06_u:5487: 6.067.008c babhūvus tāni liṅgāni vijayaṃ darśayanti ca
GE09ram_06_u:5489: 6.067.009c havis tat pratijagrāha pāvakaḥ svayam utthitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5492: 6.067.011a sa vājibhiś caturbhis tu bāṇaiś ca niśitair yutaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5495: 6.067.012c śaraiś candrārdhacandraiś ca sa rathaḥ samalaṃkṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5502: 6.067.016a adya hatvāhave yau tau mithyā pravrajitau vane
GE09ram_06_u:5504: 6.067.017a kṛtvā nirvānarām urvīṃ hatvā rāmaṃ salakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:5508: 6.067.019a sa dadarśa mahāvīryau nāgau triśirasāv iva
GE09ram_06_u:5510: 6.067.020a imau tāv iti saṃcintya sajyaṃ kṛtvā ca kārmukam
GE09ram_06_u:5512: 6.067.021a sa tu vaihāyasaṃ prāpya saratho rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_06_u:5513: 6.067.021c acakṣur viṣaye tiṣṭhan vivyādha niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5515: 6.067.022c dhanuṣī saśare kṛtvā divyam astraṃ pracakratuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5517: 6.067.023c tam astraiḥ surasaṃkāśau naiva pasparśatuḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5518: 6.067.024a sa hi dhūmāndhakāraṃ ca cakre pracchādayan nabhaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5521: 6.067.025c śuśruve caratas tasya na ca rūpaṃ prakāśate
GE09ram_06_u:5524: 6.067.027a sa rāmaṃ sūryasaṃkāśaiḥ śarair dattavaro bhṛśam
GE09ram_06_u:5526: 6.067.028a tau hanyamānau nārācair dhārābhir iva parvatau
GE09ram_06_u:5529: 6.067.029c nikṛtya patagā bhūmau petus te śoṇitokṣitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5531: 6.067.030c tān iṣūn patato bhallair anekair nicakartatuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5532: 6.067.031a yato hi dadṛśāte tau śarān nipatitāñ śitān
GE09ram_06_u:5534: 6.067.032a rāvaṇis tu diśaḥ sarvā rathenātirathaḥ patan
GE09ram_06_u:5535: 6.067.032c vivyādha tau dāśarathī laghv astro niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5538: 6.067.034a nāsya veda gatiṃ kaś cin na ca rūpaṃ dhanuḥ śarān
GE09ram_06_u:5539: 6.067.034c na cānyad viditaṃ kiṃ cit sūryasyevābhrasaṃplave
GE09ram_06_u:5540: 6.067.035a tena viddhāś ca harayo nihatāś ca gatāsavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5542: 6.067.036a lakṣmaṇas tu susaṃkruddho bhrātaraṃ vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:5544: 6.067.037a tam uvāca tato rāmo lakṣmaṇaṃ śubhalakṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:5545: 6.067.037c naikasya heto rakṣāṃsi pṛthivyāṃ hantum arhasi
GE09ram_06_u:5547: 6.067.038c palāyantaṃ pramattaṃ vā na tvaṃ hantum ihārhasi
GE09ram_06_u:5548: 6.067.039a asyaiva tu vadhe yatnaṃ kariṣyāvo mahābala
GE09ram_06_u:5550: 6.067.040a tam enaṃ māyinaṃ kṣudram antarhitarathaṃ balāt
GE09ram_06_u:5552: 6.067.041a yady eṣa bhūmiṃ viśate divaṃ vā; rasātalaṃ vāpi nabhastalaṃ vā
GE09ram_06_u:5553: 6.067.041c evaṃ nigūḍho 'pi mamāstradagdhaḥ; patiṣyate bhūmitale gatāsuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5554: 6.067.042a ity evam uktvā vacanaṃ mahātmā; raghupravīraḥ plavagarṣabhair vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5555: 6.067.042c vadhāya raudrasya nṛśaṃsakarmaṇas; tadā mahātmā tvaritaṃ nirīkṣate
GE09ram_06_u:5556: 6.068.001a vijñāya tu manas tasya rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5560: 6.068.003a sa paścimena dvāreṇa niryayau rākṣasair vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5562: 6.068.004a indrajit tu tato dṛṣṭvā bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_06_u:5564: 6.068.005a indrajit tu rathe sthāpya sītāṃ māyāmayīṃ tadā
GE09ram_06_u:5566: 6.068.006a mohanārthaṃ tu sarveṣāṃ buddhiṃ kṛtvā sudurmatiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5568: 6.068.007a taṃ dṛṣṭvā tv abhiniryāntaṃ nagaryāḥ kānanaukasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5572: 6.068.009a sa dadarśa hatānandāṃ sītām indrajito rathe
GE09ram_06_u:5576: 6.068.011a tāṃ nirīkṣya muhūrtaṃ tu maithilīm adhyavasya ca
GE09ram_06_u:5578: 6.068.012a abravīt tāṃ tu śokārtāṃ nirānandāṃ tapasvinām
GE09ram_06_u:5580: 6.068.013a kiṃ samarthitam asyeti cintayan sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5583: 6.068.014c kṛtvā viśokaṃ nistriṃśaṃ mūrdhni sītāṃ parāmṛśat
GE09ram_06_u:5584: 6.068.015a taṃ striyaṃ paśyatāṃ teṣāṃ tāḍayām āsa rāvaṇiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5585: 6.068.015c krośantīṃ rāma rāmeti māyayā yojitāṃ rathe
GE09ram_06_u:5590: 6.068.017c brahmarṣīṇāṃ kule jāto rākṣasīṃ yonim āśritaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5591: 6.068.017e dhik tvāṃ pāpasamācāraṃ yasya te matir īdṛśī
GE09ram_06_u:5593: 6.068.018c anāryasyedṛśaṃ karma ghṛṇā te nāsti nirghṛṇa
GE09ram_06_u:5594: 6.068.019a cyutā gṛhāc ca rājyāc ca rāmahastāc ca maithilī
GE09ram_06_u:5595: 6.068.019c kiṃ tavaiṣāparāddhā hi yad enāṃ hantum icchasi
GE09ram_06_u:5596: 6.068.020a sītāṃ ca hatvā na ciraṃ jīviṣyasi kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_06_u:5598: 6.068.021a ye ca strīghātināṃ lokā lokavadhyaiś ca kutsitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5599: 6.068.021c iha jīvitam utsṛjya pretya tān pratilapsyase
GE09ram_06_u:5600: 6.068.022a iti bruvāṇo hanumān sāyudhair haribhir vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5606: 6.068.025a sugrīvas tvaṃ ca rāmaś ca yannimittam ihāgatāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5607: 6.068.025c tāṃ haniṣyāmi vaidehīm adyaiva tava paśyataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5608: 6.068.026a imāṃ hatvā tato rāmaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ tvāṃ ca vānara
GE09ram_06_u:5609: 6.068.026c sugrīvaṃ ca vadhiṣyāmi taṃ cānāryaṃ vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:5610: 6.068.027a na hantavyāḥ striyaś ceti yad bravīṣi plavaṃgama
GE09ram_06_u:5611: 6.068.027c pīḍā karam amitrāṇāṃ yat syāt kartavyam eta tat
GE09ram_06_u:5612: 6.068.028a tam evam uktvā rudatīṃ sītāṃ māyāmayīṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5616: 6.068.030a tām indrajitstriyaṃ hatvā hanūmantam uvāca ha
GE09ram_06_u:5617: 6.068.030c mayā rāmasya paśyemāṃ kopena ca niṣūditām
GE09ram_06_u:5618: 6.068.031a tataḥ khaḍgena mahatā hatvā tām indrajit svayam
GE09ram_06_u:5619: 6.068.031c hṛṣṭaḥ sa ratham āsthāya vinanāda mahāsvanam
GE09ram_06_u:5621: 6.068.032c vyāditāsyasya nadatas tad durgaṃ saṃśritasya tu
GE09ram_06_u:5622: 6.068.033a tathā tu sītāṃ vinihatya durmatiḥ; prahṛṣṭacetāḥ sa babhūva rāvaṇiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5623: 6.068.033c taṃ hṛṣṭarūpaṃ samudīkṣya vānarā; viṣaṇṇarūpāḥ samabhipradudruvuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5626: 6.069.002a tān uvāca tataḥ sarvān hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5629: 6.069.003c tyaktayuddhasamutsāhāḥ śūratvaṃ kva nu vo gatam
GE09ram_06_u:5636: 6.069.007a sa tair vānaramukhyais tu hanūmān sarvato vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5640: 6.069.009a sa tu śokena cāviṣṭaḥ krodhena ca mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5641: 6.069.009c hanūmān rāvaṇi rathe mahatīṃ pātayac chilām
GE09ram_06_u:5642: 6.069.010a tām āpatantīṃ dṛṣṭvaiva rathaḥ sārathinā tadā
GE09ram_06_u:5645: 6.069.011c viveśa dharaṇīṃ bhittvā sā śilāvyartham udyatā
GE09ram_06_u:5646: 6.069.012a patitāyāṃ śilāyāṃ tu rakṣasāṃ vyathitā camūḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5648: 6.069.013a te drumāṃś ca mahākāyā giriśṛṅgāṇi codyatāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5657: 6.069.017c te cāpy anucarāṃs tasya vānarā jaghnur āhave
GE09ram_06_u:5660: 6.069.019a sa nivārya parānīkam abravīt tān vanaukasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5661: 6.069.019c hanūmān saṃnivartadhvaṃ na naḥ sādhyam idaṃ balam
GE09ram_06_u:5663: 6.069.020c yannimittaṃ hi yudhyāmo hatā sā janakātmajā
GE09ram_06_u:5664: 6.069.021a imam arthaṃ hi vijñāpya rāmaṃ sugrīvam eva ca
GE09ram_06_u:5665: 6.069.021c tau yat pratividhāsyete tat kariṣyāmahe vayam
GE09ram_06_u:5667: 6.069.022c śanaiḥ śanair asaṃtrastaḥ sabalaḥ sa nyavartata
GE09ram_06_u:5668: 6.069.023a sa tu prekṣya hanūmantaṃ vrajantaṃ yatra rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5670: 6.069.024a yajñabhūmyāṃ tu vidhivat pāvakas tena rakṣasā
GE09ram_06_u:5674: 6.069.026a athendrajid rākṣasabhūtaye tu; juhāva havyaṃ vidhinā vidhānavat
GE09ram_06_u:5675: 6.069.026c dṛṣṭvā vyatiṣṭhanta ca rākṣasās te; mahāsamūheṣu nayānayajñāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5678: 6.070.002a saumya nūnaṃ hanumatā kṛtaṃ karma suduṣkaram
GE09ram_06_u:5679: 6.070.002c śrūyate hi yathā bhīmaḥ sumahān āyudhasvanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5686: 6.070.006a dṛṣṭvā pathi hanūmāṃś ca tad ṛṣkabalam udyatam
GE09ram_06_u:5689: 6.070.007c śīghram āgamya rāmāya duḥkhito vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:5690: 6.070.008a samare yudhyamānānām asmākaṃ prekṣatāṃ ca saḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5693: 6.070.009c tad ahaṃ bhavato vṛttaṃ vijñāpayitum āgataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5695: 6.070.010c nipapāta tadā bhūmau chinnamūla iva drumaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5696: 6.070.011a taṃ bhūmau devasaṃkāśaṃ patitaṃ dṛśya rāghavam
GE09ram_06_u:5703: 6.070.014c anarthebhyo na śaknoti trātuṃ dharmo nirarthakaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5704: 6.070.015a bhūtānāṃ sthāvarāṇāṃ ca jaṅgamānāṃ ca darśanam
GE09ram_06_u:5705: 6.070.015c yathāsti na tathā dharmas tena nāstīti me matiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5706: 6.070.016a yathaiva sthāvaraṃ vyaktaṃ jaṅgamaṃ ca tathāvidham
GE09ram_06_u:5707: 6.070.016c nāyam arthas tathā yuktas tvadvidho na vipadyate
GE09ram_06_u:5708: 6.070.017a yady adharmo bhaved bhūto rāvaṇo narakaṃ vrajet
GE09ram_06_u:5709: 6.070.017c bhavāṃś ca dharmasaṃyukto naivaṃ vyasanam āpnuyāt
GE09ram_06_u:5710: 6.070.018a tasya ca vyasanābhāvād vyasanaṃ ca gate tvayi
GE09ram_06_u:5713: 6.070.019c dharmeṇa caratāṃ dharmas tathā caiṣāṃ phalaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_06_u:5714: 6.070.020a yasmād arthā vivardhante yeṣv adharmaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5715: 6.070.020c kliśyante dharmaśīlāś ca tasmād etau nirarthakau
GE09ram_06_u:5717: 6.070.021c vadhakarmahato dharmaḥ sa hataḥ kaṃ vadhiṣyati
GE09ram_06_u:5718: 6.070.022a atha vā vihitenāyaṃ hanyate hanti vā param
GE09ram_06_u:5719: 6.070.022c vidhir ālipyate tena na sa pāpena karmaṇā
GE09ram_06_u:5722: 6.070.024a yadi sat syāt satāṃ mukhya nāsat syāt tava kiṃ cana
GE09ram_06_u:5723: 6.070.024c tvayā yadīdṛśaṃ prāptaṃ tasmāt san nopapadyate
GE09ram_06_u:5724: 6.070.025a atha vā durbalaḥ klībo balaṃ dharmo 'nuvartate
GE09ram_06_u:5725: 6.070.025c durbalo hṛtamaryādo na sevya iti me matiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5726: 6.070.026a balasya yadi ced dharmo guṇabhūtaḥ parākrame
GE09ram_06_u:5727: 6.070.026c dharmam utsṛjya vartasva yathā dharme tathā bale
GE09ram_06_u:5728: 6.070.027a atha cet satyavacanaṃ dharmaḥ kila paraṃtapa
GE09ram_06_u:5729: 6.070.027c anṛtas tvayy akaruṇaḥ kiṃ na baddhas tvayā pitā
GE09ram_06_u:5730: 6.070.028a yadi dharmo bhaved bhūta adharmo vā paraṃtapa
GE09ram_06_u:5731: 6.070.028c na sma hatvā muniṃ vajrī kuryād ijyāṃ śatakratuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5733: 6.070.029c sarvam etad yathākāmaṃ kākutstha kurute naraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5734: 6.070.030a mama cedaṃ mataṃ tāta dharmo 'yam iti rāghava
GE09ram_06_u:5735: 6.070.030c dharmamūlaṃ tvayā chinnaṃ rājyam utsṛjatā tadā
GE09ram_06_u:5736: 6.070.031a arthebhyo hi vivṛddhebhyaḥ saṃvṛddhebhyas tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5739: 6.070.032c vyucchidyante kriyāḥ sarvā grīṣme kusarito yathā
GE09ram_06_u:5741: 6.070.033c pāpam ārabhate kartuṃ tathā doṣaḥ pravartate
GE09ram_06_u:5742: 6.070.034a yasyārthās tasya mitrāṇi yasyārthās tasya bāndhavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5743: 6.070.034c yasyārthāḥ sa pumāṃl loke yasyārthāḥ sa ca paṇḍitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5744: 6.070.035a yasyārthāḥ sa ca vikrānto yasyārthāḥ sa ca buddhimān
GE09ram_06_u:5745: 6.070.035c yasyārthāḥ sa mahābhāgo yasyārthāḥ sa mahāguṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5747: 6.070.036c rājyam utsṛjatā vīra yena buddhis tvayā kṛtā
GE09ram_06_u:5750: 6.070.038a harṣaḥ kāmaś ca darpaś ca dharmaḥ krodhaḥ śamo damaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5752: 6.070.039a yeṣāṃ naśyaty ayaṃ lokaś caratāṃ dharmacāriṇām
GE09ram_06_u:5753: 6.070.039c te 'rthās tvayi na dṛśyante durdineṣu yathā grahāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5754: 6.070.040a tvayi pravrajite vīra guroś ca vacane sthite
GE09ram_06_u:5756: 6.070.041a tad adya vipulaṃ vīra duḥkham indrajitā kṛtam
GE09ram_06_u:5758: 6.070.042a ayam anagha tavoditaḥ priyārthaṃ; janakasutā nidhanaṃ nirīkṣya ruṣṭaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5759: 6.070.042c sahayagajarathāṃ sarākṣasendrāṃ; bhṛśam iṣubhir vinipātayāmi laṅkām
GE09ram_06_u:5769: 6.071.005c antarduḥkhena dīnātmā kim etad iti so 'bravīt
GE09ram_06_u:5770: 6.071.006a vibhīṣaṇa mukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā sugrīvaṃ tāṃś ca vānarān
GE09ram_06_u:5772: 6.071.007a hatām indrajitā sītām iha śrutvaiva rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5773: 6.071.007c hanūmad vacanāt saumya tato moham upāgataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5775: 6.071.008c puṣkalārtham idaṃ vākyaṃ visaṃjñaṃ rāmam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:5777: 6.071.009c tad ayuktam ahaṃ manye sāgarasyeva śoṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:5779: 6.071.010c sītāṃ prati mahābāho na ca ghātaṃ kariṣyati
GE09ram_06_u:5781: 6.071.011c vaidehīm utsṛjasveti na ca tat kṛtavān vacaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5782: 6.071.012a naiva sāmnā na bhedena na dānena kuto yudhā
GE09ram_06_u:5783: 6.071.012c sā draṣṭum api śakyeta naiva cānyena kena cit
GE09ram_06_u:5784: 6.071.013a vānarān mohayitvā tu pratiyātaḥ sa rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5785: 6.071.013c caityaṃ nikumbhilāṃ nāma yatra homaṃ kariṣyati
GE09ram_06_u:5786: 6.071.014a hutavān upayāto hi devair api savāsavaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5788: 6.071.015a tena mohayatā nūnam eṣā māyā prayojitā
GE09ram_06_u:5790: 6.071.015e sasainyās tatra gacchāmo yāvat tan na samāpyate
GE09ram_06_u:5792: 6.071.016c sīdate hi balaṃ sarvaṃ dṛṣṭvā tvāṃ śokakarśitam
GE09ram_06_u:5793: 6.071.017a iha tvaṃ svastha hṛdayas tiṣṭha sattvasamucchritaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5795: 6.071.018a eṣa taṃ naraśārdūlo rāvaṇiṃ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5796: 6.071.018c tyājayiṣyati tat karma tato vadhyo bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_06_u:5801: 6.071.021a manujavara na kālaviprakarṣo; ripunidhanaṃ prati yat kṣamo 'dya kartum
GE09ram_06_u:5802: 6.071.021c tvam atisṛja ripor vadhāya bāṇīm; asurapuronmathane yathā mahendraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5803: 6.071.022a samāptakarmā hi sa rākṣasendro; bhavaty adṛśyaḥ samare surāsuraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5804: 6.071.022c yuyutsatā tena samāptakarmaṇā; bhavet surāṇām api saṃśayo mahān
GE09ram_06_u:5806: 6.072.001c nopadhārayate vyaktaṃ yad uktaṃ tena rakṣasā
GE09ram_06_u:5809: 6.072.003a nairṛtādhipate vākyaṃ yad uktaṃ te vibhīṣaṇa
GE09ram_06_u:5810: 6.072.003c bhūyas tac chrotum icchāmi brūhi yat te vivakṣitam
GE09ram_06_u:5812: 6.072.004c yat tat punar idaṃ vākyaṃ babhāṣe sa vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5817: 6.072.007a bhūyas tu mama vijāpyaṃ tac chṛṇuṣva mahāyaśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5819: 6.072.008a tyaja rājann imaṃ śokaṃ mithyā saṃtāpam āgatam
GE09ram_06_u:5822: 6.072.009c prāptavyā yadi te sītā hantavyaś vca niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5823: 6.072.010a raghunandana vakṣyāmi śrūyatāṃ me hitaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5824: 6.072.010c sādhv ayaṃ yātu saumitrir balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5829: 6.072.012c astraṃ brahmaśiraḥ prāptaṃ kāmagāś ca turaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5830: 6.072.013a nikumbhilām asaṃprāptam ahutāgniṃ ca yo ripuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5831: 6.072.013c tvām ātatāyinaṃ hanyād indraśatro sa te vadhaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5832: 6.072.013e ity evaṃ vihito rājan vadhas tasyaiva dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5834: 6.072.014c hate tasmin hataṃ viddhi rāvaṇaṃ sasuhṛjjanam
GE09ram_06_u:5837: 6.072.016a sa hi brahmāstravit prājño mahāmāyo mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5838: 6.072.016c karoty asaṃjñān saṃgrāme devān savaruṇān api
GE09ram_06_u:5841: 6.072.018a rāghavas tu ripor jñātvā māyāvīryaṃ durātmanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5843: 6.072.019a yad vānarendrasya balaṃ tena sarveṇa saṃvṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5847: 6.072.021a ayaṃ tvāṃ sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ mahātmā rajanīcaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5851: 6.072.023a saṃnaddhaḥ kavacī khaḍgī sa śarī hemacāpadhṛk
GE09ram_06_u:5855: 6.072.025a adyaiva tasya raudrasya śarīraṃ māmakāḥ śarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5857: 6.072.026a sa evam uktvā dyutimān vacanaṃ bhrātur agrataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5859: 6.072.027a so 'bhivādya guroḥ pādau kṛtvā cāpi pradakṣiṇam
GE09ram_06_u:5863: 6.072.029a vānarāṇāṃ sahasrais tu hanūmān bahubhir vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5867: 6.072.031a sa gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ saumitrir mitranandanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5871: 6.072.033a vividham amalaśastrabhāsvaraṃ tad; dhvajagahanaṃ vipulaṃ mahārathaiś ca
GE09ram_06_u:5872: 6.072.033c pratibhayatamam aprameyavegaṃ; timiram iva dviṣatāṃ balaṃ viveśa
GE09ram_06_u:5877: 6.073.003a sa tvam indrāśaniprakhyaiḥ śarair avakiran parān
GE09ram_06_u:5878: 6.073.003c abhidravāśu yāvad vai naitat karma samāpyate
GE09ram_06_u:5885: 6.073.007a rākṣasāś ca śitair bāṇair asibhiḥ śaktitomaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5888: 6.073.008c śabdena mahatā laṅkāṃ nādayan vai samantataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5889: 6.073.009a śastrair bahuvidhākāraiḥ śitair bāṇaiś ca pādapaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5890: 6.073.009c udyatair giriśṛṅgaiś ca ghorair ākāśam āvṛtam
GE09ram_06_u:5892: 6.073.010c niveśayantaḥ śastrāṇi cakrus te sumahad bhayam
GE09ram_06_u:5893: 6.073.011a tathaiva sakalair vṛkṣair giriśṛṅgaiś ca vānarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5897: 6.073.013a svam anīkaṃ viṣaṇṇaṃ tu śrutvā śatrubhir arditam
GE09ram_06_u:5900: 6.073.014c āruroha rathaṃ sajjaṃ pūrvayuktaṃ sa rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5903: 6.073.016a dṛṣṭvaiva tu rathasthaṃ taṃ paryavartata tad balam
GE09ram_06_u:5905: 6.073.017a tasmin kāle tu hanumān udyamya sudurāsadam
GE09ram_06_u:5907: 6.073.018a sa rākṣasānāṃ tat sainyaṃ kālāgnir iva nirdahan
GE09ram_06_u:5908: 6.073.018c cakāra bahubhir vṛkṣair niḥsaṃjñaṃ yudhi vānaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5913: 6.073.021a parighaiś ca gadābhiś ca kuntaiś ca śubhadarśanaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5914: 6.073.021c śataśaś ca śataghnībhir āyasair api mudgaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5915: 6.073.022a ghoraiḥ paraśubhiś caiva bhiṇḍipālaiś ca rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5918: 6.073.023c teṣām api ca saṃkruddhaś cakāra kadanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_06_u:5921: 6.073.025a sa sārathim uvācedaṃ yāhi yatraiṣa vānaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5922: 6.073.025c kṣayam eva hi naḥ kuryād rākṣasānām upekṣitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5923: 6.073.026a ity uktaḥ sārathis tena yayau yatra sa mārutiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5927: 6.073.028a tāni śastrāṇi ghorāṇi pratigṛhya sa mārutiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5928: 6.073.028c roṣeṇa mahatāviṣo vākyaṃ cedam uvāca ha
GE09ram_06_u:5931: 6.073.030a bāhubhyāṃ saṃprayudhyasva yadi me dvandvam āhave
GE09ram_06_u:5932: 6.073.030c vegaṃ sahasva durbuddhe tatas tvaṃ rakṣasāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5936: 6.073.032c sa eṣa ratham āsthāya hanūmantaṃ jighāṃsati
GE09ram_06_u:5939: 6.073.034a ity evam uktas tu tadā mahātmā; vibhīṣaṇenārivibhīṣaṇena
GE09ram_06_u:5940: 6.073.034c dadarśa taṃ parvatasaṃnikāśaṃ; rathasthitaṃ bhīmabalaṃ durāsadam
GE09ram_06_u:5941: 6.074.001a evam uktvā tu saumitriṃ jātaharṣo vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5943: 6.074.002a avidūraṃ tato gatvā praviśya ca mahad vanam
GE09ram_06_u:5944: 6.074.002c darśayām āsa tat karma lakṣmaṇāya vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5950: 6.074.005c nihanti samare śatrūn badhnāti ca śarottamaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5958: 6.074.009c samāhvaye tvāṃ samare samyag yuddhaṃ prayaccha me
GE09ram_06_u:5960: 6.074.010c abravīt paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ tatra dṛṣṭvā vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:5961: 6.074.011a iha tvaṃ jātasaṃvṛddhaḥ sākṣād bhrātā pitur mama
GE09ram_06_u:5962: 6.074.011c kathaṃ druhyasi putrasya pitṛvyo mama rākṣasa
GE09ram_06_u:5963: 6.074.012a na jñātitvaṃ na sauhārdaṃ na jātis tava durmate
GE09ram_06_u:5964: 6.074.012c pramāṇaṃ na ca sodaryaṃ na dharmo dharmadūṣaṇa
GE09ram_06_u:5965: 6.074.013a śocyas tvam asi durbuddhe nindanīyaś ca sādhubhiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5966: 6.074.013c yas tvaṃ svajanam utsṛjya parabhṛtyatvam āgataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5967: 6.074.014a naitac chithilayā buddhyā tvaṃ vetsi mahad antaram
GE09ram_06_u:5968: 6.074.014c kva ca svajanasaṃvāsaḥ kva ca nīcaparāśrayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5969: 6.074.015a guṇavān vā parajanaḥ svajano nirguṇo 'pi vā
GE09ram_06_u:5970: 6.074.015c nirguṇaḥ svajanaḥ śreyān yaḥ paraḥ para eva saḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5974: 6.074.017c ajānann iva macchīlaṃ kiṃ rākṣasa vikatthase
GE09ram_06_u:5976: 6.074.018c kule yady apy ahaṃ jāto rakṣasāṃ krūrakarmaṇām
GE09ram_06_u:5977: 6.074.018e guṇo 'yaṃ prathamo nṝṇāṃ tan me śīlam arākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_06_u:5978: 6.074.019a na rame dāruṇenāhaṃ na cādharmeṇa vai rame
GE09ram_06_u:5981: 6.074.020c suhṛdām atiśaṅkāṃ ca trayo doṣāḥ kṣayāvahāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5982: 6.074.021a maharṣīṇāṃ vadho ghoraḥ sarvadevaiś ca vigrahaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5983: 6.074.021c abhimānaś ca kopaś ca vairitvaṃ pratikūlatā
GE09ram_06_u:5985: 6.074.022c guṇān pracchādayām āsuḥ parvatān iva toyadāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:5986: 6.074.023a doṣair etaiḥ parityakto mayā bhrātā pitā tava
GE09ram_06_u:5987: 6.074.023c neyam asti purī laṅkā na ca tvaṃ na ca te pitā
GE09ram_06_u:5988: 6.074.024a atimānī ca bālaś ca durvinītaś ca rākṣasa
GE09ram_06_u:5989: 6.074.024c baddhas tvaṃ kālapāśena brūhi māṃ yad yad icchasi
GE09ram_06_u:5990: 6.074.025a adya te vyasanaṃ prāptaṃ kim iha tvaṃ tu vakṣyasi
GE09ram_06_u:5991: 6.074.025c praveṣṭuṃ na tvayā śakyo nyagrodho rākṣasādhama
GE09ram_06_u:5992: 6.074.026a dharṣayitvā tu kākutsthau na śakyaṃ jīvituṃ tvayā
GE09ram_06_u:5994: 6.074.026e hatas tvaṃ devatā kāryaṃ kariṣyasi yamakṣaye
GE09ram_06_u:5996: 6.074.027c na lakṣmaṇasyaitya hi bāṇagocaraṃ; tvam adya jīvan sabalo gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_06_u:6004: 6.075.004c tāṃś ca vānaraśārdūlān paśyadhvaṃ me parākramam
GE09ram_06_u:6010: 6.075.007c adya vo gamayiṣyāmi sarvān eva yamakṣayam
GE09ram_06_u:6013: 6.075.009a tac chrutvā rākṣasendrasya garjitaṃ lakṣmaṇas tadā
GE09ram_06_u:6015: 6.075.010a uktaś ca durgamaḥ pāraḥ kāryāṇāṃ rākṣasa tvayā
GE09ram_06_u:6016: 6.075.010c kāryāṇāṃ karmaṇā pāraṃ yo gacchati sa buddhimān
GE09ram_06_u:6017: 6.075.011a sa tvam arthasya hīnārtho duravāpasya kena cit
GE09ram_06_u:6021: 6.075.013a yathā bāṇapathaṃ prāpya sthito 'haṃ tava rākṣasa
GE09ram_06_u:6022: 6.075.013c darśayasvādya tat tejo vācā tvaṃ kiṃ vikatthase
GE09ram_06_u:6023: 6.075.014a evam ukto dhanur bhīmaṃ parāmṛśya mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6026: 6.075.015c saṃprāpya lakṣmaṇaṃ petuḥ śvasanta iva pannagāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6030: 6.075.017c śuśubhe lakṣmaṇaḥ śrīmān vidhūma iva pāvakaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6031: 6.075.018a indrajit tv ātmanaḥ karma prasamīkṣyādhigamya ca
GE09ram_06_u:6035: 6.075.020a adya gomāyusaṃghāś ca śyenasaṃghāś ca lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_06_u:6036: 6.075.020c gṛdhrāś ca nipatantu tvāṃ gatāsuṃ nihataṃ mayā
GE09ram_06_u:6038: 6.075.021c bhaktaṃ bhrātaram adyaiva tvāṃ drakṣyati mayā hatam
GE09ram_06_u:6040: 6.075.022c hṛtottamāṅgaṃ saumitre tvām adya nihataṃ mayā
GE09ram_06_u:6043: 6.075.024a akṛtvā katthase karma kimartham iha rākṣasa
GE09ram_06_u:6044: 6.075.024c kuru tat karma yenāhaṃ śraddadhyāṃ tava katthanam
GE09ram_06_u:6045: 6.075.025a anuktvā paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ kiṃ cid apy anavakṣipan
GE09ram_06_u:6049: 6.075.027a sa śarair āhatas tena saroṣo rāvaṇātmajaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6056: 6.075.030c yuyudhāte mahāvīrau grahāv iva nabho gatau
GE09ram_06_u:6057: 6.075.031a balavṛtrāv iva hi tau yudhi vai duṣpradharṣaṇau
GE09ram_06_u:6062: 6.075.033c parasparaṃ tau pravavarṣatur bhṛśaṃ; śaraughavarṣeṇa balāhakāv iva
GE09ram_06_u:6064: 6.076.001c sasarja rākṣasendrāya kruddhaḥ sarpa iva śvasan
GE09ram_06_u:6070: 6.076.004c tvara tena mahābāho bhagna eṣa na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6072: 6.076.005c mumoca niśitāṃs tasmai sarvān iva viṣolbaṇān
GE09ram_06_u:6078: 6.076.008c abravīc cainam āsādya punaḥ sa paruṣaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6079: 6.076.009a kiṃ na smarasi tad yuddhe prathame matparākramam
GE09ram_06_u:6080: 6.076.009c nibaddhas tvaṃ saha bhrātrā yadā yudhi viceṣṭase
GE09ram_06_u:6083: 6.076.011a smṛtir vā nāsti te manye vyaktaṃ vā yamasādanam
GE09ram_06_u:6084: 6.076.011c gantum icchasi yasmāt tvaṃ māṃ dharṣayitum icchasi
GE09ram_06_u:6085: 6.076.012a yadi te prathame yuddhe na dṛṣṭo matparākramaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6087: 6.076.013a ity uktvā saptabhir bāṇair abhivivyādha lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:6091: 6.076.015a tad dṛṣṭvendrajitaḥ karma kṛtaṃ rāmānujas tadā
GE09ram_06_u:6092: 6.076.015c acintayitvā prahasan naitat kiṃ cid iti bruvan
GE09ram_06_u:6093: 6.076.016a mumoca sa śarān ghorān saṃgṛhya narapuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6096: 6.076.017c laghavaś cālpavīryāś ca sukhā hīme śarās tava
GE09ram_06_u:6097: 6.076.018a naivaṃ śūrās tu yudhyante samare jayakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6098: 6.076.018c ity evaṃ taṃ bruvāṇas tu śaravarṣair avākirat
GE09ram_06_u:6099: 6.076.019a tasya bāṇais tu vidhvastaṃ kavacaṃ hemabhūṣitam
GE09ram_06_u:6102: 6.076.020c indrajit samare śūraḥ prarūḍha iva sānumān
GE09ram_06_u:6103: 6.076.021a abhīkṣṇaṃ niśvasantau hi yudhyetāṃ tumulaṃ yudhi
GE09ram_06_u:6105: 6.076.022a astrāṇy astravidāṃ śreṣṭhau darśayantau punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6107: 6.076.023a vyapetadoṣam asyantau laghucitraṃ ca suṣṭhu ca
GE09ram_06_u:6108: 6.076.023c ubhau tu tumulaṃ ghoraṃ cakratur nararākṣasau
GE09ram_06_u:6111: 6.076.025a te gātrayor nipatitā rukmapuṅkhāḥ śarā yudhi
GE09ram_06_u:6114: 6.076.026c babhañjuś cicchiduś cāpi tayor bāṇāḥ sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6115: 6.076.027a sa babhūva raṇe ghoras tayor bāṇamayaś cayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6116: 6.076.027c agnibhyām iva dīptābhyāṃ satre kuśamayaś cayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6119: 6.076.029a cakratus tumulaṃ ghoraṃ saṃnipātaṃ muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6121: 6.076.030a lakṣmaṇo rāvaṇiṃ yuddhe rāvaṇiś cāpi lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:6122: 6.076.030c anyonyaṃ tāv abhighnantau na śramaṃ pratyapadyatām
GE09ram_06_u:6127: 6.076.033a tayor atha mahān kālo vyatīyād yudhyamānayoḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6128: 6.076.033c na ca tau yuddhavaimukhyaṃ śramaṃ vāpy upajagmatuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6129: 6.076.034a atha samarapariśramaṃ nihantuṃ; samaramukheṣv ajitasya lakṣmaṇasya
GE09ram_06_u:6130: 6.076.034c priyahitam upapādayan mahaujāḥ; samaram upetya vibhīṣaṇo 'vatasthe
GE09ram_06_u:6131: 6.077.001a yudhyamānau tu tau dṛṣṭvā prasaktau nararākṣasau
GE09ram_06_u:6133: 6.077.002a tato visphārayām āsa mahad dhanur avasthitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6136: 6.077.003c rākṣasān dārayām āsur vajrā iva mahāgirīn
GE09ram_06_u:6139: 6.077.005a rākṣasais taiḥ parivṛtaḥ sa tadā tu vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6140: 6.077.005c babhau madhye prahṛṣṭānāṃ kalabhānām iva dvipaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6142: 6.077.006c uvāca vacanaṃ kāle kālajño rakṣasāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6144: 6.077.007c etac cheṣaṃ balaṃ tasya kiṃ tiṣṭhata harīśvarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6146: 6.077.008c rāvaṇaṃ varjayitvā tu śeṣam asya balaṃ hatam
GE09ram_06_u:6147: 6.077.009a prahasto nihato vīro nikumbhaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6148: 6.077.009c kumbhakarṇaś ca kumbhaś ca dhūmrākṣaś ca niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6149: 6.077.010a akampanaḥ supārśvaś ca cakramālī ca rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6152: 6.077.011c bāhubhyāṃ sāgaraṃ tīrtvā laṅghyatāṃ goṣpadaṃ laghu
GE09ram_06_u:6153: 6.077.012a etāvad iha śeṣaṃ vo jetavyam iha vānarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6155: 6.077.013a ayuktaṃ nidhanaṃ kartuṃ putrasya janitur mama
GE09ram_06_u:6156: 6.077.013c ghṛṇām apāsya rāmārthe nihanyāṃ bhrātur ātmajam
GE09ram_06_u:6157: 6.077.014a hantukāmasya me bāṣpaṃ cakśuś caiva nirudhyate
GE09ram_06_u:6159: 6.077.014e vānarā ghnantuṃ saṃbhūya bhṛtyān asya samīpagān
GE09ram_06_u:6162: 6.077.016a tatas te kapiśārdūlāḥ kṣveḍantaś ca muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6163: 6.077.016c mumucur vividhān nādān meghān dṛṣṭveva barhiṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6164: 6.077.017a jāmbavān api taiḥ sarvaiḥ svayūthair abhisaṃvṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6165: 6.077.017c aśmabhis tāḍayām āsa nakhair dantaiś ca rākṣasān
GE09ram_06_u:6169: 6.077.019c jāmbavantaṃ mṛdhe jaghnur nighnantaṃ rākṣasīṃ camūm
GE09ram_06_u:6172: 6.077.021a hanūmān api saṃkruddhaḥ sālam utpāṭya parvatāt
GE09ram_06_u:6174: 6.077.022a sa dattvā tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ pitṛvyasyendrajid yudhi
GE09ram_06_u:6176: 6.077.023a tau prayuddhau tadā vīrau mṛdhe lakṣmaṇarākṣasau
GE09ram_06_u:6180: 6.077.025a na hy ādānaṃ na saṃdhānaṃ dhanuṣo vā parigrahaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6181: 6.077.025c na vipramokṣo bāṇānāṃ na vikarṣo na vigrahaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6186: 6.077.027e tamasā pihitaṃ sarvam āsīd bhīmataraṃ mahat
GE09ram_06_u:6187: 6.077.028a na tadānīiṃ vavau vāyur na jajvāla ca pāvakaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6188: 6.077.028c svastyas tu lokebhya iti jajalpaś ca maharṣayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6189: 6.077.028e saṃpetuś cātra saṃprāptā gandharvāḥ saha cāraṇaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6191: 6.077.029c śaraiś caturbhiḥ saumitrir vivyādha caturo hayān
GE09ram_06_u:6193: 6.077.030c lāghavād rāghavaḥ śrīmāñ śiraḥ kāyād apāharat
GE09ram_06_u:6195: 6.077.031c prajahau samaroddharṣaṃ viṣaṇṇaḥ sa babhūva ha
GE09ram_06_u:6200: 6.077.034a te cāsya hayamukhyeṣu tūrṇam utpatya vānarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6204: 6.077.036a te nihatya hayāṃs tasya pramathya ca mahāratham
GE09ram_06_u:6208: 6.077.038a tato mahendrapratimaṃh sa lakṣmaṇaḥ; padātinaṃ taṃ niśitaiḥ śarottamaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6209: 6.077.038c sṛjantam ādau niśitāñ śarottamān; bhṛśaṃ tadā bāṇagaṇair nyavārayat
GE09ram_06_u:6210: 6.078.001a sa hatāśvo mahātejā bhūmau tiṣṭhan niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6212: 6.078.002a tau dhanvinau jighāṃsantāv anyonyam iṣubhir bhṛśam
GE09ram_06_u:6215: 6.078.003c bhartāraṃ na jahur yuddhe saṃpatantas tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6216: 6.078.004a sa lakṣmaṇaṃ samuddiśya paraṃ lāghavam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6218: 6.078.005a muktam indrajitā tat tu śaravarṣam ariṃdamaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6221: 6.078.006c lalāṭe lakṣmaṇaṃ bāṇaiḥ supuṅkhais tribhir indrajit
GE09ram_06_u:6225: 6.078.008a sa tathāpy ardito bāṇai rākṣasena mahāmṛdhe
GE09ram_06_u:6226: 6.078.008c tam āśu prativivyādha lakṣmaṇaḥ panabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6230: 6.078.010c ghorair vivyadhatur bāṇaiḥ kṛtabhāvāv ubhau jaye
GE09ram_06_u:6233: 6.078.012a te tasya kāyaṃ nirbhidya rukmapuṅkhā nimittagāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6235: 6.078.013a sa pitṛvyasya saṃkruddha indrajic charam ādade
GE09ram_06_u:6237: 6.078.014a taṃ samīkṣya mahātejā maheṣuṃ tena saṃhitam
GE09ram_06_u:6239: 6.078.015a kubereṇa svayaṃ svapne yad dattam amitātmanā
GE09ram_06_u:6240: 6.078.015c durjayaṃ durviṣahyaṃ ca sendrair api surāsuraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6241: 6.078.016a tābhyāṃ tau dhanuṣi śreṣṭhe saṃhitau sāyakottamau
GE09ram_06_u:6243: 6.078.017a tau bhāsayantāv ākāśaṃ dhanurbhyāṃ viśikhau cyutau
GE09ram_06_u:6247: 6.078.019a śarau pratihatau dṛṣṭvā tāv ubhau raṇamūrdhani
GE09ram_06_u:6249: 6.078.020a susaṃrabdhas tu saumitrir astraṃ vāruṇam ādade
GE09ram_06_u:6250: 6.078.020c raudraṃ mahedrajid yuddhe vyasṛjad yudhi viṣṭhitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6254: 6.078.022c bhūtair bahubhir ākāśaṃ vismitair āvṛtaṃ babhau
GE09ram_06_u:6263: 6.078.027a yena śakro mahātejā dānavān ajayat prabhuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6265: 6.078.028a tad aindram astraṃ saumitriḥ saṃyugeṣv aparājitam
GE09ram_06_u:6268: 6.078.029c sajyam āyamya durdharśaḥ kālo lokakṣaye yathā
GE09ram_06_u:6269: 6.078.030a saṃdhāya dhanuṣi śreṣṭhe vikarṣann idam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:6271: 6.078.031a dharmātmā satyasaṃdhaś ca rāmo dāśarathir yadi
GE09ram_06_u:6272: 6.078.031c pauruṣe cāpratidvandvas tad enaṃ jahi rāvaṇim
GE09ram_06_u:6273: 6.078.032a ity uktvā bāṇam ākarṇaṃ vikṛṣya tam ajihmagam
GE09ram_06_u:6276: 6.078.033a tac chiraḥ saśiras trāṇaṃ śrīmaj jvalitakuṇḍalam
GE09ram_06_u:6282: 6.078.036a cukruśus te tataḥ sarve vānarāḥ savibhīṣaṇāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6283: 6.078.036c hṛṣyanto nihate tasmin devā vṛtravadhe yathā
GE09ram_06_u:6288: 6.078.039a vanarair vadhyamānās te śastrāṇy utsṛjya rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6290: 6.078.040a dudruvur bahudhā bhītā rākṣasāḥ śataśo diśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6292: 6.078.041a ke cil laṅkāṃ paritrastāḥ praviṣṭā vānarārditāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6293: 6.078.041c samudre patitāḥ ke cit ke cit parvatam āśritāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6295: 6.078.042c rākṣasānāṃ sahasreṣu na kaś cit pratyadṛśyata
GE09ram_06_u:6297: 6.078.043c tathā tasmin nipatite rākṣasās te gatā diśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6302: 6.078.046a harṣaṃ ca śakro bhagavān saha sarvaiḥ surarṣabhaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6304: 6.078.047a śuddhā āpo nabhaś caiva jahṛṣur daityadānavāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6312: 6.078.051a kṣveḍantaś ca nadantaś ca garjantaś ca plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6315: 6.078.052c lakṣmaṇo jayatīty evaṃ vākyaṃ vyaśrāvayaṃs tadā
GE09ram_06_u:6318: 6.078.054a tad asukaram athābhivīkṣya hṛṣṭāḥ; priyasuhṛdo yudhi lakṣmaṇasya karma
GE09ram_06_u:6319: 6.078.054c paramam upalabhan manaḥpraharṣaṃ; vinihatam indraripuṃ niśamya devāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6321: 6.079.001c babhūva hṛṣṭas taṃ hatvā śakrajetāram āhave
GE09ram_06_u:6322: 6.079.002a tataḥ sa jāmbavantaṃ ca hanūmantaṃ ca vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:6323: 6.079.002c saṃnivartya mahātejās tāṃś ca sarvān vanaukasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6326: 6.079.004a tato rāmam abhikramya saumitrir abhivādya ca
GE09ram_06_u:6328: 6.079.004e ācacakṣe tadā vīro ghoram indrajito vadham
GE09ram_06_u:6329: 6.079.005a rāvaṇas tu śiraś chinnaṃ lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā
GE09ram_06_u:6332: 6.079.006c mūrdhni cainam upāghrāya bhūyaḥ saṃspṛśya ca tvaran
GE09ram_06_u:6335: 6.079.007c niramitraḥ kṛto 'smy adya niryāsyati hi rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6339: 6.079.009a tvayā lakṣmaṇa nāthena sītā ca pṛthivī ca me
GE09ram_06_u:6340: 6.079.009c na duṣprāpā hate tv adya śakrajetari cāhave
GE09ram_06_u:6341: 6.079.010a sa taṃ bhrātaram āśvāsya pāriṣvajya ca rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6344: 6.079.011c yathā bhavati susvasthas tathā tvaṃ samupācara
GE09ram_06_u:6347: 6.079.012c ye cānye 'tra ca yudhyantaḥ saśalyā vraṇinas tathā
GE09ram_06_u:6348: 6.079.012e te 'pi sarve prayatnena kriyantāṃ sukhinas tvayā
GE09ram_06_u:6349: 6.079.013a evam uktaḥ sa rāmeṇa mahātmā hariyūthapaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6351: 6.079.014a sa tasya gandham āghrāya viśalyaḥ samapadyata
GE09ram_06_u:6352: 6.079.014c tadā nirvedanaś caiva saṃrūḍhavraṇa eva ca
GE09ram_06_u:6357: 6.079.017a tathaiva rāmaḥ plavagādhipas tadā; vibhīṣaṇaś carkṣapatiś ca jāmbavān
GE09ram_06_u:6358: 6.079.017c avekṣya saumitrim arogam utthitaṃ; mudā sasainyaḥ suciraṃ jaharṣire
GE09ram_06_u:6359: 6.079.018a apūjayat karma sa lakṣmaṇasya; suduṣkaraṃ dāśarathir mahātmā
GE09ram_06_u:6360: 6.079.018c hṛṣṭā babhūvur yudhi yūthapendrā; niśamya taṃ śakrajitaṃ nipātitam
GE09ram_06_u:6361: 6.080.001a tataḥ paulastya sacivāḥ śrutvā cendrajitaṃ hatam
GE09ram_06_u:6366: 6.080.003c lakṣṇanena hataḥ śūraḥ putras te vibudhendrajit
GE09ram_06_u:6367: 6.080.004a sa taṃ pratibhayaṃ śrutvā vadhaṃ putrasya dāruṇam
GE09ram_06_u:6368: 6.080.004c ghoram indrajitaḥ saṃkhye kaśmalaṃ prāviśan mahat
GE09ram_06_u:6372: 6.080.006c jitvendraṃ katham adya tvaṃ lakṣmaṇasya vaśaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6373: 6.080.007a nanu tvam iṣubhiḥ kruddho bhindyāḥ kālāntakāv api
GE09ram_06_u:6374: 6.080.007c mandarasyāpi śṛṅgāṇi kiṃ punar lakṣmaṇaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:6375: 6.080.008a adya vaivasvato rājā bhūyo bahumato mama
GE09ram_06_u:6378: 6.080.009c yaḥ kṛte hanyate bhartuḥ sa pumān svargam ṛcchati
GE09ram_06_u:6380: 6.080.010c hatam indrajitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sukhaṃ svapsyanti nirbhayāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6381: 6.080.011a adya lokās trayaḥ kṛtsnāḥ pṛthivī ca sakānanā
GE09ram_06_u:6385: 6.080.013a yauvarājyaṃ ca laṅkāṃ ca rakṣāṃsi ca paraṃtapa
GE09ram_06_u:6386: 6.080.013c mātaraṃ māṃ ca bhāryāṃ ca kva gato 'si vihāya naḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6387: 6.080.014a mama nāma tvayā vīra gatasya yamasādanam
GE09ram_06_u:6389: 6.080.015a sa tvaṃ jīvati sugrīve rāghave ca salakṣmaṇe
GE09ram_06_u:6390: 6.080.015c mama śalyam anuddhṛtya kva gato 'si vihāya naḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6393: 6.080.017a ghoraṃ prakṛtyā rūpaṃ tat tasya krodhāgnimūrchitam
GE09ram_06_u:6399: 6.080.020a kālāgnir iva saṃkruddho yāṃ yāṃ diśam avaikṣata
GE09ram_06_u:6407: 6.080.024a tasyaiva tapaso vyuṣṭyā prasādāc ca svayambhuvaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6408: 6.080.024c nāsurebhyo na devebhyo bhayaṃ mama kadā cana
