GE09ram_06_u:6411: 6.080.026a tena mām adya saṃyuktaṃ rathastham iha saṃyuge
GE09ram_06_u:6412: 6.080.026c pratīyāt ko 'dya mām ājau sākṣād api puraṃdaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6415: 6.080.028a adya tūryaśatair bhīmaṃ dhanur utthāpyatāṃ mahat
GE09ram_06_u:6418: 6.080.029c samīkṣya rāvaṇo buddhyā sītāṃ hantuṃ vyavasyata
GE09ram_06_u:6420: 6.080.030c dīno dīnasvarān sarvāṃs tān uvāca niśācarān
GE09ram_06_u:6422: 6.080.031c kiṃ cid eva hataṃ tatra sīteyam iti darśitam
GE09ram_06_u:6423: 6.080.032a tad idaṃ satyam evāhaṃ kariṣye priyam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6425: 6.080.032e ity evam uktvā sacivān khaḍgam āśu parāmṛśat
GE09ram_06_u:6427: 6.080.033c niṣpapāta sa vegena sabhāyāḥ sacivair vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6429: 6.080.034c saṃkruddhaḥ khaḍgam ādāya sahasā yatra maithilī
GE09ram_06_u:6431: 6.080.035c ūcuś cānyonyam āśliṣya saṃkruddhaṃ prekṣya rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6432: 6.080.036a adyainaṃ tāv ubhau dṛṣṭvā bhrātarau pravyathiṣyataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6438: 6.080.038c abhyadhāvata saṃkruddhaḥ khe graho rohiṇīm iva
GE09ram_06_u:6444: 6.080.041c vadhiṣyati sanāthāṃ mām anāthām iva durmatiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6445: 6.080.042a bahuśaś codayām āsa bhartāraṃ mām anuvratām
GE09ram_06_u:6447: 6.080.043a so 'yaṃ mām anupasthānād vyaktaṃ nairāśyam āgataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6449: 6.080.044a atha vā tau naravyāghrau bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_06_u:6452: 6.080.045a hanūmato hi tadvākyaṃ na kṛtaṃ kṣudrayā mayā
GE09ram_06_u:6453: 6.080.045c yady ahaṃ tasya pṛṣṭhena tadāyāsam aninditā
GE09ram_06_u:6455: 6.080.046a manye tu hṛdayaṃ tasyāḥ kausalyāyāḥ phaliṣyati
GE09ram_06_u:6456: 6.080.046c ekaputrā yadā putraṃ vinaṣṭaṃ śroṣyate yudhi
GE09ram_06_u:6457: 6.080.047a sā hi janma ca bālyaṃ ca yauvanaṃ ca mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6459: 6.080.048a nirāśā nihate putre dattvā śrāddham acetanā
GE09ram_06_u:6460: 6.080.048c agnim ārokṣyate nūnam apo vāpi pravekṣyati
GE09ram_06_u:6461: 6.080.049a dhig astu kubjām asatīṃ mantharāṃ pāpaniścayām
GE09ram_06_u:6463: 6.080.050a ity evaṃ maithilīṃ dṛṣṭvā vilapantīṃ tapasvinīm
GE09ram_06_u:6464: 6.080.050c rohiṇīm iva candreṇa vinā grahavaśaṃ gatām
GE09ram_06_u:6468: 6.080.052c hantum icchasi vaidehīṃ krodhād dharmam apāsya hi
GE09ram_06_u:6470: 6.080.053c striyāḥ kasmād vadhaṃ vīra manyase rākṣaseśvara
GE09ram_06_u:6472: 6.080.054c tvam eva tu sahāsmābhī rāghave krodham utsṛja
GE09ram_06_u:6474: 6.080.055c kṛtvā niryāhy amāvāsyāṃ vijayāya balair vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6475: 6.080.056a śūro dhīmān rathī khaḍgī rathapravaram āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6476: 6.080.056c hatvā dāśarathiṃ rāmaṃ bhavān prāpsyati maithilīm
GE09ram_06_u:6477: 6.080.057a sa tad durātmā suhṛdā niveditaṃ; vacaḥ sudharmyaṃ pratigṛhya rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6478: 6.080.057c gṛhaṃ jagāmātha tataś ca vīryavān; punaḥ sabhāṃ ca prayayau suhṛdvṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6479: 6.081.001a sa praviśya sabhāṃ rājā dīnaḥ paramaduḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6480: 6.081.001c niṣasādāsane mukhye siṃhaḥ kruddha iva śvasan
GE09ram_06_u:6481: 6.081.002a abravīc ca tadā sarvān balamukhyān mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6485: 6.081.004a ekaṃ rāmaṃ parikṣipya samare hantum arhatha
GE09ram_06_u:6487: 6.081.005a atha vāhaṃ śarair tīṣkṇair bhinnagātraṃ mahāraṇe
GE09ram_06_u:6488: 6.081.005c bhavadbhiḥ śvo nihantāsmi rāmaṃ lokasya paśyataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6489: 6.081.006a ity evaṃ rākṣasendrasya vākyam ādāya rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6490: 6.081.006c niryayus te rathaiḥ śīghraṃ nāgānīkaiś ca saṃvṛtāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6493: 6.081.008a te gadābhir vicitrābhiḥ prāsaiḥ khaḍgaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6499: 6.081.011a keśān karṇalalāṭāṃś ca nāsikāś ca plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6500: 6.081.011c rakṣasāṃ daśanais tīkṣṇair nakhaiś cāpi vyakartayan
GE09ram_06_u:6503: 6.081.013a tathā gadābhir gurvībhiḥ prāsaiḥ khaḍgaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6507: 6.081.015a tato rāmo mahātejā dhanur ādāya vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:6508: 6.081.015c praviśya rākṣasaṃ sainyaṃ śaravarṣaṃ vavarṣa ha
GE09ram_06_u:6509: 6.081.016a praviṣṭaṃ tu tadā rāmaṃ meghāḥ sūryam ivāmbare
GE09ram_06_u:6512: 6.081.017c raṇe rāmasya dadṛśuḥ karmāṇy asukarāṇi ca
GE09ram_06_u:6514: 6.081.018c dadṛśus te na vai rāmaṃ vātaṃ vanagataṃ yathā
GE09ram_06_u:6515: 6.081.019a chinnaṃ bhinnaṃ śarair dagdhaṃ prabhagnaṃ śastrapīḍitam
GE09ram_06_u:6516: 6.081.019c balaṃ rāmeṇa dadṛśur na ramaṃ śīghrakāriṇam
GE09ram_06_u:6517: 6.081.020a praharantaṃ śarīreṣu na te paśyanti rābhavam
GE09ram_06_u:6519: 6.081.021a eṣa hanti gajānīkam eṣa hanti mahārathān
GE09ram_06_u:6520: 6.081.021c eṣa hanti śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ padātīn vājibhiḥ saha
GE09ram_06_u:6521: 6.081.022a iti te rākṣasāḥ sarve rāmasya sadṛśān raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:6523: 6.081.023a na te dadṛśire rāmaṃ dahantam arivāhinīm
GE09ram_06_u:6525: 6.081.024a te tu rāma sahasrāṇi raṇe paśyanti rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6526: 6.081.024c punaḥ paśyanti kākutstham ekam eva mahāhave
GE09ram_06_u:6532: 6.081.027c dadṛśū rāmacakraṃ tat kālacakram iva prajāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6541: 6.081.032a hatair gajapadāty aśvais tad babhūva raṇājiram
GE09ram_06_u:6543: 6.081.033a tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6544: 6.081.033c sādhu sādhv iti rāmasya tat karma samapūjayan
GE09ram_06_u:6545: 6.081.034a abravīc ca tadā rāmaḥ sugrīvaṃ pratyanantaram
GE09ram_06_u:6546: 6.081.034c etad astrabalaṃ divyaṃ mama vā tryambakasya vā
GE09ram_06_u:6547: 6.081.035a nihatya tāṃ rākṣasavāhinīṃ tu; rāmas tadā śakrasamo mahātmā
GE09ram_06_u:6548: 6.081.035c astreṣu śastreṣu jitaklamaś ca; saṃstūyate devagaṇaiḥ prahṛṣṭaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6555: 6.082.004a dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca saṃbhrāntā hataśeṣā niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6560: 6.082.006c āsasāda vane rāmaṃ kandarpam iva rūpiṇam
GE09ram_06_u:6562: 6.082.007c taṃ dṛṣṭvā lokavadhyā sā hīnarūpā prakāmitā
GE09ram_06_u:6564: 6.082.008c sumukhaṃ durmukhī rāmaṃ kāmayām āsa rākṣasī
GE09ram_06_u:6569: 6.082.011a tan nimittam idaṃ vairaṃ rāvaṇena kṛtaṃ mahat
GE09ram_06_u:6570: 6.082.011c vadhāya nītā sā sītā daśagrīveṇa rakṣasā
GE09ram_06_u:6571: 6.082.012a na ca sītāṃ daśagrīvaḥ prāpnoti janakātmajām
GE09ram_06_u:6572: 6.082.012c baddhaṃ balavatā vairam akṣayaṃ rāghaveṇa ha
GE09ram_06_u:6573: 6.082.013a vaidehīṃ prārthayānaṃ taṃ virādhaṃ prekṣya rākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_06_u:6577: 6.082.015a kharaś ca nihataḥ saṃkhye dūṣaṇas triśirās tathā
GE09ram_06_u:6586: 6.082.019c yuktaṃ vibhīṣaṇenoktaṃ mohāt tasya na rocate
GE09ram_06_u:6588: 6.082.020c śmaśānabhūtā duḥkhārtā neyaṃ laṅkā purī bhavet
GE09ram_06_u:6591: 6.082.022a mama putro mama bhrātā mama bhartā raṇe hataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6592: 6.082.022c ity evaṃ śrūyate śabdo rākṣasānāṃ kule kule
GE09ram_06_u:6593: 6.082.023a rathāś cāśvāś ca nāgāś ca hatāḥ śatasahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6594: 6.082.023c raṇe rāmeṇa śūreṇa rākṣasāś ca padātayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6595: 6.082.024a rudro vā yadi vā viṣṇur mahendro vā śatakratuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6596: 6.082.024c hanti no rāmarūpeṇa yadi vā svayam antakaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6601: 6.082.027a na devā na ca gandharvā na piśācā na rākasāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6603: 6.082.028a utpātāś cāpi dṛśyante rāvaṇasya raṇe raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:6607: 6.082.030a tad idaṃ mānuṣān manye prāptaṃ niḥsaṃśayaṃ bhayam
GE09ram_06_u:6612: 6.082.032c uvāca devatāḥ sarvā idaṃ tuṣṭo mahad vacaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6613: 6.082.033a adya prabhṛti lokāṃs trīn sarve dānavarākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6617: 6.082.035a prasannas tu mahādevo devān etad vaco 'bravīt
GE09ram_06_u:6619: 6.082.036a eṣā devaiḥ prayuktā tu kṣud yathā dānavān purā
GE09ram_06_u:6623: 6.082.038a taṃ na paśyāmahe loke yo naḥ śaraṇado bhavet
GE09ram_06_u:6625: 6.082.039a itīva sarvā rajanīcarastriyaḥ; parasparaṃ saṃparirabhya bāhubhiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6626: 6.082.039c viṣedur ārtātibhayābhipīḍitā; vinedur uccaiś ca tadā sudāruṇam
GE09ram_06_u:6627: 6.083.001a ārtānāṃ rākṣasīnāṃ tu laṅkāyāṃ vai kule kule
GE09ram_06_u:6629: 6.083.002a sa tu dīrghaṃ viniśvasya muhūrtaṃ dhyānam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6632: 6.083.003c rākṣasair api durdarśaḥ kālāgnir iva mūrchitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6637: 6.083.006a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rākṣasās te bhayārditāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6638: 6.083.006c codayām āsur avyagrān rākṣasāṃs tān nṛpājñayā
GE09ram_06_u:6639: 6.083.007a te tu sarve tathety uktvā rākṣasā ghoradarśanāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6649: 6.083.012a naivāntarikṣaṃ na diśo na nadyo nāpi sāgaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6659: 6.083.017a hato bhartā hato bhrātā yāsāṃ ca tanayā hatāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6662: 6.083.018c karomi vānarair yuddhe yatnāvekṣya talāṃ mahīm
GE09ram_06_u:6663: 6.083.019a adya gomāyavo gṛdhrā ye ca māṃsāśino 'pare
GE09ram_06_u:6665: 6.083.020a kalpyatāṃ me rathaśīghraṃ kṣipram ānīyatāṃ dhanuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6668: 6.083.021c balādhyakṣān sthitāṃs tatra balaṃ saṃtvaryatām iti
GE09ram_06_u:6669: 6.083.022a balādhyakṣās tu saṃrabdhā rākṣasāṃs tān gṛhād gṛhāt
GE09ram_06_u:6673: 6.083.024a asibhiḥ paṭṭasaiḥ śūlair galābhir musalair halaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6675: 6.083.025a yaṣṭibhir vimalaiś cakrair niśitaiś ca paraśvadhaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6682: 6.083.028c virūpākṣaś ca durdharṣo rathān āruruhus tadā
GE09ram_06_u:6683: 6.083.029a te tu hṛṣṭā vinardanto bhindata iva medinīm
GE09ram_06_u:6688: 6.083.031c dvāreṇa niryayau tena yatra tau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_06_u:6689: 6.083.032a tato naṣṭaprabhaḥ sūryo diśaś ca timirāvṛtāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6690: 6.083.032c dvijāś ca nedur ghorāś ca saṃcacāla ca medinī
GE09ram_06_u:6691: 6.083.033a vavarṣa rudhiraṃ devaś caskhaluś ca turaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6692: 6.083.033c dhvajāgre nyapatad gṛdhro vineduś cāśivaṃ śivāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6693: 6.083.034a nayanaṃ cāsphurad vāmaṃ savyo bāhur akampata
GE09ram_06_u:6694: 6.083.034c vivarṇavadanaś cāsīt kiṃ cid abhraśyata svaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6708: 6.083.041c nirucchvāsā hatāḥ ke cit ke cit pārśveṣu dāritāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6709: 6.083.041e ke cid vibhinnaśirasaḥ ke cic cakṣurvivarjitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6710: 6.083.042a daśānanaḥ krodhavivṛttanetro; yato yato 'bhyeti rathena saṃkhye
GE09ram_06_u:6711: 6.083.042c tatas tatas tasya śarapravegaṃ; soḍhuṃ na śekur hariyūthapās te
GE09ram_06_u:6712: 6.084.001a tathā taiḥ kṛttagātrais tu daśagrīveṇa mārgaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6713: 6.084.001c babhūva vasudhā tatra prakīrṇā haribhir vṛtā
GE09ram_06_u:6715: 6.084.002c na śekuḥ sahituṃ dīptaṃ pataṃgā iva pāvakam
GE09ram_06_u:6719: 6.084.004c sa yayau samare tasmin vidhaman rāvaṇaḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6721: 6.084.005c āsasāda tato yuddhe rāghavaṃ tvaritas tadā
GE09ram_06_u:6722: 6.084.006a sugrīvas tān kapīn dṛṣṭvā bhagnān vidravato raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:6723: 6.084.006c gulme suṣeṇaṃ nikṣipya cakre yuddhe drutaṃ manaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6724: 6.084.007a ātmanaḥ sadṛśaṃ vīraṃ sa taṃ nikṣipya vānaram
GE09ram_06_u:6726: 6.084.008a pārśvataḥ pṛṣṭhataś cāsya sarve yūthādhipāḥ svayam
GE09ram_06_u:6728: 6.084.009a sa nadan yudhi sugrīvaḥ svareṇa mahatā mahān
GE09ram_06_u:6738: 6.084.014a virūpākṣaḥ svakaṃ nāma dhanvī viśrāvya rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6740: 6.084.015a sa taṃ dviradam āruhya virūpākṣo mahārathaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6742: 6.084.016a sugrīve sa śarān ghorān visasarja camūmukhe
GE09ram_06_u:6744: 6.084.017a so 'tividdhaḥ śitair bāṇaiḥ kapīndras tena rakṣasā
GE09ram_06_u:6745: 6.084.017c cukrodha ca mahākrodho vadhe cāsya mano dadhe
GE09ram_06_u:6746: 6.084.018a tataḥ pādapam uddhṛtya śūraḥ saṃpradhane hariḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6750: 6.084.020a gajāt tu mathitāt tūrṇam apakramya sa vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:6754: 6.084.022a sa hi tasyābhisaṃkruddhaḥ pragṛhya mahatīṃ śilām
GE09ram_06_u:6756: 6.084.023a sa tāṃ śilām āpatantīṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasapuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6760: 6.084.025a sa samutthāya patitaḥ kapis tasya vyasarjayat
GE09ram_06_u:6765: 6.084.027c mokṣitaṃ cātmano dṛṣṭvā prahāraṃ tena rakṣasā
GE09ram_06_u:6773: 6.084.031c karuṇaṃ ca vinardāntaṃ dadṛśuḥ kapayo ripum
GE09ram_06_u:6774: 6.084.032a tathā tu tau saṃyati saṃprayuktau; tarasvinau vānararākṣasānām
GE09ram_06_u:6775: 6.084.032c balārṇavau sasvanatuḥ sabhīmaṃ; mahārṇavau dvāv iva bhinnavelau
GE09ram_06_u:6776: 6.084.033a vināśitaṃ prekṣya virūpanetraṃ; mahābalaṃ taṃ haripārthivena
GE09ram_06_u:6778: 6.085.001a hanyamāne bale tūrṇam anyonyaṃ te mahāmṛdhe
GE09ram_06_u:6782: 6.085.003a prakṣīṇaṃ tu balaṃ dṛṣṭvā vadhyamānaṃ valīmukhaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6785: 6.085.004c asmin kāle mahābāho jayāśā tvayi me sthitā
GE09ram_06_u:6788: 6.085.006a evam uktas tathety uktvā rākṣasendraṃ mahodaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6790: 6.085.007a tataḥ sa kadanaṃ cakre vānarāṇāṃ mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6794: 6.085.009a pragṛhya vipulāṃ ghorāṃ mahīdhara samāṃ śilām
GE09ram_06_u:6795: 6.085.009c cikṣepa ca mahātejās tad vadhāya harīśvaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6796: 6.085.010a tām āpatantīṃ sahasā śilāṃ dṛṣṭvā mahodaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6798: 6.085.011a rakṣasā tena bāṇaughair nikṛttā sā sahasradhā
GE09ram_06_u:6800: 6.085.012a tāṃ tu bhinnāṃ śilāṃ dṛṣṭvā sugrīvaḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6803: 6.085.013a sa dadarśa tataḥ kruddhaḥ parighaṃ patitaṃ bhuvi
GE09ram_06_u:6804: 6.085.013c āvidhya tu sa taṃ dīptaṃ parighaṃ tasya darśayan
GE09ram_06_u:6811: 6.085.016c papāta sa gadodbhinnaḥ parighas tasya bhūtale
GE09ram_06_u:6814: 6.085.018a taṃ samudyamya cikṣepa so 'py anyāṃ vyākṣipad gadām
GE09ram_06_u:6818: 6.085.020a jaghnatus tau tadānyonyaṃ nedatuś ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6820: 6.085.021a utpetatus tatas tūrṇaṃ jaghnatuś ca parasparam
GE09ram_06_u:6824: 6.085.023a tathaiva ca mahākhaḍgaṃ carmaṇā patitaṃ saha
GE09ram_06_u:6828: 6.085.025a dakṣiṇaṃ maṇḍalaṃ cobhau tau tūrṇaṃ saṃparīyatuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6830: 6.085.026a sa tu śūro mahāvego vīryaślāghī mahodaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6831: 6.085.026c mahācarmaṇi taṃ khaḍgaṃ pātayām āsa durmatiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6835: 6.085.028c tad balaṃ rākṣasendrasya dṛṣṭvā tatra na tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_06_u:6836: 6.085.029a hatvā taṃ vānaraiḥ sārdhaṃ nanāda mudito hariḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6837: 6.085.029c cukrodha ca daśagrīvo babhau hṛṣṭaś ca rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6839: 6.086.001c aṅgadasya camūṃ bhīmāṃ kṣobhayām āsa sāyakaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6841: 6.086.002c pātayām āsa kāyebhyaḥ phalaṃ vṛntād ivānilaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6842: 6.086.003a keṣāṃ cid iṣubhir bāhūn skandhāṃś cicheda rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6847: 6.086.005c vegaṃ cakre mahābāhuḥ samudra iva parvaṇi
GE09ram_06_u:6850: 6.086.007a sa tu tena prahāreṇa mahāpārśvo vicetanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6851: 6.086.007c sasūtaḥ syandanāt tasmād visaṃjñaḥ prāpatad bhuvi
GE09ram_06_u:6854: 6.086.009a pragṛhya giriśṛṅgābhāṃ kruddhaḥ sa vipulāṃ śilām
GE09ram_06_u:6855: 6.086.009c aśvāñ jaghāna tarasā syandanaṃ ca babhañja tam
GE09ram_06_u:6857: 6.086.010c aṅgadaṃ bahubhir bāṇair bhūyas taṃ pratyavidhyata
GE09ram_06_u:6859: 6.086.011c ṛkṣarājaṃ gavākṣaṃ ca jaghāna bahubhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6860: 6.086.012a gavākṣaṃ jāmbavantaṃ ca sa dṛṣṭvā śarapīḍitau
GE09ram_06_u:6864: 6.086.014a dvābhyāṃ bhujābhyāṃ saṃgṛhya bhrāmayitvā ca vegavān
GE09ram_06_u:6866: 6.086.015a sa tu kṣipto balavatā parighas tasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6867: 6.086.015c dhanuś ca saśaraṃ hastāc chirastraṃ cāpy apātayat
GE09ram_06_u:6870: 6.086.017a sa tu kruddho mahāvego mahāpārśvo mahādyutiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6875: 6.086.019c aṅgado mokṣayām āsa saroṣaḥ sa paraśvadham
GE09ram_06_u:6876: 6.086.020a sa vīro vajrasaṃkāśam aṅgado muṣṭim ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6881: 6.086.022c paphāla hṛdayaṃ cāśu sa papāta hato bhuvi
GE09ram_06_u:6882: 6.086.023a tasmin nipatite bhūmau tat sainyaṃ saṃpracukṣubhe
GE09ram_06_u:6883: 6.086.023c abhavac ca mahān krodhaḥ samare rāvaṇasya tu
GE09ram_06_u:6885: 6.087.001c tasmiṃś ca nihate vīre virūpākṣe mahābale
GE09ram_06_u:6886: 6.087.002a āviveśa mahān krodho rāvaṇaṃ tu mahāmṛdhe
GE09ram_06_u:6887: 6.087.002c sūtaṃ saṃcodayām āsa vākyaṃ cedam uvāca ha
GE09ram_06_u:6891: 6.087.004c praśākhā yasya sugrīvo jāmbavān kumudo nalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6892: 6.087.005a sa diśo daśa ghoṣeṇa rathasyātiratho mahān
GE09ram_06_u:6897: 6.087.007c nirdadāha kapīn sarvāṃs te prapetuḥ samantataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6900: 6.087.009a sa dadarśa tato rāmaṃ tiṣṭhantam aparājitam
GE09ram_06_u:6901: 6.087.009c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā viṣṇunā vāsavaṃ yathā
GE09ram_06_u:6904: 6.087.011a vānarāṃś ca raṇe bhagnān āpatantaṃ ca rāvaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:6905: 6.087.011c samīkṣya rāghavo hṛṣṭo madhye jagrāha kārmukam
GE09ram_06_u:6906: 6.087.012a visphārayitum ārebhe tataḥ sa dhanur uttamam
GE09ram_06_u:6909: 6.087.013c sa babhūva yathā rāhuḥ samīpe śaśisūryayoḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6911: 6.087.014c śabdena rākṣasās tena petuś ca śataśas tadā
GE09ram_06_u:6912: 6.087.015a tam icchan prathamaṃ yoddhuṃ lakṣmaṇo niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6916: 6.087.017a ekam ekena bāṇena tribhis trīn daśabhir daśa
GE09ram_06_u:6919: 6.087.018c āsasāda tato rāmaṃ sthitaṃ śailam ivācalam
GE09ram_06_u:6924: 6.087.021a tāñ śaraughāṃs tato bhallais tīkṣṇaiś ciccheda rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6926: 6.087.022a rāghavo rāvaṇaṃ tūrṇaṃ rāvaṇo rāghavaṃ tathā
GE09ram_06_u:6928: 6.087.023a ceratuś ca ciraṃ citraṃ maṇḍalaṃ savyadakṣiṇam
GE09ram_06_u:6932: 6.087.025a saṃtataṃ vividhair bāṇair babhūva gaganaṃ tadā
GE09ram_06_u:6936: 6.087.027a śarāndhakāraṃ tau bhīmaṃ cakratuḥ paramaṃ tadā
GE09ram_06_u:6941: 6.087.029c ubhau cāstravidāṃ mukhyāv ubhau yuddhe viceratuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6942: 6.087.030a ubhau hi yena vrajatas tena tena śarormayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6943: 6.087.030c ūrmayo vāyunā viddhā jagmuḥ sāgarayor iva
GE09ram_06_u:6947: 6.087.032c śirasā dhārayan rāmo na vyathāṃ pratyapadyata
GE09ram_06_u:6948: 6.087.033a atha mantrān api japan raudram astram udīrayan
GE09ram_06_u:6950: 6.087.034a mumoca ca mahātejāś cāpam āyamya vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:6953: 6.087.035c avadhye rākṣasendrasya na vyathāṃ janayaṃs tadā
GE09ram_06_u:6954: 6.087.036a punar evātha taṃ rāmo rathasthaṃ rākṣasādhipam
GE09ram_06_u:6963: 6.087.040c pañcāsyāṃl lelihānāṃś ca sasarja niśitāñ śarān
GE09ram_06_u:6966: 6.087.042a etāṃś cānyāṃś ca māyābhiḥ sasarja niśitāñ śarān
GE09ram_06_u:6967: 6.087.042c rāmaṃ prati mahātejāḥ kruddhaḥ sarpa iva śvasan
GE09ram_06_u:6975: 6.087.046c vilayaṃ jagmur ākāśe jagmuś caiva sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6977: 6.087.047c hṛṣṭā nedus tataḥ sarve kapayaḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6979: 6.088.001c krodhaṃ ca dviguṇaṃ cakre krodhāc cāstram anantaram
GE09ram_06_u:6980: 6.088.002a mayena vihitaṃ raudram anyad astraṃ mahādyutiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6982: 6.088.003a tataḥ śūlāni niścerur gadāś ca musalāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:6985: 6.088.004c niṣpetur vividhās tīkṣṇā vātā iva yugakṣaye
GE09ram_06_u:6986: 6.088.005a tad astraṃ rāghavaḥ śrīmān uttamāstravidāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6990: 6.088.007a tataś cakrāṇi niṣpetur bhāsvarāṇi mahānti ca
GE09ram_06_u:6992: 6.088.008a tair āsīd gaganaṃ dīptaṃ saṃpatadbhir itas tataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6993: 6.088.008c patadbhiś ca diśo dīptaiś candrasūryagrahair iva
GE09ram_06_u:6994: 6.088.009a tāni ciccheda bāṇaughaiś cakrāṇi tu sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6996: 6.088.010a tad astraṃ tu hataṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:6997: 6.088.010c vivyādha daśabhir bāṇai rāmaṃ sarveṣu marmasu
GE09ram_06_u:7001: 6.088.012c rāghavas tu susaṃkruddho rāvaṇaṃ bahubhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7005: 6.088.014c dhvajaṃ manuṣyaśīrṣaṃ tu tasya ciccheda naikadhā
GE09ram_06_u:7008: 6.088.016a tasya bāṇaiś ca ciccheda dhanur gajakaropamam
GE09ram_06_u:7013: 6.088.018c krodham āhārayat tīvraṃ bhrātaraṃ prati rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7014: 6.088.019a tataḥ śaktiṃ mahāśaktir dīptāṃ dīptāśanīm iva
GE09ram_06_u:7016: 6.088.020a aprāptām eva tāṃ bāṇais tribhiś ciccheda lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7018: 6.088.021a sa papāta tridhā chinnā śaktiḥ kāñcanamālinī
GE09ram_06_u:7024: 6.088.024a etasminn antare vīro lakṣmaṇas taṃ vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:7026: 6.088.025a taṃ vimokṣayituṃ vīraś cāpam āyamya lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7030: 6.088.027a mokṣitaṃ bhrātaraṃ dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇena sa rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7032: 6.088.028a mokṣitas te balaślāghin yasmād evaṃ vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7034: 6.088.029a eṣā te hṛdayaṃ bhittvā śaktir lohitalakṣaṇā
GE09ram_06_u:7036: 6.088.030a ity evam uktvā tāṃ śaktim aṣṭaghaṇṭāṃ mahāsvanām
GE09ram_06_u:7039: 6.088.031c rāvaṇaḥ paramakruddhaś cikṣepa ca nanāda ca
GE09ram_06_u:7042: 6.088.033a tām anuvyāharac chaktim āpatantīṃ sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7043: 6.088.033c svastyas tu lakṣmaṇāyeti moghā bhava hatodyamā
GE09ram_06_u:7052: 6.088.038a na viṣādasya kālo 'yam iti saṃcintya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7053: 6.088.038c cakre sutumulaṃ yuddhaṃ rāvaṇasya vadhe dhṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7054: 6.088.039a sa dadarśa tato rāmaḥ śaktyā bhinnaṃ mahāhave
GE09ram_06_u:7056: 6.088.040a tām api prahitāṃ śaktiṃ rāvaṇena balīyasā
GE09ram_06_u:7057: 6.088.040c yatnatas te hariśreṣṭhā na śekur avamarditum
GE09ram_06_u:7060: 6.088.041c tāṃ karābhyāṃ parāmṛśya rāmaḥ śaktiṃ bhayāvahām
GE09ram_06_u:7061: 6.088.041e babhañja samare kruddho balavad vicakarṣa ca
GE09ram_06_u:7064: 6.088.043a acintayitvā tān bāṇān samāśliṣyā ca lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:7065: 6.088.043c abravīc ca hanūmantaṃ sugrīvaṃ caiva rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7070: 6.088.045a asmin muhūrte nacirāt satyaṃ pratiśṛṇomi vaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7071: 6.088.045c arāvaṇam arāmaṃ vā jagad drakṣyatha vānarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7073: 6.088.046c vaidehyāś ca parāmarśaṃ rakṣobhiś ca samāgamam
GE09ram_06_u:7074: 6.088.047a prāptaṃ duḥkhaṃ mahad ghoraṃ kleśaṃ ca nirayopamam
GE09ram_06_u:7075: 6.088.047c adya sarvam ahaṃ tyakṣye hatvā taṃ rāvaṇaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:7076: 6.088.048a yadarthaṃ vānaraṃ sainyaṃ samānītam idaṃ mayā
GE09ram_06_u:7077: 6.088.048c sugrīvaś ca kṛto rājye nihatvā vālinaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:7078: 6.088.049a yadarthaṃ sāgaraḥ krāntaḥ setur baddhaś ca sāgare
GE09ram_06_u:7079: 6.088.049c so 'yam adya raṇe pāpaś cakṣurviṣayam āgataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7084: 6.088.052a adya rāmasya rāmatvaṃ paśyantu mama saṃyuge
GE09ram_06_u:7086: 6.088.053a adya karma kariṣyāmi yal lokāḥ sacarācarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7090: 6.088.055a atha pradīptair nārācair musalaiś cāpi rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7091: 6.088.055c abhyavarṣat tadā rāmaṃ dhārābhir iva toyadaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7093: 6.088.056c śarāṇāṃ ca śarāṇāṃ ca babhūva tumulaḥ svanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7094: 6.088.057a te bhinnāś ca vikīrṇāś ca rāmarāvaṇayoḥ śarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7099: 6.088.059c bhayāt pradudrāva sametya rāvaṇo; yathānilenābhihato balāhakaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7100: 6.089.001a sa dattvā tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7101: 6.089.001c visṛjan eva bāṇaughān suṣeṇaṃ vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:7103: 6.089.002c sarpavad veṣṭate vīro mama śokam udīrayan
GE09ram_06_u:7104: 6.089.003a śoṇitārdram imaṃ vīraṃ prāṇair iṣṭataraṃ mama
GE09ram_06_u:7105: 6.089.003c paśyato mama kā śaktir yoddhuṃ paryākulātmanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7106: 6.089.004a ayaṃ sa samaraślāghī bhrātā me śubhalakṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7107: 6.089.004c yadi pañcatvam āpannaḥ prāṇair me kiṃ sukhena vā
GE09ram_06_u:7108: 6.089.005a lajjatīva hi me vīryaṃ bhraśyatīva karād dhanuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7110: 6.089.005e cintā me vardhate tīvrā mumūrṣā copajāyate
GE09ram_06_u:7113: 6.089.007a na hi yuddhena me kāryaṃ naiva prāṇair na sītayā
GE09ram_06_u:7115: 6.089.008a kiṃ me rājyena kiṃ prāṇair yuddhe kāryaṃ na vidyate
GE09ram_06_u:7117: 6.089.009a rāmam āśvāsayan vīraḥ suṣeṇo vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:7119: 6.089.010a na cāsya vikṛtaṃ vaktraṃ nāpi śyāmaṃ na niṣprabham
GE09ram_06_u:7120: 6.089.010c suprabhaṃ ca prasannaṃ ca mukham asyābhilakṣyate
GE09ram_06_u:7122: 6.089.011c evaṃ na vidyate rūpaṃ gatāsūnāṃ viśāṃ pate
GE09ram_06_u:7123: 6.089.011e māṃ viṣādaṃ kṛtvā vīra saprāṇo 'yam ariṃdama
GE09ram_06_u:7125: 6.089.012c socchvāsaṃ hṛdayaṃ vīra kampamānaṃ muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7126: 6.089.013a evam uktvā tu vākyajñaḥ suṣeṇo rāghavaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7128: 6.089.014a saumya śīghram ito gatvā śailam oṣadhiparvatam
GE09ram_06_u:7129: 6.089.014c pūrvaṃ hi kathito yo 'sau vīra jāmbavatā śubhaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7130: 6.089.015a dakṣiṇe śikhare tasya jātām oṣadhim ānaya
GE09ram_06_u:7135: 6.089.017a ity evam ukto hanumān gatvā cauṣadhiparvatam
GE09ram_06_u:7136: 6.089.017c cintām abhyagamac chrīmān ajānaṃs tā mahauṣadhīḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7138: 6.089.018c idam eva gamiṣyāmi gṛhītvā śikharaṃ gireḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7140: 6.089.019c kālātyayena doṣaḥ syād vaiklavyaṃ ca mahad bhavet
GE09ram_06_u:7141: 6.089.020a iti saṃcintya hanumān gatvā kṣipraṃ mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7142: 6.089.020c utpapāta gṛhītvā tu hanūmāñ śikharaṃ gireḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7144: 6.089.021c tad idaṃ śikharaṃ kṛtsnaṃ gires tasyāhṛtaṃ mayā
GE09ram_06_u:7151: 6.089.025a samutthitaṃ te harayo bhūtalāt prekṣya lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:7152: 6.089.025c sādhu sādhv iti suprītāḥ suṣeṇaṃ pratyapūjayan
GE09ram_06_u:7153: 6.089.026a ehy ehīty abravīd rāmo lakṣmaṇaṃ paravīrahā
GE09ram_06_u:7155: 6.089.027a abravīc ca pariṣvajya saumitriṃ rāghavas tadā
GE09ram_06_u:7156: 6.089.027c diṣṭyā tvāṃ vīra paśyāmi maraṇāt punar āgatam
GE09ram_06_u:7157: 6.089.028a na hi me jīvitenārthaḥ sītayā ca jayena vā
GE09ram_06_u:7158: 6.089.028c ko hi me jīvitenārthas tvayi pañcatvam āgate
GE09ram_06_u:7159: 6.089.029a ity evaṃ vadatas tasya rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7160: 6.089.029c khinnaḥ śithilayā vācā lakṣmaṇo vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:7162: 6.089.030c laghuḥ kaś cid ivāsattvo naivaṃ vaktum ihārhasi
GE09ram_06_u:7163: 6.089.031a na pratijñāṃ hi kurvanti vitathāṃ sādhavo 'nagha
GE09ram_06_u:7164: 6.089.031c lakṣmaṇaṃ hi mahat tv asya pratijñāparipālanam
GE09ram_06_u:7165: 6.089.032a nairāśyam upagantuṃ te tad alaṃ matkṛte 'nagha
GE09ram_06_u:7167: 6.089.033a na jīvan yāsyate śatrus tava bāṇapathaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7169: 6.089.034a ahaṃ tu vadham icchāmi śīghram asya durātmanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7170: 6.089.034c yāvad astaṃ na yāty eṣa kṛtakarmā divākaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7171: 6.090.001a lakṣmaṇena tu tad vākyam uktaṃ śrutvā sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7173: 6.090.002a daśagrīvo rathasthas tu rāmaṃ vajropamaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7178: 6.090.004c na samaṃ yuddham ity āhur devagandharvadānavāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7185: 6.090.008a abravīc ca tadā rāmaṃ sapratodo rathe sthitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7190: 6.090.010c śarāś cādityasaṃkāśāḥ śaktiś ca vimalā śitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7191: 6.090.011a āruhyemaṃ rathaṃ vīra rākṣasaṃ jahi rāvaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:7192: 6.090.011c mayā sārathinā rāma mahendra iva dānavān
GE09ram_06_u:7193: 6.090.012a ity uktaḥ sa parikramya rathaṃ tam abhivādya ca
GE09ram_06_u:7194: 6.090.012c āruroha tadā rāmo lokāṃl lakṣmyā virājayan
GE09ram_06_u:7196: 6.090.013c rāmasya ca mahābāho rāvaṇasya ca rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7197: 6.090.014a sa gāndharveṇa gāndharvaṃ daivaṃ daivena rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7199: 6.090.015a astraṃ tu paramaṃ ghoraṃ rākṣasaṃ rākasādhipa
GE09ram_06_u:7203: 6.090.017a te dīptavadanā dīptaṃ vamanto jvalanaṃ mukhaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7206: 6.090.018c diśaś ca saṃtatāḥ sarvāḥ pradiśaś ca samāvṛtāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7207: 6.090.019a tān dṛṣṭvā pannagān rāmaḥ samāpatata āhave
GE09ram_06_u:7211: 6.090.021a te tān sarvāñ śarāñ jaghnuḥ sarparūpān mahājavān
GE09ram_06_u:7217: 6.090.024a pātayitvā rathopasthe rathāt ketuṃ ca kāñcanam
GE09ram_06_u:7220: 6.090.025c rāmam ārtaṃ tadā dṛṣṭvā siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7223: 6.090.027a prājāpatyaṃ ca nakṣatraṃ rohiṇīṃ śaśinaḥ priyām
GE09ram_06_u:7226: 6.090.028c utpapāta tadā kruddhaḥ spṛśann iva divākaram
GE09ram_06_u:7235: 6.090.033a sa kṛtvā bhrukuṭīṃ kruddhaḥ kiṃ cit saṃraktalocanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7237: 6.091.001a tasya kruddhasya vadanaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7240: 6.091.002c babhūva cāpi kṣubhitaḥ samudraḥ saritāṃ patiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7243: 6.091.004a rāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā susaṃkruddham utpātāṃś ca sudāruṇān
GE09ram_06_u:7245: 6.091.005a vimānasthās tadā devā gandharvāś ca mahoragāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7249: 6.091.007a ūcuḥ surāsurāḥ sarve tadā vigraham āgatāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7252: 6.091.008c devā rāmam athocus te tvaṃ jayeti punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7253: 6.091.009a etasminn antare krodhād rāghavasya sa rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7260: 6.091.012c pradīpta iva roṣeṇa śūlaṃ jagrāha rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7261: 6.091.013a tac chūlaṃ paramakruddho madhye jagrāha vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:7265: 6.091.015a pṛthivīṃ cāntarikṣaṃ ca diśaś ca pradiśas tathā
GE09ram_06_u:7269: 6.091.017a sa gṛhītvā mahāvīryaḥ śūlaṃ tad rāvaṇo mahat
GE09ram_06_u:7271: 6.091.018a śūlo 'yaṃ vajrasāras te rāma roṣān mayodyataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7274: 6.091.019c tvāṃ nihatya raṇaślāghin karomi tarasā samam
GE09ram_06_u:7275: 6.091.020a tiṣṭhedānīṃ nihanmi tvām eṣa śūlena rāghava
GE09ram_06_u:7276: 6.091.020c evam uktvā sa cikṣepa tac chūlaṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7287: 6.091.026a sā kṣiptā rākṣasendrasya tasmiñ śūle papāta ha
GE09ram_06_u:7288: 6.091.026c bhinnaḥ śaktyā mahāñ śūlo nipapāta gatadyutiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7289: 6.091.027a nirbibheda tato bāṇair hayān asya mahājavān
GE09ram_06_u:7290: 6.091.027c rāmas tīkṣṇair mahāvegair vajrakalpaiḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7296: 6.091.030c jagāma khedaṃ ca samājamadhye; krodhaṃ ca cakre subhṛśaṃ tadānīm
GE09ram_06_u:7297: 6.092.001a sa tu tena tadā krodhāt kākutsthenārdito raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:7299: 6.092.002a sa dīptanayano roṣāc cāpam āyamya vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:7301: 6.092.003a bāṇadhārā sahasrais tu sa toyada ivāmbarāt
GE09ram_06_u:7302: 6.092.003c rāghavaṃ rāvaṇo bāṇais taṭākam iva pūrayat
GE09ram_06_u:7305: 6.092.005a sa śaraiḥ śarajālāni vārayan samare sthitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7316: 6.092.010c uvāca rāvaṇaṃ vīraḥ prahasya paruṣaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7318: 6.092.011c hṛtā te vivaśā yasmāt tasmāt tvaṃ nāsi vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:7320: 6.092.012c vaidehīṃ prasabhaṃ hṛtvā śūro 'ham iti manyase
GE09ram_06_u:7322: 6.092.013c kṛtvā kāpuruṣaṃ karma śūro 'ham iti manyase
GE09ram_06_u:7324: 6.092.014c darpān mṛtyum upādāya śūro 'ham iti manyase
GE09ram_06_u:7326: 6.092.015c ślāghanīyaṃ yaśasyaṃ ca kṛtaṃ karma mahat tvayā
GE09ram_06_u:7330: 6.092.017c naiva lajjāsti te sītāṃ coravad vyapakarṣataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7331: 6.092.018a yadi matsaṃnidhau sītā dharṣitā syāt tvayā balāt
GE09ram_06_u:7332: 6.092.018c bhrātaraṃ tu kharaṃ paśyes tadā matsāyakair hataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7334: 6.092.019c adya tvāṃ sāyakais tīkṣṇair nayāmi yamasādanam
GE09ram_06_u:7335: 6.092.020a adya te maccharaiś chinnaṃ śiro jvalitakuṇḍalam
GE09ram_06_u:7337: 6.092.021a nipatyorasi gṛdhrās te kṣitau kṣiptasya rāvaṇa
GE09ram_06_u:7341: 6.092.023a ity evaṃ sa vadan vīro rāmaḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7343: 6.092.024a babhūva dviguṇaṃ vīryaṃ balaṃ harṣaś ca saṃyuge
GE09ram_06_u:7351: 6.092.028a yadā ca śastraṃ nārebhe na vyakarṣac charāsanam
GE09ram_06_u:7353: 6.092.029a kṣiptāś cāpi śarās tena śastrāṇi vividhāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:7355: 6.092.030a sūtas tu rathanetāsya tadavasthaṃ nirīkṣya tam
GE09ram_06_u:7360: 6.093.002c bhīruṃ laghum ivāsattvaṃ vihīnam iva tejasā
GE09ram_06_u:7361: 6.093.003a vimuktam iva māyābhir astrair iva bahiṣkṛtam
GE09ram_06_u:7362: 6.093.003c mām avajñāya durbuddhe svayā buddhyā viceṣṭase
GE09ram_06_u:7363: 6.093.004a kimarthaṃ mām avajñāya macchandam anavekṣya ca
GE09ram_06_u:7366: 6.093.005c yaśo vīryaṃ ca tejaś ca pratyayaś ca vināśitha
GE09ram_06_u:7369: 6.093.007a yas tvaṃ ratham imaṃ mohān na codvahasi durmate
GE09ram_06_u:7370: 6.093.007c satyo 'yaṃ pratitarko me pareṇa tvam upaskṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7371: 6.093.008a na hīdaṃ vidyate karma suhṛdo hitakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7372: 6.093.008c ripūṇāṃ sadṛśaṃ caitan na tvayaitat svanuṣṭhitam
GE09ram_06_u:7373: 6.093.009a nivartaya rathaṃ śīghraṃ yāvan nāpaiti me ripuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7374: 6.093.009c yadi vāpy uṣito 'si tvaṃ smaryante yadi vā guṇāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7375: 6.093.010a evaṃ paruṣam uktas tu hitabuddhir abuddhinā
GE09ram_06_u:7376: 6.093.010c abravīd rāvaṇaṃ sūto hitaṃ sānunayaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7377: 6.093.011a na bhīto 'smi na mūḍho 'smi nopajapto 'smi śatrubhiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7378: 6.093.011c na pramatto na niḥsneho vismṛtā na ca satkriyā
GE09ram_06_u:7379: 6.093.012a mayā tu hitakāmena yaśaś ca parirakṣatā
GE09ram_06_u:7381: 6.093.013a nāsminn arthe mahārāja tvaṃ māṃ priyahite ratam
GE09ram_06_u:7382: 6.093.013c kaś cil laghur ivānāryo doṣato gantum arhasi
GE09ram_06_u:7386: 6.093.015c na hi te vīra saumukhyaṃ praharṣaṃ vopadhāraye
GE09ram_06_u:7389: 6.093.017a nimittāni ca bhūyiṣṭhaṃ yāni prādurbhavanti naḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7392: 6.093.018c dainyaṃ harṣaś ca khedaś ca rathinaś ca balābalam
GE09ram_06_u:7393: 6.093.019a sthalanimnāni bhūmeś ca samāni viṣamāṇi ca
GE09ram_06_u:7398: 6.093.021c raudraṃ varjayatā khedaṃ kṣamaṃ kṛtam idaṃ mayā
GE09ram_06_u:7399: 6.093.022a na mayā svecchayā vīra ratho 'yam apavāhitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7402: 6.093.023c tat kariṣyāmy ahaṃ vīraṃ gatānṛṇyena cetasā
GE09ram_06_u:7403: 6.093.024a saṃtuṣṭas tena vākyena rāvaṇas tasya sāratheḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7405: 6.093.025a rathaṃ śīghram imaṃ sūta rāghavābhimukhaṃ kuru
GE09ram_06_u:7407: 6.093.026a evam uktvā tatas tuṣṭo rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7408: 6.093.026c dadau tasya śubhaṃ hy ekaṃ hastābharaṇam uttamam
GE09ram_06_u:7409: 6.093.027a tato drutaṃ rāvaṇavākyacoditaḥ; pracodayām āsa hayān sa sārathiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7410: 6.093.027c sa rākṣasendrasya tato mahārathaḥ; kṣaṇena rāmasya raṇāgrato 'bhavat
GE09ram_06_u:7416: 6.094.003a taṃ dṛṣṭvā meghasaṃkāśam āpatantaṃ rathaṃ ripoḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7419: 6.094.004a mātale paśya saṃrabdham āpatantaṃ rathaṃ ripoḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7421: 6.094.004e samare hantum ātmānaṃ tathānena kṛtā matiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7422: 6.094.005a tad apramādam ātiṣṭha pratyudgaccha rathaṃ ripoḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7427: 6.094.007c yuyutsur aham ekāgraḥ smāraye tvāṃ na śikṣaye
GE09ram_06_u:7428: 6.094.008a parituṣṭaḥ sa rāmasya tena vākyena mātaliḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7439: 6.094.013a tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7446: 6.094.016c yena yena ratho yāti tena tena pradhāvati
GE09ram_06_u:7451: 6.094.019a rāvaṇaś ca yatas tatra pracacāla vasuṃdharā
GE09ram_06_u:7452: 6.094.019c rakṣasāṃ ca praharatāṃ gṛhītā iva bāhavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7453: 6.094.020a tāmrāḥ pītāḥ sitāḥ śvetāḥ patitāḥ sūryaraśmayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7455: 6.094.021a gṛdhrair anugatāś cāsya vamantyo jvalanaṃ mukhaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7456: 6.094.021c praṇedur mukham īkṣantyaḥ saṃrabdham aśivaṃ śivāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7457: 6.094.022a pratikūlaṃ vavau vāyū raṇe pāṃsūn samutkiran
GE09ram_06_u:7461: 6.094.024a diśaś ca pradiśaḥ sarvā babhūvus timirāvṛtāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7463: 6.094.025a kurvantyaḥ kalahaṃ ghoraṃ sārikās tadrathaṃ prati
GE09ram_06_u:7466: 6.094.026c mumucus tasya turagās tulyam agniṃ ca vāri ca
GE09ram_06_u:7469: 6.094.028a rāmasyāpi nimittāni saumyāni ca śivāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:7471: 6.094.029a tato nirīkṣyātmagatāni rāghavo; raṇe nimittāni nimittakovidaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7472: 6.094.029c jagāma harṣaṃ ca parāṃ ca nirvṛtiṃ; cakāra yuddhe 'bhyadhikaṃ ca vikramam
GE09ram_06_u:7475: 6.095.002a tato rākṣasasainyaṃ ca harīṇāṃ ca mahad balam
GE09ram_06_u:7480: 6.095.004c tasthuḥ prekṣya ca saṃgrāmaṃ nābhijaghnuḥ parasparam
GE09ram_06_u:7481: 6.095.005a rakṣasāṃ rāvaṇaṃ cāpi vānarāṇāṃ ca rāghavam
GE09ram_06_u:7483: 6.095.006a tau tu tatra nimittāni dṛṣṭvā rāghavarāvaṇau
GE09ram_06_u:7485: 6.095.007a jetavyam iti kākutstho martavyam iti rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7487: 6.095.008a tataḥ krodhād daśagrīvaḥ śarān saṃdhāya vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:7488: 6.095.008c mumoca dhvajam uddiśya rāghavasya rathe sthitam
GE09ram_06_u:7495: 6.095.012a jagāma sa mahīṃ bhittvā daśagrīvadhvajaṃ śaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7499: 6.095.014a sa roṣavaśam āpannaḥ śaravarṣaṃ mahad vaman
GE09ram_06_u:7500: 6.095.014c rāmasya turagān divyāñ śarair vivyādha rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7501: 6.095.015a te viddhā harayas tasya nāskhalan nāpi babhramuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7503: 6.095.016a teṣām asaṃbhramaṃ dṛṣṭvā vājināṃ rāvaṇas tadā
GE09ram_06_u:7504: 6.095.016c bhūya eva susaṃkruddhaḥ śaravarṣaṃ mumoca ha
GE09ram_06_u:7505: 6.095.017a gadāś ca parighāṃś caiva cakrāṇi musalāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:7507: 6.095.018a māyā vihitam etat tu śastravarṣam apātayat
GE09ram_06_u:7514: 6.095.021a vyāyacchamānaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā tatparaṃ rāvaṇaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:7515: 6.095.021c prahasann iva kākutsthaḥ saṃdadhe sāyakāñ śitān
GE09ram_06_u:7516: 6.095.022a sa mumoca tato bāṇān raṇe śatasahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7517: 6.095.022c tān dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇaś cakre svaśaraiḥ khaṃ nirantaram
GE09ram_06_u:7523: 6.095.025c cakratus tau śaraughais tu nirucchvāsam ivāmbaram
GE09ram_06_u:7524: 6.095.026a rāvaṇasya hayān rāmo hayān rāmasya rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7526: 6.096.001a tau tathā yudhyamānau tu samare rāmarāvaṇau
GE09ram_06_u:7528: 6.096.002a ardayantau tu samare tayos tau syandanottamau
GE09ram_06_u:7530: 6.096.003a maṇḍalāni ca vīthīś ca gatapratyāgatāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:7532: 6.096.004a ardayan rāvaṇaṃ rāmo rāghavaṃ cāpi rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7536: 6.096.006a darśayitvā tadā tau tu gatiṃ bahuvidhāṃ raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:7538: 6.096.007a dhuraṃ dhureṇa rathayor vaktraṃ vaktreṇa vājinām
GE09ram_06_u:7539: 6.096.007c patākāś ca patākābhiḥ sameyuḥ sthitayos tadā
GE09ram_06_u:7540: 6.096.008a rāvaṇasya tato rāmo dhanurmuktaiḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7545: 6.096.010c jagāma na vikāraṃ ca na cāpi vyathito 'bhavat
GE09ram_06_u:7548: 6.096.012a mātales tu mahāvegāḥ śarīre patitāḥ śarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7549: 6.096.012c na sūkṣmam api saṃmohaṃ vyathāṃ vā pradadur yudhi
GE09ram_06_u:7550: 6.096.013a tayā dharṣaṇayā kroddho mātaler na tathātmanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7553: 6.096.014c mumoca rāghavo vīraḥ sāyakān syandane ripoḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7554: 6.096.015a gadānāṃ musalānāṃ ca parighāṇāṃ ca nisvanaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7557: 6.096.016c vyathitāḥ pannagāḥ sarve dānavāś ca sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7559: 6.096.017c bhāskaro niṣprabhaś cābhūn na vavau cāpi mārutaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7560: 6.096.018a tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7567: 6.096.021a tac chiraḥ patitaṃ bhūmau dṛṣṭaṃ lokais tribhis tadā
GE09ram_06_u:7571: 6.096.023a chinnamātraṃ ca tac chīrṣaṃ punar anyat sma dṛśyate
GE09ram_06_u:7572: 6.096.023c tad apy aśanisaṃkāśaiś chinnaṃ rāmeṇa sāyakaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7573: 6.096.024a evam eva śataṃ chinnaṃ śirasāṃ tulyavarcasām
GE09ram_06_u:7576: 6.096.025c mārgaṇair bahubhir yuktaś cintayām āsa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7577: 6.096.026a mārīco nihato yais tu kharo yais tu sudūṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7578: 6.096.026c krañcāraṇye virādhas tu kabandho daṇḍakā vane
GE09ram_06_u:7579: 6.096.027a ta ime sāyakāḥ sarve yuddhe pratyayikā mama
GE09ram_06_u:7580: 6.096.027c kiṃ nu tat kāraṇaṃ yena rāvaṇe mandatejasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7581: 6.096.028a iti cintāparaś cāsīd apramattaś ca saṃyuge
GE09ram_06_u:7586: 6.096.030c paśyatāṃ tan mahad yuddhaṃ sarvarātram avartata
GE09ram_06_u:7587: 6.096.031a naiva ratriṃ na divasaṃ na muhūrtaṃ na cakṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:7589: 6.097.001a atha saṃsmārayām āsa rāghavaṃ mātalis tadā
GE09ram_06_u:7590: 6.097.001c ajānann iva kiṃ vīra tvam enam anuvartase
GE09ram_06_u:7591: 6.097.002a visṛjāsmai vadhāya tvam astraṃ paitāmahaṃ prabho
GE09ram_06_u:7592: 6.097.002c vināśakālaḥ kathito yaḥ suraiḥ so 'dya vartate
GE09ram_06_u:7593: 6.097.003a tataḥ saṃsmārito rāmas tena vākyena mātaleḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7594: 6.097.003c jagrāha sa śaraṃ dīptaṃ niśvasantam ivoragam
GE09ram_06_u:7595: 6.097.004a yam asmai prathamaṃ prādād agastyo bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7596: 6.097.004c brahmadattaṃ mahad bāṇam amoghaṃ yudhi vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:7603: 6.097.008a sadhūmam iva kālāgniṃ dīptam āśīviṣaṃ yathā
GE09ram_06_u:7605: 6.097.009a dvārāṇāṃ parighāṇāṃ ca girīṇām api bhedanam
GE09ram_06_u:7615: 6.097.014a abhimantrya tato rāmas taṃ maheṣuṃ mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7617: 6.097.015a sa rāvaṇāya saṃkruddho bhṛśam āyamya kārmukam
GE09ram_06_u:7618: 6.097.015c cikṣepa param āyattas taṃ śaraṃ marmaghātinam
GE09ram_06_u:7627: 6.097.020a tasya hastād dhatasyāśu kārmukaṃ tat sasāyakam
GE09ram_06_u:7630: 6.097.021c papāta syandanād bhūmau vṛtro vajrahato yathā
GE09ram_06_u:7631: 6.097.022a taṃ dṛṣṭvā patitaṃ bhūmau hataśeṣā niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7635: 6.097.024a arditā vānarair hṛṣṭair laṅkām abhyapatan bhayāt
GE09ram_06_u:7638: 6.097.025c vadanto rāghavajayaṃ rāvaṇasya ca taṃ vadham
GE09ram_06_u:7643: 6.097.028a rāghavas tava saṃyuktā gagane ca viśuśruve
GE09ram_06_u:7644: 6.097.028c sādhu sādhv iti vāg agryā devatānāṃ mahātmanām
GE09ram_06_u:7645: 6.097.029a āviveśa mahān harṣo devānāṃ cāraṇaiḥ saha
GE09ram_06_u:7647: 6.097.030a tataḥ sakāmaṃ sugrīvam aṅgadaṃ ca mahābalam
GE09ram_06_u:7649: 6.097.031a tataḥ prajagmuḥ praśamaṃ marudgaṇā; diśaḥ prasedur vimalaṃ nabho 'bhavat
GE09ram_06_u:7650: 6.097.031c mahī cakampe na ca mārutā vavuḥ; sthiraprabhaś cāpy abhavad divākaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7651: 6.097.032a tatas tu sugrīvavibhīṣaṇādayaḥ; suhṛdviśeṣāḥ sahalakṣmaṇās tadā
GE09ram_06_u:7652: 6.097.032c sametya hṛṣṭā vijayena rāghavaṃ; raṇe 'bhirāmaṃ vidhinābhyapūjayan
GE09ram_06_u:7653: 6.097.033a sa tu nihataripuḥ sthirapratijñaḥ; svajanabalābhivṛto raṇe rarāja
GE09ram_06_u:7661: 6.098.004a āryaputreti vādinyo hā nātheti ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7667: 6.098.007a tāḥ patiṃ sahasā dṛṣṭvā śayānaṃ raṇapāṃsuṣu
GE09ram_06_u:7668: 6.098.007c nipetus tasya gātreṣu chinnā vanalatā iva
GE09ram_06_u:7669: 6.098.008a bahumānāt pariṣvajya kā cid enaṃ ruroda ha
GE09ram_06_u:7670: 6.098.008c caraṇau kā cid āliṅgya kā cit kaṇṭhe 'valambya ca
GE09ram_06_u:7671: 6.098.009a uddhṛtya ca bhujau kā cid bhūmau sma parivartate
GE09ram_06_u:7672: 6.098.009c hatasya vadanaṃ dṛṣṭvā kā cin moham upāgamat
GE09ram_06_u:7673: 6.098.010a kā cid aṅke śiraḥ kṛtvā ruroda mukham īkṣatī
GE09ram_06_u:7674: 6.098.010c snāpayantī mukhaṃ bāṣpais tuṣārair iva paṅkajam
GE09ram_06_u:7675: 6.098.011a evam ārtāḥ patiṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇaṃ nihataṃ bhuvi
GE09ram_06_u:7676: 6.098.011c cukruśur bahudhā śokād bhūyas tāḥ paryadevayan
GE09ram_06_u:7677: 6.098.012a yena vitrāsitaḥ śakro yena vitrāsito yamaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7679: 6.098.013a gandharvāṇām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca surāṇāṃ ca mahātmanām
GE09ram_06_u:7680: 6.098.013c bhayaṃ yena mahad dattaṃ so 'yaṃ śete raṇe hataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7681: 6.098.014a asurebhyaḥ surebhyo vā pannagebhyo 'pi vā tathā
GE09ram_06_u:7682: 6.098.014c na bhayaṃ yo vijānāti tasyedaṃ mānuṣād bhayam
GE09ram_06_u:7684: 6.098.015c hataḥ so 'yaṃ raṇe śete mānuṣeṇa padātinā
GE09ram_06_u:7685: 6.098.016a yo na śakyaḥ surair hantuṃ na yakṣair nāsurais tathā
GE09ram_06_u:7686: 6.098.016c so 'yaṃ kaś cid ivāsattvo mṛtyuṃ martyena lambhitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7687: 6.098.017a evaṃ vadantyo bahudhā rurudus tasya tāḥ striyaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7688: 6.098.017c bhūya eva ca duḥkhārtā vilepuś ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7690: 6.098.018c etāḥ samam idānīṃ te vayam ātmā ca pātitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7691: 6.098.019a bruvāṇo 'pi hitaṃ vākyam iṣṭo bhrātā vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7693: 6.098.020a yadi niryātitā te syāt sītā rāmāya maithilī
GE09ram_06_u:7694: 6.098.020c na naḥ syād vyasanaṃ ghoram idaṃ mūlaharaṃ mahat
GE09ram_06_u:7695: 6.098.021a vṛttakāmo bhaved bhrātā rāmo mitrakulaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_06_u:7696: 6.098.021c vayaṃ cāvidhavāḥ sarvāḥ sakāmā na ca śatravaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7697: 6.098.022a tvayā punar nṛśaṃsena sītāṃ saṃrundhatā balāt
GE09ram_06_u:7698: 6.098.022c rākṣasā vayam ātmā ca trayaṃ tulaṃ nipātitam
GE09ram_06_u:7699: 6.098.023a na kāmakāraḥ kāmaṃ vā tava rākṣasapuṃgava
GE09ram_06_u:7700: 6.098.023c daivaṃ ceṣṭayate sarvaṃ hataṃ daivena hanyate
GE09ram_06_u:7701: 6.098.024a vānarāṇāṃ vināśo 'yaṃ rākṣasānāṃ ca te raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:7703: 6.098.025a naivārthena na kāmena vikrameṇa na cājñayā
GE09ram_06_u:7708: 6.099.001c jyeṣṭhā patnī priyā dīnā bhartāraṃ samudaikṣata
GE09ram_06_u:7712: 6.099.003c kruddhasya pramukhe sthātuṃ trasyaty api puraṃdaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7713: 6.099.004a ṛṣayaś ca mahīdevā gandharvāś ca yaśasvinaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7714: 6.099.004c nanu nāma tavodvegāc cāraṇāś ca diśo gatāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7715: 6.099.005a sa tvaṃ mānuṣamātreṇa rāmeṇa yudhi nirjitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7716: 6.099.005c na vyapatrapase rājan kim idaṃ rākṣasarṣabha
GE09ram_06_u:7717: 6.099.006a kathaṃ trailokyam ākramya śriyā vīryeṇa cānvitam
GE09ram_06_u:7721: 6.099.008a na caitat karma rāmasya śraddadhāmi camūmukhe
GE09ram_06_u:7723: 6.099.009a indriyāṇi purā jitvā jitaṃ tribhuvaṇaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_06_u:7724: 6.099.009c smaradbhir iva tad vairam indriyair eva nirjitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7725: 6.099.010a atha vā rāmarūpeṇa vāsavaḥ svayam āgataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7727: 6.099.011a yadaiva hi janasthāne rākṣasair bahubhir vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7728: 6.099.011c kharas tava hato bhrātā tadaivāsau na mānuṣaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7729: 6.099.012a yadaiva nagarīṃ laṅkāṃ duṣpraveṣāṃ surair api
GE09ram_06_u:7730: 6.099.012c praviṣṭo hanumān vīryāt tadaiva vyathitā vayam
GE09ram_06_u:7731: 6.099.013a kriyatām avirodhaś ca rāghaveṇeti yan mayā
GE09ram_06_u:7732: 6.099.013c ucyamāno na gṛhṇāsi tasyeyaṃ vyuṣṭir āgatā
GE09ram_06_u:7735: 6.099.015a arundhatyā viśiṣṭāṃ tāṃ rohiṇyāś cāpi durmate
GE09ram_06_u:7736: 6.099.015c sītāṃ dharṣayatā mānyāṃ tvayā hy asadṛśaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_06_u:7737: 6.099.016a na kulena na rūpeṇa na dākṣiṇyena maithilī
GE09ram_06_u:7738: 6.099.016c mayādhikā vā tulyā vā tvaṃ tu mohān na budhyase
GE09ram_06_u:7742: 6.099.018c alpapuṇyā tv ahaṃ ghore patitā śokasāgare
GE09ram_06_u:7743: 6.099.019a kailāse mandare merau tathā caitrarathe vane
GE09ram_06_u:7746: 6.099.020c paśyantī vividhān deśāṃs tāṃs tāṃś citrasragambarā
GE09ram_06_u:7748: 6.099.021a satyavāk sa mahābhāgo devaro me yad abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:7751: 6.099.022c tvayā kṛtam idaṃ sarvam anāthaṃ rakṣasāṃ kulam
GE09ram_06_u:7752: 6.099.023a na hi tvaṃ śocitavyo me prakhyātabalapauruṣaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7753: 6.099.023c strīsvabhāvāt tu me buddhiḥ kāruṇye parivartate
GE09ram_06_u:7754: 6.099.024a sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ ca tvaṃ gṛhītvā svāṃ gatiṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7758: 6.099.025e prasupta iva śokārtāṃ kiṃ māṃ na pratibhāṣase
GE09ram_06_u:7760: 6.099.026c yātudhānasya dauhitrīṃ kiṃ tvaṃ māṃ nābhyudīkṣase
GE09ram_06_u:7764: 6.099.028c parigho vyavakīrṇas te bāṇaiś chinnaḥ sahasradhā
GE09ram_06_u:7765: 6.099.029a dhig astu hṛdayaṃ yasyā mamedaṃ na sahasradhā
GE09ram_06_u:7767: 6.099.030a etasminn antare rāmo vibhīṣaṇam uvāca ha
GE09ram_06_u:7768: 6.099.030c saṃskāraḥ kriyatāṃ bhrātuḥ striyaś caitā nivartaya
GE09ram_06_u:7769: 6.099.031a taṃ praśritas tato rāmaṃ śrutavākyo vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7774: 6.099.033a bhrātṛrūpo hi me śatrur eṣa sarvāhite rataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7776: 6.099.034a nṛśaṃsa iti māṃ rāma vakṣyanti manujā bhuvi
GE09ram_06_u:7777: 6.099.034c śrutvā tasya guṇān sarve vakṣyanti sukṛtaṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7778: 6.099.035a tac chrutvā paramaprīto rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7780: 6.099.036a tavāpi me priyaṃ kāryaṃ tvatprabhavāc ca me jitam
GE09ram_06_u:7781: 6.099.036c avaśyaṃ tu kṣamaṃ vācyo mayā tvaṃ rākṣaseśvara
GE09ram_06_u:7783: 6.099.037c tejasvī balavāñ śūraḥ saṃgrāmeṣu ca nityaśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7787: 6.099.039c kriyatām asya saṃskāro mamāpy eṣa yathā tava
GE09ram_06_u:7789: 6.099.040c kṣipram arhati dharmajña tvaṃ yaśobhāg bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_06_u:7792: 6.099.042a sa dadau pāvakaṃ tasya vidhiyuktaṃ vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7793: 6.099.042c tāḥ striyo 'nunayām āsa sāntvam uktvā punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7797: 6.099.044c harṣaṃ lebhe ripuṃ hatvā yathā vṛtraṃ śatakratuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7799: 6.100.001c jagmus tais tair vimānaiḥ svaiḥ kathayantaḥ śubhāḥ kathāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7801: 6.100.002c suyuddhaṃ vānarāṇāṃ ca sugrīvasay ca mantritam
GE09ram_06_u:7802: 6.100.003a anurāgaṃ ca vīryaṃ ca saumitrer lakṣmaṇasya ca
GE09ram_06_u:7804: 6.100.004a rāghavas tu rathaṃ divyam indradattaṃ śikhiprabham
GE09ram_06_u:7807: 6.100.005c divyaṃ taṃ ratham āsthāya divam evāruroha saḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7815: 6.100.009c anuraktaṃ ca bhaktaṃ ca mama caivopakāriṇam
GE09ram_06_u:7816: 6.100.010a eṣa me paramaḥ kāmo yad imaṃ rāvaṇānujam
GE09ram_06_u:7818: 6.100.011a evam uktas tu saumitrī rāghaveṇa mahātmanā
GE09ram_06_u:7819: 6.100.011c tathety uktvā tu saṃhṛṣṭaḥ sauvarṇaṃ ghaṭam ādade
GE09ram_06_u:7823: 6.100.013c tasyāmātyā jahṛṣire bhaktā ye cāsya rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7826: 6.100.015a sa tad rājyaṃ mahat prāpya rāmadattaṃ vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7827: 6.100.015c prakṛtīḥ sāntvayitvā ca tato rāmam upāgamat
GE09ram_06_u:7828: 6.100.016a akṣatān modakāṃl lājān divyāḥ sumanasas tathā
GE09ram_06_u:7829: 6.100.016c ājahrur atha saṃhṛṣṭāḥ paurās tasmai niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7830: 6.100.017a sa tān gṛhītvā durdharṣo rāghavāya nyavedayat
GE09ram_06_u:7831: 6.100.017c maṅgalyaṃ maṅgalaṃ sarvaṃ lakṣmaṇāya ca vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:7834: 6.100.019a tataḥ śailopamaṃ vīraṃ prāñjaliṃ pārśvataḥ sthitam
GE09ram_06_u:7839: 6.100.021c ācakṣva jayatāṃ śreṣṭha rāvaṇaṃ ca mayā hatam
GE09ram_06_u:7840: 6.100.022a priyam etad udāhṛtya maithilyās tvaṃ harīśvara
GE09ram_06_u:7845: 6.101.002c dadarśa śaśinā hīnāṃ sātaṅkām iva rohiṇīm
GE09ram_06_u:7851: 6.101.005c nihato rāvaṇo devi lakṣmaṇasya nayena ca
GE09ram_06_u:7852: 6.101.006a pṛṣṭvā ca kuśalaṃ rāmo vīras tvāṃ raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7854: 6.101.007a priyam ākhyāmi te devi tvāṃ tu bhayaḥ sabhājaye
GE09ram_06_u:7855: 6.101.007c diṣṭyā jīvasi dharmajñe jayena mama saṃyuge
GE09ram_06_u:7856: 6.101.008a labdho no vijayaḥ sīte svasthā bhava gatavyathā
GE09ram_06_u:7857: 6.101.008c rāvaṇaḥ sa hataḥ śatrur laṅkā ceyaṃ vaśe sthitā
GE09ram_06_u:7858: 6.101.009a mayā hy alabdhanidreṇa dhṛtena tava nirjaye
GE09ram_06_u:7860: 6.101.010a saṃbhramaś ca na kartavyo vartantyā rāvaṇālaye
GE09ram_06_u:7861: 6.101.010c vibhīṣaṇa vidheyaṃ hi laṅkaiśvaryam idaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_06_u:7865: 6.101.012c praharṣeṇāvaruddhā sā vyājahāra na kiṃ cana
GE09ram_06_u:7867: 6.101.013c kiṃ tvaṃ cintayase devi kiṃ ca māṃ nābhibhāṣase
GE09ram_06_u:7868: 6.101.014a evam uktā hanumatā sītā dharme vyavasthitā
GE09ram_06_u:7872: 6.101.016a na hi paśyāmi sadṛśaṃ cintayantī plavaṃgama
GE09ram_06_u:7874: 6.101.017a na ca paśyāmi tat saumya pṛthivyām api vānara
GE09ram_06_u:7875: 6.101.017c sadṛśaṃ matpriyākhyāne tava dātuṃ bhavet samam
GE09ram_06_u:7876: 6.101.018a hiraṇyaṃ vā suvarṇaṃ vā ratnāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:7877: 6.101.018c rājyaṃ vā triṣu lokeṣu naitad arhati bhāṣitum
GE09ram_06_u:7878: 6.101.019a evam uktas tu vaidehyā pratyuvāca plavaṃgamaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7881: 6.101.020c snigdham evaṃvidhaṃ vākyaṃ tvam evārhasi bhāṣitum
GE09ram_06_u:7882: 6.101.021a tavaitad vacanaṃ saumye sāravat snigdham eva ca
GE09ram_06_u:7884: 6.101.022a arthataś ca mayā prāptā devarājyādayo guṇāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7885: 6.101.022c hataśatruṃ vijayinaṃ rāmaṃ paśyāmi yat sthitam
GE09ram_06_u:7886: 6.101.023a imās tu khalu rākṣasyo yadi tvam anumanyase
GE09ram_06_u:7887: 6.101.023c hantum icchāmy ahaṃ sarvā yābhis tvaṃ tarjitā purā
GE09ram_06_u:7890: 6.101.025a rākṣasyo dāruṇakathā varam etaṃ prayaccha me
GE09ram_06_u:7891: 6.101.025c icchāmi vividhair ghātair hantum etāḥ sudāruṇāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7892: 6.101.026a muṣṭibhiḥ pāṇibhiś caiva caraṇaiś caiva śobhane
GE09ram_06_u:7893: 6.101.026c ghorair jānuprahāraiś ca daśanānāṃ ca pātanaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7895: 6.101.027c bhṛśaṃ śuṣkamukhībhiś ca dāruṇair laṅghanair hataiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7897: 6.101.028c hantum icchāmy ahaṃ devi tavemāḥ kṛtakilbiṣāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7901: 6.101.030c vidheyānāṃ ca dāsīnāṃ kaḥ kupyed vānarottama
GE09ram_06_u:7903: 6.101.031c mayaitet prāpyate sarvaṃ svakṛtaṃ hy upabhujyate
GE09ram_06_u:7904: 6.101.032a prāptavyaṃ tu daśā yogān mayaitad iti niścitam
GE09ram_06_u:7907: 6.101.033c hate tasmin na kuryur hi tarjanaṃ vānarottama
GE09ram_06_u:7909: 6.101.034c ṛkṣeṇa gītaḥ śloko me taṃ nibodha plavaṃgama
GE09ram_06_u:7910: 6.101.035a na paraḥ pāpam ādatte pareṣāṃ pāpakarmaṇām
GE09ram_06_u:7912: 6.101.036a pāpānāṃ vā śubhānāṃ vā vadhārhāṇāṃ plavaṃgama
GE09ram_06_u:7913: 6.101.036c kāryaṃ kāruṇyam āryeṇa na kaś cin nāparādhyati
GE09ram_06_u:7915: 6.101.037c kurvatām api pāpāni naiva kāryam aśobhanam
GE09ram_06_u:7916: 6.101.038a evam uktas tu hanumān sītayā vākyakovidaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7919: 6.101.039c pratisaṃdiśa māṃ devi gamiṣye yatra rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7926: 6.101.043a tām evam uktvā rājantīṃ sītāṃ sākṣād iva śriyam
GE09ram_06_u:7931: 6.102.002c tāṃ devīṃ śokasaṃtaptāṃ maithilīṃ draṣṭum arhasi
GE09ram_06_u:7933: 6.102.003c maithilī vijayaṃ śrutvā tava harṣam upāgamat
GE09ram_06_u:7934: 6.102.004a pūrvakāt pratyayāc cāham ukto viśvastayā tayā
GE09ram_06_u:7936: 6.102.005a evam ukto hanumatā rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7938: 6.102.006a dīrgham uṣṇaṃ ca niśvasya medinīm avalokayan
GE09ram_06_u:7942: 6.102.008a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa tvaramāṇo vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7945: 6.102.009c yānam āroha bhadraṃ te bhartā tvāṃ draṣṭum icchati
GE09ram_06_u:7946: 6.102.010a evam uktā tu vaidehī pratyuvāca vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:7949: 6.102.011c yathāhaṃ rāmo bhartā te tat tathā kartum arhasi
GE09ram_06_u:7957: 6.102.015c praṇataś ca prahṛṣṭaś ca prāptāṃ sītāṃ nyavedayat
GE09ram_06_u:7959: 6.102.016c harṣo dainyaṃ ca roṣaś ca trayaṃ rāghavam āviśat
GE09ram_06_u:7965: 6.102.019c tūrṇam utsāraṇe yatnaṃ kārayām āsa sarvataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7968: 6.102.021a ṛkṣāṇāṃ vānarāṇāṃ ca rākṣasānāṃ ca sarvataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7973: 6.102.023c dākṣiṇyāt tadamarṣāc ca vārayām āsa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7974: 6.102.024a saṃrabdhaś cābravīd rāmaś cakṣuṣā pradahann iva
GE09ram_06_u:7976: 6.102.025a kimarthaṃ mām anādṛtya kṛśyate 'yaṃ tvayā janaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7978: 6.102.026a na gṛhāṇi na vastrāṇi na prākārās tiraskriyāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7980: 6.102.027a vyasaneṣu na kṛcchreṣu na yuddhe na svayaṃ vare
GE09ram_06_u:7981: 6.102.027c na kratau no vivāhe ca darśanaṃ duṣyate striyaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7982: 6.102.028a saiṣā yuddhagatā caiva kṛcchre mahati ca sthitā
GE09ram_06_u:7983: 6.102.028c darśane 'syā na doṣaḥ syān matsamīpe viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7984: 6.102.029a tad ānaya samīpaṃ me śīghram enāṃ vibhīṣaṇa
GE09ram_06_u:7985: 6.102.029c sītā paśyatu mām eṣā suhṛdgaṇavṛtaṃ sthitam
GE09ram_06_u:7986: 6.102.030a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa savimarśo vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:7989: 6.102.031c niśamya vākyaṃ rāmasya babhūvur vyathitā bhṛśam
GE09ram_06_u:7991: 6.102.032c aprītam iva sītāyāṃ tarkayanti sma rāghavam
GE09ram_06_u:7992: 6.102.033a lajjayā tv avalīyantī sveṣu gātreṣu maithilī
GE09ram_06_u:7996: 6.102.035a vismayāc ca praharṣāc ca snehāc ca paridevatā
GE09ram_06_u:7998: 6.102.036a atha samapanudan manaḥklamaṃ sā; suciram adṛṣṭam udīkṣya vai priyasya
GE09ram_06_u:8000: 6.103.001a tāṃ tu pārśve sthitāṃ prahvāṃ rāmaḥ saṃprekṣya maithilīm
GE09ram_06_u:8002: 6.103.002a eṣāsi nirjitā bhadre śatruṃ jitvā mayā raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:8003: 6.103.002c pauruṣād yad anuṣṭheyaṃ tad etad upapāditam
GE09ram_06_u:8005: 6.103.003c avamānaś ca śatruś ca mayā yugapad uddhṛtau
GE09ram_06_u:8006: 6.103.004a adya me pauruṣaṃ dṛṣṭam adya me saphalaḥ śramaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8008: 6.103.005a yā tvaṃ virahitā nītā calacittena rakṣasā
GE09ram_06_u:8010: 6.103.006a saṃprāptam avamānaṃ yas tejasā na pramārjati
GE09ram_06_u:8013: 6.103.007c saphalaṃ tasya tac chlāghyam adya karma hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8014: 6.103.008a yuddhe vikramataś caiva hitaṃ mantrayataś ca me
GE09ram_06_u:8016: 6.103.009a nirguṇaṃ bhrātaraṃ tyaktvā yo māṃ svayam upasthitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8018: 6.103.010a ity evaṃ bruvatas tasya sītā rāmasya tadvacaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8020: 6.103.011a paśyatas tāṃ tu rāmasya bhūyaḥ krodho 'bhyavartata
GE09ram_06_u:8025: 6.103.013c tat kṛtaṃ sakalaṃ sīte śatruhastād amarṣaṇāt
GE09ram_06_u:8028: 6.103.015a viditaś cāstu bhadraṃ te yo 'yaṃ raṇapariśramaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8029: 6.103.015c sa tīrṇaḥ suhṛdāṃ vīryān na tvadarthaṃ mayā kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8030: 6.103.016a rakṣatā tu mayā vṛttam apavādaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8034: 6.103.018a tad gaccha hy abhyanujñātā yateṣṭaṃ janakātmaje
GE09ram_06_u:8035: 6.103.018c etā daśa diśo bhadre kāryam asti na me tvayā
GE09ram_06_u:8036: 6.103.019a kaḥ pumān hi kule jātaḥ striyaṃ paragṛhoṣitām
GE09ram_06_u:8039: 6.103.020c kathaṃ tvāṃ punarādadyāṃ kulaṃ vyapadiśan mahat
GE09ram_06_u:8040: 6.103.021a tadarthaṃ nirjitā me tvaṃ yaśaḥ pratyāhṛtaṃ mayā
GE09ram_06_u:8041: 6.103.021c nāsti me tvayy abhiṣvaṅgo yatheṣṭaṃ gamyatām itaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8043: 6.103.022c lakṣmaṇe bharate vā tvaṃ kuru buddhiṃ yathāsukham
GE09ram_06_u:8045: 6.103.023c niveśaya manaḥ śīte yathā vā sukham ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8046: 6.103.024a na hi tvāṃ rāvaṇo dṛṣṭvā divyarūpāṃ manoramām
GE09ram_06_u:8048: 6.103.025a tataḥ priyārhaśvaraṇā tad apriyaṃ; priyād upaśrutya cirasya maithilī
GE09ram_06_u:8049: 6.103.025c mumoca bāṣpaṃ subhṛśaṃ pravepitā; gajendrahastābhihateva vallarī
GE09ram_06_u:8050: 6.104.001a evam uktā tu vaidehī paruṣaṃ lomaharṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:8052: 6.104.002a sā tad aśrutapūrvaṃ hi jane mahati maithilī
GE09ram_06_u:8055: 6.104.003c vākśalyais taiḥ saśalyeva bhṛśam aśrūṇy avartayat
GE09ram_06_u:8057: 6.104.004c śanair gadgadayā vācā bhartāram idam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:8058: 6.104.005a kiṃ mām asadṛśaṃ vākyam īdṛśaṃ śrotradāruṇam
GE09ram_06_u:8059: 6.104.005c rūkṣaṃ śrāvayase vīra prākṛtaḥ prākṛtām iva
GE09ram_06_u:8060: 6.104.006a na tathāsmi mahābāho yathā tvam avagacchasi
GE09ram_06_u:8061: 6.104.006c pratyayaṃ gaccha me svena cāritreṇaiva te śape
GE09ram_06_u:8062: 6.104.007a pṛthak strīṇāṃ pracāreṇa jātiṃ tvaṃ pariśaṅkase
GE09ram_06_u:8063: 6.104.007c parityajemāṃ śaṅkāṃ tu yadi te 'haṃ parīkṣitā
GE09ram_06_u:8064: 6.104.008a yady ahaṃ gātrasaṃsparśaṃ gatāsmi vivaśā prabho
GE09ram_06_u:8065: 6.104.008c kāmakāro na me tatra daivaṃ tatrāparādhyati
GE09ram_06_u:8066: 6.104.009a madadhīnaṃ tu yat tan me hṛdayaṃ tvayi vartate
GE09ram_06_u:8069: 6.104.010c yady ahaṃ te na vijñātā hatā tenāsmi śāśvatam
GE09ram_06_u:8070: 6.104.011a preṣitas te yadā vīro hanūmān avalokakaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8071: 6.104.011c laṅkāsthāhaṃ tvayā vīra kiṃ tadā na visarjitā
GE09ram_06_u:8073: 6.104.012c tvayā saṃtyaktayā vīra tyaktaṃ syāj jīvitaṃ mayā
GE09ram_06_u:8074: 6.104.013a na vṛthā te śramo 'yaṃ syāt saṃśaye nyasya jīvitam
GE09ram_06_u:8079: 6.104.015c mama vṛttaṃ ca vṛttajña bahu te na puraskṛtam
GE09ram_06_u:8080: 6.104.016a na pramāṇīkṛtaḥ pāṇir bālye bālena pīḍitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8081: 6.104.016c mama bhaktiś ca śīlaṃ ca sarvaṃ te pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtam
GE09ram_06_u:8083: 6.104.017c abravīl lakṣmaṇaṃ sītā dīnaṃ dhyānaparaṃ sthitam
GE09ram_06_u:8084: 6.104.018a citāṃ me kuru saumitre vyasanasyāsya bheṣajam
GE09ram_06_u:8087: 6.104.019c yā kṣamā me gatir gantuṃ pravekṣye havyavāhanam
GE09ram_06_u:8088: 6.104.020a evam uktas tu vaidehyā lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā
GE09ram_06_u:8091: 6.104.021c citāṃ cakāra saumitrir mate rāmasya vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:8092: 6.104.022a adhomukhaṃ tato rāmaṃ śanaiḥ kṛtvā pradakṣiṇam
GE09ram_06_u:8094: 6.104.023a praṇamya devatābhyaś ca brāhmaṇebhyaś ca maithilī
GE09ram_06_u:8096: 6.104.024a yathā me hṛdayaṃ nityaṃ nāpasarpati rāghavāt
GE09ram_06_u:8097: 6.104.024c tathā lokasya sākṣī māṃ sarvataḥ pātu pāvakaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8098: 6.104.025a evam uktvā tu vaidehī parikramya hutāśanam
GE09ram_06_u:8102: 6.104.027a tasyām agniṃ viśantyāṃ tu hāheti vipulaḥ svanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8105: 6.105.001c sahasrākṣo mahendraś ca varuṇaś ca paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8107: 6.105.002c kartā sarvasya lokasya brahmā brahmavidāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8109: 6.105.003c āgamya nagarīṃ laṅkām abhijagmuś ca rāghavam
GE09ram_06_u:8112: 6.105.005a kartā sarvasya lokasya śreṣṭho jñānavatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8115: 6.105.006a ṛtadhāmā vasuḥ pūrvaṃ vasūnāṃ ca prajāpatiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8116: 6.105.006c tvaṃ trayāṇāṃ hi lokānām ādikartā svayaṃprabhuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8117: 6.105.007a rudrāṇām aṣṭamo rudraḥ sādhyānām api pañcamaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8118: 6.105.007c aśvinau cāpi te karṇau candrasūryau ca cakṣuṣī
GE09ram_06_u:8119: 6.105.008a ante cādau ca lokānāṃ dṛśyase tvaṃ paraṃtapa
GE09ram_06_u:8120: 6.105.008c upekṣase ca vaidehīṃ mānuṣaḥ prākṛto yathā
GE09ram_06_u:8121: 6.105.009a ity ukto lokapālais taiḥ svāmī lokasya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8124: 6.105.010c yo 'haṃ yasya yataś cāhaṃ bhagavāṃs tad bravītu me
GE09ram_06_u:8125: 6.105.011a iti bruvāṇaṃ kākutsthaṃ brahmā brahmavidāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8126: 6.105.011c abravīc chṛṇu me rāma satyaṃ satyaparākrama
GE09ram_06_u:8127: 6.105.012a bhavān nārāyaṇo devaḥ śrīmāṃś cakrāyudho vibhuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8129: 6.105.013a akṣaraṃ brahmasatyaṃ ca madhye cānte ca rāghava
GE09ram_06_u:8130: 6.105.013c lokānāṃ tvaṃ paro dharmo viṣvaksenaś caturbhujaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8132: 6.105.014c ajitaḥ khaḍgadhṛg viṣṇuḥ kṛṣṇaś caiva bṛhadbalaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8133: 6.105.015a senānīr grāmaṇīś ca tvaṃ buddhiḥ sattaṃ kṣamā damaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8134: 6.105.015c prabhavaś cāpyayaś ca tvam upendro madhusūdanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8136: 6.105.016c śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ ca tvām āhur divyā maharṣayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8138: 6.105.017c tvaṃ yajñas tvaṃ vaṣaṭkāras tvam oṃkāraḥ paraṃtapa
GE09ram_06_u:8139: 6.105.018a prabhavaṃ nidhanaṃ vā te na viduḥ ko bhavān iti
GE09ram_06_u:8140: 6.105.018c dṛśyase sarvabhūteṣu brāhmaṇeṣu ca goṣu ca
GE09ram_06_u:8141: 6.105.019a dikṣu sarvāsu gagane parvateṣu vaneṣu ca
GE09ram_06_u:8143: 6.105.020a tvaṃ dhārayasi bhūtāni vasudhāṃ ca saparvatām
GE09ram_06_u:8144: 6.105.020c ante pṛthivyāḥ salile dṛśyase tvaṃ mahoragaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8146: 6.105.021c ahaṃ te hṛdayaṃ rāma jihvā devī sarasvatī
GE09ram_06_u:8147: 6.105.022a devā gātreṣu lomāni nirmitā brahmaṇā prabho
GE09ram_06_u:8148: 6.105.022c nimeṣas te 'bhavad rātrir unmeṣas te 'bhavad divā
GE09ram_06_u:8149: 6.105.023a saṃskārās te 'bhavan vedā na tad asti tvayā vinā
GE09ram_06_u:8150: 6.105.023c jagat sarvaṃ śarīraṃ te sthairyamṃ te vasudhātalam
GE09ram_06_u:8151: 6.105.024a agniḥ kopaḥ prasādas te somaḥ śrīvatsalakṣaṇa
GE09ram_06_u:8152: 6.105.024c tvayā lokās trayaḥ krāntāḥ purāṇe vikramais tribhiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8153: 6.105.025a mahendraś ca kṛto rājā baliṃ baddhvā mahāsuram
GE09ram_06_u:8154: 6.105.025c sītā lakṣmīr bhavān viṣṇur devaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ prajāpatiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8156: 6.105.026c tad idaṃ naḥ kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ tvayā dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
GE09ram_06_u:8157: 6.105.027a nihato rāvaṇo rāma prahṛṣṭo divam ākrama
GE09ram_06_u:8158: 6.105.027c amoghaṃ balavīryaṃ te amoghas te parākramaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8159: 6.105.028a amoghās te bhaviṣyanti bhaktimantaś ca ye narāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8160: 6.105.028c ye tvāṃ devaṃ dhruvaṃ bhaktāḥ purāṇaṃ puruṣottamam
GE09ram_06_u:8161: 6.105.029a ye narāḥ kīrtayiṣyanti nāsti teṣāṃ parābhavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8167: 6.106.003c dadau rāmāya vaidehīm aṅke kṛtvā vibhāvasuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8168: 6.106.004a abravīc ca tadā rāmaṃ sākṣī lokasya pāvakaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8169: 6.106.004c eṣā te rāma vaidehī pāpam asyā na vidyate
GE09ram_06_u:8170: 6.106.005a naiva vācā na manasā nānudhyānān na cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_06_u:8171: 6.106.005c suvṛttā vṛttaśauṇḍīrā na tvām aticacāra ha
GE09ram_06_u:8173: 6.106.006c tvayā virahitā dīnā vivaśā nirjanād vanāt
GE09ram_06_u:8179: 6.106.009c na kiṃ cid abhidhātavyam aham ājñāpayāmi te
GE09ram_06_u:8182: 6.106.011a avaśyaṃ triṣu lokeṣu sītā pāvanam arhati
GE09ram_06_u:8185: 6.106.012c iti vakṣyanti māṃ santo jānakīm aviśodhya hi
GE09ram_06_u:8190: 6.106.015a imām api viśālākṣīṃ rakṣitāṃ svena tejasā
GE09ram_06_u:8192: 6.106.016a na hi śaktaḥ sa duṣṭātmā manasāpi hi maithilīm
GE09ram_06_u:8195: 6.106.017c ananyā hi mayā sītāṃ bhāskareṇa prabhā yathā
GE09ram_06_u:8197: 6.106.018c na hi hātum iyaṃ śakyā kīrtir ātmavatā yathā
GE09ram_06_u:8198: 6.106.019a avaśyaṃ ca mayā kāryaṃ sarveṣāṃ vo vaco hitam
GE09ram_06_u:8199: 6.106.019c snigdhānāṃ lokamānyānām evaṃ ca bruvatāṃ hitam
GE09ram_06_u:8200: 6.106.020a itīdam uktvā vacanaṃ mahābalaiḥ; praśasyamānaḥ svakṛtena karmaṇā
GE09ram_06_u:8201: 6.106.020c sametya rāmaḥ priyayā mahābalaḥ; sukhaṃ sukhārho 'nubabhūva rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8202: 6.107.001a etac chrutvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ rāghaveṇa subhāṣitam
GE09ram_06_u:8205: 6.107.002c diṣṭyā kṛtam idaṃ karma tvayā śastrabhṛtāṃ vara
GE09ram_06_u:8206: 6.107.003a diṣṭyā sarvasya lokasya pravṛddhaṃ dāruṇaṃ tamaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8207: 6.107.003c apāvṛttaṃ tvayā saṃkhye rāma rāvaṇajaṃ bhayam
GE09ram_06_u:8208: 6.107.004a āśvāsya bharataṃ dīnaṃ kausalyāṃ ca yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_06_u:8209: 6.107.004c kaikeyīṃ ca sumitrāṃ ca dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇamātaram
GE09ram_06_u:8213: 6.107.006c brāhmaṇebhyo dhanaṃ dattvā tridivaṃ gantum arhasi
GE09ram_06_u:8214: 6.107.007a eṣa rājā vimānasthaḥ pitā daśarathas tava
GE09ram_06_u:8215: 6.107.007c kākutstha mānuṣe loke gurus tava mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8216: 6.107.008a indralokaṃ gataḥ śrīmāṃs tvayā putreṇa tāritaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8217: 6.107.008c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā tvam enam abhivādaya
GE09ram_06_u:8221: 6.107.010c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā dadarśa pitaraṃ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8223: 6.107.011c prāṇaiḥ priyataraṃ dṛṣṭvā putraṃ daśarathas tadā
GE09ram_06_u:8226: 6.107.013a na me svargo bahumataḥ saṃmānaś ca surarṣibhiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8227: 6.107.013c tvayā rāma vihīnasya satyaṃ pratiśṛṇomi te
GE09ram_06_u:8228: 6.107.014a kaikeyyā yāni coktāni vākyāni vadatāṃ vara
GE09ram_06_u:8230: 6.107.015a tvāṃ tu dṛṣṭvā kuśalinaṃ pariṣvajya salakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:8231: 6.107.015c adya duḥkhād vimukto 'smi nīhārād iva bhāskaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8234: 6.107.017a idānīṃ ca vijānāmi yathā saumya sureśvaraiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8236: 6.107.018a siddhārthā khalu kausalyā yā tvāṃ rāma gṛhaṃ gatam
GE09ram_06_u:8238: 6.107.019a siddhārthāḥ khalu te rāma narā ye tvāṃ purīṃ gatam
GE09ram_06_u:8241: 6.107.020c iccheyaṃ tvām ahaṃ draṣṭuṃ bharatena samāgatam
GE09ram_06_u:8243: 6.107.021c vasatā sītayā sārdhaṃ lakṣmaṇena ca dhīmatā
GE09ram_06_u:8245: 6.107.022c rāvaṇaṃ ca raṇe hatvā devās te paritoṣitāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8246: 6.107.023a kṛtaṃ karma yaśaḥ ślāghyaṃ prāptaṃ te śatrusūdana
GE09ram_06_u:8247: 6.107.023c bhrātṛbhiḥ saha rājyastho dīrgham āyur avāpnuhi
GE09ram_06_u:8248: 6.107.024a iti bruvāṇaṃ rājānaṃ rāmaḥ prāñjalir abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:8249: 6.107.024c kuru prasādaṃ dharmajña kaikeyyā bharatasya ca
GE09ram_06_u:8250: 6.107.025a saputrāṃ tvāṃ tyajāmīti yad uktā kaikayī tvayā
GE09ram_06_u:8251: 6.107.025c sa śāpaḥ kaikayīṃ ghoraḥ saputrāṃ na spṛśet prabho
GE09ram_06_u:8252: 6.107.026a sa tatheti mahārājo rāmam uktvā kṛtāñjalim
GE09ram_06_u:8253: 6.107.026c lakṣmaṇaṃ ca pariṣvajya punar vākyam uvāca ha
GE09ram_06_u:8254: 6.107.027a rāmaṃ śuśrūṣatā bhaktyā vaidehyā saha sītayā
GE09ram_06_u:8255: 6.107.027c kṛtā mama mahāprītiḥ prāptaṃ dharmaphalaṃ ca te
GE09ram_06_u:8256: 6.107.028a dharmaṃ prāpsyasi dharmajña yaśaś ca vipulaṃ bhuvi
GE09ram_06_u:8257: 6.107.028c rāme prasanne svargaṃ ca mahimānaṃ tathaiva ca
GE09ram_06_u:8259: 6.107.029c rāmaḥ sarvasya lokasya śubheṣv abhirataḥ sadā
GE09ram_06_u:8260: 6.107.030a ete sendrās trayo lokāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8262: 6.107.031a etat tad uktam avyaktam akṣaraṃ brahmanirmitam
GE09ram_06_u:8263: 6.107.031c devānāṃ hṛdayaṃ saumya guhyaṃ rāmaḥ paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8264: 6.107.032a avāptaṃ dharmacaraṇaṃ yaśaś ca vipulaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_06_u:8265: 6.107.032c rāmaṃ śuśrūṣatā bhaktyā vaidehyā saha sītayā
GE09ram_06_u:8266: 6.107.033a sa tathoktvā mahābāhur lakṣmaṇaṃ prāñjaliṃ sthitam
GE09ram_06_u:8267: 6.107.033c uvāca rājā dharmātmā vaidehīṃ vacanaṃ śubham
GE09ram_06_u:8268: 6.107.034a kartavyo na tu vaidehi manyus tyāgam imaṃ prati
GE09ram_06_u:8270: 6.107.035a na tvaṃ subhru samādheyā patiśuśrūvaṇaṃ prati
GE09ram_06_u:8271: 6.107.035c avaśyaṃ tu mayā vācyam eṣa te daivataṃ param
GE09ram_06_u:8272: 6.107.036a iti pratisamādiśya putrau sītāṃ tathā snuṣām
GE09ram_06_u:8277: 6.108.002c prītiyukto 'smi tena tvaṃ brūhi yan manasecchasi
GE09ram_06_u:8278: 6.108.003a evam uktas tu kākutsthaḥ pratyuvāca kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8279: 6.108.003c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā sītayā cāpi bhāryayā
GE09ram_06_u:8281: 6.108.004c vakṣyāmi kuru me satyaṃ vacanaṃ vadatāṃ vara
GE09ram_06_u:8282: 6.108.005a mama hetoḥ parākrāntā ye gatā yamasādanam
GE09ram_06_u:8283: 6.108.005c te sarve jīvitaṃ prāpya samuttiṣṭhantu vānarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8284: 6.108.006a matpriyeṣv abhiraktāś ca na mṛtyuṃ gaṇayanti ca
GE09ram_06_u:8285: 6.108.006c tvatprasādāt sameyus te varam etad ahaṃ vṛṇe
GE09ram_06_u:8288: 6.108.008a akāle cāpi mukhyāni mūlāni ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:8289: 6.108.008c nadyaś ca vimalās tatra tiṣṭheyur yatra vānarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8290: 6.108.009a śrutvā tu vacanaṃ tasya rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8292: 6.108.010a mahān ayaṃ varas tāta tvayokto raghunandana
GE09ram_06_u:8294: 6.108.011a suhṛdbhir bāndhavaiś caiva jñātibhiḥ svajanena ca
GE09ram_06_u:8295: 6.108.011c sarva eva sameṣyanti saṃyuktāḥ parayā mudā
GE09ram_06_u:8298: 6.108.013a savraṇaiḥ prathamaṃ gātraiḥ saṃvṛtair nivraṇaiḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8299: 6.108.013c babhūvur vānarāḥ sarve kim etad iti vismitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8301: 6.108.014c ūcus te prathamaṃ stutvā stavārhaṃ sahalakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:8302: 6.108.015a gacchāyodhyām ito vīra visarjaya ca vānarān
GE09ram_06_u:8306: 6.108.017a evam uktvā tam āmantrya rāmaṃ saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_06_u:8307: 6.108.017c vimānaiḥ sūryasaṃkāśair hṛṣṭā jagmuḥ surā divam
GE09ram_06_u:8308: 6.108.018a abhivādya ca kākutsthaḥ sarvāṃs tāṃs tridaśottamān
GE09ram_06_u:8309: 6.108.018c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā vāsam ājñāpayat tadā
GE09ram_06_u:8310: 6.108.019a tatas tu sā lakṣmaṇarāmapālitā; mahācamūr hṛṣṭajanā yaśasvinī
GE09ram_06_u:8311: 6.108.019c śriyā jvalantī virarāja sarvato; niśāpraṇīteva hi śītaraśminā
GE09ram_06_u:8312: 6.109.001a tāṃ rātrim uṣitaṃ rāmaṃ sukhotthitam ariṃdamam
GE09ram_06_u:8313: 6.109.001c abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ jayaṃ pṛṣṭvā vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8315: 6.109.002c candanāni ca divyāni mālyāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:8318: 6.109.004a evam uktas tu kākutsthaḥ pratyuvāca vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:8320: 6.109.005a sa tu tāmyati dharmātmā mamahetoḥ sukhocitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8323: 6.109.006c na me snānaṃ bahumataṃ vastrāṇy ābharaṇāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:8324: 6.109.007a ita eva pathā kṣipraṃ pratigacchāma tāṃ purīm
GE09ram_06_u:8325: 6.109.007c ayodhyām āyato hy eṣa panthāḥ paramadurgamaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8326: 6.109.008a evam uktas tu kākutsthaṃ pratyuvāca vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8327: 6.109.008c ahnā tvāṃ prāpayiṣyāmi tāṃ purīṃ pārthivātmaja
GE09ram_06_u:8328: 6.109.009a puṣpakaṃ nāma bhadraṃ te vimānaṃ sūryasaṃnibham
GE09ram_06_u:8330: 6.109.010a tad idaṃ meghasaṃkāśaṃ vimānam iha tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_06_u:8331: 6.109.010c tena yāsyasi yānena tvam ayodhyāṃ gajajvaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8332: 6.109.011a ahaṃ te yady anugrāhyo yadi smarasi me guṇān
GE09ram_06_u:8333: 6.109.011c vasa tāvad iha prājña yady asti mayi sauhṛdam
GE09ram_06_u:8334: 6.109.012a lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā vaidehyā cāpi bhāryayā
GE09ram_06_u:8335: 6.109.012c arcitaḥ sarvakāmais tvaṃ tato rāma gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_06_u:8336: 6.109.013a prītiyuktas tu me rāma sasainyaḥ sasuhṛdgaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8337: 6.109.013c satkriyāṃ vihitāṃ tāvad gṛhāṇa tvaṃ mayodyatām
GE09ram_06_u:8338: 6.109.014a praṇayād bahumānāc ca sauhṛdena ca rāghava
GE09ram_06_u:8339: 6.109.014c prasādayāmi preṣyo 'haṃ na khalv ājñāpayāmi te
GE09ram_06_u:8340: 6.109.015a evam uktas tato rāmaḥ pratyuvāca vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:8344: 6.109.017a na khalv etan na kuryāṃ te vacanaṃ rākṣaseśvara
GE09ram_06_u:8345: 6.109.017c taṃ tu me bhrātaraṃ draṣṭuṃ bharataṃ tvarate manaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8347: 6.109.018c śirasā yācato yasya vacanaṃ na kṛtaṃ mayā
GE09ram_06_u:8348: 6.109.019a kausalyāṃ ca sumitrāṃ ca kaikeyīṃ ca yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_06_u:8349: 6.109.019c gurūṃś ca suhṛdaś caiva paurāṃś ca tanayaiḥ saha
GE09ram_06_u:8351: 6.109.020c kṛtakāryasya me vāsaḥ kathaṃ cid iha saṃmataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8353: 6.109.021c manyur na khalu kartavyas tvaritas tvānumānaye
GE09ram_06_u:8366: 6.110.001a upasthitaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā puṣpakaṃ puṣpabhūṣitam
GE09ram_06_u:8368: 6.110.002a sa tu baddhāñjaliḥ prahvo vinīto rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8373: 6.110.004c ratnair arthaiś ca vivibhair bhūṣaṇaiś cābhipūjaya
GE09ram_06_u:8376: 6.110.006a evaṃ saṃmānitāś ceme mānārhā mānada tvayā
GE09ram_06_u:8379: 6.110.007c yatas tvām avagacchanti tataḥ saṃbodhayāmi te
GE09ram_06_u:8380: 6.110.008a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa vānarāṃs tān vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8382: 6.110.009a tatas tān pūjitān dṛṣṭvā ratnair arthaiś ca yūthapān
GE09ram_06_u:8383: 6.110.009c āruroha tato rāmas tad vimānam anuttamam
GE09ram_06_u:8387: 6.110.011c sugrīvaṃ ca mahāvīryaṃ rākṣasaṃ ca vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:8390: 6.110.013a yat tu kāryaṃ vayasyena suhṛdā vā paraṃtapa
GE09ram_06_u:8391: 6.110.013c kṛtaṃ sugrīva tat sarvaṃ bhavatā dharmabhīruṇā
GE09ram_06_u:8393: 6.110.014a svarājye vasa laṅkāyāṃ mayā datte vibhīṣaṇa
GE09ram_06_u:8394: 6.110.014c na tvāṃ dharṣayituṃ śaktāḥ sendrā api divaukasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8397: 6.110.016a evam uktās tu rāmeṇa vānarās te mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8398: 6.110.016c ūcuḥ prāñjalayo rāmaṃ rākṣasaś ca vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8399: 6.110.016e ayodhyāṃ gantum icchāmaḥ sarvān nayatu no bhavān
GE09ram_06_u:8400: 6.110.017a dṛṣṭvā tvām abhiṣekārdraṃ kausalyām abhivādya ca
GE09ram_06_u:8402: 6.110.018a evam uktas tu dharmātmā vānaraiḥ savibhīṣaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8404: 6.110.019a priyāt priyataraṃ labdhaṃ yad ahaṃ sasuhṛjjanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8405: 6.110.019c sarvair bhavadbhiḥ sahitaḥ prītiṃ lapsye purīṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8406: 6.110.020a kṣipram āroha sugrīva vimānaṃ vānaraiḥ saha
GE09ram_06_u:8408: 6.110.021a tatas tat puṣpakaṃ divyaṃ sugrīvaḥ saha senayā
GE09ram_06_u:8409: 6.110.021c adhyārohat tvarañ śīghraṃ sāmātyaś ca vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8413: 6.110.023c prahṛṣṭaś ca pratītaś ca babhau rāmaḥ kuberavat
GE09ram_06_u:8414: 6.111.001a anujñātaṃ tu rāmeṇa tad vimānam anuttamam
GE09ram_06_u:8421: 6.111.004c harīṇāṃ rākṣasānāṃ ca sīte viśasanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_06_u:8426: 6.111.007a akampanaś ca nihato balino 'nye ca rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8428: 6.111.008a atra mandodarī nāma bhāryā taṃ paryadevayat
GE09ram_06_u:8430: 6.111.009a etat tu dṛśyate tīrthaṃ samudrasya varānane
GE09ram_06_u:8431: 6.111.009c yatra sāgaram uttīrya tāṃ rātrim uṣitā vayam
GE09ram_06_u:8432: 6.111.010a eṣa setur mayā baddhaḥ sāgare salilārṇave
GE09ram_06_u:8439: 6.111.014a eṣā sā dṛśyate sīte kiṣkindhā citrakānanā
GE09ram_06_u:8440: 6.111.014c sugrīvasya purī ramyā yatra vālī mayā hataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8441: 6.111.015a dṛśyate 'sau mahān sīte savidyud iva toyadaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8444: 6.111.016c samayaś ca kṛtaḥ sīte vadhārthaṃ vālino mayā
GE09ram_06_u:8445: 6.111.017a eṣā sā dṛśyate pampā nalinī citrakānanā
GE09ram_06_u:8447: 6.111.018a asyās tīre mayā dṛṣṭā śabarī dharmacāriṇī
GE09ram_06_u:8448: 6.111.018c atra yojanabāhuś ca kabandho nihato mayā
GE09ram_06_u:8450: 6.111.019c yatra yuddhaṃ mahad vṛttaṃ tavahetor vilāsini
GE09ram_06_u:8452: 6.111.020a kharaś ca nihataś saṃkhye dūṣaṇaś ca nipātitaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8453: 6.111.020c triśirāś ca mahāvīryo mayā bāṇair ajihmagaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8455: 6.111.021c yatra tvaṃ rākṣasendreṇa rāvaṇena hṛtā balāt
GE09ram_06_u:8457: 6.111.022c agastyasyāśramo hy eṣa dṛśyate paśya maithili
GE09ram_06_u:8462: 6.111.024e atra sīte tvayā dṛṣṭā tāpasī dharmacāriṇī
GE09ram_06_u:8463: 6.111.025a asmin deśe mahākāyo virādho nihato mayā
GE09ram_06_u:8466: 6.111.027a eṣā sā yamunā dūrād dṛśyate citrakānanā
GE09ram_06_u:8470: 6.111.029a eṣā sā dṛśyate 'yodhyā rājadhānī pitur mama
GE09ram_06_u:8471: 6.111.029c ayodhyāṃ kuru vaidehi praṇāmaṃ punar āgatā
GE09ram_06_u:8472: 6.111.030a tatas te vānarāḥ sarve rākṣasaś ca vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8474: 6.111.031a tatas tu tāṃ pāṇḍuraharmyamālinīṃ; viśālakakṣyāṃ gajavājisaṃkulām
GE09ram_06_u:8475: 6.111.031c purīm ayodhyāṃ dadṛśuḥ plavaṃgamāḥ; purīṃ mahendrasya yathāmarāvatīm
GE09ram_06_u:8479: 6.112.002c śṛṇoṣi ka cid bhagavan subhikṣānāmayaṃ pure
GE09ram_06_u:8480: 6.112.002e kaccic ca yukto bharato jīvanty api ca mātaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8481: 6.112.003a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa bharadvājo mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8483: 6.112.004a paṅkadigdhas tu bharato jaṭilas tvāṃ pratīkṣate
GE09ram_06_u:8484: 6.112.004c pāduke te puraskṛtya sarvaṃ ca kuśalaṃ gṛhe
GE09ram_06_u:8486: 6.112.005c strītṛtīyaṃ cyutaṃ rājyād dharmakāmaṃ ca kevalam
GE09ram_06_u:8489: 6.112.007a dṛṣṭvā tu karuṇā pūrvaṃ mamāsīt samitiṃjaya
GE09ram_06_u:8492: 6.112.008c samīkṣya vijitāriṃ tvāṃ mama prītir anuttamā
GE09ram_06_u:8493: 6.112.009a sarvaṃ ca sukhaduḥkhaṃ te viditaṃ mama rāghava
GE09ram_06_u:8498: 6.112.011c sugrīveṇa ca te sakhyaṃ yac ca vālī hatas tvayā
GE09ram_06_u:8499: 6.112.012a mārgaṇaṃ caiva vaidehyāḥ karma vātātmajasya ca
GE09ram_06_u:8500: 6.112.012c viditāyāṃ ca vaidehyāṃ nalasetur yathā kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8501: 6.112.012e yathā ca dīpitā laṅkā prahṛṣṭair hariyūthapaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8503: 6.112.013c yathā ca nihataḥ saṃkhye rāvaṇo devakaṇṭakaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8504: 6.112.014a samāgamaś ca tridaśair yathādattaś ca te varaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8506: 6.112.015a aham apy atra te dadmi varaṃ śastrabhṛtāṃ vara
GE09ram_06_u:8508: 6.112.016a tasya tac chirasā vākyaṃ pratigṛhya nṛpātmajaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8509: 6.112.016c bāḍham ity eva saṃhṛṣṭaḥ śrīmān varam ayācata
GE09ram_06_u:8511: 6.112.017c bhavantu mārge bhagavann ayodhyāṃ prati gacchataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8513: 6.112.018c śuṣkāḥ samagrapatrās te nagāś caiva madhusravāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8514: 6.113.001a ayodhyāṃ tu samālokya cintayām āsa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8518: 6.113.003a ayodhyāṃ tvarito gaccha kṣipraṃ tvaṃ plavagottama
GE09ram_06_u:8522: 6.113.005a śrutvā tu māṃ kuśalinam arogaṃ vigatajvaram
GE09ram_06_u:8523: 6.113.005c bhaviṣyati guhaḥ prītaḥ sa mamātmasamaḥ sakhā
GE09ram_06_u:8524: 6.113.006a ayodhyāyāś ca te mārgaṃ pravṛttiṃ bharatasya ca
GE09ram_06_u:8526: 6.113.007a bharatas tu tvayā vācyaḥ kuśalaṃ vacanān mama
GE09ram_06_u:8527: 6.113.007c siddhārthaṃ śaṃsa māṃ tasmai sabhāryaṃ sahalakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:8529: 6.113.008c sugrīveṇa ca saṃvādaṃ vālinaś ca vadhaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_06_u:8533: 6.113.010c yathā ca kāritaḥ setū rāvaṇaś ca yathā hataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8536: 6.113.012a jitvā śatrugaṇān rāmaḥ prāpya cānuttamaṃ yaśaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8538: 6.113.013a etac chrutvā yamākāraṃ bhajate bharatas tataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8539: 6.113.013c sa ca te veditavyaḥ syāt sarvaṃ yac cāpi māṃ prati
GE09ram_06_u:8540: 6.113.014a jñeyāḥ sarve ca vṛttāntā bharatasyeṅgitāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:8544: 6.113.016a saṃgatyā bharataḥ śrīmān rājyenārthī svayaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_06_u:8546: 6.113.017a tasya buddhiṃ ca vijñāya vyavasāyaṃ ca vānara
GE09ram_06_u:8547: 6.113.017c yāvan na dūraṃ yātāḥ smaḥ kṣipram āgantum arhasi
GE09ram_06_u:8549: 6.113.018c mānuṣaṃ dhārayan rūpam ayodhyāṃ tvarito yayau
GE09ram_06_u:8553: 6.113.020c sa vācā śubhayā hṛṣṭo hanūmān idam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:8554: 6.113.021a sakhā tu tava kākutstho rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8555: 6.113.021c sasītaḥ saha saumitriḥ sa tvāṃ kuśalam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:8556: 6.113.022a pañcamīm adya rajanīm uṣitvā vacanān muneḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8560: 6.113.024a so 'paśyad rāmatīrthaṃ ca nadīṃ vālukinīṃ tathā
GE09ram_06_u:8561: 6.113.024c gomatīṃ tāṃ ca so 'paśyad bhīmaṃ sālavanaṃ tathā
GE09ram_06_u:8562: 6.113.025a sa gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ tvaritaḥ kapikuñjaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8570: 6.113.029a pāduke te puraskṛtya śāsantaṃ vai vasuṃdharām
GE09ram_06_u:8572: 6.113.030a upasthitam amātyaiś ca śucibhiś ca purohitaiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8574: 6.113.031a na hi te rājaputraṃ taṃ cīrakṛṣṇājināmbaram
GE09ram_06_u:8576: 6.113.032a taṃ dharmam iva dharmajñaṃ devavantam ivāparam
GE09ram_06_u:8579: 6.113.033c anuśocasi kākutsthaṃ sa tvā kuśalam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:8580: 6.113.034a priyam ākhyāmi te deva śokaṃ tyakṣyasi dāruṇam
GE09ram_06_u:8581: 6.113.034c asmin muhūrte bhrātrā tvaṃ rāmeṇa saha saṃgataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8582: 6.113.035a nihatya rāvaṇaṃ rāmaḥ pratilabhya ca maithilīm
GE09ram_06_u:8584: 6.113.036a lakṣmaṇaś ca mahātejā vaidehī ca yaśasvinī
GE09ram_06_u:8585: 6.113.036c sītā samagrā rāmeṇa mahendreṇa śacī yathā
GE09ram_06_u:8587: 6.113.037c papāta sahasā hṛṣṭo harṣān mohaṃ jagāma ha
GE09ram_06_u:8588: 6.113.038a tato muhūrtād utthāya pratyāśvasya ca rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8592: 6.113.040a devo vā mānuṣo vā tvam anukrośād ihāgataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8593: 6.113.040c priyākhyānasya te saumya dadāmi bruvataḥ priyam
GE09ram_06_u:8594: 6.113.041a gavāṃ śatasahasraṃ ca grāmāṇāṃ ca śataṃ param
GE09ram_06_u:8595: 6.113.041c sakuṇḍalāḥ śubhācārā bhāryāḥ kanyāś ca ṣoḍaśa
GE09ram_06_u:8599: 6.113.043c praharṣito rāmadidṛkṣayābhavat; punaś ca harṣād idam abravīd vacaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8600: 6.114.001a bahūni nāma varṣāṇi gatasya sumahad vanam
GE09ram_06_u:8601: 6.114.001c śṛṇomy ahaṃ prītikaraṃ mama nāthasya kīrtanam
GE09ram_06_u:8602: 6.114.002a kalyāṇī bata gātheyaṃ laukikī pratibhāti me
GE09ram_06_u:8603: 6.114.002c eti jīvantam ānando naraṃ varṣaśatād api
GE09ram_06_u:8604: 6.114.003a rāghavasya harīṇāṃ ca katham āsīt samāgamaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8605: 6.114.003c kasmin deśe kim āśritya tat tvam ākhyāhi pṛcchataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8607: 6.114.004c ācacakṣe tataḥ sarvaṃ rāmasya caritaṃ vane
GE09ram_06_u:8608: 6.114.005a yathā pravrajito rāmo mātur datte vare tava
GE09ram_06_u:8609: 6.114.005c yathā ca putraśokena rājā daśaratho mṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8610: 6.114.006a yathā dūtais tvam ānītas tūrṇaṃ rājagṛhāt prabho
GE09ram_06_u:8611: 6.114.006c tvayāyodhyāṃ praviṣṭena yathā rājyaṃ na cepsitam
GE09ram_06_u:8613: 6.114.007c nimantritas tvayā bhrātā dharmam ācaritā satām
GE09ram_06_u:8614: 6.114.008a sthitena rājño vacane yathā rājyaṃ visarjitam
GE09ram_06_u:8615: 6.114.008c āryasya pāduke gṛhya yathāsi punar āgataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8616: 6.114.009a sarvam etan mahābāho yathāvad viditaṃ tava
GE09ram_06_u:8617: 6.114.009c tvayi pratiprayāte tu yad vṛttaṃ tan nibodha me
GE09ram_06_u:8620: 6.114.011a teṣāṃ purastād balavān gacchatāṃ gahane vane
GE09ram_06_u:8623: 6.114.012c nikhāte prakṣipanti sma nadantam iva kuñjaram
GE09ram_06_u:8624: 6.114.013a tat kṛtvā duṣkaraṃ karma bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_06_u:8635: 6.114.018c lobhayām āsa vaidehīṃ bhūtvā ratnamayo mṛgaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8636: 6.114.019a sā rāmam abravīd dṛṣṭvā vaidehī gṛhyatām iti
GE09ram_06_u:8637: 6.114.019c aho manoharaḥ kānta āśrame no bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_06_u:8640: 6.114.021a atha saumyā daśagrīvo mṛgaṃ yāte tu rāghave
