GE09ram_06_u:8642: 6.114.021e jagrāha tarasā sītāṃ grahaḥ khe rohiṇīm iva
GE09ram_06_u:8643: 6.114.022a trātukāmaṃ tato yuddhe hatvā gṛdhraṃ jaṭāyuṣam
GE09ram_06_u:8644: 6.114.022c pragṛhya sītāṃ sahasā jagāmāśu sa rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8650: 6.114.025c praveśya maithilīṃ vākyaiḥ sāntvayām āsa rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8652: 6.114.027a gṛdhraṃ hataṃ tadā dagdhvā rāmaḥ priyasakhaṃ pituḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8657: 6.114.029a tayoḥ samāgamaḥ pūrvaṃ prītyā hārdo vyajāyata
GE09ram_06_u:8667: 6.114.034a bhrātā tu gṛdhrarājasya saṃpātir nāma vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:8673: 6.114.037a tayā sametya vidhivat pṛṣṭvā sarvam aninditām
GE09ram_06_u:8676: 6.114.038c abhijñānaṃ mayā dattam arciṣmān sa mahāmaṇiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8677: 6.114.039a śrutvā tāṃ maithilīṃ hṛṣṭas tv āśaśaṃse sa jīvitam
GE09ram_06_u:8680: 6.114.040c jighāṃsur iva lokāṃs te sarvāṃl lokān vibhāvasuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8681: 6.114.041a tataḥ samudram āsādya nalaṃ setum akārayat
GE09ram_06_u:8683: 6.114.042a prahastam avadhīn nīlaḥ kumbhakarṇaṃ tu rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8684: 6.114.042c lakṣmaṇo rāvaṇasutaṃ svayaṃ rāmas tu rāvaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:8685: 6.114.043a sa śakreṇa samāgamya yamena varuṇena ca
GE09ram_06_u:8686: 6.114.043c surarṣibhiś ca kākutstho varāṃl lebhe paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8687: 6.114.044a sa tu dattavaraḥ prītyā vānaraiś ca samāgataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8689: 6.114.045a taṃ gaṅgāṃ punar āsādya vasantaṃ munisaṃnidhau
GE09ram_06_u:8690: 6.114.045c avighnaṃ puṣyayogena śvo rāmaṃ draṣṭum arhasi
GE09ram_06_u:8691: 6.114.046a tataḥ sa satyaṃ hanumadvaco mahan; niśamya hṛṣṭo bharataḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8692: 6.114.046c uvāca vāṇīṃ manasaḥ praharṣiṇī; cirasya pūrṇaḥ khalu me manorathaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8693: 6.115.001a śrutvā tu param ānandaṃ bharataḥ satyavikramaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8695: 6.115.002a daivatāni ca sarvāṇi caityāni nagarasya ca
GE09ram_06_u:8702: 6.115.005c sthānāni ca nirasyantāṃ nandigrāmād itaḥ param
GE09ram_06_u:8704: 6.115.006c tato 'bhyavakiraṃs tv anye lājaiḥ puṣpaiś ca sarvataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8711: 6.115.009e niryayus tvarayā yuktā rathaiś ca sumahārathāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8713: 6.115.010c kausalyāṃ pramukhe kṛtvā sumitrāṃ cāpi niryayuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8716: 6.115.012a kṛtsnaṃ ca nagaraṃ tat tu nandigrāmam upāgamat
GE09ram_06_u:8718: 6.115.013a mālyamodaka hastaiś ca mantribhir bharato vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8724: 6.115.016a bhrātur āgamanaṃ śrutvā tat pūrvaṃ harṣam āgataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8725: 6.115.016c pratyudyayau tadā rāmaṃ mahātmā sacivaiḥ saha
GE09ram_06_u:8727: 6.115.017c kaccin na khalu kāpeyī sevyate calacittatā
GE09ram_06_u:8728: 6.115.017e na hi paśyāmi kākutsthaṃ rāmam āryaṃ paraṃtapam
GE09ram_06_u:8729: 6.115.018a athaivam ukte vacane hanūmān idam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:8731: 6.115.019a sadā phalān kusumitān vṛkṣān prāpya madhusravān
GE09ram_06_u:8733: 6.115.020a tasya caiṣa varo datto vāsavena paraṃtapa
GE09ram_06_u:8736: 6.115.021c manye vānarasenā sā nadīṃ tarati gomatīm
GE09ram_06_u:8739: 6.115.023a tad etad dṛśyate dūrād vimalaṃ candrasaṃnibham
GE09ram_06_u:8741: 6.115.024a rāvaṇaṃ bāndhavaiḥ sārdhaṃ hatvā labdhaṃ mahātmanā
GE09ram_06_u:8743: 6.115.025a etasmin bhrātarau vīrau vaidehyā saha rāghavau
GE09ram_06_u:8748: 6.115.027c dadṛśus taṃ vimānasthaṃ narāḥ somam ivāmbare
GE09ram_06_u:8754: 6.115.030c vavande praṇato rāmaṃ merustham iva bhāskaram
GE09ram_06_u:8759: 6.115.033a tato lakṣmaṇam āsādya vaidehīṃ ca paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8762: 6.115.034c maindaṃ ca dvividaṃ nīlam ṛṣabhaṃ caiva sasvaje
GE09ram_06_u:8763: 6.115.035a te kṛtvā mānuṣaṃ rūpaṃ vānarāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8765: 6.115.036a vibhīṣaṇaṃ ca bharataḥ sāntvayan vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_06_u:8766: 6.115.036c diṣṭyā tvayā sahāyena kṛtaṃ karma suduṣkaram
GE09ram_06_u:8767: 6.115.037a śatrughnaś ca tadā rāmam abhivādya salakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_06_u:8770: 6.115.038c jagrāha praṇataḥ pādau mano mātuḥ prasādayan
GE09ram_06_u:8771: 6.115.039a abhivādya sumitrāṃ ca kaikeyīṃ ca yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_06_u:8772: 6.115.039c sa mātṝś ca tadā sarvāḥ purohitam upāgamat
GE09ram_06_u:8774: 6.115.040c iti prāñjalayaḥ sarve nāgarā rāmam abruvan
GE09ram_06_u:8777: 6.115.042a pāduke te tu rāmasya gṛhītvā bharataḥ svayam
GE09ram_06_u:8779: 6.115.043a abravīc ca tadā rāmaṃ bharataḥ sa kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8780: 6.115.043c etat te rakṣitaṃ rājan rājyaṃ niryātitaṃ mayā
GE09ram_06_u:8781: 6.115.044a adya janma kṛtārthaṃ me saṃvṛttaś ca manorathaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8782: 6.115.044c yas tvāṃ paśyāmi rājānam ayodhyāṃ punar āgatam
GE09ram_06_u:8783: 6.115.045a avekṣatāṃ bhavān kośaṃ koṣṭhāgāraṃ puraṃ balam
GE09ram_06_u:8784: 6.115.045c bhavatas tejasā sarvaṃ kṛtaṃ daśaguṇaṃ mayā
GE09ram_06_u:8785: 6.115.046a tathā bruvāṇaṃ bharataṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ bhrātṛvatsalam
GE09ram_06_u:8786: 6.115.046c mumucur vānarā bāṣpaṃ rākṣasaś ca vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8787: 6.115.047a tataḥ praharṣād bharatam aṅkam āropya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8791: 6.115.049a abravīc ca tadā rāmas tadvimānam anuttamam
GE09ram_06_u:8796: 6.115.051c nipīḍya pādau pṛthag āsane śubhe; sahaiva tenopaviveśa vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:8799: 6.116.002a pūjitā māmikā mātā dattaṃ rājyam idaṃ mama
GE09ram_06_u:8800: 6.116.002c tad dadāmi punas tubhyaṃ yathā tvam adadā mama
GE09ram_06_u:8802: 6.116.003c kiśoravad guruṃ bhāraṃ na voḍhum aham utsahe
GE09ram_06_u:8803: 6.116.004a vārivegena mahatā bhinnaḥ setur iva kṣaran
GE09ram_06_u:8805: 6.116.005a gatiṃ khara ivāśvasya haṃsasyeva ca vāyasaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8806: 6.116.005c nānvetum utsahe deva tava mārgam ariṃdama
GE09ram_06_u:8807: 6.116.006a yathā ca ropito vṛkṣo jātaś cāntarniveśane
GE09ram_06_u:8809: 6.116.007a śīryeta puṣpito bhūtvā na phalāni pradarśayet
GE09ram_06_u:8810: 6.116.007c tasya nānubhaved arthaṃ yasya hetoḥ sa ropyate
GE09ram_06_u:8811: 6.116.008a eṣopamā mahābāho tvam arthaṃ vettum arhasi
GE09ram_06_u:8812: 6.116.008c yady asmān manujendra tvaṃ bhaktān bhṛtyān na śādhi hi
GE09ram_06_u:8816: 6.116.010c madhurair gītaśabdaiś ca pratibudhyasva śeṣva ca
GE09ram_06_u:8817: 6.116.011a yāvad āvartate cakraṃ yāvatī ca vasuṃdharā
GE09ram_06_u:8818: 6.116.011c tāvat tvam iha sarvasya svāmitvam abhivartaya
GE09ram_06_u:8823: 6.116.014a pūrvaṃ tu bharate snāte lakṣmaṇe ca mahābale
GE09ram_06_u:8827: 6.116.016a pratikarma ca rāmasya kārayām āsa vīryavān
GE09ram_06_u:8837: 6.116.021a ayodhyāyāṃ tu sacivā rājño daśarathasya ye
GE09ram_06_u:8841: 6.116.022e kartum arhatha rāmasya yad yan maṅgalapūrvakam
GE09ram_06_u:8842: 6.116.023a iti te mantriṇaḥ sarve saṃdiśya tu purohitam
GE09ram_06_u:8845: 6.116.024c prayayau ratham āsthāya rāmo nagaram uttamam
GE09ram_06_u:8846: 6.116.025a jagrāha bharato raśmīñ śatrughnaś chatram ādade
GE09ram_06_u:8862: 6.116.033a amātyair brāhmaṇaiś caiva tathā prakṛtibhir vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8863: 6.116.033c śriyā viruruce rāmo nakṣatrair iva candramāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8866: 6.116.035a akṣataṃ jātarūpaṃ ca gāvaḥ kanyās tathā dvijāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8867: 6.116.035c narā modakahastāś ca rāmasya purato yayuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8868: 6.116.036a sakhyaṃ ca rāmaḥ sugrīve prabhāvaṃ cānilātmaje
GE09ram_06_u:8869: 6.116.036c vānarāṇāṃ ca tat karma vyācacakṣe 'tha mantriṇām
GE09ram_06_u:8873: 6.116.038a tato hy abhyucchrayan paurāḥ patākās te gṛhe gṛhe
GE09ram_06_u:8875: 6.116.039a pitur bhavanam āsādya praviśya ca mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8876: 6.116.039c kausalyāṃ ca sumitrāṃ ca kaikeyīṃ cābhyavādayat
GE09ram_06_u:8879: 6.116.041a yac ca madbhavanaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ sāśokavanikaṃ mahat
GE09ram_06_u:8882: 6.116.042c pāṇau gṛhītvā sugrīvaṃ praviveśa tam ālayam
GE09ram_06_u:8890: 6.116.046c pūrṇair ghaṭaiḥ pratīkṣadhvaṃ tathā kuruta vānarāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8892: 6.116.047c utpetur gaganaṃ śīghraṃ garuḍā iva śīghragāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8893: 6.116.048a jāmbavāṃś ca hanūmāṃś ca vegadarśī ca vānaraḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8898: 6.116.050a ṛṣabho dakṣiṇāt tūrṇaṃ samudrāj jalam āharat
GE09ram_06_u:8905: 6.116.054a tataḥ sa prayato vṛddho vasiṣṭho brāhmaṇaiḥ saha
GE09ram_06_u:8907: 6.116.055a vasiṣṭho vāmadevaś ca jābālir atha kāśyapaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8908: 6.116.055c kātyāyanaḥ suyajñaś ca gautamo vijayas tathā
GE09ram_06_u:8911: 6.116.057a ṛtvigbhir brāhmaṇaiḥ pūrvaṃ kanyābhir mantribhis tathā
GE09ram_06_u:8914: 6.116.058c caturhir lokapālaiś ca sarvair devaiś ca saṃgataiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8915: 6.116.059a chatraṃ tasya ca jagrāha śatrughnaḥ pāṇḍuraṃ śubham
GE09ram_06_u:8923: 6.116.062c abhiṣeke tad arhasya tadā rāmasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8924: 6.116.063a bhūmiḥ sasyavatī caiva phalavantaś ca pādapāḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8926: 6.116.064a sahasraśatam aśvānāṃ dhenūnāṃ ca gavāṃ tathā
GE09ram_06_u:8927: 6.116.064c dadau śataṃ vṛṣān pūrvaṃ dvijebhyo manujarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8936: 6.116.069a araje vāsasī divye śubhāny ābharaṇāni ca
GE09ram_06_u:8939: 6.116.070c avaikṣata harīn sarvān bhartāraṃ ca muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8941: 6.116.071c pradehi subhage hāraṃ yasya tuṣṭāsi bhāmini
GE09ram_06_u:8942: 6.116.072a pauruṣaṃ vikramo buddhir yasminn etāni nityadā
GE09ram_06_u:8943: 6.116.072c dadau sā vāyuputrāya taṃ hāram asitekṣaṇā
GE09ram_06_u:8946: 6.116.074a tato dvivida maindābhyāṃ nīlāya ca paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8950: 6.116.076a yathārhaṃ pūjitāḥ sarve kāmai ratnaiś ca puṣkalair
GE09ram_06_u:8954: 6.116.078a ātiṣṭha dharmajña mayā sahemāṃ; gāṃ pūrvarājādhyuṣitāṃ balena
GE09ram_06_u:8955: 6.116.078c tulyaṃ mayā tvaṃ pitṛbhir dhṛtā yā; tāṃ yauvarājye dhuram udvahasva
GE09ram_06_u:8956: 6.116.079a sarvātmanā paryanunīyamāno; yadā na saumitrir upaiti yogam
GE09ram_06_u:8957: 6.116.079c niyujyamāno bhuvi yauvarājye; tato 'bhyaṣiñcad bharataṃ mahātmā
GE09ram_06_u:8958: 6.116.080a rāghavaś cāpi dharmātmā prāpya rājyam anuttamam
GE09ram_06_u:8961: 6.116.081c anyaiś ca vividhair yajñair ayajat pārthivarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8966: 6.116.084a na paryadevan vidhavā na ca vyālakṛtaṃ bhayam
GE09ram_06_u:8967: 6.116.084c na vyādhijaṃ bhayaṃ vāpi rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati
GE09ram_06_u:8968: 6.116.085a nirdasyur abhaval loko nānarthaḥ kaṃ cid aspṛśat
GE09ram_06_u:8969: 6.116.085c na ca sma vṛddhā bālānāṃ pretakāryāṇi kurvate
GE09ram_06_u:8973: 6.116.087c nirāmayā viśokāś ca rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati
GE09ram_06_u:8975: 6.116.088c kālavarṣī ca parjanyaḥ sukhasparśaś ca mārutaḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8976: 6.116.089a svakarmasu pravartante tuṣṭhāḥ svair eva karmabhiḥ
GE09ram_06_u:8977: 6.116.089c āsan prajā dharmaparā rāme śāsati nānṛtāḥ
